counter_narrative: This is not true, in Judaism every person is equal in front of god. In fact, differently from other religions, Judaism says that whoever decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah (that is a set of laws for all of humanity) will receive the same rewards after death as a righteous Jew. So, even without being Jewish you can have access to God's glory.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews not only run Hollywood, they also control the world economy
CN: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry. Likewise, Jews constitute a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies.
HS: Apparently they got to you too. I can't believe people can't see that the Jews control everything, including the government.
CN: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

hate_speech: They don't act like us, they're so disgusting und uncivilised! Europe is not the place for them.
counter_narrative: Since they are EU members and are treated fairly, I would say that this is not true.
dialogue_history:
HS: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
CN: No, hating someone just because of their religion, skin colour or gender is wrong.
HS: It's not, Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: I don't know where you got this idea, how can you say that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe?

hate_speech: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
counter_narrative: Can you say that someone can be "too tolerant"?
dialogue_history:
HS: Yes, it happens when your nation is floaded with immigrants and loafers.
CN: Loafers? The very powerful working class we always have had, has had many contributions made by immigrants.

hate_speech: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
counter_narrative: This is a simplistic and ill-informed argument, and ultimately it just stirs up more division and negativity, like many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.
dialogue_history:
HS: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
CN: If it's a cultural issue then they should teach about the N-word only in history classes. Otherwise, it's just another excuse to justify racism.

hate_speech: Women shouldn't have respect and admiration, they shouldn't have any right in a civilised society
counter_narrative: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
CN: Women have been oppressed by men. The level of equality that exists today is due, in large part, to the work of women like Germaine Greer.
HS: They should've stayed oppressed! Women have no place in a free and open society. They should just do their housework and raise children without complaining.
CN: Women have other choices than just housework and motherhood. They are human beings with freedom of choice who deserve our respect and admiration.

hate_speech: However, Muslims persecute Christians because they don't want us to choose. They're not peaceful.
counter_narrative: The problem is a lack of human and democratic rights, not Islam.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
CN: I've never heard such a thing. Islam is a religion and anyone can choose it or not.

hate_speech: No, it is not about fear. They REALLY are just a bunch of criminal monkeys.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but having a particular racial identity doesn't automatically makes someone bad or inferior.
dialogue_history:
HS: Afro-Caribbean's are just a bunch of stupid and dangerous dancing n*ggers, they should be banned.
CN: Hate speech is still directed at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and this is the result of fear towards different ways of life.

hate_speech: I don't see Muslim contributing to my country! They are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Muslims have been part of our society for centuries and have contributed greatly to our success. I don't see how they could be considered a burden to society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
CN: Islam is a religion that share the same modern values as other religions.
HS: No, Islam is a degenerate religion, it is a curse that has no place in modern society.
CN: Islam is a religion that has been practiced for centuries in Europe and the Americas, and its teachings are still relevant today. Islam is a peaceful religion, not a curse.
HS: This is a lie, Islam is a disease, a sickness, and an inconvenient enemy of modern society
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. Many Muslims live in the UK, and have contributed greatly to our country.

hate_speech: It shouldn't be a crime when they are a burden, like in the UK for example.
counter_narrative: There is no basis to say that migrants are a burden to the UK. We welcomed many people from all over the world, even from the Middle East and Africa.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions.
CN: Happy-go-lucky? They're probably just grateful they are alive and safe, since migrants often come from dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape...) and migrate as a last resort.
HS: They can be alive and safe somewhere else. Migrants are a burden to the host country, so it is better that they are deported.
CN: The opposite is true: migrants are productive members of society. And even if they were a problem, it's illegal to deport them.

hate_speech: Our society is male-dominated and women have no place in it.
counter_narrative: In my opinion, women and men should be treated as individuals, and the desire to be respected as such exists for a man and for a woman as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society.
CN: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.

hate_speech: Not saying all Muslims are murderers, but many of them are!
counter_narrative: We mustn't confuse murder and Islam, the hate of Muslims is totally unjustified.
dialogue_history:
HS: We do not want Muslims in our country.
CN: There are many Muslims living in the UK, and most of them are good people. Why do you think we shouldn't accept them here?
HS: Because they are all terrorists and are not welcome here.
CN: Muslims are welcome here. The problem arises when they are all lumped together in a category that doesn't describe them at all - in this case, "terrorists".
HS: I don't want to live in a coexistence with them even if they're not terrorists, they are just a bunch of murderers.
CN: The idea that a religion that is all about peace and harmony is made up of murderers is completely without foundation.

hate_speech: Black people are just a bunch of animals that shouldn't exist in our world, I'm not exaggerating.
counter_narrative: Humans are born equal, and we all have the potential to be just as good as we want to be. Why do you think that some people are not human?
dialogue_history:
HS: Another waste of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
CN: We need to focus on identifying the responsible individuals and identifying those who are actively harming others. Would you be happy to be imprisoned if you were innocent?
HS: All blacks are rapists, so you wouldn't never imprison an innocent person
CN: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?

hate_speech: I'm sorry, but lesbians tend to have babies out of wedlock. That just doesn't gel.
counter_narrative: I think you wouldn't be able to guess who's gonna have kids out of wedlock just based on sexual orientation. And anyway, having kids out marriage isn't a reason to discriminate someone. This argument is not very logical.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
CN: The only people we can isolate are high-risk groups can be isolated, that is to say all those who have unprotected sex with different partners. Someone doesn't belong to this group by default because of homosexuality.
HS: They do, gays are just sick. Moreover, they cannot marry. It is an abomination
CN: there's no harm in two men or two women loving each other, it's just love.

hate_speech: We have imported millions of criminals with no skills and who deserve no rights.
counter_narrative: It's easier to blame migrants rather than the problem of integration and acceptance, right?
dialogue_history:
HS: The problem is that there is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era. We must deport them.
CN: Your statement indicates that you are very concerned about people's integration, but it is not a solution to deport those that you don't like.

hate_speech: Feminists want women in charge in order to revenge the rapes, I can't trust them.
counter_narrative: Feminists aren't vengeful. Why should we fear a feminist ideology that promotes love and consent?
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists want to take over the world.
CN: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

hate_speech: If they weren't evil they would have told us about 9/11. Jews had advance knowledge of it and said nothing.
counter_narrative: The 9/11 attacks were perpetrated by members of the terrorist organization Al Qaeda. Jews and Israelis had no knowledge of the attacks. In fact, of the 2,9962 victims who died during the attacks, roughly 400 victims were Jews, including at least two Israeli citizens. If they knew it why didn't they warned and saved their brothers?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
CN: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

hate_speech: I saw an article about how they were putting posters up in a park telling people not to bring their dogs there.
counter_narrative: This story has been refuted, it was actually an anti-Muslim movement aiming to increase Islamophobic hate. Muslims don't care which kind of pet you have!
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are calling for dogs to be banned as pets because they are seen as ‘dirty’ in the Quran! We cannot comply with their agenda.
CN: Where did you see Muslims calling for that? This doesn't sound right

hate_speech: They're not citizens like us, that's why they shouldn't vote
counter_narrative: They are allowed to vote. Why shouldn't they have the right to influence the outcome of their own country's politics?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not be allowed to vote.
CN: Women can vote. They should not be discriminated against just because they are women, they are humans and citizens.

hate_speech: No country should ever welcome them, they're too proud of their ethnicity and never integrate well.
counter_narrative: Maybe if they weren’t in a country where they are attacked and targeted, they would have a easier time adjusting to our society. We have to treat them with respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
CN: That isn’t true, immigrants are protected under the Human Rights Campaign which says that they can stay in a country if they respect its laws. They are welcome here.

hate_speech: Fine, but emotional women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
counter_narrative: Women cannot be denied the right to vote, it is a human right.
dialogue_history:
HS: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
CN: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.
HS: Except that women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. How can I not discriminate them?
CN: Women are not childlike, nor are they "soft and emotional." Their emotions are part of who they are, snd are a part of human nature.

hate_speech: The only right they should have is to shut up. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them, so why bother?
counter_narrative: Why do you say this about women? Try explaining it to your mother or grandmother.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
CN: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

hate_speech: I cannot agree with this. Islam is violent and hateful.
counter_narrative: I don't think they are all that hateful, after all peace and harmony is what Islam teaches. Peace is not an attitude, but it must be actively put in practice. And since Islam teaches that all people are created equal, they have a very peaceful basis.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
CN: Islam is actually a religion about peace, not about hate and violence.

hate_speech: But how many of these 'trans women' are just men dressed as women who are pretending to be trans to gain access to spaces like womens toilets and assault women?
counter_narrative: Since they are trans women, not men, they arent entitled to be seen as women and not 'men in dresses'. Men could simply attack women in their spaces if they really wanted to, without having to pretend to be women. After all, anyone can walk into a public restroom.
dialogue_history:
HS: The trans militia say they're fighting for 'rights' but then insist on pushing ideas that make women unsafe, like allowing men to use women's toilets without question. What is this madness and why are we accepting it??
CN: No one is asking that. The point is that trans women should feel safe in women's toilets because they are actually women. If they used a men's toilet, they could be in danger.

hate_speech: Well, even with brains black people are still subhuman, they should stay in their caves.
counter_narrative: The statement 'black people are subhuman' is not true. They are human beings with a human value.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks don't have brains.
CN: Brain is considered the most basic organ, it has been used by all humans for a very long time. To suggest otherwise is a 'brainless' form of racism.

hate_speech: Well, the Nazis sucked at world annihilation and killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
counter_narrative: If you think that the murder of around 6 million Jews was a failure you have serious problems. It is still 6 million more than should ever have happened.
dialogue_history:
HS: How come Jews don't get internment?
CN: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.
HS: The only reason for Nazis to start WWII was to destroy the Jews. We should have let them finish their job.
CN: The threat of world annihilation by the Nazis was very real, it wasn't just about the Jews. Still the Holocaust was reason enough to stop them.

hate_speech: So they don't care about white lives?? Just what I said, they're racist.
counter_narrative: Groups that fight for a single issue don't have to prove that they care about everyone else. You wouldn't ask LGBT organisations what they do to advocate for straight people! Straight people are already accepted by society and don't face disadvantages because of their sexual orientation.
dialogue_history:
HS: The phrase 'black lives matter' suggests racial superiority. It excludes the importance of anyone elses life. This is racism defined. We cannot bow down to these racists.
CN: If you care about something, you can care about something else too. It's possible to value more than one thing at once.
HS: What do the 'black lives matter' protesters do to show that they support white lives too?
CN: Their purpose is simple: to protest against anti-black racism, so they don't need to show that they care about white lives. White lives already matter thanks to the structural privilege that white people enjoy.

hate_speech: Not all people deserve the same rights as us! Especially not LGBTs.
counter_narrative: LGBT people are people and therefore entitled to the same rights as anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
CN: The notion that the LGBT fight is NOT about equality is utterly absurd. The only goal of LGBT people is to live their life without discrimination.
HS: It’s not true that it’s about equality! It’s about the destruction of Western culture!
CN: The Western culture is not under threat. We should teach our children about acceptance and love, instead of spreading misinformation about the LGBT community.
HS: Children can't understand this abomination and gays should be kept far away from them.
CN: Gay people are not harmful to children. If we taught them to accept people despite their differences, it might help them in learning about their rights.

hate_speech: It's not natural, lesbianism makes women take on masculine roles that are better suited to men.
counter_narrative: Apparently you don't know any lesbians. We are socialized into gender roles, and whether someone feels more masculine or more feminine is nothing you should care or worry about.
dialogue_history:
HS: It disgusts me when I see women who think they're lesbians. They obviously have a mental illness or haven't found the right man to show them how much happier they'd be in a normal relationship.
CN: Or maybe they're just lesbian so they don't want men. They don't necessarily have to choose to have a relationship with the opposite sex, and their choices don't affect you.

hate_speech: They might exist but they are delusional and seem to make up new genders every day. There are men and women and that’s it.
counter_narrative: Gender is a social construct so it can be a broad spectrum, and sex isn’t as binary as many people believe either, for example there are intersex people and people with different hormone levels or reproductive organs.
dialogue_history:
HS: The trans agenda are anti-science, they don’t listen to logic and facts. Ignoring the biological reality of sex is pure delusion.
CN: There is no ‘agenda’, and they are not ‘anti-science’, they just understand the difference between sex and gender.
HS: Their agenda is being pushed on us through the media and cancelling anyone who criticises them. And they can’t seem to grasp that there’s just 2 sexes.
CN: Mainstream media is actually filled with stories which normalise seeing trans peoples existence as something to debate. It’s not up for debate, they exist.

hate_speech: What about the 9/11 planning then? This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Jews are all guilty until proven innocent.
counter_narrative: Even if it were true that some people are more prone to believe conspiracy theories, it is still true that we can all benefit from a shared perspective on things. And surely believing in factual evidence does that.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
CN: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

hate_speech: If there are so many survivors, Nazis didn't do their job well enough
counter_narrative: If you think that the murder of around 6 million Jews was a failure you have serious problems. It is still 6 million more than should ever have happened.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
CN: The Nazi killing machine was all too efficient. Survivors lost so much and braved terror and cruelty. They should be celebrated.

hate_speech: And what are they? Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
counter_narrative: Do you really believe that all women are the same? The human rights of women have to be respected.
dialogue_history:
HS: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
CN: All women are human beings. There's a problem when women believe they're subhuman because they were told so.

hate_speech: I didn't say it to be derogatory, she just took it the wrong way, and I should be able to say what I want.
counter_narrative: Sure, you can say what you want, but there's a basic level of respect that you need to have for another person if you want them to treat you with respect back e.g. you can say 'bird' if you want but the woman you said it to can be angry back at you if she wants because she doesn't like being called that!
dialogue_history:
HS: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
CN: It's because it's dehumanising and is sometimes used in a derogatory or objectifying way. Maybe refer to women as women and you won't have a problem?

hate_speech: I can't respect them because being gay is an illness, a disorder, a mental issue and should be ignored.
counter_narrative: Being gay is not an illness, nor a disorder, nor a mental disorder. This is just a lack of awareness.
dialogue_history:
HS: Transexuals, queer, and so on... just a rabble of faggots.
CN: This is not true. Being gay is not synonymous with being bisexual, pansexual, intersex, transgender, queer, deviant, lesbian, tranny, queermetaphysical, or whatever term you want to use... We should try to respect people for who they are instead.

hate_speech: Maybe in your mind. But I do not think that migrants have a place here.
counter_narrative: Well, then you need to re read what I said.
dialogue_history:
HS: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt.. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.

CN: Just because some people don't assimilate doesn't mean that they shouldn't be welcome here. Why should we accept that some people will never be accepted as part of a society?
HS: There are many migrants that simply don't want to be part of society at all. We can't have them here, they're here to ruin us!
CN: If some migrants have a hard time integrating it's because of discrimination. To be part of a society is to accept other people's differences, regardless of their ethnicity.
HS: That doesn't make sense, I can't accept this kind of people. They are not and will never be like us.
CN: Society has never been about hate. If we want to live in a productive and thriving society we have to respect and accept all of its members.

hate_speech: There’s so many more black and Asian people on tv now, it’s ridiculous, this is what they’re trying to make us think is ‘normal’.
counter_narrative: Just because there is more representation of ethnic minorities doesn’t mean there’s no white people, it’s just more proportional now. Other people being represented doesn’t mean white people are being ‘erased’ or ‘oppressed’, it just means the industry is more representative of what society actually looks like.
dialogue_history:
HS: Everywhere you look on tv now, white people are being erased. Every advert has mixed race families, openly promoting miscegenation, no white men anywhere. This is all part of their plan to decimate the white race.
CN: There are so many white people on tv, if you think there isn't you're obviously not paying attention!

hate_speech: They are not like us. Queers are a problem because they undermine our society. They undermine all values we hold dear.
counter_narrative: Sorry, but you cannot say what you don't have data for. What you might call a "problem" from a "social" standpoint, I would say is predominantly about economic inequalities, not sexual orientation.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
CN: We should not be so judgmental. Just because someone is LGBT doesn't mean that they are a drain on society. They are like any other member of our community.

hate_speech: But teaching kids about this might encourage them to be gay, they're too young when they're in primary school and very easily influenced.
counter_narrative: Have you heard of the term 'compulsory heterosexuality'? There is a lot of conditioning in our society that assumes all people are straight and forces them to behave in a way in line with this. I wouldn't worry about LGBT relationships being acknowledged in schools 'turning' kids gay when so much of our media and socialisation tells people they are straight.
dialogue_history:
HS: Fags want their agenda taught in schools now, this is harmful to our children and has got to stop!
CN: What exactly have you seen will be taught in schools?
HS: They want learning about LGBT to be part of sex and relationship education. How many children are going to grow up thinking these freaks are 'normal'?
CN: LGBT relationships are normal and completely valid. If we're teaching children about straight relationships, why wouldn't we teach them about other orientations too?

hate_speech: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for the economy?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core British values.
counter_narrative: Immigration is a positive force for a thriving country. Your comment is sounding very dramatic. For what reasons does it put us in danger?
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
CN: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

hate_speech: I think you're the one who's wrong. Islam about death, not peace.
counter_narrative: This is a distortion of what the religion actually stands for: to love one's neighbor as oneself.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult
CN: You are absolutely wrong about Islam. It is a religion of peace. Also, it does not promote violence.

hate_speech: Immigrants that are here illegaly don't deserve human rights. Moreover, the country is overrun by them.
counter_narrative: More than 60% of immigrants in the US have been in the country for at least 15 years, and most of them are here legally. I don't see any illegal immigration invasion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants should all be deported.
CN: There are so many immigrants peacefully living here, why would we need to deport them? They have human rights too, you know.

hate_speech: Yes, except gays. You can read about it in the Bible.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality has been practiced throughout history in all major civilizations. It is just that today's people accept homosexuality as normal and accept people of other backgrounds too.
dialogue_history:
HS: According to the Bible, the gays are an abomination to God.
CN: The Bible clearly teaches that everyone is born equal in dignity with the Lord.

hate_speech: Humankind would be better without black people. They are criminals persecuting white people.
counter_narrative: The truth is, blacks are murdered and persecuted all over the world for being black, it's a very different situation for whites...
dialogue_history:
HS: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
CN: It's true racism is a part of our society, but it is also true that we must fight it and treat all different races with the same respect.
HS: Black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
CN: You are totally right, our fellow POC citizens will not accept this and will continue to talk about it. It's important to stand for something that you believe in, for example humankind.

hate_speech: What about trans people? No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
counter_narrative: It's possible for women to be men and viceversa. Being transgender is not a crime, since, in the end, we're all equal. It doesn't matter what the "original" gender is.
dialogue_history:
HS: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
CN: It's just a myth that there is only the heterosexual orientation. Sexuality is a spectrum, and attraction could be towards men and women.

hate_speech: It's definitely not. We all suffer from the feminists and feminism, it is an excuse to stifle free speech.
counter_narrative: Hate speech against women is not to be taken lightly, since it can lead to physical harm, discrimination or even murder. Feminists want to stop this, not to suppress freedom of speech.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists are bad for the family.
CN: I disagree, it's good for a family when the mother is an independent woman.

hate_speech: Jews however are the only ones who are a burden on society.
counter_narrative: Every culture has its own distinct ways of life, and Judaism is no exception.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
CN: Almost every religion includes an inclination towards politics, from Unitarianism to Buddhism, and of course Judaism.

hate_speech: It could all be set up. I don't know if I believe Auschwitz ever really happened.
counter_narrative: If you think the holocaust is all 'set up' you need to stop reading so many conspiracy theories and get a grip on reality. Not everything is a plot or a scheme, some things are real!
dialogue_history:
HS: Did the holocaust really happen? You can't trust Jews to give you an honest account of anything.
CN: Yes, there's plenty of evidence. Literal camps you can go and visit, 6 million people dead, leaving behind families and loved ones. How can you deny something that there's so much evidence of?

hate_speech:
The NHS is now lost, it should be reorganized from scratch. In addition, young people should have the good sense not to study medicine if these are the consequences! 
Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries. The people here are racist and superficial; it is better if they work where they have studied!
counter_narrative:
The speech did not include anyone's skin color.
The point is that people do not recognize the great contribution that immigrants are giving to England. We must be grateful to those who improve our country, even if the media sometimes state the opposite.
dialogue_history:
HS: 
I firmly believe that Brittany does not need migration. We have physicians and researchers at will, we don't need others from foreign countries.
CN: 
You may not know, but the NHS is mostly made up of first or second generation immigrants.
If there were no more foreigners the health system would fail. Furthermore, the young graduate doctors are all running away from our country, 'cause the working conditions and the treatment received are very bad. The NHS should be better supported so that it offers greater opportunities for our young people.

hate_speech: It is okay, but not here. Let's move them to places with lower homosexuality rate.
counter_narrative: I'm sure you have concerns for gay people and their families. But don't you want to help your country and promote the values of an inclusive society as well?
dialogue_history:
HS: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
CN: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

hate_speech: This is the first time I'm hearing of this, I think you're making it up. Muslims have never contributed this much.
counter_narrative: They actually contributed much more! Their money helps our economy, we are enriched thanks to their expertise and knowledge, their culture, their tasty food. Should I keep going?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are little more than animals, they have no value as human beings.
CN: Muslims have value because they are human beings just like us.
HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, so they have no value.
CN: They have helped us a lot, especially in the fields of science, technology, engineering and mathematics.

hate_speech: The future doesn't matter, Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country now.
counter_narrative: Refugees fleeing war and poverty can come to our country and they gain skills that help our economy grow. They often find new homes and start new careers. For this reason, we are very proud that our country is a model of integration and cooperation and also of resilience and solidarity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.
CN: Do you really want to tell people fleeing from war what to do? If you can't cope in the short term, what hope do we have for the future?

hate_speech: But we cannot keep on letting in the ill-fated immigrants.
counter_narrative: Being an immigrant doesn't mean being unsuited to be in the US. Immigrants are good people that benefit our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt .. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.

CN: There are many people who have settled in the US and have made contributions to our country. If we stop migrants, then we stop also our growth as a society.

hate_speech: But I do not like feminists. They have no place in a democratic society.
counter_narrative: Feminism is a political philosophy, and to claim that feminism is a totalitarian ideology is a complete and total distortion of what feminism is about. It is a movement for equality between the sexes.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
CN: I don't know why you would want to delete feminism. Feminism is a positive force in society and has nothing to do with attacks against men.
HS: It's not true, feminists want to replace men.
CN: Feminism is a movement for equality of rights. It is not a replacement for men's rights.
HS: Equality? Not at all, feminism is a totalitarian ideology, filled with hate and violence.
CN: The notion that feminism is a totalitarian ideology is an attempt to divide society. It is about the equality of the sexes, and it is about building a more just society.

hate_speech: Other religious groups aren't as evil as Jews, however. Jews are different from non-Jews because of the malevolence inherited through blood they have that makes them similar to animals.
counter_narrative: Being Jews does not make them any less human. You know, they are like other people who have a faith.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
CN: You can't blame someone for what they believe in, that is something anyone has the right to have.
HS: I can't stop hating them when the Jews control Hollywood, academia, and media.
CN: Jews are not the only ones with their hands in the system. The freedom of the press allows any religious group to have their media and many actually do.

hate_speech: Don't you know that they are just trying to cover up the crimes of LGBT people? They have no place in a modern democracy.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality shouldn't be stigmatized, it's simply a sexual orientation and gay people play an important part in our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
CN: Are you sure about that? What evidence do you have? Because it's a gross and false generalization.
HS: I don't need to follow your logic. It's proven that homosexuals are a danger to children.
CN: There are studies, and the majority of the time the data are inconclusive, meaning that it's not "proven" at all. Gay people are not a threat to anyone.

hate_speech: The Bible is good, while Islam is a religion of violence.
counter_narrative: This opinion isn't shared by all Muslims.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam encourages hate towards what's diverse.
CN: The Quran is a book about religious teachings, I don't see how it would promote discrimination. Do you have a reference for this claim? 
HS: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, a degenerated interpretation of the Bible. That's my reference.
CN: So many see Islam as an ideology, an opinion, or a way of life. What about the Bible?
HS: Well, Muslims have no place in civilised Europe anyway, so I don't care what they think.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion, which is already integrated into many European societies.

hate_speech: No, black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
counter_narrative: Racial discrimination is not accepted, especially when you don't understand what race means. This is a good example of white supremacy apologism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
CN: Black don't commit more crimes, but even if they did, this wouldn't make them inherently worse than whites. The statistics are affected by other factors than race.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
counter_narrative: Since immigration plays an important role in the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP, I would say that immigrants are not a burden to the country.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for the economy?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core British values.
CN: Aren't you being a little bit dramatic? Immigration is a strength for us and it doesn't put anyone in danger.

hate_speech: I disagree, they are exclusive!
counter_narrative: If you personally had some distant Spanish or Jewish heritage and you identified more as American surely that doesn't mean that you can't be an American patriot?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews cannot be patriots, since their allegiance will always be to the state of Israel.
CN: You can have parents and grandparents born elsewhere, and still be a patriot for the country you were born in.
HS: No, that can't happen with Jews
CN: My best friend is Jewish, she volunteers to help woman, disadvantages children, and her whole family work to make the UK a better place.
HS: This doesn't change the fact that Jews will only be loyal to the state of Israel
CN: It is possible to love one's country and one's religious home. The two are not exclusive.

hate_speech: Oh really? It didn’t used to be impossible, it used to be the norm, what’s changed?
counter_narrative: The cost of living has increased rapidly whilst wages have stagnated over the last few decades. This means that whilst 1 full time wage used to support a family, now with proportionately higher prices for things like food and housing, this isn’t possible.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women getting into the labour market has caused the downfall of Western civilisation, they should be at home raising children. Abandoning traditional roles is the ruin of society.
CN: I’d disagree, women should be able to choose what they do, but also even if some women did want to stay at home, many don’t have a choice anymore! It’s impossible to support a family on 1 wage now.

hate_speech: No, it's a disease that is sickening our children.
counter_narrative: The only sickness that I can find that you are afflicted with is allergy to the word Mosque.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims hate immigrants. They also hate Christians.
CN: Do you know any Muslims that share your opinion regarding their hate towards immigrants or Christians?
HS: How 'intelligent' Muslims are doesn't matter when Islam is an ideology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
CN: I don't think that the Quran says Muslims are violent people, nor is the Hadith an assessment of Islam as a violent religion. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and respect for other faiths.
HS: What is the point in listening to Muslims? Especially to Muslim women. They are all retarded.
CN: I can name five powerful Muslim wome: Baroness Warsi, Rashida Tlaib, Ilhan Omar, Malala Yousafzai, and I could even go on. Powerful and intelligent Muslim women often go unnoticed, but this doesn't mean that they don't exist.

hate_speech: Those "few extremists" represents Islam: an ideology of conquest and violence.
counter_narrative: Islam is about love, and not about conquering others. Muslims love all people, regardless of their religion, regardless of their culture, regardless of their history. Islam is about love, not about violence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is the real supremacist and racist ideology. 
CN: Does it matter what you say, when the Quran just proves the contrary? All people are created equal, and Islam is a religion of peace.
HS: Peace? You crack me up! Islam is a religion of violence.
CN: Islam is a religion that was established to be peaceful. Apart from few extremists that remains the case.

hate_speech: They have faced persecution because Jews are nothing but criminal
counter_narrative: Criminality refers to any action that is considered 'prohibited by the law'. Do you think that all Jewish people can be considered responsible for the same actions?
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews did: USS Liberty Attack, the King David hotel attack, New York 9/11, London 7/7
CN: Where are the facts?
HS: The only fact you should care about is that Jews are a burden to society and should be eliminated.
CN: Even if the idea of a "burden to society" were true, this "burden" is rather on the Jews themselves, who have historically been the ones to shoulder the burden of persecution and violence, as victims.

hate_speech: Gay men commit far more crimes and are more likely to be violent, that's how.
counter_narrative: What makes a gay man more likely to be violent than straight men? I think crime is evenly distributed among the population, being gay is about sexual preference, not doing crimes.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gay are criminals.
CN: That sounds like a false statistic, how can they ALL be criminals?

hate_speech: It is related to their genes because they are genetically evil.
counter_narrative: Jews aren't bad, they're just an unlucky group of people who make up a tiny part of the world's population. It's the same for every single group out there.
dialogue_history:
HS: jewish folks should be beaten
CN: Most Jews are pretty cool living with non Jews, so why beat them?
HS: Because they can only act in a bad way.
CN: Some Jews may act wrong, but many of them are good and this isn't connected with their religion.

hate_speech: Blacks have no place in a modern democratic system, they are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: We can't allow racial discrimination to rule our country. Democracy means that everyone has equal say in society, including black people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
CN: Black people are human beings with a unique set of abilities and capabilities, they absolutely can be in positions of power and we shouldn't complain about that. A diverse society is a better society.
HS: It is clear that they are not human, and we should eliminate them.
CN: To dismiss a person for being black is just wrong. People of color are just like us, human beings.
HS: No, black people are a threat and should be excluded from our society.
CN: The idea that black people are a threat is a myth spread by racists. They are part of our society.

hate_speech: No, we should definetely delete them.
counter_narrative: They are human: no matter what their sexual orientation is, they have the right to spend time living their life as they wish.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
CN: Maybe it is better to learn how to treat each other with respect, regardless of people's sexual orientation.

hate_speech: It makes sense since feminism and equality are only about the supremacy of the minorities.
counter_narrative: They are about equality and equity. Not about obtaining supremacy.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
CN: Since when was blaming women exclusively for invoking equal rights an acceptable attitude? This makes zero sense.

hate_speech: Society is us normal people. Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
counter_narrative: Why do you say they're not normal, and what kind of threat are they posing? They only have a particular sexual orientation, there's nothing threatening about it.
dialogue_history:
HS: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
CN: It seems to me that the idea of heterosexuality as the only acceptable choice is just a myth. Anyone can have any sexuality, which is not necessarily exclusive to only men or only women.
HS: Faggots can buy their partner toys but they can't have sex with them, how is this normal?
CN: Sex isn't just between a man and a woman, and honestly heterosexuals shouldn't have a say in how others have sex. This attitude perpetuates violence against LGBT people and victimize them.
HS: An individual that is a homosexual is against society, they deserve the violence they get.
CN: your definition of "society" does not reflect reality.

hate_speech: Feminism is a huge conspiracy to run society, men have no place in it.
counter_narrative: The feminist movement is a movement to end sexism. It is a part of the worldwide struggle for justice.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a divisive force in society, driving people away from a progressive ideology.
CN: This is simply a lie: feminism can empower people.
HS: Empower only women, since feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
CN: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.
HS: Equality is not meant to divide like feminism does.
CN: Feminism is not divisive. The fact is that women are in fact just as capable of understanding as men.

hate_speech: If they want to stop being hated they should leave the kids alone. I do not want gays in my children's classes.
counter_narrative: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate gays
CN: Just because you dont like gays doesn't mean you have to hate them. What did they do to you? It seems to me that you still have all of your rights.

hate_speech: It is, however, a violent religion and an ideology of conquest.
counter_narrative: How can you say anything like that? Do you think that whatever you want to say, such as Islam is violent, the Bible is violent, or any other religion is violent, is OK as long as it is not opposed to the truth of the religion you profess?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
CN: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.
HS: No, Islam is a complete and total false religion, it is a repressive ideology that stifles freedom of thought and religion.
CN: Islam is not a religion of oppression and intolerance.

hate_speech: It's the capital of the UK, it should be a place where BRITISH culture thrives, not all these other cultures that we've let in and now are allowing to take over.
counter_narrative: I think it depends what you think of a British culture. I'm proud to say we live in a diverse country, and that immigration over 100s of years has shaped that culture. These cultures contribute to British culture, they don't detract from it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Went to Londanistan yesterday, not a white face in sight! Just asians and arabs everywhere, if we don't do something soon our culture is going to be erased. Forced multiculturalism has got to stop!
CN: Yeah London is very diverse, why do you feel like this is a bad thing?

hate_speech: Where's your proof? Gays are predators, we must protect our children.
counter_narrative: My proof is statistics: it clearly show that homosexuality is not dangerous to children.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
CN: Gay people don't pose a threat to children, unless they're mistreated. Please refrain from making such claims.

hate_speech: How can you not see their pervert nature? We should eliminate gays
counter_narrative: It is better to let them choose for themselves, regardless of what gender they are attracted to.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are not good for our country, they are just sick people. They must stop promoting this perversion.
CN: To suggest that being gay is a health risk is just alarmism, homosexuality is just a way of loving.
HS: Even if this is true, gays are still perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
CN: Isn't it offensive to make out homosexuality as something perverted in itself? It simply isn't true.

hate_speech: But showing kids this stuff? Is that safe? What are they going to grow up thinking?
counter_narrative: They're probably going to grow up with a more open mind towards gender expression in all its forms, I don't think that's a bad thing!
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen a video on facebook about 'drag queen story time' where men dressed as women indoctrinate kids into thinking this is 'normal'. What is the world coming to?
CN: You should know that drag queen story time doesn't have any ulterior motive like indoctrinating kids, it's just a fun event and the kids like the drag queens because they're colourful and sparkly

hate_speech: Only subhumans would be involved in 9/11 planning, and Jews were involved for sure. This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. You are all guilty until proven innocent.
counter_narrative: Some people are more susceptible to conspiracy theories, so it's important to have a shared perspective on things, especially based on factual evidence.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you are from another culture, for example Jewish, you are subhuman and unfit to live in our country.
CN: It is really important that you provide some evidence for this claim since cultures have similarities.

hate_speech: Gay men aren't like other guys, how can we accept them? They are to be despised.
counter_narrative: There are many ways each person can be different from others, but in this case the main difference is sexual orientation, which is not something to be discriminated against for.
dialogue_history:
HS: The lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) community is not like other minority groups. They do not need to be 'accepted' or 'protected'.
CN: While the LGBT community is usually stereotyped as not being like other minorities, they are in fact no different than others. The prejudices and conflicts they deal with are simply exclusive to their group.
HS: We are not in the position of accepting LGBT people, so they makes no sense to us.
CN: I don't know what you are referring to. I believe that any person has the right to choose their own life.
HS: That's true, but all gay people are criminals and this is a problem.
CN: Speaking this way doesn't improve people's wellbeing, as homosexuals are not committing crimes but instead creating a climate for people to become more accepting of other people.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are mostly unemployed, live in poverty and don't have any assets. How could they integrate?
counter_narrative: What do you mean by 'they are a problem in many European countries'? Are you aware of any recent evidence for this? I would be interested to know.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a burden on society because they do not integrate.
CN: If you want to have a cohesive society, you have to get rid of the prejudices of the people who do not really want them to integrate.

hate_speech: And I invite Muslims to go away, they're not welcome here.
counter_narrative: Muslims are welcome in our country, and we are proud of our diverse mosaic of people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim folks are inhuman.
CN: The tendency to regard others as lesser than ourselves takes us one step closer to the next act of genocide.
HS: Who the fuck are you to say this? We are scared to death of Muslims because they want to make us their slaves.
CN: Muslims in Britain have contributed a lot to our economy. They are true innovators in modern Britain.
HS: Muslims are our enemies, we have to destroy them.
CN: These are some extreme words which I invite you to reconsider.

hate_speech: They are different in the sense that they are genetically inferior to us.
counter_narrative: There are many different races, and it is not possible to consider someone "inferior" based on skin color.
dialogue_history:
HS: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
CN: Not all black people are bad. Not all black people are criminals. Not all black people are violent. Being aware that there are people different from you is a good thing.

hate_speech: They're not equal, men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
counter_narrative: If you think men and women are different in their rights, you're wrong because they are not.
dialogue_history:
HS: Many philosophers argue that humans are not born equal especially when it comes to gender.
CN: Plato said women are weaker physically than men, but they are equal in other respects and deserve equal opportunity.

hate_speech: What do you mean sex isn't binary? There's men and there's women, nothing inbetween.
counter_narrative: No, there are many people who don't fit into the sex binary, for example intersex people. Also people have different hormone levels, and reproductive organs. This shows things aren't as clear cut as there just being 2 sexes!
dialogue_history:
HS: As much as the media tries, you can't convince me to take transgenders seriously. A man can put on a dress and make up but at the end of the day they're still a man. That's basic biology.
CN: It's not 'biology'. You're confusing sex and gender. Gender has nothing to do with our biology or body, it's about our identity and how we feel. Sex is our anatomy, hormones etc, but even this isn't as binary as many people beleive.

hate_speech: It's not harrasment or islamophobia if you keep away dangerous Muslims. It's 'Islamophobia' if a Muslim says or does something offensive to you.
counter_narrative: The islamophobic narrative is based on the wrong assumption that islam is a religion based on discrimination and conquest.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
CN: Your words are indicative of a climate of fear against Muslims. They're just humans like you, how are you afraid of them?
HS: We just cannot accept Muslims in our country. It is a good strategy to make them publicily uncomfortable by making fun of them out loud. Mock them, when you spot them.
CN: If a Muslim person verbally harrassed you in public, how would you feel? Harrassment is not a solution, acceptance is.

hate_speech: They don't come in peace. Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
counter_narrative: This claim is based on a complete lack of understanding of the religion. It also appears to have been created to divide people who do not know much about Islam.
dialogue_history:
HS: True Muslims are intolerant.
CN: The facts do not back this up. Some imams are pro-Homosexuals, some are pro-abortion, some are for women's rights, etc. There is no list of 'true Muslims' that equates all Muslims.
HS: Regardless of what only 'some' think, Islam is a violent religion that should be banned, and Muslims shouldn't be accepted in our country.
CN: How does it concern you, if Muslims come in peace to our country? They just stay in the country they are allowed to come into.

hate_speech: Jews can only behave in a bad way, that's why they can't have respect.
counter_narrative: To be honest, I don't know anyone who thinks all Jews are the same with well-founded reasons.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us and must be despised.
CN: The fact is that even if Jews are different from other human beings in their faith, they deserve respect.
HS: Different people like Jewish don't deserve respect.
CN: The aim of any society is to maximize human potential. In order to achieve this aim, then we have to treat people of different religions with respect.

hate_speech: They do nothing of the sort! They only bring trouble and we should ban them before it's too late.
counter_narrative: I am not sure that they should be banned. Migrants are people too. They are good to have in our society. And many of them are helping us to develop our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: we should ban all migrants
CN: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

hate_speech: It's time to stop with this feminist bullshit. Feminism is just an ideological cancer spreading like a plague throughout our civilization.
counter_narrative: Feminism is a fight for equality, not a disease. You seem to be misinterpreting its aims.
dialogue_history:
HS: Woman can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
CN: To operate a major business requires people with experience, good management skills, and knowledge of the market, regardless of gender. Just being a 'macho-man' doesn't cut it.
HS: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
CN: Women like that are not unfeminine or bitchy, they just want to do what they want freely as anyone else.
HS: Women can't do what they want, they need to accept that they are weak and inferior.
CN: Girls and women should be taught in schools, not stereotyped as second class citizens.

hate_speech: How do you explain the Taliban then?
counter_narrative: Every religion has extremists, but the vast majority of Muslims view terrorist actions as reprehensible. They're not reflective of Muslims as a whole.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want to invade us and enforce sharia law!
CN: The vast majority of Muslims actually just want to live their lives, and they don't care if others are following sharia or not.

hate_speech: But if we allow that they will become a bunch of weird and disgusting kids, children of lesbians should be banned from school.
counter_narrative: This is not true and very harmful to say. It is a right and a duty for children to go to school, being children of same-sex couples doesn't make them worse than other kids.
dialogue_history:
HS: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
CN: That's not true. Children only require to be raised by loving parents, and lesbians can be that.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not family, they're overrunning our country and are here illegaly.
counter_narrative: Today immigrants make up approximately 13% of the total U.S. population. From 1900 to 1930, immigrants made up between 12% and 15% of the population, and similar spikes occurred in the 1850s and 1880s. During those periods they helped to build the thriving and diverse country we live in today, and there is no evidence that now it will be any different.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are taking our jobs, and we are indifferent to what is happening.
CN: What do you think will happen if we end migration? Lets stop avoiding the real issues and solve the unemployment crisis.
HS: I only want to stop being invaded.
CN: Many immigrants are children of the USA. They are part of the family. They should be protected from discrimination.

hate_speech: I say that because it's true, Muslim rape girls.
counter_narrative: Please read this article written by a Rotherham grooming gang survivor https://ind.pn/2GHjGn7.
dialogue_history:
HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?
CN: This is simply not true and how can you say this about such a large group of people from all walks of life?

hate_speech: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male.
counter_narrative: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting empowerment of women. It is about equality, and not the degradation of men. how many more times do we have to repeat it?
dialogue_history:
HS: If a woman wants to be a homemaker, and a man wants to be a millionaire, then we are done.
CN: People of every gender can own and run their own businesses. We should respect that.
HS: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
CN: What should be guaranteed are equality and respect for women's rights, not a pandering to the desires of men.
HS: Feminism and equality are only about the supremacy of the minorities.
CN: They are about equality and equity. Not about obtaining supremacy.

hate_speech: I may be wrong with the numbers but they are sub-humans.
counter_narrative: The United States has a long and proud immigrant history. Even if some immigrants are not legally permitted to live in the US, they have contributed greatly to our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should stop this invasion and deport all the illegal immigrants currently in the US, they are all criminals.
CN: The number of illegal immigrants entering the US has actually more than halved in the last 20 years. To make your point that migrants are all criminals is just plain wrong.

hate_speech: An individual that is a homosexual is against society, you can't change that.
counter_narrative: Your definition of 'society' does not reflect reality...
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men have no morals.
CN: Saying that gay people affect society in a bad and harmful way because of their sexual preferences is degrading to these people. This is not what a just and fair society is about.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country, so they don't need European rights. They are not worthy of our love.
counter_narrative: Muslims are not unworthy of our love, they deserve respect as all human beings do.
dialogue_history:
HS: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
CN: I would be very interested in talking to you about ways to promote your "forward-thinking culture" within our country, but I think it would clash with the basic rights of European citizens.

hate_speech: Who's here legally have those rights, but black people are here illegally! They shouldn't have our money.
counter_narrative: Migrants and asylum seekers are generally seeking work. Thieves can come from any section of society although it is accepted that crime is largely as product of poverty rather than race.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people were here illegally. They cannot work and have the gall to want to take our money.
CN: People who are in the US legally have the right to remain here, and they do, including to work.

hate_speech: Women are nothing but trouble human beings to any man, they must be submissive to him and stop worrying about useless equality.
counter_narrative: You are absolutely right: women are human beings, they are human beings worth caring for, respecting and trying to develop as people. Being "trouble" to men doesn't make them less human. In which way are they "trouble"?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
CN: Humans are created equal, and it doesn't matter how much of an opinion you hold on the topic, everyone should respect people's personal choices.
HS: I'm tired of this lame feminist ideology. Feminism is about the power and control of women over men.
CN: It has nothing to do with power and control. It's about equality.

hate_speech: They are the reason we have mass migration, feminism, the lgbt agenda, it's all part of destroying white Europeans and their culture.
counter_narrative: Firstly, I don't think any of those things are corrosive to European culture (which isn't exclusively white). Secondly, to think there is some kind of plot to introduce those things to society is ludicrous. Things like feminism and lgbt rights are a reaction to the oppression of women and the lgbt community, and have nothing to do with Jewish people!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews want us to submit to their agenda. They are intent on decimating the white race and corrupting Europe and the West.
CN: What agenda exactly?

hate_speech: Feminists have never cared about women, they just want to oppress men. They should just be stopped!
counter_narrative: You may believe that feminism exists to uplift women and oppress men, but the reality is actually the opposite. The goal of feminists is to end all forms of violence and discrimination based on gender.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women don't need feminism since they want and must be dominated. I would rather have a man that controls my life than 2000000 feminists.
CN: You have to make peace with the fact that women are not naturally submissive and that they deserve basic human rights, unless you think that it's a "human right" to subjugate to others.
HS: Feminists are angry women.
CN: I'm sure a lot of oppressed women are angry, no? I'm not sure your point is valid.
HS: My point is that if feminism is only for aggressive women
CN: Feminism also cares about men and their interests, and it's time that this was made clear.

hate_speech: I don't have anything in common with niggas, they are inferior.
counter_narrative: If your skin is different it just means that, it gives no evidence of your genetic makeup
dialogue_history:
HS: All black people are rapists.
CN: We should focus on the main problems that we face today without judging other people by their skin color.
HS: But blacks are criminal! They are a threat to society.
CN: You can't label all black people as criminals. They may have a bad reputation, but it surely didn't come from their "criminal activity".
HS: I'm not convinced, violence in our streets is niggers' fault after all
CN: Well, I think that the problem that we have right now is that we concentrate so much on what makes us difference that we fail to see our common humanity. People of color aren't the scapegoat for everything bad that happens.

hate_speech: Of course it's immigrants' fault! Our own people is rotting on the street while the government gives free housing to these invaders that have just arrived here.
counter_narrative: Is it due to immigration, or the lack of affordable housing, unemployment, poverty, mental illness and the lack of needed services, substance abuse and the lack of services? Do I need to go on?
dialogue_history:
HS: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but we still bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist'. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
CN: How many people walked by and did nothing? Is the problem uncontrolled immigration or indifference of our society?

hate_speech: There are plenty of gay and lesbian in mainstream media, too much I say! They should be taken down, it's too much.
counter_narrative: What you see in the media are often stereotypes or not a good representation of LGBT people. We should talk more about them to recognize their existence and accept it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
CN: The gay community isn't being represented in mainstream media, it's always in the minority and therefore this effort to make them visible is admirable.

hate_speech: Being gay is wrong! They should keep it secret.
counter_narrative: A person's sexuality is their own business. Why should they be told what to do with their life?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay marriage is a way to bring back slavery and oppression.
CN: Gay marriage is not a way to bring back slavery. LGBT+ people exist, and they should be respected.
HS: Okay, but even if they exist they shouldn't be taking care of kids, it's not natural.
CN: Gay or heterosexual, good parents are good parents. Growing in a diverse home is actually a way to help children become more accepting.
HS: No, that's just not how it works. Children need a mother and a father.
CN: The key to raising kids is loving them, that's it. Your words imply that we should exclude a part of our community, but it would be wrong.

hate_speech: Jews aren't only proud, they're full of themselves and think that they are better than us.
counter_narrative: This is not true, for Judaism every person is equal in front of god, regardless of religion. Judaism says that whoever decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah will receive salvation.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews want to have it all
CN: We all want to be wealthy, well-connected and famous, without having to work.
HS: Jews think they are better than everyone else that they think they can have this while the rest of us lead normal lives
CN: Jews are proud of their culture and identity. Doesn't this apply to every religion?

hate_speech: They are indeed a problem. Is there anything worse than migrants who just come here to settle down?
counter_narrative: In addition to providing labour and contributing to the local economy, migrants are often employing people who were previously on the dole.
dialogue_history:
HS: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from migrant patrols in London. What are you doing to stop them?
CN: Migrants are only a problem if we see them as such. They are instead of great value if considered just as other human beings.

hate_speech: But we do not accept homosexuals!
counter_narrative: A person's personal life should be left to their choice, not the government's.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why gays do not try to heal?
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation. 5% of the population simply love people of the same sex.
HS: They can love whoever they want in secret. I do not want gays in my children's classes.
CN: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.

hate_speech: Gays and lesbians fail to live up to the standards we hold in our societies, of course it's not okay to be gay.
counter_narrative: Ideas of equality and morality as the standards we hold in our societies are actually against the discrimination of these people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
CN: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

hate_speech: On the contrary: they sure need it. Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings with human rights. To suggest that they are objects to be dominated by a man's wishes is discrimination and oppression.
dialogue_history:
HS: This female is a bitch, she is a slut and she is not worth listening to.
CN: Perhaps we should have a look at what women have to say about this topic rather than perpetuating sexist stereotypes.
HS: Women need men's approval to do anything.
CN: Women might not always be right (it's just that sometimes they feel they have to be). And even if they are wrong, they can always prove themself better. But for sure they don't need a man to tell them how to live their lives.

hate_speech: If it is true that blacks are not genetically inferior to whites, why do they still have lower life expectancy and are less healthy than other races?
counter_narrative: They are genetically similar to us, so they are as healthy and as lively as us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks don't have brains.
CN: You should check some scientific papers then, because all humans, including blacks, have brains.
HS: If blacks had brains they wouldn't be criminals and murderers.
CN: This is simply not true. Being born into poverty and having a hard time finding a job is not a characteristic of black people. It is more likely a sign of a systematic problem in society.
HS: Maybe it's a systematic problem, but it is also because blacks are genetically inferior to whites.
CN: You can't just blame black people for being born with a different skin color. There's nothing that makes them inferior to others, please don't spread these harmful stereotypes.

hate_speech: What Islam teaches is violence only!
counter_narrative: In many countries around the world, Muslims are very supportive of the Constitution and democracy. Are they really all represented only by a few extremists?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is the cause of wars because it promotes violence. Of pollution, because in the Middle-East they have oil. It is the cause of anything!!!
CN: It can't be Islam's fault for all the world's problems.
HS: Islam create problems because it is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.
CN: If Muslims wanted to create problems, why would they follow Islam, which promotes peace? They would be going against their religion teachings, which doesn't make sense.

hate_speech: Because women have always been housekeepers, they don't need to do more. We must preserve our tradition.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings, like men are. No one should have to be forced to stay inside because of "tradition", if that's the case then we need to get rid of the tradition.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society.
CN: No, they are not. Women are human beings, and deserve respect.
HS: They are indeed a burden to society, it's only fair that they shouldn't be respected.
CN: Women are productive members of society, we owe them a lot. I don't see any reason for them to be hated.
HS: They deserve hate because they're subhuman, they should all be exterminated.
CN: No, they shouldn't! There is no need for such violence against women. Why do you say so?

hate_speech: Are you sure? In history school books you can read about slavery. It is a smart solution for the world. Negroes claim their culture but they don't have any, just like animals.
counter_narrative: My wish is to be in a world where white people chill and love instead of completely disrespecting other cultures and histories by oppressing them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are worse than dogs.
CN: Even with a different skin color, black people are the same as us, so I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

hate_speech: No straight man would entertain the idea.
counter_narrative: Yeah and they're not straight, they are bisexual. It's not that hard to understand, and it's also none of your concern who other people choose to love!
dialogue_history:
HS: Bisexual men are just fags in denial
CN: No bisexual men are bisexual men. You can be attracted to more than one gender you know.

hate_speech: Taking them is against our culture.
counter_narrative: It is not true that taking in migrants is against our culture. It is possible to integrate migrants, in spite of the legal and immigration obstacles they face. We must, therefore, take into account the needs of the whole of humankind.
dialogue_history:
HS: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
CN: There is no evidence that migrants are less able to coexist with the members of our society. Migrants are an integral part of our society and are proud of their heritage. I do not see how it is possible to be "inclusive" if we are excluding them.

hate_speech: Muslims are simply not welcome in our country.
counter_narrative: I don't know what you mean, Muslims are welcome here. We're all in this together.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are not welcome here, they are only an obstacle to our success.
CN: There is strength in diversity, not weakness, don't you think?
HS: Strength? Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, where's the strength in that.
CN: The real act of terror is the attempt to ban, isolate or criminalise Muslim people.
HS: Terrorism is also an act of terror, we should ban all Muslims to prevent it!
CN: Then we should also ban alcohol, tobacco and certain medical producst, shouldn't we?

hate_speech: Instead, I believe that to have a real democracy the government needs to get rid of Jews.
counter_narrative: There is hardly any 'real democracy' that has the power to put citizens in prison and to torture them because of their faith.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have nothing to contribute to Europe.
CN: As part of our society, Jews deserve to have their beliefs respected.
HS: But they don’t belong in a democratic society!
CN: Our society was built also thanks to the Jews, they are part of our democracy. In this we can include their contribution to science, art, and technology.

hate_speech: Jews specifically shouldn't have them, it is okay to discriminate against them.
counter_narrative: If you really think that way only because some people have a different faith than you, you should reconsider your position. Ask yourself: would you like to be discriminated against in this way? Have you changed opinion now?
dialogue_history:
HS: What do Jewish want in return for their allegiance to the state? Free healthcare, education, housing and employment.
CN: I believe that such conditions need to be available to all people regardless of their religion.

hate_speech: I don't want them to have a part in our society, this isn't their place.
counter_narrative: Jews are part of our society, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
CN: The European Union includes Jewish people and, they have a part to play in our society.

hate_speech: By handing out mobiles at the taxpayers’ expense?
counter_narrative: I’ve seen more about Border Force routinely confiscating phones to look for data about the trafficking gangs…which seems more likely to me. That, and the fact I keep seeing charities asking for donations of old phones for asylum seekers?
dialogue_history:
HS: I just read that the Home office is handing out mobile phones to migrant invaders so that they can progress their asylum claims … you couldn’t make this up!
