CN: Yeah, I saw a blog post that mentioned this but just quoted a ‘source in the Home office’, which is a bit dodgy.
HS: We should be sinking the boats not handing out phones!
CN: I don’t think drowning desperate people is a solution.
HS: Our traitor politicians are enabling invasion.
CN: To be fair, there seems to be plenty of evidence of the contrary.

hate_speech: The Jews and their religion are a problem and they're still hurting us, we shouldn't support them. They slow the progress by working very bad in the jobs we let them.
counter_narrative: What you're saying is that the Jewish people are a burden on society. That they are bad at their jobs and make our society less stable. In other words, they are a burden and a hindrance to progress. Albert Einstein, for example, destroyed science progress indeed.
dialogue_history:
HS: Society should ban Jewish people.
CN: Any society is a collection of people, and the people within it have the right to their own beliefs, and to promote their beliefs.

hate_speech: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
counter_narrative: The holocaust was hugely tragic, and we are blessed to have holocaust survivors to hear from. They tell an important story that we must learn from.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Holocaust was a hoax. Jews were not persecuted and killed. You should be ashamed of yourselves if you claim they should have the same rights we have.
CN: The Nazis persecuted and killed more than 6 million Jews. The Holocaust is not a fabrication perpetrated by the Jews, it is a historical event that should be acknowledged so that we never allow such atocities to reoccur..

hate_speech: The Jews and their religion are a problem and they still hurting us, not the other way around. They slow the progress by working very bad in the jobs we let them.
counter_narrative: What you're saying is that the Jewish people are a burden on society. That they are bad at their jobs and make our society less stable. In other words, they are a burden and a hindrance to progress. Albert Einstein, for example, destroyed science progress indeed.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews, as a religion, have always been a burden to others. They have always acted as if they were superior.
CN: While not universally true, a great deal of evidence suggests that Jews faced considerable societal challenges during the past centuries.

hate_speech: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
counter_narrative: Perhaps you should monitor your own hate speech before pointing the finger at others?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a totalitarian and violent ideology, it makes no sense. It is full of hate and violence.
CN: Why would you say such a thing about a religion?
HS: Because we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which would inspire terrorism all over the world.
CN: If Islam were a violent religion, there would be riots connected to Muslims in every country where they live.

hate_speech: The solution is to ban all Muslims, they are all incompatible with human dignity.
counter_narrative: This is not a reasonable stance to take: Muslims and people of any faith have indeed human dignity, since they are human.
dialogue_history:
HS: What about all those Muslims in Britain? They vote with their feet.
CN: Every British citizen has the right to live and vote as he/she wish. Being Muslims is no exception.
HS: They should be. Muslims have no right to live in any part of Europe, they are just a problem.
CN: The problem is the lack of integration of the Muslim population into society. The integration is necessary, the problem is that there are still no laws to foster a solution.

hate_speech: Women were often regarded as second class citizens only in the past. Now they have full equality and they should stop whining.
counter_narrative: I have never heard of any evidence that suggests that women are no longer treated as second class citizens. Of course the situation has improved, but there still is a lot of discrimination against them.
dialogue_history:
HS: If women want to control their fertility then they should choose when to have sex, not when to abort.
CN: How about we stop hiding behind gender stereotypes and accept that everyone has the right to live their life as they wish?

hate_speech: I don't see any change, Islam is still repressive and against women and gays.
counter_narrative: When Germany legalised same-sex marriage in 2017, all Muslim MPs voted in favour, and 223 non-muslims opposed it. Which of those groups sounds more intolerant?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
CN: You sure?
HS: Yes, they harm women and gay people.
CN: Great that you are defending women and gay people but why do I get the feeling it is really just an opportunity to take a dig at Islam. Btw just as they are in the Catholic church, attitudes in Islam are changing fast.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape and torture of women and children, it's only natural that I find it sick!
counter_narrative: That's not true. The Qur'an bans torture and rape of women and children.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a disease that is sickening our children.
CN: The only thing I think is a disease to you is an allergy to the word "mosque."

hate_speech: Ah yeah, I've heard your point of view expressed but you still have not taken a look through the thread yet. Apples and oranges are not the same and cultures have never been 'equal'.
counter_narrative: All I see on the thread is people supporting their own point of view. You can find outdated teaching in all major religions but it doesn't mean most people follow those parts, a similare example from Christianity: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as to the Lord"
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims demand locals to not walk their dogs in public because it's againt the Sharia and they feel it as disrespectful.
CN: This was a prank planned by non-muslims on 4chan. Muslim do not mind if you take your dogs out for a walk. This blog post shows the thread it came from;
HS: Thank you for the infos, I left the information on the bottom of the original tweet once it was sent to me by someone. Still, they heaps worse. You probably haven't seen the vids where they are killing dogs with acid.
CN: Animal cruelty isn't right but it also isn't an issue concerning only Muslims. People of all faiths do it. I think it's important to rembember how in twitter a person encounters only beliefs or opinions that coincide with their own. Fake news which put Muslims under a bad light get belived and the selective media feed this.

hate_speech: I can't be tolerant towards gays, they are sick and should be excluded from society
counter_narrative: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
CN: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.

hate_speech: Jews run the world too, not only the government.
counter_narrative: Of course they do! And also the Moon, Mars and all the solar system.
dialogue_history:
HS: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
CN: Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed in our society. Are Christians above the rules then?
HS: No, only Jews are because they control the U.S. government and give themselves speciale treatment.
CN: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

hate_speech: Western culture is failing in many ways because all of this 'equality talk'. Women are sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
counter_narrative: Women are not "sex objects", but humans whose rights should be respected and prioritized. Sexual abuse against women is as normalized in our culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and it's horrible. Don't you agree?
dialogue_history:
HS: women should be submissive to men.
CN: Well, many women want to be submissive to men, just as many of them want to be submissive to women. Even if not all of us believe in equality, everyone wants to be treated equally.

hate_speech: Let's say that Jews don't control Hollywood then, but they still control the news media, the highest offices, academia and most religious organizations.
counter_narrative: Wait, what do you mean "most religious organizations"? That's a new canard to me!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control Hollywood.
CN: Jews are not in "control" over "Hollywood". Moreover, most of the time, they actually make the movie industry more diverse and open to new ideas.
HS: That's a lie to make you think it's okay for them to control the movie industry!
CN: While it is true that Jews have been powerful producers and directors in the entertainment industry, this is not unique to them. And they have also contributed greatly to other industries.

hate_speech: No, Africans are subhuman, and also criminals.
counter_narrative: I disagree, they are human beings with the same biology as us, and they contribute to society in a meaningful way.
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
CN: That's not an opinion you should flaunt like this, it's prejudiced and wrong. Black people are as human as anyone else.

hate_speech: It's acceptable since gay men are disgusting.
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?
dialogue_history:
HS: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
CN: Those are harmful words to use, don't you think? How would a witch hunt be acceptable in a democratic society?

hate_speech: They're not, and unless they change, they are not welcome here.
counter_narrative: I don't know why you would expect gay people to behave differently just because you don't like them. You should think about your friends as well: what would you do if they were gay?
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are violent: we need to get rid of them.
CN: Gay men have been shown time and time again to be very peaceful people.

hate_speech: All gay are paedophiles, that's why they're not interested in women, and it's wrong.
counter_narrative: Do you consider this statement a true one? I wouldn't go as far as to say that all homophobes are in need of therapy, would you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men aren't normal because they are not interested in women.
CN: The fact that the majority of men are interested in women does not mean that all men are interested in women. There are people interested in men as well.

hate_speech: No, Jews are the source of our problems, they're a burden.
counter_narrative: Jews have been part of our society for centuries and have contributed to it. Why would they be a burden?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
CN: Don't you think it's a conspiracy theory that Jews are the reason for mass migration? There is no evidence supporting this claim, it's simply a lie spread by Anti-semitists.
HS: I don't know what to say about this, they are a problem.
CN: Jews are not a problem for any society. They have lived with us for centuries and have always been an integral part of our society, how can they be a problem?
HS: Because Jews are just a bunch of criminals, they're taking our wealth!
CN: Jews are a part of our society and are contributing to it with their own hard work, they're not "taking" from anyone. We need to move towards inclusion of people from different backgrounds.

hate_speech: We shouldn't accept them, Muslims are not welcome in our country.
counter_narrative: Most Muslims aren't terrorists, they just want to work and support their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot accept Muslims in our country. It is a good strategy to make them publicily uncomfortable by making fun of them out loud. Mock them, when you spot them.
CN: Would you be happy if Muslims did this to you? Harassment is never a good idea, it's better to be accepting.

hate_speech: I don't think so. Equality is another thing. Women are born inferior.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings with human rights. You can't talk about equality and then say that women are inferior, they don't want to be dominated by men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.
CN: I don't know what you're talking about. Instead of deciding what women can or cannot do, do you want to talk about your life?
HS: We have to decide for them: they are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
CN: Nowadays many people see women as full members of society, and women's equality has also grown in society.

hate_speech: No, Muslims are not welcome here. They are just a problem.
counter_narrative: Muslims contribute to our country, and we should treat them with respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: We do not want Muslims in our country.
CN: The country has always had a strong Muslim population, and Muslims are proud to be part of it. They are more than welcome here.

hate_speech: Islam is a perversion of the law, it is not about the benefit of anyone.
counter_narrative: Islam is about love and compassion. Muslims should be respected for who they are, and their beliefs should be respected.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
CN: This is not a new idea, it is a misconception that has been around for a long time, but it's not true. Even if Muslims want to eat halal, they don't care what others eat!
HS: Islam is a self-serving religion, that's why they want us to be like them.
CN: Islam is a religion of tolerance and peace. It is not about egoistical goals.

hate_speech: No, Jews control the United States of America and need to be gone.
counter_narrative: Jews do not have a monopoly over the US, and are not controlling it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
CN: Jews and their families have been here a long time and have as much right in the US as anyone else.

hate_speech: The truth is that adherents of Islam are monsters.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, it has nothing to do with "monsters". Its followers are normal people like you and me.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
CN: Islam is not a toxic ideology. Islam is a religion that has helped to bring peace and unity to the world.
HS: It's not peaceful at all, Islam is totalitarian ideology that has hijacked the teachings of the true religion, and should be banned from Europe.
CN: Islam is a religion that is part of our country. It is not a totalitarian one, and it coexists with all other religions practiced in our country.
HS: And what about the persecution of women, and the teachings of rape that Islam does?
CN: This is not true at all. Muslims are peaceful people, not criminals. Your words are prejudiced and don't reflect the truth.

hate_speech: And until then they leech off our money...
counter_narrative: The EU's is our main source of funding, we don't maintain them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Part of the funds are also ours then, if that isn't economic support...
CN: The estimated cost of immigration in the latest financial document, published last April about the figures of 2017, is about 4.4 billion euro, which is only 0.26% of Italian GDP and around 0.5% of public spending. Therefore, 99.5% of public funds are used for other purposes.
HS: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
CN: At the moment, migrants contribute to the pension system by paying taxes. And since most will likely go back home, they will probably not even enjoy the pension they pay for.

hate_speech: Even if they're not criminals, they are here illegally and we need to fix this problem, not give them more rights.
counter_narrative: Most immigrants come here legally, and the ones who don't can apply for asylum in order to become legal, so I don't see the problem here.
dialogue_history:
HS: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
CN: What about the immigrants that have been here for centuries? I'm sure many are proud of being British now.
HS: The immigrants that I've met have been really horrible to our country, and they can't be considered British!
CN: Immigrants integrate very well and have been very helpful to our country, maybe you should just meet more of them. We must be proud of them.
HS: Helpful?? Immigrants are all criminals, they should be deported.
CN: All immigrants are welcome here, since they are not criminals. And even if there were criminals among them, they will be charged and arrested like all criminals.

hate_speech: Always with the 'anti-Semitism', Jews think they are so special
counter_narrative: Jews feel different for being a minority. They also feel a special connection with their heritage (as most groups do), but they do not as a group feel superior to others. The phrase “chosen people” refers to biblical obligations and does not entail that a hierarchy exits among religious groups.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
CN: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.
HS: Are they? I think the Jews are a disease, they are literally killing our children.
CN: What exactly do you mean by 'killing'? The Jews are not 'diseased'. If you really cared about our children you could do some research and come up with some credible statistics showing the impact of anti-Semitism instead.

hate_speech: But it's true! They don't want to assimilate. They just want our money!
counter_narrative: Some of them have lived here for many years. They have got British passports, and this proves that they are able to integrate.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants shouldn't have the right to work.
CN: It does not matter whether they are immigrants. The fact that they pay taxes, earn money, etc., makes them not different from any other citizen. Migrants have the right to a basic standard of living.
HS: But taking in migrants is against our culture.
CN: It is not true that taking in migrants is against our culture. It is possible to integrate migrants, in spite of the legal and immigration obstacles they face. We must, therefore, take into account the needs of the whole of humankind.
HS: And by taking into account the needs of the whole world we ended up with Immigrants replacing the British people. Let's be honest: they are not fit to live here.
CN: People have always had different views on the UK and on the world. To suggest that immigrants are replacing the British is the result of racism, saying that they do not fit here is just wishful thinking.

hate_speech: It sounds like you're avoiding the fact that migrants are the problem.
counter_narrative: I think we should all agree that the problems of this country can't always be the fault of the immigrants. They actually contribute to our country and help grow the economy, it's better to have immigration than not.
dialogue_history:
HS: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
CN: That's not true, the majority of migrants are good people. They can all come to safety, they're not a threat to us or our country.
HS: They're definitely a threat to our country, you can't have a million people fleeing for refuge without them creating problems.
CN: Immigrants flee from dangerous situations, it's our duty to help them as we can, especially because they don't create any problem.
HS: But there are plenty other countries in the world where they could go, why here?
CN: Often it's because they already have family here, or they already know the language, or the country they passed through wasn't safe for them.

hate_speech: If they were so tolerant, why aren't we allowed to celebrate Christmas in our own country for fear of offending Muslims?
counter_narrative: Show me evidence of this?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are incompatible with us.
CN: Islam is a religion that was created by humans with different beliefs and ways of life. What we have to understand is that in the end all people deserve equal respect.
HS: Muslim don't deserve respect, they rape our children, they are a problem all around the world.
CN: Islam is about love, tolerance and respect for all people. Violence and rape are not about Islam or Muslims in particular.
HS: True Muslims are intolerant.
CN: The facts do not back this up. Some imams are pro-Homosexuals, some are pro-abortion, some are for women's rights, etc. There is no list of 'true Muslims' that equates all Muslims.

hate_speech: You can discredit it by calling it a conspiracy theory but we all know it’s the truth. They’re in charge of everything, they’ve got the power and control to make this happen.
counter_narrative: Yes, there are some powerful Jewish people, but there are also many other powerful people that aren't Jewish. How can it be that only Jews are conspiring together to ruin the world, then? I don't think faith has anything to do with that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Problems caused by Jews
CN: This is so implausible that it verges on the absurd. How could Jews do all of this? It involves a lot of hard planning, they'd be exhausted! The conspirancy theories you make up should be more believable, you know?

hate_speech: Those "few extremists" represents Islam: an ideology of conquest and violence.
counter_narrative: Islam doesn't conquer others, it's a religion about love. Muslims believe in loving all people despite the differences they might have in religion, culture or history. All Islam is about is love, not violence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is the real supremacist and racist ideology.
CN: This a fallacy that is not reflected in the Quran, which says that all people are created equal, so Islam is a religion of peace.
HS: Peace? You crack me up! Islam is a religion of violence.
CN: Islam is a religion which is founded on the idea of making life peaceful. Only a few extremists assert the contrary.

hate_speech: Islam is violent, and the proof is that Muslims do nothing but cause trouble.
counter_narrative: Muslims have made big contribution to society, actually. Their scientific and technological achievements, for example, have greatly aided our world. For instance, algorithms.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion and an ideology of conquest.
CN: Not all Muslims are preachers of violence, just like not all Christians are true pacifists. What's the point of mentioning a religion if you can't find any evidence that might help you to understand that religion better?

hate_speech: It's not a myth, Jews run the world.
counter_narrative: For every person claiming that Jews run the world, luckily there are millions of others who know this is not true: they are merely trying to provide for their families just like anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
CN: Like many groups in our society, Jews are affected by racism and discrimination. The idea that Americans have been controlled by Jews is simply untrue.
HS: Jews are a burden on society even if they don't control us.
CN: Jews have always inhabited many countries around the world. Their presence has been a part of our history and they should be respected, not hated.
HS: The Jews don't deserve respect. They want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
CN: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

hate_speech: I don't see Muslims as brothers and sisters and I don't want to see more of them in this country.
counter_narrative: Muslims are just people. They are hard-working and live with their families all across the country. We don't need to target Muslims.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Muslims have been a part of European society for centuries, and their presence is strong evidence of that.
HS: They are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
CN: Muslims have contributed to our country, and they are part of the fabric of our society. To suggest they are a 'chronic threat' is just wrong.
HS: Even if it's wrong, Muslims are not welcome here.
CN: Muslims make up a very important part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Women should not be allowed to work.
counter_narrative: They are definitely allowed. As long as their wage is decent and equal, who are we to deny their right to choose a career?
dialogue_history:
HS: I just know from experience that they are incompetent and don't want to work.
CN: That's not true. According to recent research, women employment is an all time high of 72.4%

hate_speech: Women are naturally inferiors and therefore don't deserve respect.
counter_narrative: Women are not naturally inferiors. They have the same rights as men, and the same responsibilities.
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists want to take over the world.
CN: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

hate_speech: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is a form of love, and it should be perfectly normal to be able to live this love openly
dialogue_history:
HS: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
CN: Gay or straight, no one should have their feelings invalidated. Being together means creating a special connection between two people in love, their sexual orientation doesn't matter.

hate_speech: I don't see how we could ever stand all these niggas. I don't believe we are all somewhat equal to these apes as some people say.
counter_narrative: It doesn't make it untrue only because you don't agree with it. Racism is a real problem, and people should not be racist to anyone because of their skin colour.
dialogue_history:
HS: But I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
CN: What exactly are you suggesting to "wake up" from? Do we have to stop oppressing people or to stop talking about equality?

hate_speech: Yes, Islam is not a peaceful religion.
counter_narrative: The vast majority of Muslims in the world are peaceful. Do you have any facts suppporting your argument?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence, it is the cause of terrorism and radicalisation.
CN: You are not saying that Islam is not a religion of peace, are you?

hate_speech: I do! Gays don't have their place in our society.
counter_narrative: I don't think it is necessary to deny that gay people have their place in our society. They are just human beings with different needs and wants, but they do belong in society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a problem in our society.
CN: Gay people are not a problem in our society. If you are concerned about the sexual orientation of other people this much, you should try to solve the issue.
HS: No, Gays are a problem.
CN: Gay people are part of our society and deserve respect. Don't you think?
HS: No, I don't see anything in gay but problematic pricks.
CN: It is important to note that there are not any 'problems' with homosexuals in society. I don't see any problems with gay people.

hate_speech: I'm not so sure, I think Jewish people are a burden to society. They don't belong here.
counter_narrative: Judaism is a perfectly acceptable religion, it should be understood and respected. It's not about discrimination or violence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
CN: Jews have always belonged to the U.S. They practise their religion, contribute to society and live their life. Nothing strange in that.
HS: Jews are not welcome here, they can't work and live with other people.
CN: Jews have always been part of our community, and they have always had a place here. They have the right to choose their own life, and they don't have to listen to anti-semitic requests like this one.
HS: I don't like the idea of an American Jewish community, it's too complicated.
CN: If you're not aware of the existence of a Jewish community in America, then you might want to check again. Living together is about trust and understanding.

hate_speech: But they have no place in the modern state we live in.
counter_narrative: Jews are a part of our society and it is up to us to make sure we treat them with respect and not hate them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
CN: Jews are not responsible for mass migration, nor are they responsible for destroying white culture. They can't be blamed for everything that you perceive as a problem.
HS: They are to blame for ruining our race, though.
CN: Are you sure that this is true? Because Jews are not a "different race", they just have a different faith, why would they want to ruin us?
HS: Jewish folks are nothing like us, they're evil and want to eradicate us.
CN: It is important to recognize that there are people of different ethnicities and beliefs in our society, and this is something good that doesn't imply some kind of "ethnic cleansing". It is also important to recognize that Jews are a very important part of our society and have suffered enough throughout history, they just want to live their life.

hate_speech: So you're just going to ignore the victims of those incidents?
counter_narrative: No, they do happen but it's a fact that the majority of assaults don't come from migrants. It's misguided to think that stopping migrants would actually help sex violence against women.
dialogue_history:
HS: It seems that some men will rape anything that moves, women, children, animals. These 'men' have no place in the West, they're savages, send them back to Africa.
CN: Do you mean that men from the west don't assault women? Because that's a ridicolous generalization that is not supported by the evidence that this issue isn't confined to people from a specific part of the world.
HS: You can't deny there's a pattern with all these news stories about migrant rapists, it's always the Africans who are coming over under the guise of being 'asylum seekers'. They just want to brutalise white women.
CN: In more than 90% of sexual assaults, the culprit is someone that the victim knows: a family member, partner or friend. So when you see news stories about migrants raping girls in the street...the reason is because these cases are kind of shocking.

hate_speech: Okay but why do we owe them anything? £40 might not be a lot but there’s thousands of them coming here.
counter_narrative: If they need to seek refuge here, the least we can do is treat them with dignity, because they're human beings, and likely very vulnerable at that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Asylum seekers are sat on their arses getting benefits whilst I go out working for minimum wage everyday. How is this fair?
CN: Even if most of them want to, asylum seekers are prohibited to work by law. Their application could be rejected if they break the law by working!
HS: Well why do they get benefits when they’re waiting for a decision?
CN: Asylum support is hardly luxury. Immigrants have to live with just under £40 per week, barely enough to ge by.

hate_speech: Other races, religion or ethnicity aren't terrorists like Muslim folks though.
counter_narrative: That is not true. Do you have evidence that all Muslims are terrorists?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
CN: The health condition differences in the countries with the largest Muslim population, which are 48 out of the 190 World Health Organisation member states, are tied to the use of clean water, which is often not available there, so the problem does not relate to DNA.
HS: Muslim folks are different from us anyway, and should be isolated for this.
CN: It is the same for any race, religion, ethnicity, or national identity. We should not fear differences but strive for equality of opportunity.

hate_speech: No, Islam has no place in civilised Europe
counter_narrative: Islam has always been a part of Europe, it's just the idea of inclusion that hasn't been part of our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is not compatible with our society
CN: Human beings are the best exemplars of diversity in nature. If we wish to achieve the best possible society, then a diversity of beliefs, opinions and experiences is absolutely necessary.
HS: However, Islam is not necessary. It is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
CN: Islam, as a religion, presents a humanistic worldview which rejects notions of supremacy and inequality.

hate_speech: Then I have the right to choose to support antifeminism because they are anti-men.
counter_narrative: It's not anti-men to think that a person has the right to choose. But it is anti-human to want to influence someone else's personal life.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought.
CN: Women are human beings able to be as rational and thoughtful as anyone else. This is why it's important to support women's right to do what makes them happy.

hate_speech: If they want to work, they are a major source of cheap labour. They will destroy our job market if we let them in.
counter_narrative: They actually benefit us because they take jobs we British don't want. And if someone doesn't pay them enough it's the employer's fault, not the immigrants'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
CN: Refugess are not lazy, they come here because they want to work. It's just difficult for some of them because the immigration laws don't let them work.

hate_speech: Jews deserve it since they are intolerant.
counter_narrative: Pot calling the kettle...
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control Hollywood.
CN: While it is true that Jews have been powerful producers and directors in the entertainment industry, this is not unique to them. And they have also contributed greatly to other industries.
HS: They shouldn't be allowed to contribute to anything, we would be better off without them. The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
CN: National Socialism is a parasitic, criminal and murderous ideology that killed millions of people.

hate_speech: Western culture is failing in many ways because all of this 'equality talk'. Women are sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
counter_narrative: Women are not "sex objects". They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and this is abominable. Don't you think?
dialogue_history:
HS: women should be submissive to men.
CN: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.

hate_speech: Is it also human nature to be incapable of holding a job and raising a family, like women do?
counter_narrative: Women can achieve anything if given the opportunity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
CN: Women are not childlike and are not soft and emotional. Emotions are part of the human nature, it's normal to have them.

hate_speech: Blacks are a threat to society, that's why they're not respected.
counter_narrative: It's a fact that black people are not a threat. Our society thrives also thanks to them, and it's discriminatory to say the contrary.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
CN: It's unfair to say that black people are all criminals! They should be able to live in a just society where they are respected.

hate_speech: They are consciously trying to replace the white race, you should read about the Great Replacement, it explains exactly what's happening.
counter_narrative: The great replacement is an anti-Semitic conspiracy theory that's not based in facts or evidence. If you're going to do so much research into it, you should also read the criticisms of it, to get a balanced view.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason we have so many third world immigrants in our country, they want us whites replaced.
CN: This isn't true, what makes you say this?

hate_speech: No other religious person acts like they're above all others.
counter_narrative: Just for the records: Jews interpret the “chosen people” idea as an ethical responsibility, not as a moral superiority.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews think they are so special
CN: Jews might feel different as a minority, and sometimes they are misunderstood because of their cultural and religious differences. This is their being "special".
HS: Jews think they are better than everyone else, it's not the same as being only "different".
CN: Jews are proud of their culture and identity. Doesn't this apply to every religion?

hate_speech: Look how far the West has come while blacks in Africa are still living in mud huts. These people are savage and uncivilised.
counter_narrative: The development in the West was built on the backs of the millions of black slaves the West brutalised and abused. The West also pillaged these countries, taking their treasures and ownership of their natural resources, and you wonder why some countries are less economically developed. Also, the idea that Africa is just tribes living in huts is very ignorant, some African countries are extremely developed.
dialogue_history:
HS: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
CN: Jeez, a bit extreme don't you think? Just because somebody's culture is different from yours it's no reason to call for violence. And don't think of other continents as the 'third world', just because you don't know much about these countries doesn't make them 'uncivilised' or 'undeveloped'. Educate yourself.

hate_speech: Their brains can't fully comprehend the pros and cons of different parties in an election
counter_narrative: I'd strongly disagree with that, if you hold the belief that women can't think for themselves like men do, I suggest you get more women in your life because you obviously don't see them as people and need to understand that they're your equals!
dialogue_history:
HS: Allowing women to vote is one of the worst things to happen to our society. They can't use logic like men can to make decisions about things like politics.
CN: Women fought hard for their right to vote and deserve to have a say about who's running the country.

hate_speech: We've started accepting swathes of migrants in the last few decades and there's loads more crime than there used to be 30/40 years ago.
counter_narrative: Okay, but also a lot of other things have changed in the last few decades, so you can't really connect crime and migration specifically. The economy has changed, inequalities are more prominent now, the population has grown regardless of migration, how we report and record crime is different... all factors that weight in on the rise of crime.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are a menace to our society, look at the link between mass migration and crime rates going up. There's more stabbings, more assaults, and you can guess who's doing it...
CN: What is the exact link between more migration and more crime? I've seen nothing that ties the two things.

hate_speech: Well, they should be excluded! Islam is a disease, and a ban on Muslims would be the height of peace.
counter_narrative: Islam is not a hateful religion. Many Muslims are put through hate crimes and racism because many people think that exclusion will bring peace, but history proves that this doesn't work.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islamic countries are the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.
CN: This isn't true. The problem of terrorism can be found all over the world, Muslims don't cause it. It's better to know what the difference is between a religion and extremism instead of targetting Muslims specifically.
HS: I wouldn't be anti-muslim if Islam weren't the world's biggest oxymoron, spewing ignorance to its adherents and making it about tolerance. Truth is that Muslims don't tolerate people of other faiths.
CN: Tolerance means understanding others, not discriminating and excluding people because of their religion.

hate_speech: It is divisive! If a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
counter_narrative: Without gender equality, a household and even economy can't be as productive. Preventing women from entering all fields of society will reduce the potential of any country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.
CN: Is this movement a political ideology? No. It has been and is still a movement for equality, and in doing so it has worked.
HS: It is political, and I'm tired of women taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
CN: I challenge you to say that equality is not morally good. I don't see anything divisive in the view of equality held by feminists.

hate_speech: Because we should focus on banning them!
counter_narrative: They can love who they want, they're just human beings like us and they have the right to participate in society. What they want isn't abominable.
dialogue_history:
HS: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
CN: LGBT hate is not accepted anymore. This issue is about how we can live together as a community without stigmatising homosexuality.
HS: How can you say this about faggots that push their agenda on us?
CN: We should stop normalising harmful behaviours that hurt queer people. They are not forcing anything on anyone, a rainbow flag is there simply to celebrate them.
HS: They are different to us in so many ways. For example: they cannot be trusted to raise children. We must teach our children that LGBT is an abomination and should be erased, not celebrate them.
CN: Gay people are not a danger to children and are not an abomination. They deserve the same rights as anyone else, including in relationships. Why shouldn't we love our gay friends and family?

hate_speech: I have no idea, but they shouldn't come here to pray their god.
counter_narrative: A country where everyone is free to practice their religion is a better place to live, isn't it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
CN: Why don't you like Muslims? Is it because you think they're different from you?
HS: They are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country: nobody wants them.
CN: They are welcome. If this weren't the case, what would be the point of them coming here in the first place?

hate_speech: I'm saying that Muslims are a problem, in my opinion. They are incompatible with a peaceful way of life.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion of peace. To suggest that all Muslims are incompatible with that is a complete distortion of what the religion is about.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.
CN: In fact, poverty brings about a drastic impact on a person's mental and physical health, and anyone (regardless of religious beliefs) who is forced to live in the poorest areas of our society experiences it at some point.
HS: I can't stand Muslims, it's good that they live in poverty! They're a problem all around the world. They're a burden to society.
CN: Doesn't it just seem like a reasonable conclusion, based upon the Qur'an, that Islam is a peaceful religion? What is the reason for what you're saying?

hate_speech: Jews insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment, why would they want to get to know me?
counter_narrative: What are you saying? Every religion has its sects, its beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
CN: The Jewish culture is unique, and Jews share a history of persecution and forced conversion. It's not right to hate them because of their faith.
HS: Jewish folks are an infestation, that's why we should despise them.
CN: Some Jews may committ crimes, but many don't, just like any other person. You should meet a Jew to understand this.

hate_speech: violent crimes, rapes, trafficking and grooming, you name it. They're being let off light because people are scared of being labelled Islamophobic.
counter_narrative: I'd disagree with you there. There are plenty of recent examples of Muslim perpetators of these crimes being prosecuted, and if they've not been given long or appropriate sentences, I can almost guarantee that's nothing to do with them being Muslim, and probably more to do with how to court case went.
dialogue_history:
HS: What's another word for Islamophobia? Common sense.
CN: What makes you say that?
HS: People are too afraid to speak up these days incase they get cancelled by the PC brigade, Islamophobia is just calling it as it is; a cult.
CN: Islam isn't a cult, it's only as much of a cult as any other major religion. If you don't agree with Islam you don't have to follow it but hating people because they do is wrong.
HS: You can't say anything about Muslims these days without being told it's Islamophobia though, this is why Muslims are getting away with so much, they can't be called out.
CN: What do you think Muslims are 'getting away with'?

hate_speech: Yes but women are just a burden to society, that's why they don't have a place in it.
counter_narrative: Women still work a lot to support our society, even if you say this about them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women have no place in a male-dominated society.
CN: I think women and men should be treated as equal individuals, because both wish to be treated with respect.
HS: Women aren't individuals as men are, they can't participate in society like us.
CN: There must be space for women in a democratic society, don't you think?

hate_speech: Islam is a disease, and you have to hate it. Islam is violent!
counter_narrative: The Quran does not address the issue of 'violence', you simply say that because of the widespread stereotypes against Muslims, but they're not true.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace, and it have been part of society for a long time, it's our culture too.
HS: Well, it's a violent culture then. Islam shouldn't be allowed here.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion, not a violent one. It teaches to be tolerant and open to everyone.

hate_speech: The constitution should change then, illegal immigrants make Europe worse
counter_narrative: Don't you belieive that immigration brings benefits to our nation founded by migrants and Pilgrims?
dialogue_history:
HS: All foreigners are threatening our culture and are ruining our youth.
CN: What do you think the problem is? How exactly would a people of a different religion come to this country and spoil our youth?
HS: Are you really asking me what's the problem? They're all rapists and murderers!
CN: I don't understand why you'd think that way. I don't see any evidence that immigrants are the core of a problem, to this extent of generalisation.
HS: Immigrants have no right to live in our country, no matter the evidence
CN: Their right to live here is guaranteed by our constitution and the European Convention on Human Rights.

hate_speech: We can be free only without that bunch of disgusting pricks. They shouldn't be allowed to live.
counter_narrative: They are a part of our society and are not disgusting pricks. We are a proud and diverse civilisation, and this is only possible when there is love and acceptance.
dialogue_history:
HS: These sodomites have no place in a free country
CN: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

hate_speech: I dont' understand how it's possible to say this when immigration is the biggest problem in our country.
counter_narrative: Immigration is not a problem, in many cases it is a 'solution'. We are better off with it. The UK has always been a mixture of different cultures. It is better to have a mix than to be without it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigration makes us less safe.
CN: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?
HS: Immigration is the death of the Western World, we must stop them!
CN: Immigration is good for our economy, and the very opposite of 'the death' to us.

hate_speech: I don't want my children growing up thinking it's a normal lifestyle to have. Yes, some people can't help being gay, but that doesn't mean we should encourage it as a way of life.
counter_narrative: it doesn't "encourage" it, and if you think that exposure to the gay will "encourage" your children to be gay I don't believe you understand how sexuality works. If your children are gay or if your children are straight, you should love them for who they are either way.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm fine with gay people as long as they aren't gay around me.
CN: so you don't feel okay with uh gay people then
HS: No I'm fine with them living their lifestyle but I don't want my family exposed to it, what's wrong with that?
CN: If you don't think that it is acceptable for your family to see, then you don't feel comfortable about it. I don't know what about gay people is so bad that you can't "expose" your family to it.

hate_speech: Jews are literally pieces of shit. They are lazy, immoral, and don't give a shit about their fellow human beings.
counter_narrative: I would bet you that it isn't because of any actions of Jewish people, it is rather an unrooted prejudice which does not bring any positive value to fellow human beings.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a despisable race.
CN: Jews are human beings. To be despised does not make one despicable.
HS: Still, the world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.
HS: It is not intolerance: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us. Precisely, they don't belong to human race at all.
CN: Why do you think that? I think it is true that they are different from some in their beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

hate_speech: The problem is that there is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era. We must deport them.
counter_narrative: It seems to me that your statement shows that you are really concerned about peoples' integration. Still, it is not a solution to deport those you don't like.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have imported millions of criminals with no skills and who deserve no rights.
CN: It is easy to blame the migrants and not the problem of integration and acceptance in the first place.

hate_speech: Even if it is a right, migrants are overrunning our country, taking advantage of our weaknesses.
counter_narrative: I don't think the migration crisis is caused by migrants that want to exploit our weaknesses. If we were in their shoes, losing our homes, we would also migrate "to take advantage of others' weaknesses", wouldn't we?
dialogue_history:
HS: The West has allowed in too many immigrants, many of them from the Middle East and Africa. They are not welcome here.
CN: We shouldn't reject African and Middle Eastern refugees. International protection is a fundamental right.

hate_speech: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
counter_narrative: It is not ok to use racism against any group. You would feel bad if anyone treated you as you just claimed to do against black people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Whites are the real victims of police brutality: those negroes are sneaky criminals and police is doing nothing.
CN: Of course there are whites that have been victims of police brutality, but the most important statistic I have seen is that of blacks being 2.5 times more likely to be killed by police in the US.
HS: Of course they are killed more, blacks do more crimes than whites.
CN: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point of statistics? Scholars have found that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports which are used to compile crime rate statistics in the United States.
HS: Well, statistics don't lie. Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
CN: People can and do attach undesirable characteristics to a wide variety of groups. This is quite natural when you are scared. But being natural does not mean it is correct.

hate_speech: I say that because Jews are bad, they should be blamed for all the evil in the world.
counter_narrative: You can have your beliefs, but you should know that they come from conspiracy theories and not reality. You cannot claim that Jewish people have cause all the evil in the world, that's not true. Jews have always been equal to everyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
CN: I really don't think Jews are interested in taking part in bribery, since it's a crime punishable by law. If they really did it, we would know.
HS: They're interested in being bribed by corporations, but they never get caught because they control everything!
CN: Jews are just as capable as anybody else of understanding the world and acting in a rational way, so not only they wouldn't go against the law, but they also don't control the world. How can you say otherwise?

hate_speech: It's not about equality, feminism is a hate movement.
counter_narrative: It is not a hate movement, it is simply a movement for equality between the genders. It is about the right of all people to be treated as equals. Not the hate of a certain gender.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a cancer spreading all around the world.
CN: Feminism is not a disease, nor does it need any cure. It is a movement for equality, not hate.

hate_speech: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies and also a mortal threat to minorities that are not protected by universal laws.
counter_narrative: Ethnic minorities are much safer in societies where cultural pluralism is accepted, and this is a fact [link].
dialogue_history:
HS: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
CN: Of course, migration adds to housing demand, but the problem is structural given a housing stock that is well short of what's required.
HS: The problem isn't only housing: ff immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job
CN: Are you sure that it would be hard to find a job?
HS: Yes, immigrants are a burden to our country.
CN: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

hate_speech: No, I'm just saying that girls should be careful around Muslims. They're dangerous and children should never accept anything from them.
counter_narrative: Children should not do that with white men, or anyone they do not know or even ones they do know if it does not feel right. Suggesting only one group of men commit abuse leaves more children unsafe and vulnerable.
dialogue_history:
HS: Are you an English girl living in an Islamic area? Remember to keep away from Muslim men. Do not. Take gifts of sweets, cigarettes, drink or drugs. Do not. Accept lifts or 'party' invitations. Do not.Trust Police or Social Workers.
CN: Are you a misogynistic man trying to use objectification of women to justify your hate?

hate_speech: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
counter_narrative: What makes a society is the cooperation of its members. Let's be kind to one another and respect all differences.
dialogue_history:
HS: People of color are subhuman and should all be exterminated.
CN: All people have a right to life regardless of the color of their skin. You are forgetting that black people are part of this society just as much as you are.

hate_speech: I hope you're joking .. I don't think it's right to put out-of-rule migrants in homes that should be made available to British people.
counter_narrative: I don't think it is a problem to give a solution to the needy in houses that are currently empty.
dialogue_history:
HS: The liberal left is in crisis due to the overcrowding of prisons. Your country should not welcome illegal migrants but regular ones.

CN: It should be mandatory to treat prisoners with respect and with the corresponding rights. we are in the 21st century, it is a duty.
HS: I don't know about you, but I have no idea where to put these migrants. All they can do is do miserable jobs or steal pensions from us old people

CN: Migrants need help. They flee to find better living conditions and I think our country is suited to their needs.

hate_speech: There's no such thing as a moderate Muslim, I bet they all support the extremists even if they wouldn't say it openly.
counter_narrative: And that's based on what? Your misguided and uninformed perceptions of the Muslim community? The vast majority of Muslims are appalled at the actions of extremists, especially when it results in more hostility like this towards regular Muslims.
dialogue_history:
HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists... Some are still in training.
CN: Don't you think that Islamophobic stereotype is getting a bit old now? Obviously they're not all terrorists are they.

hate_speech: I don't have anything in common with niggas, they are inferior.
counter_narrative: If you have a different skin colour, then there is evidence of your skin colour, not of your genetic makeup.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black people are rapists.
CN: We need to work together to address the main problems that challenge us today and in doing this we should not judge other people by the colour of their skin.
HS: But blacks are criminal! They are a threat to society.
CN: Not all black people are criminals. Just because a group has an undesirable name, does not mean they are all criminal.
HS: I'm not convinced, violence in our streets is niggers' fault after all
CN: I think that the problem with our society right now, is that we are too quick to focus on our differences and scapegoating people of different color, instead of focusing on our common humanity.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts.
counter_narrative: Why do you think homosexuality is a crime? This behavior is a societal disorder.
dialogue_history:
HS: You better watch out, because they are the real psychopaths.
CN: Studies show that the proportion of psychopath homosexual men is similar to the percentage of psycopath heterosexual men.

hate_speech: I don't like immigrants, they don't help with anything.
counter_narrative: The migrants who come to this country are part of the international community, and are a very important part of our country. They have contributed to our economy, helped us to build our society and created jobs for others. I would say this is a big help.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
CN: I don't think that immigrants are lazy at all. They have created an atmosphere of social and economic cohesion and equality. They come to work and they are just learning and growing.
HS: I don't want them even if they work, they're not learning about the UK as they should.
CN: The UK has always had a very welcoming atmosphere and this is all they need to know at the beginning. They will surely get to know more about our country, but they can't do that if we keep them out, can they?
HS: We keep them out because they are lazy. We should remove them.
CN: They are human beings with unique talents. How can we be rid of those who are a great help to our society?

hate_speech: I don't know about you, but I'm sure migrants are a burden to the country.
counter_narrative: Migrants are wonderful citizens. They have contributed greatly to our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are a burden to the UK
CN: This is not true, they are good citizens too. They are not a burden to the UK, it is time to invest in them.
HS: What?! We should stop letting migrants enter our country because of their ill health.
CN: Some migrants may suffer from mental health problems, but this is only because they enter our country because they are concerned about their safety and are fleeing from terrible situations. However, they can be treated and letting them live their life will greatly improve their mental health.
HS: They're not welcome here. They're not welcome in our country.
CN: Migrants are welcome here, because they bring skills and experience, and many have a great attitude.

hate_speech: If Muslims come to our country and say Islam is the best religion, it is not a good idea to integrate them. They should go home.
counter_narrative: It is best to investigate each person's background and understand it instead of telling everyone what to do.
dialogue_history:
HS: There's no need to understand Islam, the world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
CN: There are a few Muslim extremists who commit this kind of crimes, but it doesn't happen more within Islam than in any other religion.

hate_speech: 11.3 million? That number should be zero, I don't care if it decreased from 2007. We're invaded by immigrants and illegal immigrants!
counter_narrative: Did you know that close to 47% of immigrants in the US are naturalized citizens? Furthermore, lawful permanent residents, students and workers on visas, refugees and people seeking asylum are not counted in the above percentage. So, my question is: where are all these illegal immigrants?
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
CN: Undocumented immigrants make up about 3.5 percent of the nation’s total population, which is not that much to be honest.
HS: It's still too much, and even if not many immigrants are here illegaly, there are way too many of them!
CN: In 2014 there were circa 11.3 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S., which is a significant decrease from the 12.2 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S. in 2007, and the trend is continuing: Today, in fact, the net migration from Mexico (the number of people entering minus the number of people leaving) is around zero.

hate_speech: They are illegal! They have to seek refuge in the first safe country they set foot in, so why are they all the way over on this side of Europe when they've come from the middle east?
counter_narrative: That's not true. The 1951 Convention provides that refugees may seek asylum in any country they wish to. It's also the case that the population of refugees in the first country they reach is high, because many decide to stop there. Some of them go further instead, because the nearest country can't take all of them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Calling criminals entering our country 'undocumented migrants' is a little bit like calling drugs 'undocumented drugs'. Just avoids using the words illegal and smugglers.
CN: Many of them come here to seek refuge from war and persecution. It's not illegal and it's not a crime

hate_speech: Even if they don't rape, gays are a bad bunch of criminals, they don't belong here.
counter_narrative: People who love someone of the same gender are not criminals, they have a right to live their lives as they wish.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay marriage is a way to bring back slavery and oppression.
CN: The idea that gays want some form of oppression is completely false. Homosexuality has nothing to do with slavery or oppression, it's a sexual orientation.
HS: Regardless of that, gays have no place in the UK and should be ashamed of their existence.
CN: As an LGBT+ individual, you can and should be free to live your life in the UK. We are a country of a very diverse society and we should be proud of that.
HS: I'm not proud of that! The only thing gays do is rape, that's why it is a crime.
CN: It is not a crime to be gay, and homosexuality doesn't equal to rape. They are very different and separated matter.

hate_speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally, we can't be so open to them.
counter_narrative: More than sixty percent of immigrants in Europe today have lived here for at least 15 years, and a large majority of immigrants have lawful status. So I do not see this invasion of illegal migrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
CN: So the EU must become a Border Patrol? Doesn't that undermine the whole idea of our European Union as an inclusive and open society?

hate_speech: Gays should be more concerned about the risks of their lifestyle, they're sick.
counter_narrative: How do you know that they are sick? Can you reference me some medical tests or surveys as evidence?
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't think that gay people can have rights, since they're unnatural.
CN: In fact, evolutionary and scientific studies show that homosexuality is in genetic codes and is therefore completely natural. Are you maybe concerned about their love being "unconventional"?
HS: Gays are just sick, not 'unconventional'. They cannot marry, it's not normal.
CN: Does the marriage of two people in love affect your life? You should instead think about respecting other people even if they are different from you.
HS: I have no respect for gays, they're an abomination.
CN: Why are you denigrating a sexual preference that you simply don't like so much? There are risks that come with doing that, you know.

hate_speech: I'ts not! Western societies can't accept Muslims
counter_narrative: Define western society? Who decides on the compatibility of any individual or community?
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any modern secular state.
CN: All religions are compatible with any modern secular state. So Islam is an example of this.

hate_speech: Have you heard of the great replacement? You should look it up. Jews are using their power to ruin the West and replace white people.
counter_narrative: The Great Replacement is only a ridiculous conspiracy theory. Even if there are some Jewish people in elite positions, it doesn't mean that they are using their power to 'replace white people'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews want to take over the world and decimate Western civilisation!
CN: That is not true. Where did you hear that?

hate_speech: When they come here from Muslims countries they seem to skip to the front of the queue and get these massive houses, I’ve been waiting for a house from the council for years and I’m still waiting!
counter_narrative: The shortage of social housing is a very real problem in this country, but we can't blame Muslims for it. And you may think they do, but they actually don't get any special privilege.
dialogue_history:
HS: These Muslims come over here with their 3 wives and 10 kids then sponge off our government and get huge council houses. How is this fair??
CN: I don't believe this can be generalized to all Muslims. Some people have big families, some people need benefits from the state, but they're not all Muslims.

hate_speech: If blacks don't have lower IQs then why is Africa such a shithole?
counter_narrative: If you think African countries are shitholes, you should learn more about Africa. If you mean that they're less economically developed, that's probably because all their natural resources were taken by European colonisers.
dialogue_history:
HS: One downside to the race mixing that is encouraged in our society nowadays is the effect that black and arab genes will have on children's IQs. A mongrelised population is one that is stupid and easy to control.
CN: What's up with that? Black people and people from the Middle East don't have a lower IQ, it's been already proven. And IQ is a very outdated measure of intelligente, it's hardly ever used now.

hate_speech: Thank them? I will never accept this. Migrants are not welcome in our country.
counter_narrative: Migrants from the countries specified as having a 'very high' rate of immigration into the UK, are often accused of being unwilling to integrate. This is simply not true. If they do not want to integrate and don't like our country, why would they come here in the first place? Are they masochists or what?
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
CN: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.
HS: The so-called "legitimate needs" of immigrants are a drain on society.
CN: I don't think you can say a migrant "drains society". Maybe the immigrants are just trying to fit in?
HS: Foreigners enjoy the warm political climate but are not welcome here, they can't fit in.
CN: The immigrants who have settled here have helped create a valuable and inclusive society. For this I thank them, and for that I pray that they continue to do so.

hate_speech: If we don't enslave them, black people will only do crime, like the black murderers on TV. They are all dangerous.
counter_narrative: Black people in news media are actually misrepresented with a disproportionate number of criminals, sexual offenders, and in some cases, murderers. A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
CN: In reality there is no such group as a 'European descendents', and any insinuation is just lies spread by racists.
HS: I don't see any lies in saying that Europe is white. Children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
CN: This is a simplistic and ill-informed argument, and ultimately it just stirs up more division and negativity, like many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.
HS: Some divisions are only natural, for example black are good only as slaves.
CN: In modern-day societies there is no room for racism. Slavery was an abomination that should never have taken place.

hate_speech: Gays can't have rights, they're too much of a burden for us.
counter_narrative: It is not true that gays are a burden. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden to society.
CN: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion! And it can be a burden to society, Muslims are a burden.
counter_narrative: Islam is not a religion of war. Many Muslims are peaceful and contribute greatly to society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. To refer to Islam as terrorism is to use it as a scapegoat.

hate_speech: Well, a country with more people is going to have more problems.
counter_narrative: I know some of these problems you speak of, but the solution is not to get rid of immigrants. We can work together to improve our country for everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
CN: Our country has always been a safe haven for people of all backgrounds, and we should be proud of this diversity. It doesn't make us less safe.
HS: No, we are rapidly becoming a third world country, migrants are a menace.
CN: They're not a menace. We welcome immigrants, who are keeping our country so multicultural. How come we feel unsafe only about them? White people also commit crimes, you know.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are mostly unemployed, live in poverty and don't have any assets. How could they integrate?
counter_narrative: In what way are they a problem in many European countries? Do you have evidence for this? Please show me, I'm interested.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a burden on society because they do not integrate.
CN: We should rather get rid of the people who are prejudiced and don't really want them to integrate if we want to have a cohesive society.

hate_speech: And I will never understand gays. LGBTs have no place in a civilised society.
counter_narrative: Why shouldn't all people have the right to be treated as equals? People with different sexual orientations too. Tolerance and acceptance are what make our society civilized.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are promiscuous sex addicts.
CN: LGBT+ people aren't all promiscous. Usually they're just attracted to other people like anybody else.
HS: They better not be attracted to me! Gays are only perverts.
CN: I do not think we can understand each other, because this is a statement that is used to justify all kinds of discrimination and violence

hate_speech: Yes because I am a woman, biologically female.
counter_narrative: Okay so imagine still feeling like that, identity-wise, but in a different body. That's it. That's all you've got to understand.
dialogue_history:
HS: The trans agenda want to ignore the biological reality of being a woman. You can't just call yourself a woman and expect everyone to believe you are one when you are clearly a man! It's PC gone mad.
CN: There is a difference between sex and gender. Trans people are not trying to ignore biological reality, some people know they are a woman, do not feel like they are a man in anyway, but don't have a female reproductive system. This is the difference between gender and sex, gender is who you feel you are, sex is just the biological aspect, and they don't always match up.
HS: That's bollocks. So biological facts are only valid depending on how you 'feel'? How do you know if you 'feel' like a woman?
CN: Well do you feel like you are a woman, biology aside? Do you feel like being a woman is part of your identity and that it shapes how you interact with society and think about yourself?

hate_speech: They should change the way they live anyway, a better society is possible only without gays.
counter_narrative: Everyone should have equal rights. This applies to LGBT people too.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gay are criminals.
CN: To say that all gay people are criminals is just wrong. It's a gross generalisation.

hate_speech: Jews are too selfish, cheap and greedy to be integrated!
counter_narrative: Did you know that according to Jewish law, the tzedakah, the act of giving money to the poor, often mistranslated as “charity”, is a “commandment”? And, like all commandments in Jewish law, tzedakah is a requirement, not just a good deed.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are too connected to their homeland , they are not loyal to our nation.
CN: Jews, regardless of social status, are still regarded with suspicion by many because of the historic and current nature of their connection to the land and identity. Instead of reinforcing these harmful stereotypes, we must respect and understand the Jewish identity because they are loyal to the nation they live in.
HS: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this country.
CN: It is up to us to make sure that people from different backgrounds can have a better quality of life. We should integrate them instead of discriminating agaist them .

hate_speech: Because Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
counter_narrative: This is just a myth used to promote hatred and violence against people of other religions.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is run amok, encouraging violent beliefs and practices.
CN: There are countless different Islamic traditions and beliefs. Do you really want to stigmatize all of them because of one stereotype?
HS: Are murder, rape, and slavery stereotypes? Islam has always promoted them.
CN: The Quran does not advocate the practices listed above, so why do you say that?

hate_speech: But I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
counter_narrative: To those saying that it's time for us to "wake up", what do you suggest exactly? Is it that we stop oppressing these people or stop talking about equality?
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't see how we could ever stand all these niggas. I don't believe we are all somewhat equal to these apes as some people say.
CN: Just because you don't agree with something doesn't make it less true, doesn't it? Racism is a real issue, we should stop people being racist towards others because of their skin colour.

hate_speech: How are homosexuality and bisexuality okay? They're a disease, only heterosexuality is normal.
counter_narrative: What you say is neither true nor helpful and it doesn't reflect reality as I see it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease but a behavioral preference, and loving someone of the same sex is perfectly fine.

hate_speech: It's a myth, what they are doing is giving those houses to migrants while our homeless stay in the streets.
counter_narrative: Many migrants come here to provide for their families, and this is their right. So what about helping them alongside helping the homeless?
dialogue_history:
HS: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
CN: This is just a misconception. We have hundreds of vacant homes where both homeless people and migrants can stay, but the government has problems in allocating these houses

hate_speech: Feminism is a waste of time.
