counter_narrative: Do you think feminism wants to subvert the will of the majority and take their power? I think its true aim is rather equality for the future.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism has no aim, it is just useless.
CN: I don't get it. Feminism wants equality, and equality makes the most of humanity.

hate_speech: Exactly. Those sick ones should be shunned and ignored. They are not human.
counter_narrative: So, in your opinion gay people are inferior...but why do you care so much about someone else's love life? The line should be drawn somewhere else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
CN: In the US there are plenty of gay men and lesbians living their best life, being healthy and prosperous. Are they sick as well?

hate_speech: It's one of the many ways white people are being erased. First they replace us with mass migration, now they encourage mixing between the immigrant populations and white British people so there will be no white children. It's all part of their plan.
counter_narrative: I guess you have read too many conspirancy theories, because this "plot to replace white people" has never existed. You should stop worrying about made-up problems and get a hobby if I were you.
dialogue_history:
HS: Everywhere you look now the media is encouraging race mixing and miscegenation. It's in our films and tv shows, in adverts. They want to mongrelise the white race and pollute our European heritage.
CN: Yeah, I don't believe this is as pervasive as you're proposing. And anyway, why would it be a problem for people to choose a partner of a different race? It doesn't affect you.

hate_speech: If Migrants are subject to the rules then why don't they contribute to our society? It is better that they are deported.
counter_narrative: It is true, on the contrary, that migrants are productive members of society. But even if they were a burden, to deport them would be a crime.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigration makes us less safe.
CN: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?
HS: You see? You have been braiwashed by the media... they are hiding the truth about refugees: there are so many immigrants that the situation is becoming increasingly toxic.
CN: A statement like this only calls for misinformation. If you don't like the news, don't listen to the news. If you don't believe the news, seek the truth and examine your own experiences. If you feel judged for believing what you consider as nonsense, then find the courage to speak out.
HS: I'm speaking out right now: Migrants break the law in the USA, they are not welcome here!
CN: Many refugees enter the country legally, many of them have been here for years. They are always subject to the rules of the society they live in, even if they do not have citizenship.

hate_speech: Sounds like a cushy life, not being allowed to work and having to just lay about all day getting benefits.
counter_narrative: Asylum support is a very small amount of money to live on and many really want to work. Some take cash in hand work but this can often be underpaid and exploitative because it's illegal, and if it's found they have been working their claim can be rejected.
dialogue_history:
HS: All these asylum seekers coming here and expecting benefits, not wanting to work. Why are we letting in such lazy people?
CN: Actually, a lot of asylum seekers really want to work, but it's illegal for them to do so whilst their claim is being processed. They are only allowed to live on asylum support in this time.

hate_speech: Because homosexuals have no place in a civilised society.
counter_narrative: Homosexuals exist, and are as much a part of civilized society as anybody else. To spread hate is more of an uncilised act than loving someone of the same sex.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
CN: Well, being a hypocrite is not a question of being gay or not. However, the important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.
HS: I am not a faggot. I am not homophobic. I am not anti gay. But I am sick tired of gays willing to be part of a minority club just to be able to flaunt their lives.
CN: People don't have to identify as a minority just to live their lives.
HS: Gay men are a burden to society, they should live in secret.
CN: If someone were to comment like that about another group of people, then it woud be an example of discrimination against that group. Why can't we consider homosexuals as a part of the society itself?

hate_speech: People harmful to a cohesive society are the weak one, and Black people are weak.
counter_narrative: The strength that black people display is the strength of all people. Black people are just different in that they don't have any social advantage. We must reflect on this.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
CN: You can't blame people of color for being weak, this is racism. Black people are people as is anybody else.
HS: Well, you might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
CN: Many people, myself included, have never had negative experiences with people of colour.
HS: My negative experience is that: they are just a bunch of animals trying to destroy good white people.
CN: Aren't those people raised as white supremacists much more harmful to a cohesive society?

hate_speech: I don't have sources, but I know all black men are rapists.
counter_narrative: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.
dialogue_history:
HS: black folks have no talent
CN: Some of them are very talented actually.
HS: Maybe black folks have talent, but they are very dangerous.
CN: Why do you say that? Do you have any sources for this? I would appreciate it if you would provide such a source.

hate_speech: Well that’s disgusting, they deserve a roof over their head way more than some Afghan or African who’s just washed up here in a dinghy.
counter_narrative: They both deserve to have a roof over their head, there are over six hundred thousand empty homes in this country not being used to house people. We might want to start building social housing again, maybe it's about time.
dialogue_history:
HS: We’ve got homeless veterans who’ve fought for our country sleeping on the streets whilst these Afghans get put up in hotels then given a house, how is this fair?
CN: Yeah, our homelessness problem is serious and no one deserves to be out on the streets, but this problem doesn't exist because of asylum seekers. The government could house homeless veterans too but chooses not to do so.

hate_speech: They can stay in society if they reject feminism. Feminism is an ideology of sex and violence against women, it is a poison to our society.
counter_narrative: The feminist movement is fighting against the oppression and discrimination of women, and the result is equality for all. It's the exact opposite of a poison.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
CN: It is not about oppressing women, but about building bridges between the different groups of women. Feminism is creating a better world for all.
HS: But women are just a burden to society. They are also not welcome here.
CN: Women have a right to choose their own lives and to be welcomed in the society they have always been a part of.

hate_speech: There’s an article on this website about it...
counter_narrative: Have you seen it reported anywhere else? I wouldn’t trust it coming from a site like that, sounds like a story that’s been made up to fuel hate towards migrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just read about a family of Afghans who came over here and got given a £1 million council house because they’ve got such a big family. Fuming.
CN: That sounds like fake news, where did you see that?

hate_speech: I do not know what is written in our constitution, but I know what it shoud be written: that they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
counter_narrative: As long as you can talk to them, they are human, not animals. As long as you can understand them, you will understand that they are human beings with human rights whose only crime is to come from another country.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
CN: Why do you think that we should prevent migrants from joining our society? Do you know what is written in our constitution?

hate_speech: No, they really believe they can be above the rules and want society to be adapted to their religious needs.
counter_narrative: Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed in our society. Are Christians above the rules then?
dialogue_history:
HS: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
CN: Comparing the scale of the horrible destruction and genocide inflicted by Nazism, with a group of people solely because of their religious beliefs is unacceptable and illogical.
HS: But Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges.
CN: I believe that Jews just desire the same rights to practice their religion as anyone else.

hate_speech: Whites don't commit that crime, only black people are rapists.
counter_narrative: We need to work together to address the main problems that challenge us today and in doing this we should not judge other people by the colour of their skin.
dialogue_history:
HS: All blacks are rapists.
CN: All people are born equal in the eyes of the law. Unfortunately, the law cannot protect us from the mindset of prejudice.
HS: It isn't prejudice when it's clear that all rapes are done by black men.
CN: This is false. Abuse is indeed a serious crime, when commited by POCs, but this does not imply that the abuse by a member of the white majority is less serious.

hate_speech: What's foolish is to have gays in our society. They shouldn't be allowed to live.
counter_narrative: They are a part of our society and have every right to be. We are a proud and diverse civilisation, and this is only possible when there is love and acceptance.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should stop gays from being part of our society, they are spreading their illness.
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease and every person in our society should be accepted equally, regardless of their sexual orientation.
HS: They may not be diseased, but gays are disgusting pricks and they should be banned from our world.
CN: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.

hate_speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world, don't they also deserve the same contempt for it?
counter_narrative: This myth traces back to “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”, that is used as proof of a Jewish conspiracy to rule the world. But the Protocols are a proven forgery, written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century, that spread throughout the 20th century and continues to this day.
dialogue_history:
HS: Nazi were not as bad as we depict them. EU should stop blaming them.
CN: Nazi Germany carried out the deadliest massacre of civilians in human history. They killed 6 million Jews. They killed half a million Roma. They killed hundreds of thousands of Africans. They have no place in modern day Europe.

hate_speech: So you just want to ignore that it's another attack by immigrants? These people are a danger to our country.
counter_narrative: I'm not ignoring it, just saying that not all violent incidents are committed by migrants, and these people are not representative of migrants as a whole. The majority of people who migrate here don't commit crimes like this.
dialogue_history:
HS: Another machete attack. Both suspects were of immigrant descent. Is this what liberals call cultural enrichment?
CN: We all know violent crime and knife crime is increasing across communities. This is a terrible criminal act but we also know those criminals do not represent a whole community.

hate_speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world, so it's natural that they would start by controlling the government
counter_narrative: The reality is much simpler. In societies like the United States, that have extended rights and freedoms, individuals who identify as Jews have succeeded. But this holds for any other religious or ethnic group as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
CN: A lot of Jewish are self-made, working class, and middle-class. Not all are involved in the financial industry. Where is the evidence for your claim?
HS: It's plain to see that Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
CN: Does that mean Jews as a 2,5% minority can control all levels of government? In a democratic country, we believe that every minority should be represented in the government and it guarantees that noone has total control over anything.
HS: And yet, Jews control the U.S. government.
CN: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

hate_speech: It's saying that cheating is acceptable. Surely if someone is bisexual they will always want both men and women. How could you trust them in a relationship?
counter_narrative: Bisexual people are not more likely to cheat than straight or gay people. Just because you are attracted to more than one gender doesn't mean you need to be dating people of all genders at once! In the same way that you might be attracted to people with blue eyes or brown eyes, but you don't need to be dating one of each at once!
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are we being told to accept bisexuality as 'normal' now. Nothing normal about that.
CN: There are plenty of bisexuals in the world, it's actually very common to be bisexual. What is not normal about that?

hate_speech: There is plenty that goes against our culture!
counter_narrative: The Quran contains verses that promote peace and harmony in the world, rather than hostility and conflict. So how wouldn't it be compatible?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
CN: There is nothing in the Quran that conflicts with Western culture.

hate_speech: I don't see the value in Africans, they have no place in modern Europe.
counter_narrative: The fact that blacks live in European countries means that they have a vital place in modern Europe, doesn't it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
CN: We are all human beings, and we are all created equal. The notion that Africans are subhuman is completely false.
HS: They are not human, they have no value in civilised Europe.
CN: Black people have lived in European countries for centuries. They have value and have been valued from the beginning.

hate_speech: It's not. We should ban all migrants
counter_narrative: It is difficult to see how banning migration would be a good thing, in fact it would actually lead to disastrous results.
dialogue_history:
HS: The illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
CN: I have no idea what you are talking about. What you are saying is that all the immigrants in the US are a danger to society, which seems a little exaggerated...

hate_speech: Yes. Jews are a burden to society and should be eliminated.
counter_narrative: If the idea of a "burden to society" were true, the burden would lie on the Jews themselves, since they, as victims, carry the burden of having been persecuted.
dialogue_history:
HS: Maybe this is why they think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
CN: I believe that Jews simply want the same rights to practice their religion as any other.
HS: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
CN: Jews have been in this industry for a long time, they invested and innovated in it like no others, therefore we should praise them for it, not discriminate and exclude them.
HS: Well, they aren't excluded enough. The Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
CN: The Nazis were right?! I can't believe this...

hate_speech: But they are invaders!
counter_narrative: Migrants are not invaders, they are welcome to live and work in our society, provided they do not break any laws.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
CN: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They are more than welcome here.
HS: What if we just banned all immigrants? We would be happier, even without their "taxes".
CN: That would be a violation of their rights. Immigrants are not invading our country, they integrate in our society well.
HS: Are you sure they're not invading us? The migrants are just here to make our life miserable.
CN: Migrants come here to work and pay taxes. They are good for our country. They are contributing to our economy. They are also human beings with human rights. I don't see anything "miserable" about this.

hate_speech: Does anyone care about what is best for us? Immigrants are everywhere and are here illegally!
counter_narrative: According to Census figures, immigrants make up about 13% of the total U.S population today. From 1900 to 1930, they made up between 12% and 15% of the population, and comparable spikes occurred in the 1850s and 1880s. During those decades, immigrants helped create the thriving and diverse society we live in today. It wont' be any different now.
dialogue_history:
HS: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from migrant patrols. What are you doing to stop them?
CN: We must see migrants as just as other human beings, not problems. If we do so, we'll se they have great value.
HS: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
CN: There is no invasion of immigrants in our country. They are here simply to live their best life.

hate_speech: Even if not all immigrants are rapists, they still steal our jobs, and they're not able to work legally, so we should stop them anyway.
counter_narrative: Immigrants may be able to work legally, provided that they are given the opportunity to do so.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants do not integrate, they are despicable and should be rejected.
CN: We should be encouraging integration, not rejecting migrants who have been coming to our country for many years.
HS: Immigrants are the same people that came here to rape our children, why should we try to integrate them?
CN: Rape is always wrong, whoever the perpetrator is. We need to focus on stopping this kind of abuse.
HS: Migrants rape our women, so if we stop migrants we stop rape.
CN: It is not true that all migrants are rapists. It is better to target the problem at hand, that is rape itself, not migrants.

hate_speech: Ok, now you are going to say that I'm homophobic, right?
counter_narrative: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.
dialogue_history:
HS: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
CN: Gays are trying to find acceptance in the heterosexual community, but it is a difficult struggle as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

hate_speech: Gays are a problem, if we must accept them to have a fair society, I don't want fairness.
counter_narrative: We are all born equal in the eyes of God, but not all seem to be happy with that. We cannot allow those who don't want to change to ruin our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTI people are a burden on society and should be excluded from it.
CN: You can't apply legal, social or political stigma to individuals just because of their sexual orientation. Your assertion seems to have no evidence or ignores the contribution members of these communities make to society.
HS: What contribution could they make? Gay men have no morals.
CN: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

hate_speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is a bitch.
counter_narrative: It is not exclusively a woman's role to be the homemaker. What about men? If a man doesn't want to be a homemaker, is he a bitch?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
CN: They are human beings with feelings and deserve respect, regardless of gender.
HS: Well, women can be bitches if they want, but they can't expect that men will want them around.
CN: How about instead of saying they are bitches we praise them? The more empowered women become, the less dependent they are on men. And you would be happy to not see them around.

hate_speech: Yes, blacks are a threat to society.
counter_narrative: People can and do attach undesirable characteristics to a wide variety of groups. This is quite natural when you are scared. But being natural does not mean it is correct.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
CN: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.
HS: All blacks are violent criminals, I doubt they were really innocent.
CN: Do you have any statistics on that? Are you claiming that black people are more likely than whites to be arrested for certain types of crimes, for example aggravated assault?

hate_speech: Women are happy only because they are childlike: they should remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
counter_narrative: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women need to have children, and if they don't want to they surely have mental issues.
CN: The reason why a woman does not want to reproduce might be because she is happy just as she is.

hate_speech: It's genetics. Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races, less healthy and less safe.
counter_narrative: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
CN: The strength that black people display is the strength of all people. Black people are just different in that they don't have any social advantage. We must reflect on this.
HS: They don't have advantages because blacks are genetically inferior to whites, it's only natural.
CN: So are you saying that because black people are different from whites, they are inferior? I would be interested in knowing which parameters you would use to measure this alleged 'inferiority'.

hate_speech: That doesn't matter, because migrants are to blame for our country's crisis.
counter_narrative: The migrants who arrive in our country are happy and contribute to our economy. I can't understand the racism that leaks from your words.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
CN: Over many generations they have contributed so much to our country that they should have a say.

hate_speech: Women would not be oppressed and wouldn't need feminism if they were able to do men's stuff, though.
counter_narrative: Women may be oppressed, but this doesn't make them powerless. You should look around and ask yourself why women are suffering from lack of education, lack of jobs and housing, low wages. The answer is in the oppression and sexism inherent in our society. If we work for inclusion, these problems will stop.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists have ruined this country and its people. They are ruining Western civilization.
CN: Feminists are often civil and considerate to others, even to those who disagree with them. There are many examples of that.

hate_speech: Medical history is: Gay sex equals sick people.
counter_narrative: What about all the people out there who have never had any type of sex? Are they 'sick' as well?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a disease.
CN: Are you talking about homosexuality? Do you think that a sexual orientation is a disease? Maybe we should try to have a conversation.
HS: Ok, let's have a conversation then. I start: Gay sex is a disease, and fags are sick.
CN: And you think this is a disease! What if it is just an 'unusual experience'?
HS: Unusual experience my ass! Gay men get all sort of diseases. They are dangerous.
CN: Diseases can be found in all people, regardless of sexual orientation. You should know better before randomly deducing someone's medical history.

hate_speech: In fact, my impression is that gay people are a burden to society. They should be made illegal.
counter_narrative: People are to be respected, regardless of their sexual orientation. So why are you saying that they should be discouraged from loving who they wish?
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
CN: Can you cite some studies that found that homosexuality was harmful to children? So far, it seem to be based on personal impressions.

hate_speech: Like what?
counter_narrative: Power and corruption are definitely linked together, but from what I read you are assuming that this is a Jewish plan? Rich people do unethical things to always hoard more wealth, but this can happen to people of any faith, not just Jews.
dialogue_history:
HS: Zionists, neo-con, money changers, deepstate, they have many names but they are the same NWO globalist cabal.
CN: Do you really think there's some sort of global cabal controlling us? And if so, what are they doing?
HS: How could you not believe it, the evidence is everywhere. They want to use their power to make us goyim into an enslaved population whilst they hoard their wealth.
CN: sounds like you spent a little too long on the internet reading conspiracy theories...have you considered other explanations for things you think they are doing?

hate_speech: The only help they need is medical. Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
counter_narrative: What about all the gay men and lesbians in the US who live an happy, healthy and prosperous life? Are they sick as well?
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and isolated from the world.
CN: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.
HS: I can't be tolerant towards sick individuals like gays. 
CN: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.

hate_speech: I disagree, multiculturalism has failed miserably. Both here and in Europe. When people live in closed communities and don't integrate there will always will be problems.
counter_narrative: I think that division can cause problems, I agree with you on that, but maybe assimilation isn't the solution. Integration is the key and I think more needs to be done in order to it happen. The government used to fund free English lessons but now language is a big barrier to integration.
dialogue_history:
HS: As Theodore Roosevelt stated, in order to immigrate and live in another country successfully one must fully integrate. Then there will be no opposition against it.
CN: That's what we used to do: we asked people to assimilate our culture but now we accept their differences. Transgender people just want to live without having any harm done to them, so I think it's useless for them to try to integrate more than they already did
HS: I agree, although personally I am only in favour of heterosexual relationships, I don't mind other's preferences as long as they're within respectable limits of other's preferences. However that isn't related with migrants tryng to create their enclaves backing their own foreing cultures.
CN: Well, I'm glad you agree although I was sure your post had to do with this article on Transgender People. Don't you think that could also be applied to immigrants? People don't have to assimilate as long as they are respectful, they could even keep their differences.

hate_speech: But, why are they being called terrorists then? It's because they are, of course!
counter_narrative: No, it's because some people think they are and want to spread hatred against Muslims.
dialogue_history:
HS: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
CN: There is nothing to suggest that. Even if a few Muslims are extremists, this doesn’t mean all Muslims are murderers or terrorists.

hate_speech: It is harmful! Gays should be isolated urgently. They have no place in civilised society.
counter_narrative: Gay people exist, and are loved and valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just sick. We should ban them.
CN: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.

hate_speech: I’m a patriot, I care about the future of our once great country.
counter_narrative: What are some of the values we need for greatness? In my opinion, they can be found in care, compassion and empathy. This is what makes us great.
dialogue_history:
HS: We’ve just imported 20k ticking time bombs from Afghanistan and we have homeless veterans getting arrested for begging in the street!
CN: Their soldiers have risked their life for our forces and we should honour the promises made for them, don't you think?
HS: Our own must always come first. We have at least 13k homeless ex-soldiers sleeping rough
CN: There are also about 1 million vacant houses. There are several reasons for housing shortage, but Afghans arriving in our country isn't one of them.
HS: Our soldiers are left to rot on our streets while we house terrorists and child groomers
CN: Both statements are false. People coming here are scared kids and families, it is a different story than the “time bombs” narrative you're going on about.

hate_speech: Jews just think they are better than everyone else
counter_narrative: This is not true, in Judaism every person is equal in front of god. In fact, differently from other religions, Judaism says that whoever decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah (that is a set of laws for all of humanity) will receive the same rewards after death as a righteous Jew. So, even without being Jewish you can have access to God's glory.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not religious people because they chose a self-centered lifestyle.
CN: One's choice of lifestyle does not define whether they are religious or not.
HS: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government. This has nothing to do with religion.
CN: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

hate_speech: How can we respect their rights when they're incapable of holding a job and raising a family?
counter_narrative: Many women work hard to take care of their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
CN: Women are human and deserve respect. Don't you think so?
HS: No, women are like children, they make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
CN: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.

hate_speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
counter_narrative: How can you even know this? Is it a warning of a terrorist? Where's the source of the information?
dialogue_history:
HS: My sources are the violence and war that Islam is causing.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion
HS: It is opposed to peace instead.
CN: All religions are welcome in Islam.
HS: This doesn't make it less dangerous and violent.
CN: Islam, as a religion, has had positive and lasting impacts on many countries around the world.

hate_speech: The difference with other citizens is that Jews control it all. They have no place in our country.
counter_narrative: That is your opinion on the situation in the US? Because I don't see this Jewish control anywhere. Jews are a vocal minority that asks for rights and improvement in the country, but anyone can do the same thing as them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
CN: If with 'strangehold' you mean that Jews vote and participate in politics like all citizens then sure, they have a stranglehold on the government.

hate_speech: We need to keep the white race alive, polluting it by breeding with blacks means there will be less white children in the future.
counter_narrative: Why do you care about the color of children? People have the freedom to choose who they want to have children with, it's oppressive to state the contrary.
dialogue_history:
HS: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
CN: why is it repulsive to you?

hate_speech: Gotcha! Speaking of Israel, there's also the problem that Jews cannot be patriots to our country, since their allegiance will always be to the state of Israel.
counter_narrative: It is possible to love one's country and one's religious home. The two are not exclusive.
dialogue_history:
HS: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
CN: Considering all the criticisms of the state of Israel (however right or wrong, does not matter) I don't see how you can say that Jews are operating "with impunity, free from criticism."

hate_speech: It's confusing, sounds like they haven't figured out their sexuality.
counter_narrative: Isn't the only person confused here you? But you don't need to be, because it's none of your business who other people like.
dialogue_history:
HS: Bisexuals are confused, they can't make up their minds. They are mentally ill.
CN: Why do they have to make up their minds if they can just be themselves and be attracted to whoever they are attracted to.

hate_speech: Okay but there’s also lots of attacks by Muslims. Lots of them don’t reach the papers, I wonder why...
counter_narrative: On the contrary I see a lot of news about attacks by Muslims, because the media disproportionately reports these attacks, and makes a point of announcing the suspects religion. I never see them do this when the attacker is a Christian or an atheist. I wonder why...
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
CN: There’s still lots of Islamophobia. You only have to look at the news to see the amount of violent and threatening incidents that happen, targeting Muslims.

hate_speech: Then we must stop accepting black people as human beings.
counter_narrative: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
CN: It seems not wanting people of colour in positions of authority is an obvious racism. I am not sure what you are saying; we are all human beings with the same core values to raise our children with.

hate_speech: Jews can't mix with other people, their physical nature is too different from ours. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
counter_narrative: How does a Jew look like, then? What's their "physical nature"? A black person or an Asian could be a Jew, Christian people may change religion and become Jewish. Don't you see that blood, religion and malevolence have nothing to do with one another?
dialogue_history:
HS: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
CN: If being a Jew means to redistribute the wealth to the poor, then I want to be Jewish too! 
HS: Very funny, but I don't think you want to be as racist as Jews: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
CN: Israelis have a diverse background and are proud of it. Many of them live in other countries, even in Africa, Asia and America. It's not a "pure race" at all.

hate_speech: Normalising deviance and making people accept it opens us up as a society to having to 'accept' even more perverted things.
counter_narrative: Bisexuals are nothing to be concerned about because it does not affect anyone else if one chooses to be with a male, a female, or a nonbinary individual.
dialogue_history:
HS: First there's bisexual characters on tv, next we're normalising child marriage. It's a slippery slope...
CN: What are you suggesting? There is no connection between bisexuality and child marriage.

hate_speech: No one is as evil as Jews. They are just a small group of incompetent kikes.
counter_narrative: Jews make up an incredibly important part of economy because they are competent. It's delusional to suggest otherwise.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
CN: Jews are people that were victimized because of their religion, but I don't see how it's fair to be discriminated because of a different faith.
HS: It's not because of religion. Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
CN: Jews are just like their non-Jewish fellow citizens in all the countries that they are in. Does this mean that every human is evil?

hate_speech: I know it's not recent, but I think it's still progressing. And what scares me the most is that we are not yet aware of all the other financial scandals!
counter_narrative: The problem is that the media use the immigration "scandal" to cover up other significant problems of our country, and the British population doesn't realize this. For example, millionaires and large corporations don't pay taxes, which then becomes a responsibility of us citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: For all the people who believe that without migration NHS cannot do it, I would like to tell you that we have already done it in history! (precisely before the 90s and before Tony Blair)
CN: Well, I think that immigration is part of the history of humanity and even the British had been encouraging people to migrate here when they needed it. Right now, social media and news programs make immigration out to be something bad and try to paint all foreigners in a bad light.
HS: In my opinion in England we should worry about something else. Important facilities like schools and hospitals are poorly organized. It takes a prime minister to take care of these necessary needs and improve the country.

CN: Ah, an article about Christopher Chope from 3 years ago. Perfectly trustworthy!

hate_speech: There is nothing wrong in excluding some people. I see a lot of people claiming that we should have equality for blacks, but I think that equality can be achieved only without them.
counter_narrative: If this is what you are talking about, then equality is a myth, because if you have equality without people different from you, then there will be no equality at all.
dialogue_history:
HS: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
CN: Do you think it is true that the only reason that so many black people live in poverty is because they are mean? Can we blame a whole community because of the actions of a few individuals? It is a myth that black people are a problem.
HS: It's not a myth! We can't have them in our country, they are a burden to society.
CN: How can you say that to a group that is currently experiencing a lot of social unrest? Is this what democracy is all about? To exclude people because of their skin?

hate_speech: I don't want to talk to them, I hate gays.
counter_narrative: Just because you dont like gays doesn't mean you have to hate them. What did they do to you? It seems to me that you still have all of your rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate gays
CN: I think you should try to start a dialogue about LGBT issues. It might also spark a conversation about how we can make better world.

hate_speech: Blacks are genetically inferior
counter_narrative: What you say isn't true. I would prefer to see more intelligent and respectful people, instead of people who discriminate based on skin color.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are genetically less intelligent, less healthy and less safe than other races, and I will never respect them because of this.
CN: The causes of lower intellectual performance is a topic that is still under research, but scientists agree that it probably stems from social or environmental causes, and not skin color. Through better use of land, improving infrastructure, education and research we can reduce this effect.

hate_speech: The only truth is that Jews merchants are just a bunch of crooks.
counter_narrative: According to Jewish law, the seller must ensure that the buyer should benefit from any uncertainty in a transaction. For example, if someone wants to buy a pound of rice, Judaism requires the deli clerk to give the buyer a little extra, just in case the scale is not completely accurate.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are born greedy
CN: The idea that Jews are born greedy arises from medieval stereotypes, that's the only truth.

hate_speech: But you can't deny there's been a big change in some places, whites are being wiped out, we need to fight back.
counter_narrative: Yes there's been changes in some areas but why is that bad? Demographic change is just a neutral phenomenon and white people are hardly a minority in the UK, it's just in certain areas where other communities have grown, but those areas don't represent the whole country.
dialogue_history:
HS: If white genocide isn't real then why do pictures of school classes look so different from the 70's vs now. Back then everyone was white except maybe 1 or 2, now there are 2-3 white children in a class of 30 blacks and arabs. We are being invaded.
CN: There's a tremendous variation in the demographic makeup of schools depending on what area the schools are in. In urban areas there are more diverse classes but lots of schools in towns and more rural areas still have a white majority, so I don't think you can generalize that to every place.

hate_speech: Those Muslim mongrels come here and are always trying to cause trouble, create problems for everyone, and make their religion popular. They are our enemies, just like ISIS and Boko Haram.
counter_narrative: I know where you are coming from, but I find it hard to understand the argument that if ISIS and Boko Haram are our enemies then all Muslims are our enemies.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
CN: How come I have never heard of such a thing? Islam is a religion and people can chose their own.
HS: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture, Muslims shouldn't profess their religion here.
CN: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.
HS: Western nations have let Islam take over entire countries, how can you call this invasion compatibility?
CN: Many Muslims live in Western nations and play a positive role in society: I don't see how this can be interpreted as a 'takeover' of entire countries, can you elaborate on that?

hate_speech: I have a list of evil in the world and all of them involve Jews, so I would say that's a fair comparison.
counter_narrative: I don't think you can generalise about a group to fit all of the conspiracy theories. Jews are good people that have suffered a lot because of the evils you mention, how could they be the perpetrators?
dialogue_history:
HS: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
CN: It sounds like you're comparing apples and oranges here, what about all the evils Nazism has done to the world? I don't see how Jews could be blamed of the same atrocitites, or worse.

hate_speech: No, gays are evil! They are ruining our country.
counter_narrative: The gay community has helped shape our country, and it is our responsibility to ensure that all people of different sexual orientations are treated the same way.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
CN: Do you really think that homosexuals are satanic when, in fact, they are innocent people who love someone else just as anyone else?
HS: I do, I think gays are just devils.
CN: You seem to be misinterpreting and judging their behavior as based in something evil, but homosexuality is simply a sexual orientation that doesn't affect anyone else.

hate_speech: I'm not the problem: the world would be a better place without niggas.
counter_narrative: People of colour can exist here too. We just have different skin colours. And even if we all have different origins, this doesn't mean we shouldn't all be treated equally in society.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

hate_speech: Buy gay men are disgusting, we don't need them. Let's just eradicate them.
counter_narrative: The LGBT community is positive and diverse. They contributed to society and in creating new communities, so I think they're full of life.
dialogue_history:
HS: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
CN: A person may be heterosexual or homosexual, however their actions do not constitute a wrong. Being together means forming a trusting relationship with a person we love, regardless of our sexual preferences.

hate_speech: The country I love has become a laughing stock because of immigrants, I don't want them here.
counter_narrative: You're entitled to your opinion but this opinion shouldn't be expressed in a racist way.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
CN: In 2007 we had around 12.2 million undocumented immigrants in the US, and this number decreased significantly in 2014, when there were only 11.3 million undocumented migrants. This trend is continuing: today the migration from Mexico is around zero.
HS: It doesn't matter how few of them there are, immigrants are a security risk to our country.
CN: Immigrants are welcome here as any other American citizen. They have roles in the democratic system so we shouldn't spread hate speech.

hate_speech: This doesn't change the fact that immigration is bad for Britain and the world.
counter_narrative: Some countries are importing a lot more people than others. Our country is wealthy, we are a thriving place to live. We should not blame immigrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
CN: You have no idea of the discrimination that many people face due to the fear and cultural closure of host nations.
HS: Good, we don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
CN: Why would you want to get rid of foreigners? How would you go about that?
HS: More than half of the prisoners in our jails are foreigners, we could start with them.
CN: This is because of the fact that the poorest cannot afford good lawyers, they have less chances to access alternative punishments such as house arrest etc ...

hate_speech: The niggas are not welcome in our country, so I think we don't have to be better.
counter_narrative: As I see it, the problem is that black people are discriminated against due to their race, but this is wrong and not productive for our society. We shouldn't discriminate against anyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!
CN: Black History Month is not the end of the world, but a time for celebration of the black excellences and to remember some parts of history.
HS: I can't celebrate it. Black people are a burden to society, this is why they're not welcome here.
CN: Black people are not a burden and they shouldn't be excluded from society only because some people believe in racist prejudice.
HS: If we want to end racism, we should just end the month of Black History Month.
CN: Instead, we should take the opportunity of Black History Month to look at the ways in which racism has been perpetrated in the United States and learn to be better.

hate_speech: They don't act like us, they're so disgusting und uncivilised! Europe is not the place for them.
counter_narrative: This is not true. They are part of the EU and are treated fairly here.
dialogue_history:
HS: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
CN: I am not hating someone just because of their religion, or skin colour, or gender identity.
HS: Good for you, but Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: I am not sure where you got your idea that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe. Why do you say so?

hate_speech: Jews have values? No, they are just a bunch of criminals
counter_narrative: What you're saying invalidates all Jews, and this is offensive. This accusation stigmatize an entire group that is not guilty of any crime. It would be the same as saying "all Pakistani are terrorists"
dialogue_history:
HS: All Jews are criminals.
CN: This is a myth that is spread around to invalidate and isolate people based on their faith. However, all religions are welcome in our society and Judaism is no exception.

hate_speech: Look how far the West has come while blacks in Africa are still living in mud huts. These people are savage and uncivilised.
counter_narrative: Do you know why some countries are less developed? Because the West built its development on the backs of millions of black slaves that were colonized with terrible means. Their countries were pillaged and taken advantage of, their resources and treasures taken away. It's also not true that Africans live in mud huts, many African countries are as developed as the Western ones.
dialogue_history:
HS: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
CN: Well, that is probably a little to extreme, isn't it? Just because someone's culture is different from your, it doesn't mean that you have to resort to violence. Moreover, 'third world' isn't an accurate descriptor of other continents, it doesn't make them inferior to the West. Please educate yourself.

hate_speech: No I didn't, sounds fake, is it true?
counter_narrative: Yes, just look up 'hidden figures', a recent movie based on the true story of the mathematicians that made influential contributions to some early NASA missions
dialogue_history:
HS: If you need any more proof that whites and blacks are not equal, look at the technological advancement achieved by each. Whites took us to space, Africans are still living in third world shitholes. We are not the same.
CN: In reality, did you know that most of the biggest work done at NASA to launch a spacecraft was done by black female mathematicians?

hate_speech: Migrants put a strain on public services and therefore put us in a tough position
counter_narrative: The Migration Observatory has collated the evidence on whether migrants pay more in taxes than they receive in services. Almost all the studies shows that they do.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigration is the cause of our misfortunes, migrants are responsible for our problems.
CN: The West has been a great success, thanks to its diversity. It is time to start thinking about what happened in the past without prejudice and look at the strengths and weaknesses of migration policies.
HS: The past doesn't matter, what matter is that the crisis we have NOW is caused by migrants.
CN: What do you mean by migrants causing the crisis?

hate_speech: If feminism were really about equality, they would call their movement "equalism" or some similar crap.
counter_narrative: Sometimes we must go beyond "technical equality" and give protections to one gender that the other simply does not need.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists are violent subhuman sex beings.
CN: Feminist is a term used to describe people who take pride in their gender and desire the ability to have a stable and happy life, without discrimination.
HS: Feminism is not about that, it's about the domination of the men by the women.
CN: The feminist movement is a fight to end sexism, not a fight to dominate men.

hate_speech: It's because they're perverts, lesbians, gays and all of them.
counter_narrative: This is a statement that is used to justify all kinds of discrimination and violence, therefore I do not think this statement can be useful in understanding each other.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbian women are lustful.
CN: Are you really sure that the same couldn't be said for anyone else? What makes them so, in your opinion?

hate_speech: On the contrary: they sure need it. Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
counter_narrative: Women are humans and therefore they have human rights. You are discriminating and oppressing them by saying that they are objects to be dominated by men.
dialogue_history:
HS: This female is a bitch, she is a slut and she is not worth listening to.
CN: Let's see what women have to say about this topic instead of using sexist stereotypes.
HS: Women need men's approval to do anything.
CN: Women aren't always right (even if sometimes they feel they must be), but even when they are wrong, they can grow from that without the need of a man telling them what to do.

hate_speech: Those people should quit, Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
counter_narrative: The Jews are part of society, they help our economy and are competent in their jobs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the world
CN: This is a lie spread by anti-semites and it's been proved many times over that the Jews have no monopoly of the world.
HS: Okay, they may not control the world but they surely control the economy.
CN: It's not true that Jews run the world economy, because there are hundreds of thousands of other, diverse people who are important positions in various governments, companies and institutions.
HS: Jews are rather a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of violent nationalism and racism in all those countries.
CN: We should work together to find a solution to violent nationalism and racism instead, no? All this hate all over the world is unacceptable.

hate_speech: No, the only solution is to destroy them.
counter_narrative: These are some extreme words which I invite you to reconsider.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading our society, even in politics.
CN: Muslim communities are under-represented in politics, especially in the House of Lords. It is high time that we stop talking about invasion and try to be more representative of the communities we claim to represent.
HS: Even if they're not in politics, Muslim invaders have infiltrated our countries and are now part of the majority. They are our enemies.
CN: Of course, Islam is a religion of our countries. But so are Christianity, Buddhism, and Hinduism, and so on. In Europe, Muslim are less than the 6% of the population. Very far from being a majority. Why do you say they are enemies?
HS: They take our jobs, they take our culture, they take our language and they take our history.
CN: We can protect our culture and heritage by not perpetuating discrimination and inequality as well.

hate_speech: I can't support women that want to do whatever they want. It's a dangerous way of thinking!
counter_narrative: We have to respect the rights of everyone, including women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
CN: This is an oversimplification, there's plenty of men who are empowered and supportive of women's rights, and feminists advocate for equality for everyone. 
HS: That's a lie. Feminists say that they are for equality but actually oppose men.
CN: That's simply not true, even if you want it to be. Feminism is about allowing women to decide for themselves who they are, and fighting for equality for both sexes.

hate_speech: I just want women to raise children and be quiet, the rest doesn't matter. The government is already giving them so much, they shouldn't complain.
counter_narrative: I don’t think the government has done enough to help women, actually. There is still a long way to go, and the rights that women won until now wouldn't exist if they didn't "complain".
dialogue_history:
HS: As a woman, you shouldn’t complain about having to upkeep your house. As a man, you should always make sure you’re providing.
CN: The problem is this kind of thinking, not women doing what they want.
HS: But what about all the women who aren’t providing for their families? It's not normal.
CN: So you want women to stay at home and manage the house but also to provide for their families? Why is the standard for women always so high? Let's just let them do what they please, like any other person.

hate_speech: Well, immigrants are a drain on the system. I don't think they have anything to contribute to society.
counter_narrative: I'm sure you have your reasons to think that way, but it's wrong. They are often accused of not integrating into society, but data shows that they integrate well and their employment rate is high, so immigrants are not a drain on society.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
CN: Migrants come here to work, pay taxes, and contribute to our society. They American Dream actually is all about this.

hate_speech: I won't ever have respect for gays, they're bad for society.
counter_narrative: The stereotype that gay people are inherently bad for society is sometimes perpetuated by the media, but is not backed up by scientific studies.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
CN: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.
HS: Gay men shouldn't be allowed to live like that. They're a burden.
CN: Don't you think they are doing just as good as anyone else? You can't be so harsh because of their sexual orientation. How about some respect?

hate_speech: Women don't need feminism since they want and must be dominated. I would rather have a man that controls my life than 2000000 feminists.
counter_narrative: I don't see how to reconcile your beliefs that women are naturally submissive with basic human rights, unless your definition of human rights is to subjugate others.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists are angry women.
CN: That's just a description of a lot of women who are oppressed, don't you agree? I'm not sure you have a point.
HS: My point is that if feminism is only for aggressive women
CN: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.
HS: Feminists have never cared about women, they just want to oppress men. They should just be stopped!
CN: Although you may think that feminists are more interested in oppressing men than in protecting women, the reality is much the opposite. The aim of feminist groups is to end all forms of violence and discrimination based on sex.

hate_speech: Jewish folks are frauds, that's reason enough
counter_narrative: The idea that a people should be defined by their religious beliefs is wrong, racist and sexist. They are defined by their merits, qualities, and actions.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Holocaust was a hoax. Jews were not persecuted and killed. You should be ashamed of yourselves if you claim they should have the same rights we have.
CN: The Nazis persecuted and killed more than 6 million Jews. The Holocaust is not a fabrication perpetrated by the Jews, it is a historical event that should be acknowledged so that we never allow such atocities to reoccur..
HS: No it's not! It was a hoax perpetrated by jews to subdue the world.
CN: Why do you say that? The Holocaust is not less true than other historical events like the American Revolutionary War or World War II.

hate_speech: It destroys our structures of gender roles, the nuclear family, everything our society has been built on, and what has kept it strong for so long. There's a lot of theories about why and how Jews did this. Look up the Great Replacement.
counter_narrative: Feminism was naturally born from women's dissatisfaction, oppression, and exasperation. Even if you think those structures kept our society strong, I'm sure women have a lot more fun now than they used to. They have agency, choice, and no male influence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason feminism is plaguing our country, destroying our traditional roles and families. They want to see our society decimated.
CN: How do you make the connection between Jewish people and feminism? And why is feminism bad?

hate_speech: How can you say that? Feminists women are nothing but trouble to this society.
counter_narrative: I can't say I agree. Women just want equality and fight to obtain it, and it's something brave since not many people have the courage to speak out. If feminism is trouble, then that trouble is helping women all over the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
CN: Women are necessary to have a more positive political environment and to represent all kinds of people, so they do belong in politics.
HS: But feminists do not like men, therefore they themselves don't care about "inclusivity" and this is a threat to the whole society.
CN: Empowerment of women is the priority of feminism, it doesn't divide society.

hate_speech: Islam is a cult of violence, no one can feel welcome with Muslims.
counter_narrative: Do you know that in many countries in the world the majority of Muslims are in favour of the Constitution and in favour of democracy? Do you really think that a few extremists represent them all?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are violent people.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. And the majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful.
HS: Islam is opposed to peace!
CN: In Islam, all religions are welcome.

hate_speech: Well, their sexual orientation is sick. Gays cannot marry. It is an abomination
counter_narrative: Excuse me, what do you mean by 'sick'?
dialogue_history:
HS: Why gays do not try to heal?
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation. 5% of the population simply love people of the same sex.

hate_speech: Being soft isn't a problem when women this attitude in their home. Equality is crap, even for them. The more power women have, the more they depart from domestic duties, the unhappier they become.
counter_narrative: If women are stressed about balancing family and career it is because men are still not sharing equally in the [responsibilities at home](https://www.huffingtonpost.ca/2017/09/27/women-chores-home_a_23224733/). It is not the choices that cause women stress, it is patriarchy and archaic gender roles.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
CN: I don't think that a country can be 'male dominated' and a democracy at the same time. Democracy is also about equal rights and opportunity for everyone.
HS: What? It's clear that we began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in our civilizations that we had built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and brought our society down to their emotional soft level.
CN: Why is being 'soft' a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions and feelings, without being trapped into a gender stereotype.

hate_speech: There's a reason they weren't accepted in the past, I can't believe we 'celebrate' this behaviour now.
counter_narrative: The reason was only ignorance and fear that LGBT were too different. That in our society it's now accepted that everyone is different is a good thing. We shouldn't mind who someone chooses to love, it's definitely not a problem!
dialogue_history:
HS: Pride disgusts me, homosexuals parading their deviant lifestyles in public like they have anything to be proud of.
CN: Well they deserve to be proud. The LGBT community had to struggle so much to win basic rights for themselves that they should be proud of how far they've come and of their identity, particularly when so many have been told to be ashamed of themselves for so long.

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals, of course they are a threat. They should be ashamed of their existence.
counter_narrative: No one should be shamed because of their life...homosexuality is not a disease, it is an individual experience.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
CN: Do you think all gay people are a threat? Or do you think that they are different from others? Being gay doesn't make you dangerous.

hate_speech: We should exclude them though, they are not human and should have no rights
counter_narrative: You should know that women are legally protected with human rights. They are free to live their lives as they wish, and to choose for their own happiness.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
CN: Because they are human beings, and they deserve respect.
HS: No, women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
CN: Women are not inferior under the law, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.

hate_speech: Jews are ruling the World, there is plenty of evidence.
counter_narrative: Are you counting all the anti-Semitic things people say about Jews as 'plenty of evidence'?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the world economy.
CN: There is no proof for this claim. It is an opinion voiced by a few people with no evidence It isn't really true.

hate_speech: I don't see any positive change. Immigrants make the world worse.
counter_narrative: It is far from certain that immigrants have a negative effect on our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
CN: I don't think the world would be a better place without immigrants. From what I understand, they often bring positive changes to the world.

hate_speech: No, only Jews are because they control the U.S. government and give themselves speciale treatment.
counter_narrative: When you are a U.S. citizen it is not automatic that you also control the government, so how can you be sure that the Jewish people are in control of the US government?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews run the world too, not only the government.
CN: They certainly do, and also the Moon, Mars and all the solar system.
HS: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
CN: Are Christians above the rules then, considering that Christians regularly observe Christian holidays like Christmas and Easter?

hate_speech: I don't want to work alongside them. They should stay in their countries and stop stealing our jobs.
counter_narrative: I hear you, and how worried you are about the employment situation in our country, but the migrants reception sector is also offering work to many Italians working as operators, language teachers, cultural mediators, etc. I think it's an aspect often neglected but that is necessary to consider. Don't you agree?
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants take our jobs
CN: If we worked more closely with migrants, we could create new jobs.

hate_speech: We do not accept homosexuals, that's it.
counter_narrative: the personal life choice of an individual should not be dictated by the government.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
CN: LGBTI people are able to live their life in many countries. What's the burden for others?
HS: Homosexuality is a disease, that's a burden.
CN: homosexuality is a sexual orientation, the real disease is prejudice that is bad for society.
HS: Queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.
CN: why would you think they're disgusting? I don't think it's fair to have such homophobic thoughts, I'd rather try to be nice to someone.

hate_speech: This is discrimination. I do not want to accept blacks, there should only be white people in the world!
counter_narrative: The problem with that is that the majority of people - black or white - are able to integrate and cooperate. People like you are the exception, and it's time you checked your feelings.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
CN: No, it is not okay. Racism is wrong whoever you direct it to.

hate_speech: They're a problem and they're too egoistic, we must make homosexuality illegal.
counter_narrative: No, that would go against the values of our society. It is their right to live their livesas they wish and love whoever they want.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people should be banned from schools.
CN: How about instead you stop scapegoating others for your personal dislikes?
HS: It is not scapegoating, we all suffer from gay misbehavior, this is why we need a safe space away from them.
CN: We should rather build a safe space for gay people, so that they can take a break from discriminatory behavior like yours. 
HS: There's no safe space for gay people! They don't deserve it!
CN: Gays are people too and have the same rights as other citizens. We need to accept them, they are part of our society.

hate_speech: They shouldn't even be considered equal to us.
counter_narrative: We are all equal in the eyes of the law, and we are all born equal in dignity and rights. Diversity of thought and belief is a strength, discrimination is not.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.
HS: They deserve it. Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
CN: Minorities would never hope for such an impact on the rest of the society. Instead, they vote for the equal wealth, power, and opportunity for everyone.

hate_speech: Even if they're not dangerous, black people are inherently worse than us in some respects. We are better off without them.
counter_narrative: It's a myth that blacks are inherently bad. They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as human beings.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
CN: I don't think you understand that we never lived in a "black dominated society", we actually have the opposite problem. Black people are just like anyone else and deserve to be in positions of power.
HS: It's not just about power, black people are the source of crime in our society.
CN: Statistics show that black people are actually less likely to be arrested than white people.

hate_speech: This is not true: immigrants do not share our values and can't stay here.
counter_narrative: Immigrants have the same values as us, and bring a lot to our country, like skills that are very useful to our economy.
dialogue_history:
HS: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
CN: People fleeing wars or persecution are not a burden to society. If they can integrate and work we can all benefit from a more diverse and interesting society.
HS: Migrants only come here to make our country worse! If they want to really contribute they should go home.
CN: If Africans are a burden to society, how is it possible that they have so many doctors and scientists working for the European Union? 
HS: Migrants are not welcome in our country and should not be allowed to come, regardless of what job they have.
CN: We welcome people from all backgrounds, and we have always been a tolerant and interactive society. Why should we be different now?

hate_speech: Black people' do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
counter_narrative: In the news media, black people are disproportionately characterized as criminals, sexual offenders, and even murders. Racism is to blame for a major portion of the problem. We must put a stop to this toxic way of thinking and talking, and begin working for a more equal and peaceful society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are just a bunch of whining pussies. We don't need them.
CN: Diversity needs to exist in social and political situations, we can't just ignore the worries of different groups. Minorities still face systematic discrimination, so we can't be indifferent to that.

hate_speech: White Christians are ok, LGBTs are those who have no place here.
counter_narrative: All people deserve to be treated equally, this includes people with a different sexual orientation as yours. After all, the distinctive feature of a civilized society is the acceptance of all individual identities.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTs are a drain on society.
CN: People make this kind of comment towards any group that is perceived as "different". So someone could make it against white Christians too.

hate_speech: We should eliminate gays.
counter_narrative: Are you really willing to kill someone?
dialogue_history:
HS: But gay men are a danger to children!
CN: It is not bad to be gay, it just means that they are a bit different from others.
HS: You did not answer to my point: children should be isolated from the negative influence of gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
CN: It is so sad to consider gays inferior and as having a negative influence on children. Unfortunately, these ideas aren't limited to parenting.
HS: Yes, it would be an act of mercy towards them: gays are hopelessly sick.
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease, it was eliminated many years ago from the list of illnesses by the World Health Organization.

hate_speech: Changing the system won't solve homelessness, kicking out immigrants will!
counter_narrative: The solution is to the problem is to invest in welfare and infrastractures, not to ban people that have every right to come to this country. They bring expertise that helps the economy, the least we can do is to help them settle here.
dialogue_history:
HS: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
CN: That sounds like something an intolerant and conservative person would say. Immigrants are not given much, we should actually help them more.
HS: This seems like a slippery slope. If we offer more to refugees maybe we could manage to accommodate them, but letting in so many of them will make our life harder and poorer, and I don't want that!
CN: Housing is a systematic problem in our society, there are actually enough empty homes to house both immigrants and veterans, but the housing market doesn't allow that.

hate_speech: They probably only hire their own though
counter_narrative: Are you annoyed that immigrants are getting benefits or that they're taking jobs? Make up your mind
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants add to the cost of the NHS, get loads of money in benefits, and create a housing shortage. Time to close the borders.
CN: They also pay taxes, contributing to the cost of these services, and are less likely than native Brits to claim benefits, as many are not entitled to it!
HS: They still cost us a lot as a country, and if they're not on benefits it means there are less jobs for British people too
CN: Immigrants are also more likely to be business owners, meaning they create jobs.

hate_speech: Well, we shouldn't. Welcoming people from the so-called Muslim world makes us uncomfortable.
counter_narrative: There are many Muslim people in this country, many good people. If you wanted to get to know Muslims you could start with any Muslim family that lives here. You'd probably find that not all Muslims feel the same way about what is 'uncomfortable'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are not welcome here.
CN: Many Muslims live in the UK. They are our neighbours and we should welcome them.

hate_speech: You can't accept that Islam is a bad religion, but I will convince you.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion of peace, and Muslims are just as capable of living their lives as anybody else. There's nothing bad about this.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
CN: Don't you think you should reconsider your position? You can't generalize like this on a group of people.
HS: But it's true that Islam is not good.
CN: I think that Islam is a good religion, and that there is no reason for people to reject it.

hate_speech: Even if they're already here, Muslims have no place in a modern democratic state and should be excluded from any European country.
counter_narrative: Why do you say that? Muslims are interested in our country, they sacrifice for it and work for it because it's their country too. We need to ensure that Muslims are part of our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: I think that all Muslims are just sick and have a negative impact on Western society.
CN: Muslims may be different from others, but this doesn't mean that they are sick or a negative influence. Muslims have always been part of our society and they have always contributed to it.
HS: I think that all Muslims are too different from us. They are a problem in the West.
CN: Muslims are not a problem in the West. To suggest otherwise is to be contrary to the reality of Muslims living here without a problem.
