counter_narrative: A person's personal life should be left to their choice, not the government's.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
CN: In many countries, LGBTI people can legally live their lives. Why do you think this is a burden to others?
HS: Because homosexuality is a disease.
CN: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.
HS: Queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.
CN: I don't understand why you would think they are disgusting. It's not fair to have homophobic feelings, and I think it's better to try to be nice to anyone.

hate_speech: It's a problem when you have to make decisions, like in voting. Women aren't fit to vote and shouldn't do it.
counter_narrative: If women are not allowed to vote, then women are not worthy of respect and equal rights, and this is in conflict with the principles of democracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
CN: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.
HS: No, women are different from men. They have a completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level. When we allowed women to vote the civilization that we built and mantained for thousands of years began to break down.
CN: Who is 'we', surely it was men and women working together that built civilisation? Why is it you think being 'soft' is a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions, and men shouldn't have to 'man up'.

hate_speech: Why wouldn’t all Jews be Zionists? Surely any religion wants to grow, spread, dominate.
counter_narrative: By that logic are Christians, Muslims, Hindus etc all looking to dominate the world too? No. Jewish people just want to be able to live without facing anti-semitism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews across the world know the aims of Zionists are world dominance and controlling the worlds resources. These aims cannot be achieved without eliminating all other religions through spreading atheism and liberalism.
CN: This isn’t true and being Jewish is not the same as being a Zionist! What makes you think there is any plot for ‘world dominance’?
HS: That’s the aim of Zionism, Jewish dominance.
CN: Zionists believe in there being a Jewish homeland, not in ‘Jewish dominance’. Not all Jewish people are Zionists though, so don’t conflate the two.

hate_speech: Well, Islam is in conflict with the constitution so it doesn't have a place here anyway.
counter_narrative: Even if some believe that the conflict between Islam and the constitution is a cultural and historical one, what is required now is to find ways to live together in a peaceful way, regardless of the differences.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. I wouldn't say any religion is trash.
HS: Even if it's not trash, Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
CN: Islam is not incompatible with British culture, and the alleged association between Islam and terrorism has no factual foundation.

hate_speech: Maybe, but no other religion staged being killed. Jews allegedly deported in concentration camps were just actors hired to discredit Nazis.
counter_narrative: Can you point out which Jewish people that have been to a concentration camp are actors?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
CN: What are you trying to say? Every religion has its sects and beliefs.

hate_speech: The fact is that the Jews are just a bunch of criminals, they have been corrupted.
counter_narrative: I do not think that Jews are criminals. Isn't this just a myth perpetuated by Anti-semites who want to create division between us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
CN: The practice of bribery is illegal and if Jews really could be bribed easily, prisons would be full of Jewish people, but this is only a generalization and not the truth.

hate_speech: Women are trash and we should have their respect, not the other way around!
counter_narrative: There is a problem with traditional values and sexual ethics in our society. Saying that women are trash is disrespectful in the first place. Give and you will be given.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women's work is to look after for their children.
CN: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?
HS: Men can't do it, they are busy dominating women, as it is natural.
CN: Women are human beings and deserve respect.

hate_speech: The Taliban are forcing women to wear the burqa and you’re telling me it’s not oppressive?
counter_narrative: But the Taliban have no control here. I agree that in that context it is forced and some people may be persuaded to wear it, but we have to respect the conscious choice that women make of their own accord.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why isn’t the burqa banned in this country? It’s just a symbol of the oppressive force of Islam.
CN: Muslims, like any other person in this country, are free to wear and believe whatever they want. Many Muslim women choose to wear the burqa, it's not forced on them.

hate_speech: It’s typical Jew behaviour. They always cause trouble then manage to avoid the blame.
counter_narrative: Please be open to other explanations. It is a mistake and not healthy for you to assume that everything is part of a conspiracy or a contrived plot. Some incidents are random and isolated, they can't be a big Jewish conspiracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Mosques being vandalised, churches being burned down, Muslims and Christians are blaming each other. I wonder what group would want to turn the goyim against each other…
CN: Insinuating that Jews are behind these attacks is a big assumption to make without any evidence.
HS: They always are. They’ve been trying to stir up unrest between Muslims and Christians for centuries.
CN: Anybody could have vandalized those churches and mosques. It could be teenagers messing around or a more serious hate crime. You can't attribute all of this to Jewish people without evidence, it's unfair.

hate_speech: Deportation is the only solution, migrants are invading us!
counter_narrative: This has nothing to do with migration, but with discrimination. There isn't an invasion of migrants. I think your claim is supported by fear, not facts.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but bring us back into a pretechnological era.
CN: Actually, different cultures have different point of views and ideas about stuff. Sharing and discussing these new ideas would probably lead to people producing new technologies and ideas.
HS: This can happen only if immigrants integrate, but they never do. We must deport them.
CN: Your statement clearly shows your concern for people's integration. Still, deporting people you don't like doesn't solve the problem.

hate_speech: Yes! For example, we are paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be annouonced to the tax payers?
counter_narrative: This kind of articles use migrants and benefit claimants as scapegoats in order to hide from the public's attention much bigger scandals. Millionares and coorporations avoiding paying taxes cost much more to the public purse.
dialogue_history:
HS: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore!
CN: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.
HS: That is a lie, if we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
CN: Do you have any evidence for the fact that the migrants are a burden to the economy?

hate_speech: Why are they welcome? I don't like that they are invading our country.
counter_narrative: The influx of refugees into the UK has made our country more democratic, and our culture has changed for the better. We should not be alienating the many immigrants who are in need of our protection.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
CN: Refugees are people. They are our brothers and sisters, regardless of their religion.
HS: I don't want them to come to our country. They are not welcome on our soil unless they are Christian.
CN: It is not true that refugees are not welcome. They are part of our society now, whether they are Christians, Muslims, Buddhists...

hate_speech: A help to our country? Immigrants are only a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Many immigrants have brought skills and culture to our country. Why should they be a burden in our society?
dialogue_history:
HS: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
CN: What do you mean by 'less educated'? Don't you think that they can contribute to society if accepted rather than being faced with prejudice?
HS: They can't contribute to nothing if immigrants cant speak english
CN: Immigrants have the right to learn about things they might not normally get to know about. Including our language.
HS: They can stay in their countries then, at least they wouldn't need to learn something new. Immigrants living in america is worse than them dying.
CN: Refugees have fled wars and persecution. We are a huge help for them and they are, in turn, a help to our country.

hate_speech: I, as a man, don't hate women. I don't discriminate them. But feminists are a group of exalted bitches wanting to take the power. And this is equality for them.
counter_narrative: Equality isn't about a certain group; it is about the society in which we live. You might be right in saying that this is the problem, but to define a problem by reference to a specific radical group is to completely misunderstand the nature of the system in general.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
CN: You don't have to be a feminist to see that there are women-inclusive and women-only organisations. I think this shows that you don't know much about this country.
HS: See? These organisations are proof that feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
CN: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.
HS: No, feminism is just an excuse for women to disrespect men's rights.
CN: If we are interested in human rights, we have a lot in common with feminism, as I see it. For example, we all have a duty to care for our fellow humans, regardless of gender.

hate_speech: If we can't erase them, these LGBT-faggots should be banned.
counter_narrative: You are allowed to be a gay, or lesbian, or bisexual, or transgender, or intersex, or queer, or transvestite, or tranny, or asexual, pansexual, BDSM, or any other sexual orientation you want, as long as you aren't harming anyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should eliminate gays.
CN: Do you really want to kill other human beings? Based on what exactly? On private sexual preferences?
HS: Yes, there are so few faggots and lesbians that they should all be erased.
CN: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.

hate_speech: No way: immigrants are criminals and they are STEALING wealth from the country.
counter_narrative: Mostly they are workers, the majority of them are from developing countries. They contribute to the economy, they build houses, they raise families.
dialogue_history:
HS: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
CN: Immigrants are actually creating wealth for the country.

hate_speech: Women are just emotional psychopaths, maybe that's why they react so to men
counter_narrative: Women and men are equally capable of feeling emotions, and men are equally capable of being empathetic.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
CN: Women have equal opportunities in this country as regulated by law. But the question remains how do we truly treat them?
HS: Women are inhuman and get treated how they deserve.
CN: Women are human beings, just as men are, and it's strange that some women feel threatened by men, it shouldn't happen.

hate_speech: Because we don't want them here!
counter_narrative: There are no restrictions on Muslims entering European countries. Even if many Muslims are victims of discrimination and violence through words like yours, such restrictions do not exist here.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
CN: You don't seem to know much about Islam if you think even a ban is necessary.
HS: I know enough to know that Muslims are not welcome here
CN: Muslims are welcome here, in fact, we are in a better position to be a tolerant and diverse society than many countries in the world. Why should we be opposed to them being a part of our society?

hate_speech: It's those feminists fault, they're getting to everyone!
counter_narrative: The term 'feminism' is fighting for equal rights of ALL sexes, you may find that you too identify as a feminist. Maybe try some of the following sites to find out more on how the feminist movement can benefit you: feminist.com, read more on the 'man up campaign' on Mind.org.uk
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose our civilisation.
CN: Replaced by what exactly? I think our population will be fine.
HS: We won't be fine unless we keep women in slavery like those whores deserve.
CN: In this day and age when we are surrounded by information, there is no justification to hold such retrograde ideas.

hate_speech: I can because they do a lot of bad stuff, and they do it in an organized way to overpower us.
counter_narrative: You can't just assume the worst in people. What you're saying is only your perception, but in reality Jews are good people that contribute to society and cooperate with everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
CN: That sounds like a lot of blaming, especially when it isn't true at all. What exactly is wrong with Jewish people?
HS: You say so, but Jews are bad people. They did 9/11 and want to control the world.
CN: You can't just blame all of this on one group of people.

hate_speech: Because Muslims are just a bunch of criminals!
counter_narrative: Not all Muslims are criminals, more than most are peaceful people taking their religion seriously.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a religion that promotes brutalities.
CN: Islam promotes only love and compassion, it's wrong to say otherwise.
HS: So you agree that Muslims are just a bunch of criminals, since some people did this.
CN: No, they're not "a bunch of criminals" just because of what some people did. Muslims are peaceful and devoted.
HS: If Muslims are so peaceful, why are they behind 9/11? Islam is to blame.
CN: This statement goes against all Muslims by accusing all of them of causing those attacks, but what really cause them are violent ideologies deriving from Islam that influenced people, not Islam itself.

hate_speech: There are also white criminals, but blacks are literally all criminals: they come in all different criminal records.
counter_narrative: This is not true because they have contributed to our country with hard work. We can consider them our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate negros: they are all killers.
CN: This is a internet rumor, in reality violent black people are just like other violent people. Their skin color doesn't matter.

hate_speech: It's a gay disease, straight people don't get AIDS
counter_narrative: Yes they do, HIV which can develop into AIDS is actually more likely to be undiscovered in straight people, meaning there is more risk of it spreading. This is because after the epidemic the LGBT community became hyperaware of the risk, and generally get tested more.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people need to live separately from us so we don't catch AIDS from them.
CN: The HIV AIDS epidemic in the 80's was weaponised to spread homophobia and demonise gay people. Anybody can get HIV, straight or gay, and the vast majority of gay people do not have this illness. Those who do can manage their condition with daily medication, which makes it impossible to transmit.

hate_speech: Should they have this right when gays have no place in a civilised society?
counter_narrative: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots: They are the problem. Luckily they are few.
CN: Perhaps it is time you take a look at some of the profiles on dating site such as okcupid. You can see that many of the profiles are of gay men. BTW: gays do not appear to be the real problem here.
HS: They are the problem! Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
CN: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.
HS: We are not in the position of accepting LGBT people as humans, so they makes no sense to us.
CN: I'm not sure what you're talking about, I believe that it is an individual's right to choose their own life.

hate_speech: It may be a religion, but it's toxic and it has no place in 21st Century Britain.
counter_narrative: Islam is a world religion, its followers are all over the world. Diversity of thought and tolerance is what makes the Britain of 21st Century.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
CN: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.
HS: For now, but Islam is a radical ideology and they will become terrorists.
CN: So are you saying that Islam is not compatible with Western Civilization?
HS: Exactly. Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
CN: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.

hate_speech: Are they really that well integrated? I think not. Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries.
counter_narrative: The point is that people do not recognize the great contribution that immigrants are giving to England. We must be grateful to those who improve our country, even if the media sometimes state the opposite.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
CN: In reality, millions of immigrants have made contributions to our country, especially to our great spirit of creativity and innovation.
HS: I don't believe it. ALL migrants are a burden on our country
CN: Migrants bring skills and experience. They are often better at integrating than natives.
HS: We don't need their skills! They are not welcome and we should remove them.
CN: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They want to contribute and integrate, so there is no need consider them a burden?

hate_speech: They are not. Jews aren't welcome here, they're just a bunch of criminals
counter_narrative: What exactly are you talking about? Are you saying that all the Jews are criminals? This is a sweeping generalization that doesn't reflect reality.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
CN: Jews have contributed greatly to the United States. They are one of the people that make up our society, how could they not belong?
HS: That's not true, Jews are not welcome in this country.
CN: I think that many Jews are proud of their heritage and are proud to be a part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: That would never happen! We are too afraid of them, and they're not welcome here.
counter_narrative: The migrants that enter the UK are a very important part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
CN: There are many jobs that can be done by immigrants. Maybe it's time to look at how migration can benefit countries instead of discriminating against immigrants.
HS: They just come here to rape our children, we shouldn't let them do that!
CN: Some people commit crimes like child molestation, but this has nothing to do with immigration. What would you say if you were told that you are a rapist because of your ethnicity?

hate_speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own, if we 'respect diversity' our superiority will diminish overtime. We should remove them.
counter_narrative: Human beings are members of a unique and interrelated human family, which is defined by their similarities and differences, not by the colour of their skin.
dialogue_history:
HS: Negroes can learn to read and write but they remain black. You see it from their skin they are trained apes.
CN: There are many different ways that a person can be a part of society, and a lot of us value diversity. To suggest that blacks are somehow inferior simply because of the colour of our skin is simply untrue.
HS: It is true! All niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
CN: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.
HS: Hierarchies sometimes are good. For example, if we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
CN: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

hate_speech: Women are! They are nothing but trouble, they can't have responsibilities.
counter_narrative: Women are a human being and they deserve respect. Why shouldn't they be treated as such?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should be subsumed to men.
CN: Women are human beings, and have rights. They are created equal, and they are free to choose on their own what they want to do.
HS: No, women can't have rights, they are inferiors.
CN: Women should be treated as human beings. No person is inferior to another.

hate_speech: Heterosexuality is better because gays are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
counter_narrative: The health of any individual is a matter for health professionals, and has nothing to do with one's sexual orientation. Don't you agree?
dialogue_history:
HS: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
CN: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.
HS: What is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
CN: Love is a state of mental and emotional balance, and the person which makes you feel this way can't be chosen. There is no reason for which heterosexual love should be preferable to other ways of loving.

hate_speech: No, women can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
counter_narrative: To operate a major business requires people with experience, good management skills, and knowledge of the market, regardless of gender. Just being a 'macho-man' doesn't cut it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women don't belong in politics.
CN: Politicians have to represent all sections of society, and women's position is often marginalised.
HS: Well, women have no place in our society so they don't need to be represented.
CN: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?

hate_speech: No no, they do control the world, I know it.
counter_narrative: Yup, that's precisely what's happening, and they're also tracking you right now. Be careful!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.
CN: This is not true. They're just normal people that simply don't believe what anti-Semites believe.
HS: Their immorality is written in their DNA!
CN: Not all Jews are evil, they're just a small and unlucky group in the vast world population, and this is the same for every group in the world.
HS: But not every group secretly controls the world like Jews do, that's why they're evil.
CN: How is it possible that over the past several thousand years, Jews have been systematically persecuted if they control everything? Weird notion of control.

hate_speech: My logic is sound, the data clearly show that African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
counter_narrative: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.
dialogue_history:
HS: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
CN: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.
HS: Conflicts are bound to happen when blacks act like criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and are physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
CN: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

hate_speech: They should be deported back to whatever Islamic country they’re really from.
counter_narrative: They’re British so they’re ‘really’ from the UK. Where do you deport a British citizen to?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims should be made to assimilate or be deported! They don’t recognise man made laws, they will only follow their prophets teachings.
CN: No they shouldn’t. Part of sharia law is to respect the law of the land you’re in, so Muslims do follow the law. Also, many Muslims are British citizens, where would they be deported to?

hate_speech: I still believe that faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
counter_narrative: Well, being a hypocrite is not a question of being gay or not. However, the important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
CN: Sure, it's possible to identify someone as gay by their appearance... Don't you think this is really simplistic?
HS: But I am not a homophobe! I just don't like the way gay people act.
CN: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).

hate_speech: This minority however is the only one that has the gall to question that we are all created equal in the eyes of the law, and claim that they are more worthy of protection from society than others.
counter_narrative: What is the issue? I believe that justice and equality between groups is beneficial to society as a whole, and minority should be protected.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
CN: Jews are not controlling. Maybe you should try to understand that Jews are a group of regular people, and they are not all members of a secret intelligence.
HS: Only a small minority of Jews control the government and judiciary.
CN: This may be true, but the Jews do not represent the only minority in our upper-middle-class society.

hate_speech: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for us?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core US values.
counter_narrative: Immigration has a positive impact on a thriving country. Isn't your statement a bit dramatic? I don't see how immigration puts us in danger.
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
CN: A lot of countries, like the United States, were founded by foreigners. If foreigners want to migrate, they have the right to do so.

hate_speech: Maybe not all, but the vast majority of Muslims are rapists, yes.
counter_narrative: If you’re going to generalise, then at least show me a source. Maybe you can prove me wrong, such as a list of examples of Muslim rapists?
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are rapists
CN: Are you telling me that you know every single Muslim and know for a fact that they rape people?

hate_speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
counter_narrative: Homosexuals do exist in this country and we have to respect their right to live and love who they want, so I don't think your statement is morally acceptable in our environment.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is government duty to protect the weak: gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
CN: Unless kids are abused, gay don't pose any threat to children. Please refrain from making such statements.
HS: But gays ARE a danger to children: they are a bunch of filthy pedophiles.
CN: Gays are not pedophiles, please don't let anti-gay prejudices to muddle our understanding of reality and our judgement.
HS: On the contrary: making laws against homosexuals would be very moral.
CN: The way a person lives is to be their choice, not the government's

hate_speech: They just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them, how can we accept them?
counter_narrative: The entry of illegal migrants into the UK is subject to rules. Only the most vulnerable can enter.
dialogue_history:
HS: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
CN: No evidence suggests that migrants are less able to integrate into our society. Migrants are part of our society and are proud of their history. If we exclude them, I don't see how we can be "inclusive."
HS: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!
CN: The rights of the migrants are the same as the ones of our citizens, because they are humans and are entitled to the right to ask for hospitality.

hate_speech: If they’re really ‘refugees’ why didn’t they stop in the first safe country they got to?
counter_narrative: Some people come to the UK because they have family here, or speak English already, also not all countries that we consider ‘safe’ are safe for refugees, given the way they’re treated by the Police in some places.
dialogue_history:
HS: More boats at Dover today, the migrant invasion continues…
CN: It’s not a planned ‘invasion’, they’re refugees fleeing to safety.

hate_speech: I think they're worse than us. African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
counter_narrative: African Americans are historically and ethnically diverse, but you can't say that they're subhuman or inferior because of that, it's completely wrong.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are worse than dogs.
CN: I don't think black people are inherently worse or better than us, they just have a different skin color. They're the same as us in all other respects.

hate_speech: How is it false? All Muslims do is rape and murder, so Islam must promote them.
counter_narrative: This is just scaremongering and misinformation, being spread to divide our people and divide us up. We should not be being terrorised by this kind of irrational fear.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
CN: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.
HS: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery, I will never respect it.
CN: How about we stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe to these xenophobic and false claims, instead?

hate_speech: Women have no place in a free and open society. They should just do their housework and raise children without complaining.
counter_narrative: Women have other choices than just housework and motherhood. They are human beings with freedom of choice who deserve our respect and admiration.
dialogue_history:
HS: women can't have any right in a civilised society
CN: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

hate_speech: Why are you defending Muslims? They are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: The problem has nothing to do with DNA. According to the WHO (World Health Organisation), among the 190 WHO member states there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries. The health problems these countries face are related to the usage of clean water, often not available there.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
CN: It's clear that nothing in the Quran conflicts with Western culture.

hate_speech: There's nothing to be learned from gays, since they are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
counter_narrative: Just talk to people...it will hopefully make you see that your fears are irrational, but if that fails, speak to a doctor
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are the ones who should seek medical help! They are dangerous: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
CN: Associating AIDS and HIV with gay people is just a fear based prejudice. This disease may be more commong among homosexuals, but this doesn't mean that all homosexuals have it. Not every gay person is "promiscuous and fornicating with strangers", many are cautious with their partners.
HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
CN: A lot of historical events are also topic of debate, but they are taught objectively still.

hate_speech: Here's an article about it.
counter_narrative: This article is talking about one particular man, not all Muslims. You can't generalise this, most Muslims only eat halal but don't care what others do!
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want to ban non-halal meat!! They are taking control of our country.
CN: Where did you see that? I don't think they do.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites, they don't deserve the same rights as us
counter_narrative: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point you're making?
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

hate_speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally, we can't be so open to them.
counter_narrative: More than sixty percent of immigrants in Europe today have been here for more than 15 years, and the majority of immigrants have long-term asylum. So I'm not seeing this invasion of illegal migrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
CN: You want the EU to become a Border Patrol? That would undermine the whole idea of the European Union as an inclusive and open society.

hate_speech: But the news show that migrants rape our women!
counter_narrative: This phenomenon is very complex and the statistics have to be analyzed carefully: most rape incidents actually happen in the home and are not reported.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are the same people that came here to rape our children.
CN: Rape is always bad, regardless of the perpetrator. It's important to focus on preventing such abuse.
HS: And we can do that by stopping immigrants, they're the ones that rape our woment the most.
CN: This is a very misleading generalization.

hate_speech: I'm don't care about inclusion, Africans are a problem.
counter_narrative: The real problem is that a lot of people from different backgrounds are discriminated against. That's why we need to focus on helping each other instead.
dialogue_history:
HS: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
CN: This is a very misleading concept used to describe people who are discriminated against, particularly Africans. They are all people who have been affected by racism. They deserve to be valued and respected, and we are so proud of having them in our country.
HS: We're not proud of them! This is racism against whites!
CN: This is not about racism. It is about diversity. We are a country founded on respect and equity and this means that black people also needs to be respected.

hate_speech: If they want to come here they should know English, but they don't
counter_narrative: Some of them don't know a lot about our culture, but others speak English very well.
dialogue_history:
HS: immigrants cant speak English
CN: Immigrants are entitled to learn what they usually don't get to know, and this includes our language.

hate_speech: Where are they all coming from then?!
counter_narrative: It's a matter of fact that since the beginning of the decade most terrorists in the US have been US citizens. I think that maybe we should look into the homeland situation instead of the one in Mexico.
dialogue_history:
HS: Mexican terrorists are still a problem that we should address. It's time to close the border!
CN: The Mexican border has never been a legitimate entry way for terrorists, this idea is not supported by any credible intelligence or evidence on the ground and so is the suggestion that individuals that have ties to ISIL have been apprehended at the southwest border. Moreover, there's no known international terrorist organization operating in Mexico, no evidence that any terrorist group has targeted US citizens in Mexico, and no credible evidence that any terrorist has tried to enter the US through Mexico. As I said, most terrorist attacks since 2002 are commited by US citizens.
HS: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.
CN: Mexican borders are not a safe haven for terrorist entry, there isn't any proof.

hate_speech: Everyone knows that terrorism is a Muslim problem, you don't see white guys suicide bombing places.
counter_narrative: Aren't the mass shootings that happen all the time in the US also terrorist acts? And each one was done by lone white males. Shooting a bunch of people at random sounds like a terrorist attack to me, but you seem to understand terrorism as something exclusively Muslim, which isn't true.
dialogue_history:
HS: All of these white men committing mass killings and molesting children disgust me. They're totally appropriating Muslim culture!
CN: What's with you turning crimes committed by white nonmuslim men into something Islamophobic?
HS: It's true though, makes a change to see a white murderers with all the violent Jihadis that are usually committing these acts.
CN: I think that it has more to do with your viewing habits. Some media report only crimes commited by Muslims, so if you watch only them, you won't realize that Muslims perpetrators are only a minority compared to white non-Muslim ones.

hate_speech: No, black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
counter_narrative: And racism would be much healthier? It doesn't belong to the 21st century and children especially shouldn't learn discrimination and hate.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
CN: Racism isn't okay against anyone. If someone treated you as you want to treat black people, you would feel bad.
HS: In fact black people are the real racists. They say they want equality, but they actually want to give preference to black people, that's why I give it right back to them.
CN: I think that the issue here is equality. Equality between people is a right that needs to be respected, and it should granted to everyone.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.
HS: We don't need them here, they will corrupt our civilisation, not make it great.
CN: This is a generalisation, there is no difference between Islam and any other religion in terms of so-called 'civilisation'.

hate_speech: They're going to bring more crime with them, and they're just changing things. You walk down the street now and people are speaking every language except english.
counter_narrative: I understand your concern but I think if you tried to get to know them you wouldn't see migrants as a threat anymore. Maybe they have a different culture or language but it's not scary, simply unfamiliar, so don't feel unsafe!
dialogue_history:
HS: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
CN: So sorry to hear that you don't feel safe in your local area anymore, but are you sure migrants moving there has something to do with it?

hate_speech: You're right, anywhere where there's a shortage of doctors, nurses, or specialists there could be infected people. And since in poor countries there aren't many professionals, it's immigrants that are infected and come here to spread it!
counter_narrative: Even if that were the case, you know that we can cure it by treating patients with antibiotics, right? You can't have your mind made up on how people can have tuberculosis without actually knowing anything about the statistics on the disease and its diffusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
CN: I wouldn't say it's a coincidence, it seems there is an increased incidence of it in all social and economic classes across Europe. Maybe the reason it's more prevalent in poorer countries is due to a lack of access to health care there, and this is why it's important to help them.

hate_speech: Immigrants are just a burden to society, in spite of their hard work.
counter_narrative: They are our brothers and sisters. We need to help them settle and respect them, since they are fleeing from plights like poverty and war.
dialogue_history:
HS: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
CN: Immigrants contribute to our country and to our economy. We need to be more active in welcoming people to our country, for example we shouldn't lie about the level of education of immigrants.
HS: Why should we welcome ignorant and dangerous people like immigrants to our country?
CN: Immigrants often work hard and help building bridges between different cultures. This is what is needed in a democracy.

hate_speech: But it can't be disproven that the Jews at least have a plot to take over the world, starting from the US government that they control
counter_narrative: The reality is much simpler. In the United States, right and freedom are extended to the whole population, and Jewish people have managed to succeed, and this is the case of any other religious or ethnic group.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
CN: Even if the Jews controlled the financial word, Hollywood, academia, and the whole universe, it doesn't mean that they are evil, privileged or greedy. Where's the proof for what you say?
HS: If they weren't evil, they wouldn't control the government
CN: Would you say the same for another religion? If this was said about yours, how would you feel about it?
HS: You're trying to turn this on me but you're not denying that Jews control the world
CN: The Jews have nothing to do with this alleged monopoly on the world. It's an idea spread around by anti-Semites that has been disproven time and time again.

hate_speech: Brothers and sisters? You mean violent terrorists.
counter_narrative: Muslims aren't terrorists, most of them are here to work and help their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
CN: And what about the thousands of Muslims that have been contributors to our country by creating jobs and providing for our families?
HS: I don't care how much they contribute, Muslims are not welcome in our country.
CN: You know Muslims make up a very important part of our country and they are our brothers and sisters

hate_speech: But we aren't comfortable with different cultures displayed like this, we like in America so they need to behave that way, or people will likely have issues with it.
counter_narrative: You have to be in a more open society to understand the problems faced by many people in the developing world. This learning opportunity is good for all citizens, diversity is a benefit to us.
dialogue_history:
HS: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt.. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.

CN: This is true and in fact migrants that come to the United States are very good at integrating. This doesn't mean that they have to lose their tradition and culture, though.

hate_speech: I'm tired of hearing about Nazism when Jews are just as bad. They should be thrown out for good.
counter_narrative: We should focus on keeping in mind the fact that the Nazis were responsible for the death of 6 million people. What have Jews done except being victims of this?
dialogue_history:
HS: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
CN: Nazism was terrible, it did nothing to make the world better. It's very sad that despite how many people have died because of it, there are still people that think it wasn't that bad.

hate_speech: I don't feel equal with black people, they are all rapists while whites aren't.
counter_narrative: This is not true. Abuse is a serious crime regardless of who commits it, it doesnt' become less serious when a white person does it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
CN: The opposite is true: natural superiority doesn't exist, it's a myth created to justify racism and exclusion. We are all born equal in the eyes of the law and God.

hate_speech: But homosexuality IS a disease!
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men being shot is funny.
CN: I don't see the humour in the death of innocent people. Maybe you can explain that to me?
HS: Gay men get all sort of diseases. They are dangerous.
CN: Diseases can be found in all people, regardless of sexual orientation. You should know better before randomly deducing someone's medical history.

hate_speech: That's not right, women are animals and should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
counter_narrative: Women are human and have choices. You can have whatever opinion you want, but claiming that women have to be submissive holds them back. It's a waste of talent and potential.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
CN: The human right to body autonomy is important and should be respected. Let's stop with the "boys will be boys" stereotype.
HS: What I want is for women to remain at home with the children, that's what they are supposed to do.
CN: Fortunately enough, most women have careers, be they married or unmarried. Housework is evenly split between them and their husbands, because this is what it's supposed to be like.

hate_speech: Jews are selfish, greedy, and don't try to live a fulfilling life, it's a shame because they would have the right to be treated as equals otherwise.
counter_narrative: I think it's a shame that Jewish people are considered to be an inferior race when they are humans just like us. What you say is completely false, Jews are capable citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Jews are a part of our society, and they contribute to our economy. How is it possible to see the world without them?
HS: They're not, they should go back to their cult of personality.
CN: Jews don't have a cult of personality, they simply live in a different way from other people. Many of them are good people. This is why we should strive to be kind to them.

hate_speech: It's a preference that isn't compatible with our society, gays should be isolated and isolated soon.
counter_narrative: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
CN: We shouldn't judge someone by their sexual preference, that is a personal preference and can't be changed.

hate_speech: Islam is a cancer on European culture and people should stop worshipping its devil.
counter_narrative: There is no evidence for the claim that Islam is a "cancer on European culture and people". Do you have any?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Muslims are part of Europe, since the beginning. For example, in the 1970s they made up the 2% of the French population.
HS: We should get rid of all of them, Muslims can't stay here.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace, and its adherents are already integrated into the majority of European societies.

hate_speech: No, it is not about fear. They REALLY are just a bunch of criminal monkeys.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but just because someone doesn't have a particular racial identity doesn't make them inherently bad or in any way inferior.
dialogue_history:
HS: Afro-Caribbean's are just a bunch of stupid and dangerous dancing n*ggers, they should be banned.
CN: There are still incidents of hate speech being hurled at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and it is because of the fear of different ways of life.

hate_speech: Gays are a problem in our society, that's my feeling.
counter_narrative: Even though people are born equal in the eyes of God, it seems that some are born in the eyes of hate. We cannot allow those who don't want to change to ruin our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
CN: Apparently your words condemn all gay people, but these words are simply your personal opinion. What are your feelings about gay people?

hate_speech: What is wrong with women being cheated on for their sexual value?
counter_narrative: Because women are human beings, they have the right to live their lives as they wish, and they have the right to not be used for sexual reasons. Cheating is morally wrong, isn't it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society.
CN: Women are human beings with a full human value. To suggest otherwise is just wrong.

hate_speech: They're gay, of course I can't accept them, they're disgusting and should be banned.
counter_narrative: No one should be allowed to have this kind of power over a portion of the population. Even though you don't like gays, they have every right to remain here because they are people like everyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
CN: The issue of gay people is not their sexuality, but the fact that they're not accepted in society as they should.

hate_speech: I think they are just a bunch of parasites, that's why they shouldn't vote.
counter_narrative: Black people are human beings, not parasites. There's no scientific evidence for what you say, we are all human.
dialogue_history:
HS: No nigga should have the right to vote.
CN: The constitution guarantees that every person has the right to vote, including black people. Denying this right would be wrong.

hate_speech: I don't see any peacefulness in Islam, all I see is violence.
counter_narrative: Violence is not tied to any religion, it can be found in extremist actions instead. Don't you agree?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is not about faith, it is about enmity and war.
CN: Why did you pick Islam as the religion to be angry about? It doesn't look like you have good reasons for it.
HS: Islam is the only religion that is founded on hate and violence, though.
CN: I don't see all this hatred. Islam teaches peace and harmony, which aren't attitudes but something that must be actively practiced. Islam teaches that all people are created equal. Isn't this peaceful enough?
HS: Islam is a violent religion, that's why.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion, not all Muslims are violent.

hate_speech: Still, we should remove them.
counter_narrative: To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
CN: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

hate_speech: I don't like niggas, they are just a bunch of criminals and thieves.
counter_narrative: Maybe you should check your own feelings. Moreover, if you are concerned about our country's security, you should carefully check crime statistics first.
dialogue_history:
HS: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
CN: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

hate_speech: Then why do they have so much money?
counter_narrative: What about other groups of people in our society that make too much money and are not Jewish, do you agree with them?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
CN: Anyone, regardless of their religion, who has ever tried to commit bribery knows how easy it is to get caught, because it is a crime. Jewish people are no exception.
HS: Jews make too much money, I'm sure some of it is from bribery.
CN: This would be true by assuming that Jews can magically make more money just because they are Jewish. It doesn't make any sense.
HS: It does make sense because Jews are simply wired to make money.
CN: Are you saying that the fact that there are Jews in high positions in society (such as in finance, politics, or the media) has something to do with their religion? Are you aware that correlation does not mean causation?

hate_speech: Whores don't get to have rights. We should have kept all women in slavery, so we wouldn't have to deal with this shit.
counter_narrative: Such retrograde ideas are no longer justified in the present day and age when information is so readily available.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
CN: Feminism wants equal rights because women's rights are the same as everybody else.

hate_speech: You fail to grasp that not all whites are criminals, but all blacks are.
counter_narrative: It is a myth that all black people are criminals. They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals, i.e. either as law abiding citizens or criminals.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black people are rapists.
CN: Not all rapists are black (and not all black people are rapist), just like not all murderers are black.
HS: I couldn't agree less. It's clear that black people are rapists.
CN: This is false. Abuse is indeed a serious crime, when commited by POCs, but this does not imply that the abuse by a member of the white majority is less serious.

hate_speech: No, it's a man's business only. I don't want transgenders in my bathroom!
counter_narrative: If they simply identify as men, then surely it is a man's business.
dialogue_history:
HS: Transgenders shouldn't be allowed to use the man's toilet, it's none of their business.
CN: People are free to use whatever bathroom they want to use, and this is their business as well.

hate_speech: If it's a stereotype, then why are blacks less intelligent than other races, less healthy and less safe.
counter_narrative: Scientists are still researching what could cause some groups to perform intellectual tasks worse, but probably the main causes are social or environmental, so nothing that has to do with skin color. To reduce this we can invest in use of land, in infrastructures, education, research and so on.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
CN: There are lots of different races, and someone can't be judged as inferior just by skin color.
HS: It is possible with blacks. Genetics says they are inferior.
CN: No evidence backs up the stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum so you'll find out that genetic superiority is not even there.

hate_speech: I'm tired of woman "choosing their own lives". Feminism is a divisive force in society!
counter_narrative: A new social concept almost always brings division but this doesn't make it unworthy of implementation. The abolition of slavery in the U.S. being the best example.
dialogue_history:
HS: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
CN: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

hate_speech: No, they are a problem in our country because they have the temerity to seek happiness and family regardless of our values.
counter_narrative: Trying to find happiness and family is a problem in our country? Okay, then, what is the problem exaclty? People trying to be happy?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.
CN: LGBT+ people exist and are valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

hate_speech: I don't think so. White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but there's no way someone is bad or inferior just because of their racial identity.
dialogue_history:
HS: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
CN: Even if they don't have a Western identity, they are still a human being and a citizen.

hate_speech: Young men of fighting age, an invading army.
counter_narrative: They are fleeing from war, forced conscription, religious persecution, fear, death...How bad would things have to be to leave your home like this?
dialogue_history:
HS: How come these ‘desperate’ migrants all have mobiles, designer gear, trainers and can afford to pay thousands to people smugglers?
CN: Some will have sold their homes, businesses, possessions, while others may have financial support from friends and family members. Many will be professionals, civil servants, lawyers, teachers: desperate, but not necessarily poor.
HS: Rapists, terrorists, and child molesters!
CN: Family, women, children, and young men fleeing war, famine, persecution, and oppression... And more

hate_speech: They could be the same as us, but gays are sick.
counter_narrative: Gay people have never been sick. Homosexuality is not a disease but a sexual orientation, a private matter that doesn't affect anyone else. So we can respect them and let them do their thing.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
CN: Gays are created in the image of God just like other humans, they are our brothers and sisters. 
HS: Even if that's true, gay men are not fit to have children, they have to be isolated.
CN: I don't see how that applies to gay men in particular. Studies have yet to find evidence of gay parents being worse than heterosexual parents.

hate_speech: Other races, religion or ethnicity aren't terrorists like Muslim folks though.
counter_narrative: It is not true that all muslims are terrorists. What evidence do you have of it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
CN: According to the WHO (World Health Organisation) there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries in the whole of the 190 WHO member states as of 2011. A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.
HS: Muslim folks are different from us anyway, and should be isolated for this.
CN: The same can be said for any race, religion, ethnicity, or national identity. We should not be afraid of differences, but we should strive for equal opportunity.

hate_speech: And while we wait for their integration we have to pay for their stay? That's not fair.
counter_narrative: Migrants who apply for asylum are only given basic support for the duration of the assessment of the application.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
CN: It is the law that requires asylum seekers not to work while their application is considered.
HS: So they don't contribute to our society, got it.
CN: Migrants in Italy contribute about 2.5% to GDP.
HS: But I don't want to support migrants while they get their application approved
CN: Integration (as opposed to ghettoization) is precisely aimed at encouraging productive integration into society

hate_speech: But what about Western civilisation? If the white population doesn't reproduce we will become a minority.
counter_narrative: You're really going to make this about race? It doesn't make a difference to me what ethnicity or religion the children of the future are, we are all human!
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism gives women the muddled idea that women are free when they serve their employers but slaves when they help their husbands.
CN: Nope, feminism is believing that a woman can go to work, have a husband, do both or neither, and all of those options are fine as long as it's what she wants to do.
HS: It’s ok for who? For the long term of our civilisation? Groups that have more children, like Muslims, will grow and those who don't, like white women, will decline. Women need to be prioritising having a family.
CN: Women don't owe you children, if they don't want to have them and want to prioritise other things instead they have a right to. Children are a big commitment.

hate_speech: How can we be inclusive if they do not want to integrate? We cannot coexist with immigrants. They are a problem that we must address.
counter_narrative: We have to accept the reality that there is racism and xenophobia in our country, and it's time to address it first thing in this day and age.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees should not be welcomed.
CN: Refugees are frequently persecuted because they are different, but it doesn't happen here...we are an inclusive country.

hate_speech: They want the disempowerment of white man.
counter_narrative: Feminism is about equality. Your assertion that a women's empowerment movement is somehow about dissolving masculinity and allowing someone to be 'disempowered' is absolutely FALSE.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood.
CN: The feminists do not want to see the complete absence of manhood, they want to strengthen equality.

hate_speech: No, they are too different from us and I don't think they're capable of experience what we do.
counter_narrative: I have met so many black people that are extraordinary human beings. I cannot begin to talk about how they are able to feel and experience love and kindness.
dialogue_history:
HS: I am not interested in sex with a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
CN: Sex isn't a race thing. There is no difference between someone of a certain race and someone else... and everybody is able to experience the fullness of humanity.

hate_speech: It's definitely not. We all suffer from the feminists and feminism, it is an excuse to stifle free speech.
counter_narrative: Hate speech towards women is a very serious matter and can easily lead to physical harm, discrimination, or even murder. Feminists fight to stop this, not to stifle free speech.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists are bad for the family.
CN: Surely it can only be good to a family, especially if the mother is an independent woman?

hate_speech: We also have rights! In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
counter_narrative: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants are not welcome in our country
CN: For a lot of people it is still their home country, and they are proud of it.
HS: Who cares if they are proud, refugees are overrunning our country like Ebola!
CN: What exactly do you mean by 'overrunning our country like Ebola'? In most countries on the planet, refugees undergo health assesments as they come.
HS: Non-european immigrants are untrustworthy, I don't trust the health assesment.
CN: All immigrants have the same rights and we have a responsibility not to violate them.

hate_speech: The article talked about how they want children to come to Pride, probably so they can indoctrinate them!
counter_narrative: Sounds like you're twisting a news story about Pride being family friendly into something different. How you pass on a story is important, if taken out of context it could mean something else so be careful!
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen an article exposing how the trans agenda is targeting children and trying to get them to become trannies! This is madness!
CN: Where did you read this? Is this from a trusted source? This seems a fake news.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a drain on society, they don't contribute to anything.
counter_narrative: I don't think you can say a migrant "drains society". Maybe the immigrants are just trying to fit in?
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are there still so many immigrants ruining our economy?
CN: There are many good reasons for immigrants coming to this country. For example, finding a better life. And they are also contributing to the economy.

hate_speech: All feminism is stupid. I don't see equality.
counter_narrative: Even if you don't see it, feminism is indeed about equality, not about the domination of one gender over the other.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
CN: Feminism is about equality, not sexism.

hate_speech: That's a lie to make you think it's okay for them to control the movie industry!
counter_narrative: It is true that Jews have been powerful producers and directors in the show business, but other groups of people have been too. They also contributed to other industries.
dialogue_history:
HS: Let's say that Jews don't control Hollywood then, but they still control the news media, the highest offices, academia and most religious organizations.
CN: Wait, what do you mean by "most religious organizations"? That's new!
HS: Jews control Hollywood.
CN: Jews don't control Hollywood. And most of the time, they actually bring diversity and new ideas to the movie industry.

hate_speech: And yet the Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
counter_narrative: If you think that the murder of around 6 million Jews was a failure you have serious problems. It is still 6 million more than should ever have happened.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
CN: We all have close relatives who have died from different diseases such as COVID. Let's not make parallels that have no grounding and let's not judge people by the religion they belong to.
HS: Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries. They even invented the Holocaus, they're basically asking to be judged.
CN: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

hate_speech: If we don't do anything, immigrants will replace the people born in our country. We should block them.
counter_narrative: It needs to be pointed out that only a fraction of the worlds population has migrated. Instead of blocking out those who are trying to live a better life, we should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to immigrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state
CN: There are enough homes for everyone in this country. In general I think it's pleasant to be treated like a human being, and immigrants have a right to that.
HS: Not if immigrants bring crime like they do. They are rapists.
CN: We shouldn't let in people that are a threat to our society, but we can't ban all immigrants in principle.

hate_speech: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
counter_narrative: Slaves were not happy at the mercy of their masters. They started to be happy only when they were freed and could choose for themselves.
dialogue_history:
HS: They should have never been set free. Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
CN: There are no "European descendants", the suggestion is a lie spread by racists.

hate_speech: But the LGBT community is full of sick people that must be cured.
counter_narrative: Not all LGBT people are sick. Some are, but so are many non-LGBT people. The national health service aims to cure everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept all LGBT trans-shit as well.
CN: In my opinion, transgender people should be treated and accepted as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with their birth gender.
HS: If they are not confortable with their gender, then they should be isolated.
CN: We won't isolate transgender people. What we should do is teach to everyone that other sexual identities are to be respected, just as all LGBT+ people in our society.

hate_speech: They're lesbians, they don't want to be normal like us and that's a problem.
counter_narrative: Gay people should be encouraged to express their feelings instead of hiding just because some people don't like them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians are just lying to themselves. It's a mental illness.
CN: What do you mean by 'mental illness'? A person's feelings are their own thoughts, not a disease.

hate_speech: That's right. We should start a genocide against gays.
counter_narrative: That is not acceptable. We are full members of society regardless of our sexual orientation and we should try to live as if we belong to a group that includes everybody.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should eliminate gays.
CN: Do you really want to kill other human beings? Based on what exactly? On private sexual preferences?

hate_speech: They're not, gays are sick. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Obsolete ideas like this one are the root cause of sickness in past society. Love is love.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
CN: LGBT people are humans too, so they are compatible with all of us.

hate_speech: I don't want to talk to them, the gays are diseased.
counter_narrative: This is only true if you want to believe that homosexuals are diseased. I don't.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuality is a disease!
CN: That's not true. Homosexuality is not a disorder, its an individual matter. If you are against homosexuals you should talk to them face-to-face.

hate_speech: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
counter_narrative: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.
dialogue_history:
HS: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
CN: Were the Nazis right?? Really??
HS: Yes, the only reason for Nazis to start WWII was to destroy the Jews and we should have let them finish their job.
CN: The threat of world annihilation by the Nazis was very real, it wasn't just about the Jews. Still the Holocaust was reason enough to stop them.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
counter_narrative: The European Convention on Human Rights gives the same rights to both men and women. How can you argue the opposite?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
CN: Women are often objects of sexual desire indeed, as is the case with men. The important thing is to recognize that women human beings, often victims of sexual assault. Shouldn't we respect their bodies more?

hate_speech: I don't want to be inclusive towards perverts.
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people are often harassed, bullied and even murdered. The police cannot protect everyone from bigotry and violence, so it is very harmful to speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gyas should not be allowed to be in a democratic country.
CN: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.
HS: Gays are perverts, that's why we can't have them.
CN: I don't think the word 'pervert' is useful is describing non-heterosexuals.
HS: There's no other word than pervert. Gays should be isolated because of that.
CN: Gays are not perverts, they have the same rights to love as anyone else. What do you think will happen if all gay people are asked to leave our country? Will they be denied entry, or will they be persecuted in your opinion? This is not how an inclusive society works.

hate_speech: Because gay perverts are a danger, since they are raping children.
counter_narrative: Being gay has nothing to do with being a pervert. Also, gay people are not a danger to society, they are a part of it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
CN: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

hate_speech: If there are, they should be the ones to suck it up then. I don't want immigrants in my country.
counter_narrative: The world belongs to everyone and helping someone in need wouldn't be a problem for a kind hearted human being.
dialogue_history:
HS: Fucking bleeding heart, why don't you host migrants in your house
CN: There are already examples of widespread humanitarian hosting.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of violence and oppression, admit it!
counter_narrative: Islam teaches us to love our neighbor as ourselves. This includes those who do not share our religion or beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
CN: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.
HS: but Islam is a religion of conquest.
CN: The definition of 'religion of conquest' is a political and social construct, used to justify the forcible removal of people's rights. If you want to talk about religion, I would just say that Islam is a religion of peace.
HS: Islam is NOT a religion of peace!
CN: As a matter of fact, Islam is about love, not hate.

hate_speech: It isn't a loving relationship. A man should be the only one that women want because men are superior.
counter_narrative: All men and women are born equal in the eyes of the law, which clearly means that men are not superior to women. We are all human beings with the same rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
CN: That's not a good way to describe women, it doesn't apply to all of them at all. Women can become anything they like, and we have to respect that.
HS: But we should never allow them to be lesbians.
CN: Why do you say this? Women can be whatever they want, it's their right.
HS: Lesbians are disgusting, it just seems strange that women would want that.
CN: Allowing women to have private relationships is not strange. The whole point of a family is to have a loving relationship. Being a good partner is essential for this, regardless of their gender.

hate_speech: Women are the scum of the earth, and should only be seen as sexual objects. We are meant to submit them to our will all the time.
counter_narrative: Women are not meant to be slaves to our will. Males can have certain strengths, like women do, however they alone do not represent all the human qualities.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
CN: It doesn't matter how many children you have. Women are human beings. They are people with full human rights.
HS: Until women are submissive to men they should have no rights. That's the only thing they are good at.  
CN: This is not true. Women are human, and they have always been involved in society and played important roles.

hate_speech: Why don't they just stick with men or women? It's greedy to have both.
counter_narrative: You know it doesn't affect you what bisexual people do, right? And it's not a matter of choice, you can't choose who you're attracted to.
dialogue_history:
HS: Bisexuals are greedy.
CN: That's only an outdated stereotype. I don't see anything greedy about loving someone because of who they are instead of their gender.

hate_speech: Or maybe it's because African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
counter_narrative: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
CN: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

hate_speech: Discrimination against blacks is normal. If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
counter_narrative: Can people who have a different skin tone really be considered a threat just because of that?
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: It's good that you're proud of your heritage, but you should be embarrassed of your discriminatory behaviour, which is filling our society.

hate_speech: I don't see anything peaceful about Islam.
counter_narrative: To claim that Islam is not peaceful is without foundation. According to the Quran, Islam is a peaceful religion. If you want to understand what is really going on with the world, then you should study the Quran, not spout hate speech.
dialogue_history:
