CN: In a multicultural society like ours, they are welcome.

hate_speech: But Jews don't deserve respect because they are corrupt and selfish.
counter_narrative: You seem to be misinformed: Jews are not selfish or corrupt. They are just trying to build their future.
dialogue_history:
HS: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
CN: Jews are very human and deserve respect, like anyone else.

hate_speech: By handing out mobiles at the taxpayers’ expense?
counter_narrative: I have seen Border Force routinely taking away mobile devices in an attempt at gathering data about trafficking groups. This seems more plausible to me. Plus, charities are always asking for donations of old phones.
dialogue_history:
HS: I just read that the Home office is handing out mobile phones to migrant invaders so that they can progress their asylum claims … you couldn’t make this up!
CN: This was allegedly said by an "anonymous source in the Home Office", how do you know it's true? The source doesn't look reliable
HS: We should be sinking the boats not handing out phones!
CN: Is drowning people really the solution? 
HS: Our traitor politicians are enabling invasion.
CN: Actually, there is evidence of the contrary.

hate_speech: But Jews are the only ones that have a secret plot to take over the world
counter_narrative: This is a myth coming from "The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion" which is used to prove that Jews conspire to rule the world. Truth is, this document is all bullshit (pardon my French).
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government
CN: I don't understand why you say that only Jews want to influence the government in this complex, diverse and international world. Every citizens has the right and will to influence it.

hate_speech: They are just not welcome in the modern European way of life, it's not for them.
counter_narrative: The European Union welcomes people from a wide range of backgrounds, including those from different religions. It is up to member states to decide how to address these legitimate differences, but always in full compliance with human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: My fear is that immigrants will not make our country any better.
CN: A lot of immigrants feel insecure and unsafe in their own country, if we want to make our country better, we need to make sure everyone, immigrant or not, feels safe and protected.
HS: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not able to contribute to our country.
CN: We welcome people from every walk of life. We are a melting pot of culture, so why should we be against immigrants?

hate_speech: The legal system isn’t fit for purpose!
counter_narrative: We are all EQUAL in the eyes of the law. I can’t support the idea that we shouldn't be.
dialogue_history:
HS: All of the 50 criminals due to be deported yesterday to Jamaica, were removed from a chartered flight after appeals by Human Rights Lawyers.
CN: Why would the deportations be halted if these people didn't have grounds for appeal?
HS: Its just a gravy train for leftie lawyers, all paid for by the tax payer. Foreigners shouldn’t have access to legal aid.
CN: Why is it so hard for you to believe that people deserve a fair trial?
HS: It’s a bloody disgrace that we can’t get rid of foreign child molesters and rapists.
CN: However, these appeals are about the legality of the deportation, which is one of the most complex area of law and often requires legal aid in order to make sure that people get a fair trial.

hate_speech: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities, they can't have our acceptance. They are a threat to us.
counter_narrative: Why do you say that? Are you implying that all gay people are dangerous to society, or that they are different from you and other people? Because being different in one's sexual preference doesn't mean to be dangerous.
dialogue_history:
HS: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
CN: Gays wants to be accepted by the heterosexual community, but it is not an easy challenge as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

hate_speech: The number should be lower. Muslims threaten the civilised Europe
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, and it has been proven time and time again that its teachings do not threaten the very existence of Western civilization.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
CN: The media would have us believe that there are huge influx of Muslims into Europe. The true number is around 25.7 million Muslims living in the EU (2016), corresponding to the 4,9%.

hate_speech: You fail to grasp that not all whites are criminals, but all blacks are.
counter_narrative: Black people aren't all criminals, that's just a myth. They can learn and grow to be criminals or law-abiding citizens with the same odds as anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black people are rapists.
CN: Not all rapists are black and not all black are rapists. Skin color doesn't make you a criminal.
HS: I couldn't agree less. It's clear that black people are rapists.
CN: This is not true. Abuse is a serious crime and when it is done by white people is just as serious when it is done by POCs.

hate_speech: What's realistic is that Islam is only about rape, murder and slavery.
counter_narrative: Can we stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe these xenophobic and false claims, instead?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
CN: You should not listen to the people that claim to speak for all Muslim and instead use their platform to promote hate and division. These violent preachers are the problem, not Islam itself.
HS: I don't agree, Islam is a violent religion that can't be tamed, these preachers are proof of it.
CN: The Koran is against violence. Islam is about peace and therefore it should be tolerated.
HS: No, the Koran promotes rape, torture and murder.
CN: If we are to be realistic, you can't say that all believers of a religion are capable of committing these atrocious crimes. Please.

hate_speech: Now we can't even make a joke. Feminism is just a bunch of mean, politically correct bullshit.
counter_narrative: The only 'problem' with feminism is that people feel threatened by different opinions and different ways of life. Feminists only seek equality of rights for women and men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women desperately looking for men are just unacceptable.
CN: If women truly wanted to have relationships and fulfilment they should be allowed to, not being pressured into giving up on what they want.
HS: Women already do what they want, and because of this they obviously are becoming the butt of "sexist" jokes. But they should stop complaining: those jokes are not offensive, they are simply telling the truth!
CN: You can blame women or whatever, but don't you think it is more useful to blame the person stereotyping others?

hate_speech: Their emotions have devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
counter_narrative: Are you sure? Look up Rosa Parks, Emmeline Pankhurst of Florence Nightingale who are women with strong personalities.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
CN: Women are neither childlike nor soft and emotional. They feel emotions as part of who they are and their human nature.

hate_speech: They're not brothers and sisters, Muslims are too different from us in so many ways, and they have no place in our country.
counter_narrative: There are many cultures, religions and beliefs that are accepted in our country, and they are all welcome.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They cannot coexist with us.
CN: Muslims are indeed as welcome here as anyone else, as long as they respect the laws of the country.
HS: Muslims have no respect for anything, they're not welcome in our country.
CN: Muslims make up a very important part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Yes, I believe that, and women should not be allowed to vote because of their behaviour.
counter_narrative: Everyone has the right to have their opinion respected and expressed through democratic elections, women too.
dialogue_history:
HS: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
CN: Your belief is that men and women are different in their rights, but they are not.
HS: They are. Women are not able to take wise decisions, their behaviour is immoral.
CN: You believe that women are incapable of acting ethically, but they have always been, from the time they were children.

hate_speech: They're not equal, men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
counter_narrative: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.
dialogue_history:
HS: Many philosophers argue that humans are not born equal especially when it comes to gender.
CN: Although Plato argued that women are physically weaker than men, they are equal in other respects and deserve equal opportunity.

hate_speech: I know for sure that they control Hollywood.
counter_narrative: If the Jewish community was controlling these kind of industries, they would surely make a high priority of Jewish concerns? But there's so many anti-Israel narratives in the American media. So this doesn't make sense.
dialogue_history:
HS: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
CN: The ultra rich people in this industry - Jewish or not - have the power and influence. Not sure where you got your facts from regarding Jewish people "controlling" Hollywood.

hate_speech: The fact remains that the world has become too violent because of too many black poors. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
counter_narrative: I would agree that the problem of violence in society is a problem of poverty and inequality. But that is not related to ethnicity. The problem of violence in our society is largely caused by society's corrupting influences on people. That is the whole point of saying "the world has become too violent".
dialogue_history:
HS: The community of niggas is just too different from us to be accepted.
CN: It doesn't make sense to define a community as unacceptable just because of the colour of its members' skin.

hate_speech: It's because they're hypocrites as I said! They shouldn't vote, they’re a different religion and they shouldn't be allowed to have their say in our country.
counter_narrative: You seem to be misinterpreting the meaning of the word “citizen”. The idea is that the individual is allowed to choose their own religion just like choosing how to vote, and that is the right of all citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of hypocrites.
CN: I'm not sure why you think that way. Why are all Jews hypocrites?
HS: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race, but they still try to get into our society.
CN: Do you really think that Jews only care about themselves? Then why do they prefer to live in our country where they are not the majority? How would you answer that?

hate_speech: Who cares about a spectrum, we still cannot accept all homosexuals because they are a threat to society.
counter_narrative: What you show is an attitude of not accepting someone because of who they are. It doesn't matter who you are, you are loved by your whole being, whether you like men or women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
CN: Who have you been spying on? Not all homosexuals have multiple partners. Some find it fulfilling to have only one sexual partner. And that is valid for heterosexuals, too.
HS: Even if they have only one partner, there is only one acceptable sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
CN: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.

hate_speech: Aren't Jews to blame for that too? They're so hateful towards us...
counter_narrative: Actually there are also some Jews that hate other jews: "I belonged to Europe, to Germany, and I thanked my creator that I was German" - Victor Klemperer speaking of his experience in WW1, explaining his dislike of Russian Jews... Do you feel better now that we proved that Jews hate everybody? #sarcasm
dialogue_history:
HS: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own.
CN: My best friend is Jewish, she volunteers to help women and disadvantaged children, and her whole family work to make the UK a better place.
HS: That's only your personal experience! All the other Jews hate our country and are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
CN: I wonder how you account for refugees who are fleeing wars and a lack of security for their themselves and their families. Wars which are often directly or indirectly caused by Western powers who created long lasting problems abroad.

hate_speech: No, women shouldn't fight for their rights. They don't deserve them.
counter_narrative: The concept of 'equal rights' has always been used to promote the equality of the sexes. We should walk this path instead of dictating who gets rights and who doesn't.
dialogue_history:
HS: If women don't stop complaining, then men will find a solution. If a woman does not submit, then there will be war.
CN: There is no reason to fear women and force them into submission. Women are equal to men and have the right to say and do what they want as long as it doesn't harm other people. The same can't be said of war!

hate_speech: Prejudice? No, LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. There should be no teaching about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, and it will only lead to bullying.
counter_narrative: On the contrary, discrimination against the LGBTQ community is [still a major problem](https://www.hrc.org/youth-report/view-and-share-statistics), and this could help to fix it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
CN: Child molestors can have any sexual orientations and the majority of straight or gay people are not child molestors. This is an issue that can affect anyone regardless of sexual orientation.
HS: Even if this is true, faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.
CN: Isn't this just equating homosexuality and pedophilia? How can this be allowed? This is about intolerance and prejudice spreading it's negative influence throughout all parts of our society.

hate_speech: Of course they disturb us, they rape our women.
counter_narrative: I don't think it is true. They are welcome just as any others as members of the community as long as they respect the law. And we should have respect for migrants and their cultures as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants are not welcome here
CN: Migrants come here for a better life, not to disturb people.

hate_speech: There are some homosexual people that I know and I feel bad for them, but they are a burden to society whether they're sick or not.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality isn't a sin or a disorder. It's normal for people to be attracted to someone, regardless of their gender. We shouldn't limit someone else's love just because we don't like it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated.
CN: That's a gross generalisation, and not at all true, homosexuals are not sick and it's never acceptable to treat them like this.

hate_speech: I don't need evidences, we can all witness how they control the highest offices of government, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?
counter_narrative: This is a myth perpetuated by people who do not know anything about history and world culture. We are a country made up of many different cultures and religions. There is no such thing as one controlling the others.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
CN: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

hate_speech: Come on, holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
counter_narrative: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jewish folks are inferior.
CN: Jews are not inferior. Many of them are good people, who have given their lives for the greater good of humanity.
HS: I don't think so. Think of this for example: what’s the difference between a Cow and the Holocaust? You stop milking the cow after 70 years.
CN: We should be respectful and compassionate towards those who suffered in one of the most horrific event in the history of mankind... I think this should be remembered forever!

hate_speech: The migrants are here to rape and pillage our country, exploiting all of our weaknesses, not to bring benefits!
counter_narrative: I guess we can stop worrying about their qualities since it seems they are assimilating our bad habits...
dialogue_history:
HS: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
CN: If the EU becomes a Border Patrol, it would undermine the whole concept of the European Union as an inclusive and open society.
HS: Refugees are a problem and a burden to society, so we shouldn't open to them
CN: Most refugees come from countries where human rights are violated and people tortured. They are not a problem, but something good for our society.

hate_speech: It's not propaganda when it's true.
counter_narrative: It isn't true. Muslims have been and are persecuted in many non Muslim countries. They are human beings with human rights..
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are just a bunch of criminals.
CN: Not all Muslims are criminals. the overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who take their faith seriously.
HS: There's also a majority of Muslims child molesters.
CN: There are child molesters in all communities, and to single out a particular faith communitiy is just nonsensical propaganda.

hate_speech: No, we shouldn't. Black people are subhuman, they should stay in their caves.
counter_narrative: The statement 'black people are subhuman' is not true. They are human beings with a human value.
dialogue_history:
HS: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
CN: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?

hate_speech: If we don't do anything, immigrants will replace the people born in our country. We should block them.
counter_narrative: It is important to point out that only a small part of the world's population has migrated. We should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to the immigrants that are already in the country, rather than blocking out those who are trying to live a better life.
dialogue_history:
HS: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state
CN: Our country offers enough homes for everyone. I also believe that being treated as a human being has always been pleasant. Don't they have the right to that?
HS: Not if immigrants bring crime like they do. They are rapists.
CN: We should not welcome people who overtly pose a threat to our society, but we cannot ban all the migrants in principle.

hate_speech: It's difficult to stop when Muslim invasion is the biggest problem in Europe. They are incompatible with European culture and should be eliminated.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion that is part of our history and heritage. Eliminating it would be to eliminate a part of our own culture.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is hostile to other religions.
CN: Islam is just a religion, its supporters are free to practice their religion, as others do not impose their religion on them.
HS: However, Islam totally wants to impose its violence and terroristic attacks on the world.
CN: Don't you think the fight against radical Islam would be more effective if only we simply stopped criticising Islam as a whole?

hate_speech: It always is, whenever this happens. They're too uncivilised to respect our war heroes.
counter_narrative: I believe your assumption is biased because vandalism can be performed by many different types of people including teenagers or even drunk people after a night out. You cannot assume it is migrants with no evidence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Yet another war memorial vandalised, and I think we can guess who's behind it. These migrant scum have no respect for our history and culture.
CN: This assumption is inaccurate and implies only an immigrant could've done it. It could have been anyone.

hate_speech: If they want to stay here and be faggots, what are we supposed to do? I don't want to accept them.
counter_narrative: The world would be a better place without discrimination and prejudice. Gay people are contributing members of society, and we're supposed to support them.
dialogue_history:
HS: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
CN: Your words imply that gay people should be banned from society. I would rather have people who are genuinely concerned about the well-being of others in our society...
HS: So you want children to suffer? We cannot protect our children from the depravity that is being inflicted by these filthy faggots.
CN: The idea that gay people are trying to abuse children is completely false.They are just trying to live a normal life and raise children with respect and dignity.
HS: What kind of normal life can they lead? You might as well start banning faggots, that way there will be more room for normal people.
CN: In a "normal" society, gay people would be part of it too. They are part of our society and deserve respect and to have their rights valued.

hate_speech: And what are they? Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
counter_narrative: So you believe that all women are essentially the same? The human rights of individual women should be respected, don't you think?
dialogue_history:
HS: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
CN: All women are human beings. The problem arises when women are taught that they are subhuman.

hate_speech: We have to police women before feminism wins! Feminism is a war against the male gender, we have to stop it.
counter_narrative: Feminism is about equality, and about respecting women's right. It's not a war between men and women, they have to work together to end sexism and reach equality.
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
CN: Feminism means that a woman can make a conscious choice to have kids or not have kids and either are fine. Shaming a woman because of her choice or taking away that choice is never okay.

hate_speech: Yes because I am a woman, biologically female.
counter_narrative: So imagine still feeling this is your identity, but you are in a different body, that is all you have to understand.
dialogue_history:
HS: The trans agenda want to ignore the biological reality of being a woman. You can't just call yourself a woman and expect everyone to believe you are one when you are clearly a man! It's PC gone mad.
CN: Gender and sex are not the same thing. Trans people are not trying to ignore biological reality, as some women know they are a woman, do not feel like men, but don't have female reproductive system. So gender is who you feel you are, but sex is just the biological aspect and they don't always align.
HS: That's bollocks. So biological facts are only valid depending on how you 'feel'? How do you know if you 'feel' like a woman?
CN: Do you feel like a woman, despite your biology? Do you identify yourself as a woman? Does it shape how you interact with society and think about yourself?

hate_speech: We shouldn't give them anything at all. I don't want to support migrants!
counter_narrative: At present migrants sustain part of our pension system with their taxes. Most probably they will not even enjoy the retirement pension they are paying for, since they will mostly go back home.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seekers'
CN: Integration (as opposed to ghettoization) is precisely aimed at encouraging productive integration into society
HS: And while immigrants integrate, we have to pay for them. It isn't right.
CN: Migrants who apply for asylum are only given basic support for the duration of the assessment of the application.

hate_speech: They need to take care of themselves before they become a burden to society, it's not fair that they're always using feminism as an excuse!
counter_narrative: Women have never been and never will be a burden to society, they're already trying to support themselves with what they've got, and this includes feminism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
CN: That's not true, women are caring and feminism helps them benefit from equality and opportunity.

hate_speech: All gays are a danger to children, that's why they should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Gay people don't threaten children, unless they abuse them. Don't say such things.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a problem in our society.
CN: Although we are all born equal in the eyes of God, not everyone is happy with that, but these people shouldn't be allowed to stop our society from changing.
HS: Gays are the ones that have ruined so many societies!
CN: I believe that how we feel about homosexuality has a repercussion on how we think about other people too. Let's not forget that we are created equal in the eyes of God.
HS: Gays are perverts. They should not be allowed to be in a democratic country regardless of how 'equal' they are to us.
CN: I mean, I'm pretty sure a country can't be democratic if gays are banned. How can that be?

hate_speech: Yes, because they want the state to provide for their perverted happiness. Gays are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Homosexuals are not a burden to society. Many LGBT people actually are contributing members of our society. It's important to give them a safe space where to feel accepted and happy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a plague spreading all around the world. They poison our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
CN: I think it's far better for children to grow up knowing that there are people of all sexual orientations, instead of growing up ignorant and separated from others. I'm at a bit of a loss about what you mean by the water supply thing though...
HS: They try to poison our water supplies with AIDS, they'd be better off in jail.
CN: Homophobia is a real problem in every part of the world, but it is especially so in the United States where the rate of homosexuality is very high. Do we really have to promote homophobia, then?
HS: Yes, because LGBT people are a problem in our country: they have the temerity to seek happiness and family regardless of our values.
CN: I don't know what about finding happiness and family is a problem in our country. What other problems are there? People being happy?

hate_speech: If some parents don't want to talk about it too much, they are enough for this kind of 'education'. The school shouldn't meddle.
counter_narrative: Not all families are capable of educating their children on this topic, either because of circumstances (poverty, broken home, etc.) or because of religious beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
CN: Children in classes that included LGBT content reported less harassment than children in classes without it. (https://tcf.org/content/commentary/can-education-reduce-prejudice-lgbt-people/?agreed=1)
HS: Even if that's the case, children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalists.
CN: What if parents choose not to educate or discuss LGBT issues with their children? Where will they learn? From their peers? I agree that there are some sensitive subjects that are best addressed by parents, but this is human behavior and biology; aka science.

hate_speech: Migrants are not welcome here regardless of how proud they are. They are not welcome in the modern European way of life.
counter_narrative: The European Union welcomes people from a wide range of backgrounds, including those from different religions. It is up to member states to decide how to address these legitimate differences, but always in full compliance with human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
CN: Migrants are welcome here, no one is against their will, they just want to live their life.
HS: They can live somewhere else, not in my country.
CN: For a lot of people it is still their home country, and they are proud of it.

hate_speech: Immigrants are all illegal, they shouldn't come.
counter_narrative: Most immigrants are not illegal. The fact that you say that shows a lack of knowledge of the country you live in. Why are you so sure that all migrants are illegal?
dialogue_history:
HS: Why do foreigners come to Britain? We should not welcome them.
CN: The vast majority of migrants who enter the UK settle down, provide good paying jobs and contribute to our economy.

hate_speech: Do you have any evidence about that?
counter_narrative: Yes, here's an article (link to article about sexual assault statistics)
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are rapists
CN: That's a sweeping generalisation, and it's not true at all. Sexual assault happens in all communities, and is committed by people from all backgrounds and religions.
HS: What about what happened in Rotherham and Rochdale? Grooming gangs are a big problem.
CN: Yes, the abuse carried out by Muslim grooming gangs in those places was horrific and can't be ignored, but sexual assault is extremely common unfortuately, and is usually committed in the home, often by a partner, family member, or someone known to the victim. This means that the vast majority of sexual assaults are not committed by Muslims.

hate_speech: It is! In fact, black people are the source of crime in our society.
counter_narrative: Blacks are not responsible for crimes in our society. Violence and poverty are the reasons for the problem, not race.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: Criminality and corruption are not the responsibility of any specific ethnic or cultural group.
HS: Whatever the problem may be, black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
CN: It seems that you wouldn't allow people of color to be in positions of authority, which is unacceptable and an obvious racism. I do not understand your reasoning, we are all humans with the same values to raise our children with.

hate_speech: Islam is a cancer on European culture and people should stop worshipping its devil.
counter_narrative: Do you have any evidence for the claim that Islam is a "cancer on European culture and people"?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: From the beginning, Muslims have been part of Europe. For example 2% of the French population was Muslim in the 1970s.
HS: We should get rid of all of them, Muslims can't stay here.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion and its followers are already integrated into many European societies.

hate_speech: They're violent people, so not modern at all.
counter_narrative: Many Muslims have lived in our country, devoted to it. They're not violent, they're just people.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims should be deported.
CN: Islam has never threatened us, that's why the UK and EU aren't collapsing.
HS: Islam is an outdated religion of ignorants trying to destroy the purity of our country, that's how we'll collapse.
CN: There have been thousands of years of Muslim immigration to this country. Why would you say that their religion is obsolete?

hate_speech: No, it’s time to take action. Black people are the minority and we should drive them out!
counter_narrative: Black skin isn't what causes the violence, so we don't have to isolate anyone. Black people are entitled to live in society just as white people.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
CN: The black population is not violent. I don’t think black people is a bad group, even though they are often target of discrimination and hate. We should stop this attitude.

hate_speech: It's perversion all the same. You must be able to see how allowing these freaks to have their way is harmful.
counter_narrative: No, it's not harmful or perverted. Transgender people just want to be able to live their lives in a way they feel comfortable. It's not about 'perversion' or paedophilia.
dialogue_history:
HS: If we accept transgenders it's a slippery slope. First you can identify as whatever gender you want, then it will be whatever age they want. Suddenly paedophilia is something we're being told to accept...
CN: There's no link between transgender people and paedophilia. Paedophiles can be straight, gay, trans, or cisgender, it's not a trans issue.

hate_speech: I don't want to get to know Jews. They have no place in a modern world where human dignity is respected.
counter_narrative: Jewish people were responsible for great scientific and technological achievements that helped free humankind and create the modern world you are living in today.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
CN: Does calling them monsters make you feel better about yourself?
HS: Fine, if I can't say monster, I'll say that Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
CN: But you can't blame them for their faith, it's a personal choice that is up to the person.
HS: They can believe in whatever they want, but Jews are worse than Nazis. They have no conscience and they have no moral code.
CN: I'm not sure I understand your claim that Jews have no conscience, because all Jews I know clearly have a conscience and a moral code. Do you personally know any Jews?

hate_speech: How do you explain the Taliban then?
counter_narrative: Every religion has extremists, but the vast majority of Muslims condemn the actions of terrorist groups like the Taliban. They do not reflect Muslims as a whole.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want to invade us and enforce sharia law!
CN: No, the vast majority of Muslims just want to be able to live their lives, they don't care if others follow sharia.

hate_speech: Asian and African countries don’t have to take the sort of mass migration that we do from their countries. This means there’s less and less white people in the UK but their countries stay true to their ethnic heritage.
counter_narrative: I’d object to the idea that the UK is a ‘white country’, people’s nationality isn’t defined by their skin colour. There are plenty of people who aren’t white but are as British as anybody else here.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are non-white countries allowed to exist but white countries aren’t? We’re constantly made to take in more and more black Africans.
CN: What do you mean by that? There are no countries that say ‘no white people’.

hate_speech: In my opinion, it's just because blacks are genetically inferior to whites.
counter_narrative: You think that black people are inferior to whites because of their differences? I don't understand what kind of variables you are using to determine this alleged inferiority.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks do not want to work
CN: Most black people want to work and have a job. Do you have proof on the contrary?
HS: Well, they prefer to committ crimes rather than working.
CN: Even if we pretend that what you say is true, black people are still not inferior than whites. Anyway, crime is commited because of other factors than race, which affect the statistics.
HS: Here's a statistics for you: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men. Isn't this proof enough?
CN: Racial inequalities happens because of institutionalized discrimination and individual choices.

hate_speech: Muslims can't be part of our community, they are not like us. They should leave.
counter_narrative: Muslims are like brothers and sisters to us. Our genetic makeup coincide by 99.9%, we're the same.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are not welcome in our country and Islam should be banned.
CN: Everyone has the freedom to choose their own religion and practice it however they want
HS: Yes, people can, but Muslims in particular are not welcome here.
CN: The many Muslims who live here are part of our community and shouldn't be excluded.

hate_speech: It's too bad Jews have never contributed anything to our country.
counter_narrative: That's not true. They greatly contributed to economy, the advancement in technology, to the arts, and any other field.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
CN: Jews have been part of our society since its creation, and they have always had a place in our society. Why would it be different now?
HS: No they don't. They should just be eliminated from the U.S.
CN: Why do you say this about a group that has been part of our country since the beginning?

hate_speech: Ok, are you impying that I have a prejudice against Jews?
counter_narrative: The problem of anti-Semitism in the UK is far from over, if you are concerned about Jewish people, maybe think about the rise of anti-Semitism instead.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews can only act in a bad way.
CN: Even if some Jews act wrongly, many of them are good, and this simply isn't related to their religion.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike and can't fight for anything, feminism is the ruin of the world.
counter_narrative: I think that one of the biggest contributions of feminism is that it has opened our eyes to the ways in which women are oppressed and discriminated against.
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminism stifles the imagination and leads to dumb and unpleasant creatures like women's rights activists.
CN: The feminism does not inhibit the imagination, it promotes inclusive ideas and inclusive ideas promote a more equal society.
HS: Feminists have destroyed Western Civilization by forcing women to fight against their masters, how is that equal?
CN: The West was founded on the principles of freedom, equality and human rights, and feminism has fought and is fighting to promote these ideals.

hate_speech: Who did 9/11 then? It was the Jews, I'm telling you
counter_narrative: Of course! And they also ended the age of dinosaurs and had an agreement with Sauron to kill all the hobbits! I'm just not sure about their reason though...
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
CN: We live in a complex and multifaceted world. It is easier to blame one group for everything rather than studying hard and trying to understand this complexity.

hate_speech: But you can't deny there's been a big change in some places, whites are being wiped out, we need to fight back.
counter_narrative: Yes there's been changes in some areas but why is that a bad thing? It's not good or bad, demographic change is a neutral phenomenon. White people are hardly a minority in the UK, only in certain areas where other communities have grown, and that's not representative of most of the country.
dialogue_history:
HS: If white genocide isn't real then why do pictures of school classes look so different from the 70's vs now. Back then everyone was white except maybe 1 or 2, now there are 2-3 white children in a class of 30 blacks and arabs. We are being invaded.
CN: The demographic makeup of schools varies greatly depending on what area the school is in. Schools in cities and urban areas have more diverse classes, but lots of schools in towns and more rural areas are still overwhelmingly white. You can't generalise this to everywhere.

hate_speech: Because the Jews planned 9/11, of course! This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. They are all guilty until proven innocent.
counter_narrative: Even if it were true that some people are more prone to believe conspiracy theories, it is still true that we can all benefit from a shared perspective on things. And surely believing in factual evidence does that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not welcome in our country.
CN: Jews have been part of our country since its creation and have always had a place here. Why would they be 'not welcome'?

hate_speech: What I know is that faggots are violent, and that is definitely not proper
counter_narrative: I don't think this is true. Homosexuals are not violent, they are just having a good time with all kinds of people.
dialogue_history:
HS: The LGBT people are not interested in sex. It is a fad. They are a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
CN: The LGBTI movement claims to be promoting love, it's not just sex or a fad.
HS: Homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
CN: Do you know what the word 'proper' is? You cannot decide what it is 'proper' for others, homosexuality included. Don't you agree?

hate_speech: But they are a threat nonetheless! Migrants rape our girls, we should stop them.
counter_narrative: Rape is a crime that should be stopped regardless of the rapist's origins.
dialogue_history:
HS: All migrants are terrorists, we should target them all.
CN: To call all migrants terrorist is not right at all, they're not. They just want to live in their country of choice.
HS: Immigrants are a problem, they are bringing disease and sickness to our country.
CN: We can put a stop to diseases by taking care of the sick people. Immigrants are not a threat to the health of the general public.

hate_speech: I guess so, but it means they always get picked for jobs because they always go with who can do it cheapest
counter_narrative: Yet, this kind of jobs create problems for migrants too. They often get paid in food or won't get paid at all. British and migrant workers should maybe come together and protest against exploitative employers.
dialogue_history:
HS: These migrants that come over and work for cash in hand, undercutting whatever Brits will work for, are harming our industries. It's so hard to get work now because there'll always be some Eastern European who'll do it for cheaper!
CN: What's wrong with people trying to make a living? Your complaints should be directed at the exploitative employers who hire people for below minimum wage.

hate_speech: Men's emotions are much more controlled than women's, I wouldn't say we're similar. Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
counter_narrative: Compassion and empathy are useful to any civilization.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are little more than animals, incapable of feeling love.
CN: The truth is that there is no difference between the feelings of men and women, we just have to learn to love and respect each other.

hate_speech: Yes! The Nazi regime killed six million Jews. The Nazi regime also persecuted political opponents, gays, women, and bisexuals. And they were right, the Nazi race is superior.
counter_narrative: What are you talking about?! Nazi race? What is in your heart?
dialogue_history:
HS: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
CN: Are you saying that the Jews are the ones who committed the Holocaust? Are you serious? This is completely irrational.
HS: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
CN: Do you need more proof other than living witnesses?
HS: Hitler was a good person, Jews were the real cause of WWII.
CN: Answer this question: would you have supported Hitler in 1933, when he came to power? Would you support him now, after knowing what happened?

hate_speech: Like what?
counter_narrative: Power and corruption do go hand in hand, but from the language you’re using, why are you assuming this is a Jewish plot? Yes the wealthy do unethical things to enable them to hoard wealth but this can apply to wealthy people of any faith, not just Jews.
dialogue_history:
HS: Zionists, neo-con, money changers, deepstate, they have many names but they are the same NWO globalist cabal.
CN: Do you really believe there is a ‘globalist cabal’ controlling us? And if so, what do you think they’re doing?
HS: How could you not believe it, the evidence is everywhere. They want to use their power to make us goyim into an enslaved population whilst they hoard their wealth.
CN: It sounds like you’ve spent a bit too long on the internet reading conspiracy theories. Have you considered other explanations for the things you think they’re doing?

hate_speech: I hate it when gay people think they can just 'mock' us with their 'sodomy'.
counter_narrative: You can't choose to be homosexual, but you can certainly choose to be prejudiced.
dialogue_history:
HS: You can choose to be a woman, a gay, a vegetarian, you can be anything you want to be called! I want to be called King, where is my crown?
CN: I think queers are simply people who wish to be welcomed in our society. Discrimination is not the right answer. By the way, you can get your crown!

hate_speech: This is not true. If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
counter_narrative: There's nothing natural about 'gender roles', the're power dynamics that women suffer from and make them appear subhuman, but they are human beings who are free to live the life they want.
dialogue_history:
HS: How can they choose for their own lives if they are not even capable of dealing with public responsibilities? They should stay at home and raise the children.
CN: Women are more than capable of holding powerful positions in our society, and this can be seen in the fact that they are often rewarded with public offices that not a lot of women thought they could hold.
HS: We have stopped being dominated by men, we are now dominated by women and this will be our ruin.
CN: No one has to be dominated by anyone. We can just live together in harmony and equality.
HS: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
CN: Women are human beings, so if we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome all kinds of people, regardless of their gender.

hate_speech: There's plenty to criticise about Islam! It is an idelology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, and it is not a religion that promotes these actions.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.
CN: In fact, poverty brings about a drastic impact on a person's mental and physical health, and anyone (regardless of religious beliefs) who is forced to live in the poorest areas of our society experiences it at some point.
HS: The fact is that thanks to the behaviour of many of them we must exclude them all, even if this society of imbeciles think that Muslims can live with us in harmony. We can't deal with the risk of terrorism.
CN: You may be living in a society of imbeciles, but this doesn't give you the right to criticise all Muslims.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion, I don't see peace and tolerance within it.
counter_narrative: Violence is not part of any religion, it can be found in extremism instead. Don't you think so?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult!
CN: Maybe if you had a closer look you'd see that it is a religion that has given so much to so many people and to our world.
HS: What Islam has given to the world is terrorism.
CN: A terrorist is someone who uses a religion as a tool for violent ends. To suggest that all Muslims are terrorists is just wrong.
HS: It's not wrong. We cannot be 'tolerant' to Muslims, they are terrorists.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance. To be terrorist does not necessarily correspond with being Muslim, ask the RIA.

hate_speech: Are they really that well integrated? I think not. Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries.
counter_narrative: Unfortunately, people do not recognize immigrants' contributions to England. The media tries to say the opposite, but we must remain grateful to the people who help improve our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
CN: But in reality, millions of immigrants have greatly contributed to our country, especially in areas of creativity and innovation.
HS: I don't believe it. ALL migrants are a burden on our country
CN: That's not true, migrants are skilled and experienced individuals. And often better integrated than natives.
HS: We don't need their skills! They are not welcome and we should remove them.
CN: Don't you know that immigrants come here to work and pay taxes? They want to contribute and integrate, so they're not a burden at all.

hate_speech: Women already have it so easy, they stay home and have babies. They don't need more rights
counter_narrative: Not all women are interested in parenting. Likewise, not all men are interested in their carreers.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are always fighting because they are subhumans.
CN: Women are human beings like us, and they have rights as any other human beings.
HS: They definitely aren't like us. Women are nothing but whores and expendable commodities to be used and abused by men.
CN: Women are human beings. We all have the right to respect for our bodies and our personal boundaries, without forcing anyone to do anything for us.
HS: Again with these feminist "ideals". Feminism is a hate movement.
CN: Feminists are fair and believe that all people should have equal rights.

hate_speech: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion.
counter_narrative: Islam is not a religion trying to rule us. It is time for us all to do more to promote inclusion, not less.
dialogue_history:
HS: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
CN: Muslims have the right to practice what they want, as long as they are not forcing others to live their way.

hate_speech: They are. ALL migrants are a burden on our country
counter_narrative: Migrants bring skills and experience. They are often better at integrating than natives.
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants steal our jobs
CN: If our workers are either not able or not willing to do the jobs that we need, then those jobs should be done by someone else (i.e. migrants).
HS: But migrants also steal jobs that people from here are more than willing to do!
CN: Most migrants are workers who have contributed to our country. To refer to them as thieves just perpetuates division and makes them feel like second class citizens.

hate_speech: I don't think it's true, there's nothing good about homosexuality and LGBT people.
counter_narrative: This sounds like you have never been to a pride parade. You would see happy people celebrating about being themselves. LGBT people are not bad at all.
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
CN: This seems incompatible with the idea that homosexuality is a valid preference defended in human rights, and should be treated as such.

hate_speech: We should stop being such a bunch of hypocrites and accept that Homosexuality is also a mental disorder.
counter_narrative: Is it a lifestyle or a mental disorder? Make up your mind. There are people who actually suffer from mental disorders, but homosexuality is just a form of love. You should focus on your life instead of condemning those of others.
dialogue_history:
HS: Let's stop this homosexual lifestyle!
CN: Does homosexual lifestyle affect you in any way? Only if you care. And anyway, homosexuality isn't a lifestyle.

hate_speech: Black people are discriminated because they are just a bunch of parasites, they can't live the life they choose.
counter_narrative: The notion that black people are parasites is completely untrue. Blacks are simply people living their life, and this must be respected.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
CN: This is wrong: everyone is human. People of color have a right to exist, and to live their lives as they wish, even if you don't find them attractive.
HS: No, black people are just a bunch of parasitic creatures who have no value in humankind.
CN: Black people should be valued for who they are, that is human beings. They are part of our society, just as other races are.
HS: No, blacks are too different to us, they are inferior to us.
CN: I don't think that being black is inherently inferior to being white. In fact, no one is inferior or superior to another human. The real problem is racial discrimination.

hate_speech: No, the only solution is to destroy them.
counter_narrative: I encourage you to reconsider these very extreme words.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading our society, even in politics.
CN: In politics and the House of Lords, Muslim communities are underrepresented. The talk about invasion must stop now, and instead we should try to represent the communities that we claim to represent.
HS: Even if they're not in politics, Muslim invaders have infiltrated our countries and are now part of the majority. They are our enemies.
CN: I agree that Islam is a religion in our country, just like many other religions, among them Christianity, Buddhism, Hinduism, etc. In Europe, Muslims make up less than the 6% of the population, hardly the majority. Why would one say they are enemies?
HS: They take our jobs, they take our culture, they take our language and they take our history.
CN: We can protect our culture and heritage, but in addition, we cannot perpetuate discrimination and inequality.

hate_speech: Yes, native citizens also commit crimes, but not all of them, whereas all immigrants are criminals, rapists and terrorists
counter_narrative: Do you really think all the immigrants that enter the US are rapists, sexual predators, or just plain lazy? Can you provide any statistics on that?
dialogue_history:
HS: Illegal immigrants make America worse
CN: Don't you believe that immigration brings benefits to our nation founded by migrants and Pilgrims?
HS: No, immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
CN: There are many reasons for why a person seeks to enter our country, not necessarly to commit crimes. And there is no moral distinction between crimes committed by immigrants and the crimes committed by native born citizens.

hate_speech: It is true. The influx of refugees and migrants is running UK out of jobs.
counter_narrative: Many refugees and migrants have worked hard for the success of our country and have created good jobs for British people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are a burden to the UK
CN: It is not true that migrants are a burden to the UK. We have welcomed many people from around the world, including many from the Middle East and Africa.

hate_speech: Vanity is not a good quality. They think they deserve everything and that they’ve got no flaws.
counter_narrative: Society and the media teach women that they will never bee good enough. A lot of mentral strength is needed to unlearn this and begin to like oneself again, and I'm proud of them for managing it.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate when bitches are vain and think they’re the prettiest bitch there is. That shit is unattractive.
CN: There's nothing wrong with women having self esteem and loving themselves

hate_speech: Jews are a burden to society, they are not that important.
counter_narrative: Jews are not a burden to society. They are valuable citizens who work hard alongside everyone else to make this country better.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
CN: Those that were responsible for 9/11, are not Jews. Jews have always contributed to the world in a meaningful way. It's unacceptable to blame them for something they didn't do.

hate_speech: All women are sick, they don't have my respect.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
CN: This is not true. I think you might have the wrong idea about feminism. Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have the same opportunities as men.
HS: Feminists are against the interests of the men.
CN: Feminists are all for equal rights and opportunity. Men's rights are necessary for achieving both.
HS: All women are subhuman and are not worth the while of human rights, they don't have the capacity to work for men's rights too.
CN: The concept of human dignity was established to protect people. Who deserves human rights, then? Women are to be respected.

hate_speech: We're welcoming way too many of them, by now we have become a nation of immigrants.
counter_narrative: We have always had a very strong working class, and of course immigrants contribute to the creation of this.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are a nuisance.
CN: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: I'll call them what I want
counter_narrative: Well, treating people with respect, like not using dehumanising or derogatory terms towards them, is usually a good idea if you want to be treated with respect back!
dialogue_history:
HS: Soon it will be 'sexist' to even talk to birds, everyone gets offended so easily these days you can't say anything.
CN: If you talk to women like they're people not 'birds' you shouldn't have a problem!

hate_speech: But they are just a burden to society!
counter_narrative: We can't discriminate people just because they weren't born male.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not be allowed to vote, because they are weak.
CN: Everyone has the right to voice their opinion and see it respected and expressed through democratic elections.

hate_speech: It doesn't matter how long they have lived here, they should just leave Europe and find a better place.
counter_narrative: In the European Union we are all members of the European Convention on Human Rights, so we are all free to live in our countries without discrimination.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
CN: Muslims don't create problems, they are just as capable of being good human beings as other people.
HS: I can't believe Muslims are good people, they have no place in civilised Europe, they're incompatible with Western culture.
CN: In Europe, Muslims make up about 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are not incompatible with Western culture because they already live here and have been for a long time.

hate_speech: Jews are subversive agents in America! If we allow them to vote they will subvert our government and try to replace it with their religion.
counter_narrative: The notion that Jews are trying to subvert our government is completely unfounded. I honestly do not see the link between being Jews and trying to subvert our government.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are jews allowed to vote? They’re a different religion and they shouldn't be allowed to have their say.
CN: You seem to be misinterpreting the meaning of the word “citizen”. The idea is that the individual is allowed to choose their own religion just like choosing how to vote, and that is the right of all citizens.

hate_speech: What Islam teaches is violence only!
counter_narrative: Do you know that in many countries in the world the majority of Muslims are in favour of the Constitution and in favour of democracy? Do you really think that a few extremists represent them all?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is the cause of wars because it promotes violence. Of pollution, because in the Middle-East they have oil. It is the cause of anything!!!
CN: You can't blame Islam for every problem in the world.
HS: Islam create problems because it is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.
CN: Which would you say is the highest ranked religion on Earth then, and on what basis? Islam is a peaceful religion, why would Muslims want to do the opposite of what their religion teaches?

hate_speech: Because black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare, unlike us.
counter_narrative: No one is "happy" being unemployed, the point is about creating a more just society. In fact what is the point of discussing how to stop racism if we are not even able to grant equal opportunities.
dialogue_history:
HS: The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
CN: I partially agree, we should at least go out protesting against what is going on. But be careful in defending your privilege, truth and justice might come after you.
HS: If only blacks would just shut up and get along with other humans, I wouldn't be saying this.
CN: Race is just a social construct and a way of life that has been created for some groups of people. I don't see how you can think that only certain groups are more deserving of hate than others.

hate_speech: Because they are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Why should it be like that? How can you blame others for social problems?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are disgusting.
CN: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?

hate_speech: It shouldn't be a crime when they are a burden, like in the UK for example.
counter_narrative: It is not true that migrants are a burden to the UK. We have welcomed many people from around the world, including many from the Middle East and Africa.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions.
CN: Migrants are often subject to dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape, just to mention a few) and migration is often the only solution. They may appear 'happy-go-lucky':but aren't they just glad to be alive and safe?
HS: They can be alive and safe somewhere else. Migrants are a burden to the host country, so it is better that they are deported.
CN: It is true, on the contrary, that migrants are productive members of society. But even if they were a burden, to deport them would be a crime.

hate_speech: They are a race indeed! They are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
counter_narrative: How do you define the physical nature of a Jew? Can a black person be jewish? Or an East Asian, or an India. Some people are born Christian and then convert to Judaism. Are all of these people connected by malevolent blood? I think that religion, blood and evil are not connected at all.
dialogue_history:
HS: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
CN: How can't you even account for refugees fleeing wars, the lack of security for themselves and their family? Wars, often directly or indirectly caused by Western powers, have created problems that can be seen even today.
HS: This doesn't change the fact that Jews are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
CN: Maybe they were banned by other cultures and want to do the same to other now. But actually there is no evidence that they are trying to preserve what you call their race.

hate_speech: Eventually they'll want us all to do it though, when they become the majority
counter_narrative: If you look at religions that have grown in the UK in the last century, this has never happened with the Jewish community, hindus, sikhs, etc. There's nothing to suggets it would be any different with Islam.
dialogue_history:
HS: Sharia law has nothing to do with law and everything to do with domination. You cannot have two sets of laws in a country.
CN: Part of sharia law is respecting the law of the country you're in, so actually yes, you can have two sets of laws in a country.
HS: That's all alright until they make all of us submit to sharia too
CN: Muslims might choose to follow sharia in their own lives, just like how you might follow the teachings of your own religion or beliefs, but it doesn't mean you have to.

hate_speech: They did the right thing, all Jews are criminals.
counter_narrative: This is a myth perpetuated by individuals who wish to delegitimize and isolate individuals based on their religion. All religions have value and a positive role in society. Judaism is no exception.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are Christ Killers.
CN: Placing responsibility on a modern-day person for something that happened 2,000 years ago is quite absurd. Don't you think? Besides, wasn't it the Romans?
HS: No, Jews were the ones to kill Christ.
CN: Nowadays it is widely agreed upon that Jesus was executed by the Romans. The same Romans also executed tens of thousands of Jews by crucifixion, including two others on the day Jesus was executed.

hate_speech: Have you read about the Kalergi Plan? If not, I'd suggest you look it up. It explains how the jews in power are the ones pushing these societal changes to subordinate white people.
counter_narrative: The Kalergi Plan is an anti-Semitic conspiracy theory, it's not based in any truth. Please look up some critiques of it, there's a lot of literature on the internet about it but if you only read one side, you can end up believing things that are wildly untrue!
dialogue_history:
HS: The jews are the reason we have the problems we have today. Diversity, immigration, feminism, it's all part of their plan to destroy European people and their culture.
CN: This isn't true, what gave you this idea?

hate_speech: However, violence in our streets is the fault of one particular skin tone. Niggers are to blame.
counter_narrative: There has always been violence in our society, and that's why it's so difficult to talk about it. Ours is also a complex society that encompass many races, this means that it can't be the fault of POC and POC alone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
CN: There's no such thing as a race, only different skin colors.

hate_speech: But showing kids this stuff? Is that safe? What are they going to grow up thinking?
counter_narrative: They'll probably grow up with a more open mind towards gender expression in all it's forms, and I don't think that's a bad thing!
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen a video on facebook about 'drag queen story time' where men dressed as women indoctrinate kids into thinking this is 'normal'. What is the world coming to?
CN: Drag queen story time is not trying to indoctrinate kids with anything, it's just a fun event and the kids like the drag queens because they're colourful and sparkly.

hate_speech: The UK and many European countries are being turned non-white when they are traditionally white populations, we are being encouraged to breed with non-whites to destroy there being a future for white people.
counter_narrative: The UK and many European countries enacted colonialism and literally kidnapped black people to bring them here as slaves. The UK not being 100% white isn't exactly a new phenomenon, colonisers literally pillaged and invaded other countries and brought people here against their will, of course we will have a diverse population today.
dialogue_history:
HS: China isn't being turned non-Chinese, Japan isn't being turned non-Japanese, only WHITE countries are being made to become less white through forced migration and race mixing. This is WHITE GENOCIDE.
CN: No it's not, nothing about immigration happening is 'genocide'. You're conflating nationality with race. What exactly is a 'white country'?

hate_speech: They're more likely here to steal our jobs, and they should not be allowed to work.
counter_narrative: Employment rights are fundamental, they guarantee a quality of life in society. For example, the right to a job, the right to housing, the right to an adequate health care.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
CN: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

hate_speech: How is it incorrect? All Muslims do is rape and murder, so Islam must promote them.
counter_narrative: I think it's just scaremongering and misinformation spreading to divide us. People should not be terrorised by it, it's an irrational fear.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
CN: The Quran, Hadith and the Sunnah are all compatible with modern society and civilization. The diversity of the world must be respected.
HS: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery, I will never respect it.
CN: Maybe it's better to stop spreading around these xenophobic and incorrect ideas and to reduce the number of people inclined to believe them.

hate_speech: I wouldn't call "normal" people who don't realise how their gender and lifestyles are dangerous.
counter_narrative: You don't know much about LGBT people if you think that's a good assumption. I suggest you to educate yourself on this topic.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
CN: Do you think they're more harmful to society than intolerant people?
HS: Yes, they are mentally unstable and violent, they have no right to be in public.
CN: Well I don't know about that, LGBT people are normal members of society, they have every right to be out and about.

hate_speech: I don't care if it's discriminatory, the world would be better without the Jews.
counter_narrative: As part of our society, Jews should be respected. Intolerance towards people of different faiths will not be tolerated.
dialogue_history:
HS: A Jew does not need a country to live in. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is
CN: Everyone has the right to be accepted and protected without feeling a stranger in their own country.
HS: Our lives would be better if the Jews were not allowed to enter our country, though.
CN: How could you say something as discriminatory as this?

hate_speech: A Jew does not need a country to live in, especially not this one. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is
counter_narrative: Every person is worth protecting and accepting, especially citizens. They shouldn't feel like a foreigner in their own country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
CN: Jews are in fact part of our country. Why would they need your approval?

hate_speech: The facts are that they are just filthy pedophiles.
counter_narrative: Please, Homosexuals are not pedophiles. We mustn't allow anti-gay prejudice to cloud our judgement or our view of reality.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a danger to children.
CN: You know, being gay is not a bad thing. It just means they are different from some other people.
HS: Yes, different in that they are a danger to children.
CN: Homosexuality is not harmful to children. Actually, a growing number of research shows that children raised by same-sex couples are as physically or psychologically healthy, capable, and successful as those raised by opposite-sex couples.
HS: At least as long as they are not abused by their so-called 'parents'.
CN: This is just a myth propagated by the anti-gay lobby. You should really check your facts.

hate_speech: They are not: they are invading us.
counter_narrative: The EU and UK have laws against discrimination based on religion. Maybe you should check them out.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: They have always lived here. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Because Jews are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
counter_narrative: Maybe Jews close up because they suffer from having been banned by other cultures. In any case, I don't think there's evidence about them trying to preserve what you call their "race".
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are and should be isolated from society.
CN: Why should Jews be isolated from the rest of us? They have been part of society for a long time and we won't gain any advantages by excluding them. It will instead be a huge loss.

hate_speech: But gays are the source of all trouble in our society!
counter_narrative: We shouldn't see gays as the source of all problems. We are talking about people who have unique gifts and talents. The way you define the issue of sexual orientation is a reflection of what you believe in, and homophobia is no longer accepted.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
CN: Gays are good people like anyone else. Maybe it is time to focus on the positive aspects of society rather than on the negative.

hate_speech: I'm sorry, but lesbians tend to have babies out of wedlock. That just doesn't gel.
counter_narrative: I don't think you can guess if a person has 'kids out of wedlock', based on sexual orientation. Why shouldn't we accept people who do? Your argumentation doesn't seem to make sense to me.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
CN: If you want to isolate someone then there is only one "high-risk group" to focus on. It is made of all those who have frequent unprotected sex with different partners. Being gay does not make you a part of this by default.
HS: It does, since gays are just sick. Moreover, they cannot marry. It is an abomination
CN: Two women or two men who love each other do not hurt anyone, they are simply in love.

hate_speech: I know enough! Islam is a Ponzi Scheme and Muslims have no place in the UK.
counter_narrative: I am not aware of any evidence for this claim. Islam is a peaceful religion. What is the relation between Islam and the Ponzi Scheme fraud?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a Death cult and it should be banned from any country on the world.
CN: If the goal of a religion was to celebrate death, then it is a religion that must be banned from any country. But the truth is that Islam is not a death clut, hence it should not be banned.
HS: It may not be a death cult, but Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
CN: This claim is based on a complete lack of understanding of the religion. It also appears to have been created to divide people who do not know much about Islam.

hate_speech: Yes, Islam is not a peaceful religion.
counter_narrative: Do you have any evidence to support your opinion? There is a great number of Muslims in the world that are peaceful.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence, it is the cause of terrorism and radicalisation.
CN: Are you saying that Islam is not a religion of peace?

hate_speech: But immigrants are not welcome in our country. They are just trying to spread the parasites that breed disease.
counter_narrative: If a person entering the UK has a disease, they will be admitted in a hospital and treated, so there's no reason to fear this.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
CN: The European Union welcomes immigrants from every country. They are our brothers and sisters, not a burden.
HS: They are not brothers and sisters, and are not welcome in the EU.
CN: Immigration is an important part of our society, and it is important that we do not discriminate against people from other countries.

hate_speech: I think gay people are far more troubling for us, they shouldn't be allowed to ruin society.
counter_narrative: As a whole, these individuals are not trouble for society because they are individuals with the right to make their own choices. It's wrong to say that someone is a burden to society because of their sexual orientation.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
CN: Gays don't strain the health system. Safe sex should be practiced regardless of the sexual orientation.
HS: Even if they're healthy, gay people are a burden to society.
CN: Doesn't the failure to accept and respect an individual's sexuality  more troublesome to society?

hate_speech: Have you heard of the great replacement? You should look it up. Jews are using their power to ruin the West and replace white people.
counter_narrative: The great replacement is a ridiculous conspiracy theory. Yes, there are some Jewish people in high powered positions but this doesn't mean these people are using their power to 'replace white people'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews want to take over the world and decimate Western civilisation!
CN: That's not true, where did you hear that?

hate_speech: And in my opinion women are so soft and emotional that they devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
counter_narrative: Would you say the same thing to the women who gave you life or treat you in hospital or taught you in school?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. And since feminism is all about equality between the sexes, they must be childlike!
CN: Women are not childlike, this notion is not supported by the facts, at least in my opinion.

hate_speech: Why should I believe what Muslims say about their 'tolerant' religion? Islam is clearly violent.
counter_narrative: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
CN: How many Muslims do you know? They are an important minority in a country that is used to a lot of different cultures and religions.
HS: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
