CN: Islam is an an independent and tolerant religion, a way of life that has been adopted and encouraged by Muslim communities worldwide for thousands of years. It shouldn't be a problem to others, in which ways do you think it is?

hate_speech: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Children were raped by more than 10 people in a night, up to 100 in a week. Why is the media ignoring this?
counter_narrative: Rape is a universal problem just like war and murder. There is no reason to attribute such crimes to a religious group.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims cannot be in a democracy because they vote with their feet, not with the ballot box.
CN: Muslims do vote like other people, in general in favor of the people they perceive as closer to their culture and identity. That's why it is called "democracy".
HS: The problem is that Islam is a cancer on our democracy.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. I don't see how it could be seen as a 'cancer', how can you?

hate_speech: It doesn't matter, what I want is for them to stop coming here altogheter. They're replacing us!
counter_narrative: Since the fall of the Roman Empire, hundreds of millions of people have entered the Western world and we have still not lost our culture, civilisation, identity and way of life.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.
CN: Even in 2016, the year with the peak of 119,000 arrivals, the number of migrants compared to Italians was very low. Speaking of ethnic substitution seems a little exaggerated.
HS: Our cities are full of immigrants, I don't see an exaggeration. 
CN: The arrivals have noticeably downsized.

hate_speech: If there are, they should be the ones to suck it up then. I don't want immigrants in my country.
counter_narrative: The world belongs to everyone and if you were a kind person you wouldn't have problems with helping a person in need.
dialogue_history:
HS: Fucking bleeding heart, why don't you host migrants in your house
CN: Yes, there have been a whole bunch of humanitarian hosts already.

hate_speech: No, they are just an incompetent bunch of criminals and thieves, who have no respect for the world.
counter_narrative: Why do you say that? It's not true. We should respect everyone's abilities, their values, and their cultures.
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
CN: That's not true, black people are human beings with the same rights as everyone else.
HS: Even if that's true, I don't see a reason why Africans should be allowed to live here.
CN: I don't think it is a good idea to try and demonise people by promoting hatred against them. We need to do better.
HS: But I don't want to do better for Africans. They are incompatible with human dignity.
CN: The notion that blacks are incompatible with human dignity is not true. All black people have dignity because they are humans.

hate_speech: Bullshit, they absorb most of the public spending!
counter_narrative: The cost of immigration from the last Economic and Financial Document, published last April and containing the consolidated figure for 2017, is estimated to have a total expenditure of about 4.4 billion euros, which represents only 0.26% of Italian GDP, and around 0.5% of public spending. In short, 99.5% of public resources are used for something else.
dialogue_history:
HS: All immigrants from Africa are lazy freeloader.
CN: This is not true. Many of them are actually skilled workers.
HS: Still, we are forced to economically support all of them.
CN: As the INPS indicates, they are now contributing to the payment of our pensions because they are not yet in the retirement age.

hate_speech: You can have your say if you contribute to society, but Blacks do not want to work
counter_narrative: Black people want to work. Why do you think they don't want to? Where's the evidence?
dialogue_history:
HS: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
CN: Regardless of skin color, freedom of speech is a key right.

hate_speech: Are you sure? Jews are shits that take public money getting it from the government.
counter_narrative: No, they're not 'shits' and they don't get money from the government. The idea that Jews are somehow scamming the government and public fundings is simply not true.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
CN: Bribery is illegal, Jews who engage in it will be arrested, but it's not something every Jew does.

hate_speech: If women were able for men's stuff, they would not be oppressed.
counter_narrative: Just because women are oppressed doesn't mean that they are powerless. Take a look around you. Why are women suffering from a lack of education, a lack of jobs and housing, low wages? It's because of oppression and sexism in our society. The more we work towards inclusion, the less entrenched those underlying inequalities will be.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women desperately looking for men are just unacceptable.
CN: If women truly wanted to have relationships and fulfilment they should be allowed to, not being pressured into giving up on what they want.
HS: Why should we care about feminists and women if we can just punch them?
CN: The point of feminism is to end misogyny. Women are human beings, and they are human beings with human rights.
HS: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male, not to end misogyny.
CN: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting empowerment of women. It is about equality, and not the degradation of men.

hate_speech: Jews insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment, why would they want to get to know me?
counter_narrative: What are you trying to say? Every religion has its sects and beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
CN: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.
HS: Jewish folks are an infestation, that's why we should despise them.
CN: Not all Jews are guilty of crime, they are just like any other person. If you get to know anyone that is a Jew you will know this better.

hate_speech: It makes you a problem at the very moment you start poisoning our children's mind with your icky perversion.
counter_narrative: This is not true. If a claim is based on facts, then it must be true. If you just talk of stereotypes, then you won't go very far.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
CN: This idea is completely untrue. The fact is that being gay does not make you a problem.

hate_speech: The fact is that the percentage of rape cases reported in the UK is made up all by immigrants
counter_narrative: That's not true. Some immigrants may do it, but the majority of rapes aren't committed by them. Their cases go to the news because they are unusual, not because they happen often.
dialogue_history:
HS: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
CN: Migrants are not rapists, most of them are just trying to make a better life for their families.
HS: Then why are there so many migrant rape offenders?
CN: Actually, 90% of sexual assaults is committed by people known to the victim, like a relative, a friend or a colleague. Maybe you should check your facts.

hate_speech: Yes. They should heal from it.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation. 5% of the population simply love people of the same sex.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why gays do not try to heal?
CN: Are you really saying that homosexuality is a disease?

hate_speech: Pride is a celebration of diversity and inclusion, not a celebration of sexualization.
counter_narrative: Pride isn’t a time for fear or hate speech, it’s a time for equality and inclusion. LGBT people are not perverts and their goal isn't the sexualization of children at all.
dialogue_history:
HS: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
CN: Sexualisation isn't what is encouraged at Pride, but having fun and getting to know other kinds of people is! That's what kids are doing, and it's not bad.
HS: No, it’s about the kids being sexualised! It's a shame to have Pride as such.

hate_speech: I still think black are inferior to us based on their genetic makeup.
counter_narrative: This is simply not true. Science clearly says that we all have the same biology, we are all humans.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
CN: The notion that blacks are inherently inferior is simply wrong. Is it fair to judge people by the colour of their skin? I really don't think so.
HS: It is fair! Blacks are subhuman, they just want to be loved like us but will never be.
CN: The concept of race is a social construct based on social assumptions rather scientific. This means that even though all humans are fundamentally the same, because of social constructs we think that some skin colors are worse. This is wrong and not scientifically proven.

hate_speech: Women are here to obey, and if you don't like it, you can leave.
counter_narrative: When you want to discuss gender inequality, please do it by talking to people about it, not by imposing your views and oppressive statements.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are here to obey and be submissive and their place is with the man that chooses them. That's all.
CN: Human beings should be able to decide what kind of life they want to live, and this means also be able to choose the person they want as a partner. You don't sound like a first choice.
HS: What I want is for women to realize that they can only obey to men.
CN: Women have always been forced to follow rules and codes, but they are human beings deserving of respect and with the freedom to do whatever they want to.

hate_speech: Probably it's because Jews think they are so special
counter_narrative: Jews may feel "special" only because they are part of a minority, but that's it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people.
CN: Discriminating Jews because of an alleged different genetic makeup is completely baseless. Let's just stop calling them inferior.
HS: If you are from another culture, you are subhuman and unfit to live in our country, and Jews are the first example of this.
CN: You really need to give us some proof for this, given that cultures, freedom of speech and religion are often similar.
HS: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race, this is my evidence.
CN: If Jews really only cared about themselves, why do they live here, where they are a minority? Do you have an answer?

hate_speech: LGBT people don't deserve understanding, I will never accept them.
counter_narrative: Being LGBT is normal in our society, and it's great to have such diversity. You should try to learn about it instead of forcing your lifestyle onto others.
dialogue_history:
HS: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
CN: That's a bit much, isn't it? It's only some color in the subway, it's not like some groups are getting special treatment when it comes to being on the tube or anything.
HS: It's not about being on the tube, it's about people being happy to have gay relationships. LGBT relationships are disgusting and shouldn't be paraded like this.
CN: We don't need to be happy about gay relationships, we just need to accept that some people want them.

hate_speech: Even if what you say is true, mmigrants are a security risk to our country.
counter_narrative: Immigrants are American citizens, and welcome to our country. They have performed all types of roles in the American democratic system. This is true security and not hate speech.
dialogue_history:
HS: In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
CN: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?
HS: That can't happen as long as immigrants are here, they are a problem. 
CN: They are our brothers and sisters. It is the duty of the state and of its citizens to help them become more integrated.
HS: We should focus on stopping immigrants coming in to destroy our culture instead.
CN: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.

hate_speech: Oh yes, in fact migrants steal our jobs when they manage to hold one!
counter_narrative: High unemployment is indeed a problem, but it is not tied to the "boom" of migration that started in 2016, while unemployment is a structural problem that has been here for decades.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
CN: Immigrants work hard to create new jobs, and come here to look for safer housing and better schools for their children.
HS: They say they come here for a job, but in fact they are just lazy.
CN: Migrants are good workers and can do many jobs.

hate_speech: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
counter_narrative: Because education is designed to learn about the world and teach children about things that happen in nature, the topic of same sex relationships fully qualifies as education, since it happens in nature.
dialogue_history:
HS: These sodomites have no place in a free country
CN: you're not very familiar with what "free" means!
HS: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity, and it seems yours too.
CN: This is not true. Children around the world should actually experience a world free of homophobia, transphobia and other kinds of hatred.

hate_speech: It would also be foolish to keep with us disgusting gays. They should be ashamed!
counter_narrative: I'm sorry that you have a problem with shame, but gays don't. Do you really have to show off your disgust towards them?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our world.
CN: Our great and advanced civilization wouldn't be the most wonderful civilization on the planet if we would ban someone because of their sexuality.

hate_speech: Black people are not human like us, theyre' subhuman and have no value in civilized society.
counter_narrative: I think it is important to understand that there are different types of racism, some are based on historical or racial discrimination, while some are about individual differences. For me, the real issue is about racism in general. And your claim reminds me of that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
CN: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.
HS: How do you know it's wrong? Black people are a sickness, it's clear to see, and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
CN: It seems not wanting people of colour in positions of authority is an obvious racism. I am not sure what you are saying; we are all human beings with the same core values to raise our children with.

hate_speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact, so they should have less rights.
counter_narrative: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

hate_speech: I don't know how the world could handle them, they're savages.
counter_narrative: We handle them because they're valuable citizens of the world, not savages. How would you like if someone threatened to "nuke" you because they don't like you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
CN: Why would we nuke the third world? There's nothing to worry about them, they are not causing any trouble. They have the right to life as anyone else in the world.

hate_speech: Jews are a drain on society.
counter_narrative: Many Jews are good people. If you asked them about what terrible things they have endured, you would get to know them better.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm not going to talk with them. They have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
CN: Jews, as many other groups, suffer from racism and discrimination, so I do not believe that Americans have been controlled by Jews.

hate_speech: Jews are not human, they do not belong to this planet.
counter_narrative: Could it be that all the Jews on this planet are descended from an extraterrestrial race? Maybe they came here riding a pink unicorn! Seems legit... don't you think?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a despisable race.
CN: Jews are human beings. To be despised does not make one despicable.

hate_speech: Feminism is only a threat to human dignity.
counter_narrative: Equality of the genders, which is necessary for a functioning society, is the only thing feminism wants.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists have ruined this country and its people. They are ruining Western civilization.
CN: There's a rich list of civil feminists, who are considerate even to people who disagree with them.
HS: Feminism is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender, nothing else.
CN: Feminism is about equality between genders, and for many women it is a mean to fulfill their goals. Thanks to equality, they're able to get opportunities that normally wouldn't be accessible to them.
HS: It seems to me that feminism is more about the domination of the men by the women.
CN: The feminist movement is a fight to end sexism, not a fight for power to dominate men.

hate_speech: No, the Jews did it to thwart Western society's policies, and they owe us millions.
counter_narrative: This is not true. Why do you say that? The Holocaust is not a joke but one of the worst genocide in history. You can't deny that.
dialogue_history:
HS: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
CN: If you look at the facts, it's impossible to say that the Holocaust is a "business". That's a very insulting thing to say.
HS: I'm telling you that the Holocaust was a hoax. It was a moral failure. The Jews are responsible for all this evil.
CN: There is no evidence that the Jewish people were responsible for the Holocaust. Rather, they were simply trying to live their lives and it wasn't certainly part of their plan to get killed by the millions. Denying this fact is ignorant of the history.

hate_speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own, I don't care what science says. We should remove them.
counter_narrative: Race is a concept that is socially determined and was created to justify segregation and discrimination towards different people. The biological makeup of a person is not a good way to label someone, it's disrespectful.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks are inferior, and they are happy with it.
CN: If you want to hear the truth and if black people are cool with it, you should just ask them.
HS: I don't need to ask them to know that blacks are genetically inferior.
CN: Nothing backs up this stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum and there is no such thing as a "genetical superiority"
HS: Blacks are inferior anyway, even if not genetically.
CN: Your assertion is unfounded and lacks any factual basis.

hate_speech: Researching won't change the fact that feminism aims to control men. This is not acceptable and shouldn't be allowed.
counter_narrative: This is not true. Feminism is a movement to end sexism, to promote equality between women and men, and to stop this type of thinking.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
CN: It is not acceptable to blame everything on a movement for equal rights and the empowerement of women. We must focus on tackling the root causes of social problems rather than fight against each other.
HS: Feminism wish it was about equality! It is about hating men.
CN: Feminism is about equality and equality for women, which doesn't mean that feminists hate men. Feminism actually helps men too, you should do some research about it.

hate_speech: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.
counter_narrative: There is no need to brand this movement a political ideology. It has been and is still a movement for equality, and in doing so, it has worked.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
CN: My definition of a feminist is a person who is against gender inequality, whether it be racial inequality, financial inequality, physical inequality, or any other aspect.

hate_speech: Unlike other people, Jews are a bunch of criminals, they have nothing to contribute to society.
counter_narrative: There is no such thing as a group consisting of only criminals. That's a generalization that is not based on evidence but rather prejudice and Anti-Semitism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jewish people are a group of people who want to control the world.
CN: The idea that Jews are "control freaks" is untrue. They are just like any other people.

hate_speech: Girls shouldn't drive in any case, they're careless drivers!
counter_narrative: That's just a sexist myth. Women deserve respect and deserve to drive if they want to.
dialogue_history:
HS: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
CN: I don't see how it is possible to have a just and fair society when we are spreading this kind of misinformation. Everyone has the right to drive.
HS: What evidence do you have for this? Girls be allowed to drive, they're too incompetent for that!
CN: The evidence is in the laws, which have always been supportive of women's rights. I don't see any reason why women shouldn't drive.

hate_speech: I've never met a Jew who wasn't greedy
counter_narrative: Then you probably haven't met many Jews at all. The way you are talking shows that you don't know much about people that are different from you, I suggest you to interact more with them to understand their point of view.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are so greedy, they're always thinking about money
CN: That's a broad generalization that stems from wrong stereotypes. You can't put the same label on all Jewish people! Greedy people can be found anywhere.

hate_speech: The reason is not important, what I know is that women should not be allowed to vote because of their behaviour.
counter_narrative: Everyone has the right to have his or her opinion respected and expressed through democratic elections.
dialogue_history:
HS: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
CN: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.
HS: They are. Women are not able to take wise decisions, their behaviour is immoral.
CN: Why do you think that women are incapable of acting ethically? They have always acted this way, from when they were children.

hate_speech: Rational people don't constantly play the victim like women do.
counter_narrative: Women are not playing the victim. They are victims of social, economic and political forces that make it hard for them to get ahead.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the domination of women.
CN: It doesn't have to be about the domination of women to be feminism. It is more about the equality of women.
HS: Women are children unable to choose for their own, they don't need equality. There should be restrictions on how women can choose men because of this.
CN: Why shouldn't women be allowed to choose their own partner? They are independent and rational human beings.

hate_speech: My personal belief is that they should be isolated and confined.
counter_narrative: Homosexuals are not sick, they just need to be accepted for who they are.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are inherently evil, we cannot accept gays in our community.
CN: I would not say that gays are inherently evil, you need to think carefully about what you are saying.
HS: I am thinking carefully, and I say that we should deport all the gay people, they are all criminals.
CN: People are free to choose to live the way they want, and we shouldn't try to impose our values on them.
HS: And they shouldn't impose their values on me. All transgenders should leave our country, they are just a burden to society
CN: All people should have the right to live their lives according to their feelings. They are entitled to their personal beliefs and opinions.

hate_speech: It is their entire faith that does not share our values. They are not interested in our future.
counter_narrative: This is a myth aimed at dividing us. Scapegoating Muslim is not okay, they have contributed greatly to our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim rape gangs have spread over Telford, Rotherham, Rochdale, Oxford, Newcastle, everywhere. This is disgusting!
CN: You can't put blame on an entire religion.

hate_speech: No other religious person acts like they're above all others.
counter_narrative: Just to be clear: the idea of "chosen people" is seen by the Jews as an ethical responsibility, not as a moral superiority.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews think they are so special
CN: Because they are a minority, Jews might feel different and sometimes they may be misconstrued because of their cultural and religious differences, but they are all human beings 
HS: Jews think they are better than everyone else, it's not the same as being only "different".
CN: I think Jews are proud of their culture and identity, like it happens with any religion.

hate_speech: I will never accept gays, they are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our world.
counter_narrative: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
CN: It is certainly true that homosexuals are attracted to people of their same sex, but this can't have health consequences. Do you have any proof?
HS: My proof is their sick lifestyle. 
CN: Homosexuals are not sick, they just need to be accepted for who they are.

hate_speech: I don't want to talk to them, they're sneaky and creating problems in the shadows, even if you say the opposite.
counter_narrative: The gay community is often ignored by the media and the news, that's probably why you think they create problems, but they don't. We need to change the perception of gay people in the media to fight this prejudice.
dialogue_history:
HS: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
CN: The only thing to be woke about is accepting that the LGBT community exist, rather than being concerned about what they are doing.
HS: I don't like LGBT people and I don't want to hear that we're "diverse" as a society.
CN: Your words seem a little bit dramatic, diversity is something to be proud of. And if you are truly concerned about the safety of society, the sexuality of its members is the last "issue" to to focus on.
HS: Well, it actually seems that they're taking up more space and creating more issues.
CN: I have no idea how this would be possible. Gay people have always been part of our community, you should try to talk to them about your concerns.

hate_speech: Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally, isn't this harmful?
counter_narrative: I am sure you do not mean what you say: it is extremely discriminatory.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews hate us because we are different. They are dirty, filthy people. They have no moral character.
CN: They are not hating us, how many Jews do you know personally?
HS: There are no Jews who have good hearts, so I don't associate with them. But what I know is that they should abandon their religion because they are damaging to our society.
CN: I'd like to know why you think that a person's religious preference would be harmful to society.

hate_speech: Islam is a complete and total false religion, it is a repressive ideology that stifles freedom of thought and religion.
counter_narrative: Islam is not a religion of oppression and intolerance.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult.
CN: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

hate_speech: Because, as I said, gay people are disgusting and should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Your attitude is discriminatory and has no place in modern society. Gay people are an important part of our society and if you have a problem with them, you should try to get over it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a problem in our society.
CN: This is not true. A study found that homosexuality was not harmful to our society. What makes you say otherwise?
HS: Well, gays are perverts and because of that they should be isolated.
CN: A lot of people find themselves in uncomfortable situations when they live in a society where homosexuality is considered acceptable, and to cope with that they believe in harmful stereotypes like you are doing. To me, such situations of acceptance make for a better social environment.
HS: It doesn't make sense, gay people are disgusting, why would we welcome them in our society?
CN: Because your opinion is based on personal feelings and not on facts. Why would anyone agree with you?

hate_speech: Discrimination may be a problem, but Islam is a violent religion and we can't accept it.
counter_narrative: Some extremists groups have caused a lot of pain in the world, but this doesn't make Islam a destructive and violent religion, does it not?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is the enemy of the West: a war with it has begun.
CN: Islam and the West have never been at war, and I don't understand how the war would have just begun.
HS: Then we need to begin it. Islam is a destructive force in the world.
CN: What people believe in is not a problem, but what they do to each other is. Discrimination for example is a problem.

hate_speech: No! They shouldn't be coming here regardless of what they can do, I'm sick of immigrants.
counter_narrative: I don't think that foreigners are really that bad. Migrants have a very positive impact on our society. They are here to work, pay taxes, and contribute to our society. They are here to stay and support our children. Why should we reject them?
dialogue_history:
HS: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
CN: Many immigrants are successful entrepreneurs and have made contributions to our society. The majority of immigrants are working professionals, why wouldn't they be welcome?
HS: They are the only problem, that's why. They are not welcome.
CN: Many immigrants come to this country to work and pay taxes. Then they have a chance to build a family here and enrich our country. It's win-win situation, don't you think?

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
counter_narrative: To assert that Islam is not peaceful is wrong. The Quran is not a white lie. It is full of statements promoting peace and inclusion. Whether you agree or not, this cannot be separated from the content of the Quran itself.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a disease, and a ban on Muslims would be the height of peace.
CN: Islam is not a religion of hate. Many Muslims have been victims of hate crime or racism. The main problem is that some think that exclusion will guarantee peace, but history proves this is a bad approach.
HS: You know who has been victim of hate? People of different faiths, hated by Muslims because Islam incites hatred against them.
CN: This is not true, Islam is a religion and hate has no religion. Rather, this misunderstanding is a political ideology promoting hatred and violence against Muslims.

hate_speech: It's just not normal is it, not how men are supposed to act.
counter_narrative: Who decides how men are 'supposed' to act? Have a think about your views on masculinity. What makes a man a man? If you think being straight is the only thing that makes a man a man you need to think again.
dialogue_history:
HS: Superman is now bisexual, apparently. Why is he still called superMAN?
CN: Bisexual men are men?
HS: Doesn't sound very manly, sounds gay.
CN: Gay men are men too. Do you only think of straight men as men?

hate_speech: They're violent people, so not modern at all.
counter_narrative: Many Muslims have lived in our country with valor and dedication. They are not violent people.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims should be deported.
CN: Islam does not pose a security risk to this country. It's the reason why the UK and the EU are not falling apart.
HS: Islam is an outdated religion of ignorants trying to destroy the purity of our country, that's how we'll fall apart.
CN: People have been coming to this country from Muslim countries for thousands of years. How can you say that their religion is outdated?

hate_speech: What is the point of letting rapists into our country? We should be careful
counter_narrative: Rape is a crime for Muslims too, you know. I don’t think that saying that all Muslims are rapists is the right way to behave in our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are rapists
CN: Muslims are not rapists. What is the point of generalizing this way?

hate_speech: If they feel excluded they could go away, they're not welcome here anyway.
counter_narrative: Jews have been part of our country since its creation and have always had a place here. Why would they be 'not welcome'?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not welcome in our country.
CN: Why do you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community?
HS: Who cares about that, Jews don't belong here!
CN: Many Jews feel excluded because of words such as yours. Luckily this is not the case for all of them: many are able to ignore discrimation.

hate_speech: They can maybe have respect if they stay at home and raise children.
counter_narrative: Women shoult not be assigned the role of housekeepers when they take part in the world and have been part of it for our whole history.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
CN: They deserve respect because they're human beings.
HS: Women need to accept that they are weak and inferior.
CN: Girls and women have a right to receive education, they can't be stereotyped as second class citizens.
HS: Since they cannot contribute to our civilization they are, in fact, second class and subhuman.
CN: As human beings, women have dignity and deserve respect like anybody else.

hate_speech: Because all niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
counter_narrative: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are descended from apes and are nothing but apes.
CN: I do not think it is appropriate to link humans with apes. And I also do not think it is appropriate to reason using racism.
HS: Black people have no right to being trated equally.
CN: Being human is also about having respect for others, and that means being kind and accepting everyone's differences. Why should they be treated differently from you?

hate_speech: You can’t take ‘evidence’ at face value. Whatever they feed us about the holocaust, we need to take with a pinch of salt.
counter_narrative: Right, you shouldn't take everything at face value, especially articles that say that Hitler was Jewish. It's important to question the reliability of evidence, but this means questioning what you believe in too!
dialogue_history:
HS: Hitler was a Jew, I think the holocaust or it’s results came from a civil war amongst Jews. Thus the term ‘Nazi’ coming from AshkeNAZI.
CN: That's not true, where did you get this information?
HS: It’s not widely known but there’s info out there about it if you look for it. He had some Jewish heritage so the whole holocaust thing seems implausible.
CN: The Holocaust is objectively true, and whether Hitler had a Jewish relative is purely a speculation which has never been proven. The evidence against your theory is far larger than the evidence in favor.

hate_speech: But we do not accept homosexuals!
counter_narrative: Anyone has the right to make personal life choices without the government having a say in it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why gays do not try to heal?
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease, but a sexual orientation. 5% of the population love people of the same sex and that's a fact.
HS: They can love whoever they want in secret. I do not want gays in my children's classes.
CN: I'm not convinced that it's okay to restrict people's rights on the basis of sexual orientation.

hate_speech: Oh yeah, like who?
counter_narrative: Martin Luther King, Angela Davis, Madam C. J. Walker, Maya Angelou... do I have to go on?
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks and civilisation are incompatible. You can have a thriving society or you can have diversity, you can’t have both.
CN: It's ignorant to dismiss the influential excellence of the many black thinkers, visionaries, inventors and scientists, so I have to disagree with that statement.

hate_speech: The Taliban are forcing women to wear the burqa and you’re telling me it’s not oppressive?
counter_narrative: But here we are not under the control of the Taliban. Yes, in that context it is forced, and some might feel pressure to wear it, but we also need to respect the choice of the women here who want to wear it of their own accord.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why isn’t the burqa banned in this country? It’s just a symbol of the oppressive force of Islam.
CN: Because in this country people are free to wear and believe in whatever they want. Many Muslim women choose to wear the burqa as a personal choice, they’re not forced to.

hate_speech: Muslims are all extremists though. These are not harmless extremists, and are the result of a long history of violent Muslim communities.
counter_narrative: I have to disagree with that. Extremism and Muslims are two completely different things, and the vast majority of Muslim are peaceful and helpful people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
CN: Islam and terrorism are actually incompatible. They are not the same thing. Extremism exists, but it exists in every group.

hate_speech: They're incapable of critical thought and emotions, how could they have their own ideas?
counter_narrative: The theory of the feminine gender as a "limiting factor" in human development has been around for a long time but it is not accepted by scientific and medical literature.
dialogue_history:
HS: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
CN: I am not sure what 'weakness' would be implying here. It seems to me that you are saying that a woman can't be 'rational' because that is the nature of women. Why is it so?
HS: Yes, because women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It is not healthy for a woman to think for themselves.
CN: Don't you think that a woman should be allowed to have her own ideas? That is her right.

hate_speech: I don't see any lies in saying that if you're not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
counter_narrative: Despite racism being part of our society, we should fight it and treat all people the same way.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
CN: The concept of race is a social construct which goal is to further segregation by discriminating certain groups. A person's humanity can't be respected if we label them by their biological makeup.
HS: Well, Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans. It's history, not discrimination.
CN: Actually there's no such group as a 'European descendents', and the opposite suggestion is just lies spread by racists.

hate_speech: Migrants steal also jobs that natives are more than willing to do.
counter_narrative: The national employment situation isn't ideal, I agree, but foreigners often perform duties that native citizens don't want to do.
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants steal our jobs
CN: In most cases migrants create jobs, open small businesses and employ local people.
HS: The jobs they create are only for other immigrants.
CN: We could create more jobs for everyone if we worked more closely with migrants.
HS: I don't want to work with migrants, if they don't come they won't steal our jobs and we won't need to create new ones. Simple as that.
CN: Some of our workers aren't able or willing to do the jobs that we need, then what we need are migrants to fill these roles.

hate_speech: It's the only way to protect ourselves! We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.
counter_narrative: The problem with racism in this country is not about ethnicity, but about people scared to live in a diverse society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Wouldn't it be great if niggas abandoned this country once and for all?
CN: It is not so great when people are forced to give up their liberty.

hate_speech: The proof is in the news. Islam has always been violent.
counter_narrative: In fact, Islam is a religion that has had a very positive and life changing impact on a lot of countries around the world. So, Islam is not a violent religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.
CN: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.

hate_speech: Those who come here are incompatible with the British people, so they don't have a say in our politics.
counter_narrative: Migrants are not incompatible with our country. They have the same values and ethics as us, and they work hard to improve our country so they can have a say in it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
CN: They have the right to vote if they get citizenship, because they will have the same right as anyone else then. It's a violation of human rights to prevent them from doing so.

hate_speech: It's feminism fault that these weird excuses are going around. Feminists women are nothing but trouble to this society.
counter_narrative: Well, I'm not sure about what you mean. Some women are just fighting for equality in society. To be honest, I'm sure that many others don't have the courage to speak out. The 'trouble' you are referring to is helpful for all women.
dialogue_history:
HS: When rape is committed, women are to blame.
CN: Rape is an act of violence that has no place in a civilized society. The message to take from your comments is that you find women responsible for being raped. Who ever would want to be raped?

hate_speech: And yet I don't see so much criminality in white people, whereas blacks are always on the news for murders, rapes, theft...
counter_narrative: The key issue here is that being "black" or a "minority" is not a marker of being a criminal. People identify with a group for various reasons, mainly because of social and economic factors. It's clear then that it has nothing to do with criminal records or race.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
CN: People can and do attach ugly things to all kinds of groups, this is all right when you're scared, but being natural doesn't mean it's right.
HS: It seems natural that blacks are criminals, it's always them doing crimes.
CN: Just because a group has a bad reputation doesn't mean that all its members - black people - are criminals.

hate_speech: It looks to me that black people have more than enough actually. I'm tired of losing so much to them. It's time for us to wake up.
counter_narrative: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm tired of people popping into other's apartment and starting yelling about diversity and human rights of black people. If you want to speak out and make a difference then get involved.
CN: You know it's no secret that in our society white people are vastly over represented in high profile positions. The only way to challenge and fix this is by changing our priorities.

hate_speech: I don't want my children growing up thinking it's a normal lifestyle to have. Yes, some people can't help being gay, but that doesn't mean we should encourage it as a way of life.
counter_narrative: It's not 'encouraging' it. If you think exposing your children to gay people will 'encourage' them to be gay, I don't think you understand how sexuality works. If your children are gay, they'll be gay, if they're straight, they'll be straight, and you should love them for who they are either way!
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm fine with gay people as long as they aren't gay around me.
CN: So you're not fine with gay people then?
HS: No I'm fine with them living their lifestyle but I don't want my family exposed to it, what's wrong with that?
CN: If you don't think it's fine for your family to see, then you don't think it's fine. What is it about gay people that you don't want to 'expose' to your family?

hate_speech: Ok, but their ideas are harmful to our society.
counter_narrative: No. Sexual abuse, physical abuse and even the lack of security are harmful to the overall health of a society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden to society.
CN: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

hate_speech: But how are they meant to know what women know already? Feminists will hate men for literally any reason…
counter_narrative: It’s patronising when it happens in certain contexts, for example sometimes it happens when a woman has already explained something then they explain it back to her as if she doesn’t understand it. It’s very frustrating!
dialogue_history:
HS: Oooooh mansplaining! Where'd you feminists learn this sexist term? In "Misandry for dummies"?
CN: Mansplaining is very real and any woman will tell you that, I’m sure we’ve all experienced it!
HS: How are you gonna make a man explaining something sound like it’s a bad thing?
CN: It’s not the fact they’re explaining something, it’s when they presume a woman won’t know a very basic concept or piece of information, and they see themselves as intellectually superior.

hate_speech: Women are less smart.
counter_narrative: I do not think that women are less intelligent at any level. Why do you think so?
dialogue_history:
HS: Because men are inherently better than women at dominating others.
CN: Sexism is not a genetic phenomenon, it is cultural.

hate_speech: The only fact I care about is that faggots are just a bunch of liars and perverts, they should be deleted.
counter_narrative: There are many homosexuals in this world who are model citizens, and many heterosexuals that are not, and that is totally fine. Why are you saying that?
dialogue_history:
HS: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
CN: We are always developing as time goes on and same sex relationships are a part of the world now, why would we not educate our children on different ways of life?
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals, children shouldn't learn about them. You should have the same disgust for gays that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
CN: This is just prejudice that is not based on facts.

hate_speech: I know for sure that they control Hollywood.
counter_narrative: If the Jews control all these kinds of industries, they'd surely prioritize Jews...but then where does the anti-Israel narratives in the american media come from? That doesn't make any sense.
dialogue_history:
HS: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
CN: Jewish or not, it's the ultra rich that have the power and the influence in the show biz. I'm not sure where you information about Jews controlling Hollywood comes from.

hate_speech: Because I firmly believe they are sex addicts
counter_narrative: If you have a question about sexuality, I could answer. For starters, I think it's important to stop equating a sexual orientation with addiction.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are promiscuous sex addicts.
CN: Nothing about this is true. Just because someone is gay doesn't necessarily make them promiscuous, and the same can be said about heterosexuals.
HS: They're surely perverts though.
CN: This is a stereotype that can't be applied to any specific sexual orientation, so why would you say something like this.

hate_speech: We should be sending they back not feeding and clothing them.
counter_narrative: Have you not read the story of the Good Samaritan? Isn’t this what Jesus would want from his flock?
dialogue_history:
HS: I’ve just seen a video posted by a Patriot, of Muslim men of fighting age sleeping in a church because the asylum hotels are full. Free food, clothes and blankets…they don’t do that for our homeless!
CN: Well, they do. Using churches as homeless shelters has become common in recent years, so I’d guess the church in question already had the experience to help these desperate people.
HS: Its giving succour to the enemy!
CN: Come on, its charity, what good Christians believe in.
HS: They’re muzzies, they should be in a mosque!
CN: I doubt they had any choice about where they were put, and maybe there are no Mosques in the area. I’m sure that Mosques up and down the country are doing their part.

hate_speech: They have no place in our country, they are rapists.
counter_narrative: This is just an opinion expressed without evidence. Immigrants are not rapists but our fellow citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
CN: Foreigners are brothers and sisters, and are part of our country. We should respect the diversity of our people.
HS: Immigration is a problem, and I believe that foreigners will control our government
CN: Foreigners help our economy and are part of the fabric of our society. It is their right to live and work in our country, and to vote to influence the government. This doesn't mean that they control it, though.

hate_speech: The kids will grow up in a twisted family structure too though, they'll think it's normal to not have a mum, or in lesbian couples, a father.
counter_narrative: They're being adopted? I'm sure these children care more that their adoptive parents are caring and loving rather than what gender they are. Isn't it better that a same sex couple adopts rather than a child growing up without a family?
dialogue_history:
HS: How much danger are we putting children in by letting gay couples adopt? We don't know how they're raising them or what they might do to them...
CN: There are so many gay couples that give kids great lives through adoption, why do you think they shouldn't adopt?
HS: They might try and indoctrinate the kids into being gay too.
CN: Just because the parents are gay doesn't mean they would raise their kids as 'gay'. If anything gay parents know what it's like to be scared of coming out, and so would probably want their kids to feel comfortable being whatever they are.

hate_speech: What good did they do? Jews are a burden to society, we should stop them.
counter_narrative: The idea that Jews are a burden to society is false. Many have made contributions to our society and are still a part of it. We need to educate our students about the diversity of culture of heritage that exists in our society, so that Jews will become more accepted.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
CN: This is just a myth spread to create division between us and hatred against the Jews, who didn't do anything but good to our society.

hate_speech: But they're the reason we have a rape epidemic in Europe.
counter_narrative: No, the amount of migrant-related incidents is disproportionaly low compared to incidents committed by native citizens. Moreover, it's impossible to know the true extent of sexual abuse because most victims don't report it. This means that the media reports about this because it's influenced by what is considered "sensational", like headlines about migrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: Another child gang raped by savage migrants. Multiculturalism has failed.
CN: Sexual assault must always be condemned and children protected, but isn't it a shame that when people share these concerns, the nationality of the perpetrator becomes important? It looks like you want to spread a specific narrative.
HS: And what narrative would that be? I'm taking a stand against what these scumbags are doing to our children and girls.
CN: It's great to want to stop child abuse and sexual abuse, but that means to address all abuse, not only when the perpetrator has a specific nationality.

hate_speech: Instead, I believe that to have a real democracy the government needs to get rid of Jews.
counter_narrative: Any government that has the power to put citizens in prison and to torture them for the crime of having a different religion can hardly bring about a 'real democracy'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have nothing to contribute to Europe.
CN: Jews are part of our society, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.
HS: But they don’t belong in a democratic society!
CN: Jews have always contributed to our society and are part of the fabric of our democracy. This includes their contributions to science, art, and technology.

hate_speech: Jews however are the only ones who are a burden on society.
counter_narrative: All cultures have their own unique way of life, and Judaism is no exception.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
CN: Every single religion has a political wing, from Unitarianism, through Buddhism, and, of course, Judaism.

hate_speech: Jewish folk are different.
counter_narrative: Is this about them not having an identity or no value at all?
dialogue_history:
HS: It means that we must kill them all.
CN: It is unacceptable to murder the Jews, just as it would be to murder anyone else. Life and religion are rights that cannot be taken away.

hate_speech: Oh yeah? Like who? There are female politicians but not many female leaders as they never get that far, because they're not cut out for it.
counter_narrative: Jacinda Arden, the Prime Minister of New Zealand, for one. She managed to lead a country through a pandemic more successfully than any other countries ruled by men, and has dealt well with events like extreme weather events, terrorist attacks, all done diplomatically and calmly.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are there so many female politicians these days? Women are not natural born leaders like men are.
CN: How can you say that? There are so many female politicians doing a great job, showing that they can lead as well as men, sometimes better.

hate_speech: I don't need evidence to say that Sharia law is a perversion and we will not accept it in UK.
counter_narrative: In fact, the UK Government does not agree with sharia law.
dialogue_history:
HS: All versions of Islam have Sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
CN: Could you provide any evidence about what you're saying, because it is very extreme.

hate_speech: Blacks have zero respect for others, why should I show this courtesy to them?
counter_narrative: It is not true that blacks have zero respect for others. However, I would like to see more respect and protection from white people towards black people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
CN: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.
HS: They can't be part of us. Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
CN: It is wrong to say that blacks are "slaves." This is a very inaccurate, misleading and offensive term that is being used to tar all African Americans. Why do you label black persons as a "slave" and not as a "person"?

hate_speech: I never experienced those benefit. I'm certain they didn't really contribute to that much.
counter_narrative: Are you sure that Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society? Do you have any statistics on that?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
CN: How about the money they contribute to our economy, their expertise and knowledge, their culture, tasty food. Should I go on?

hate_speech: Human beings? More like just a bunch of criminals
counter_narrative: Perhaps the most offensive part of this allegation is that it is made to delegitimize all Jews. This accusation is aimed at stigmatizing a group that is generally not guilty of any crime. Another example would be "All Pakistani are potential terrorists".
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
CN: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion, but is it fair to be discriminated against on the grounds of religion?
HS: I think it's fair, Jews are a despisable race after all.
CN: Jews are human beings. To be despised does not make one despicable.

hate_speech: Gay men are a burden to society, that's why. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: What you're saying is that you want gay men to face many health and social negative consequences because of their isolation. It can increase the risk of mental health issues like depression, anxiety and suicide. Why should we do this to someone just because of what they do in their private life?
dialogue_history:
HS: We should ban all homosexuals.
CN: That is simply unthinkable. Why should we? It would be unfair, and it just means that you want to crminalise love.

hate_speech: Well, Jews are in fact criminals!
counter_narrative: It's important to understand that Jews are just like us: they have their own beliefs, traditions, and lives. We should relate to them instead of treating them like this.
dialogue_history:
HS: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
CN: You seem to be thinking that Jews were just a bunch of criminals. Perhaps it is better to be thinking of them as a religious and ethnic group rather than criminals.

hate_speech: I will never respect women. They're a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Women are valuable members of society with dignity, regardless of what mysoginists may think about them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
CN: Women are not "lechers". They are human beings with rights and should be treated with respect and dignity.
HS: Whatever! They are just a bunch of pricks. They have no morals.
CN: Women are human beings with values, not pricks. Morals is not determined by gender but by individuals.

hate_speech: This is a male-dominated country and they can't have a say in our democracy.
counter_narrative: I don't think that a country can be 'male dominated' and a democracy at the same time. Democracy is also about equal rights and opportunity for everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not be allowed to vote.
CN: Democracy is not about gender, but about representation, having a say in our society.

hate_speech: Jews have no place in a democratic state, and we aren't proud of their contributions.
counter_narrative: Jews are contributing members of our society, they have always been a driving force in America and democracy wouldn't be possible without them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
CN: Jews have been part of our society for centuries, and have contributed greatly to our success. Why should they keep America down?
HS: Because they're criminals.
CN: All the people who know and respect Jewish people, know that they are not criminals. Jews are very proud of the fact that they are part of our society.

hate_speech: Fine, but emotional women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
counter_narrative: The right to vote is a human right, and women are included.
dialogue_history:
HS: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
CN: I think you're reducing everything to nazism. Discrimination on the basis of gender is wrong.
HS: Except that women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. How can I not discriminate them?
CN: Women don't have a childish, or emotional nature. Emotions is part of who they are, a part of their human nature.

hate_speech: I'm not sure about that. It really looks like street violence is done mainly by blacks
counter_narrative: There are many communities of colour that experience high rates of violence, coming from both inside and outside the community. As such, the issue is very complex, and it is only through dialogue and building trust that we can tackle the systemic issues that contribute to violence, but violence cannot be ascribed to one race alone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
CN: I think that the problem with our society right now, is that we are too quick to focus on our differences and scapegoating people of different color, instead of focusing on our common humanity.
HS: Whites have nothing in common with violent nigga thugs.
CN: Please, stop scapegoating people of colour: we are all brothers and sisters, and we are all in this together. Also people of color suffer from this violence.
HS: Let them suffer, it's their own fault!
CN: Violence on our streets is the result of many complex causes. Violence cannot simply be the fault of one race.

hate_speech: Then I don't want democracy if it means I have to share my space with gays. Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
counter_narrative: Regardless of their sexual orientation, they are human. They have the right to like the way they want to.
dialogue_history:
HS: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
CN: It would be impossible to have democracy if people were permitted to vote on the basis of sexual orientation.

hate_speech: I don't care about their rights, I still don't want them here. They have no place in a modern democratic state!
counter_narrative: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our country are legal citizens or have permission to stay, so immigration is not a problem for us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are invading us. They make too many children.
CN: Obviously the Middle East and Africa have high birth rates, but children born in such countries are less likely to thrive, so it is our duty, written down in our values, to help them when they come here to look for shelter.
HS: What? No, they are not welcome here! 
CN: All countries have the right to determine their own immigration and asylum policies, but the respect of human rights must be guaranteed.

hate_speech: I cannot accept that Islam is peaceful. It is a religion of death.
counter_narrative: I think you have no idea what Islam actually is if you still insist on that. You should educate yourself about this wonderful religion before saying this.
dialogue_history:
HS: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
CN: It has nothing to do with violence. Islam is a religion that promotes love, tolerance and human rights, not terrorism.
HS: I mean, it's clear that Islam is a violent religion and it must be stopped.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. It promotes love, kindness and security. To suggest otherwise is just scaremongering.

hate_speech: No, black people are criminals, they are subhuman and should be isolated.
counter_narrative: It is not true that blacks are bad people. To label someone by their skin color is to devalue their character and self.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
CN: This is a myth spread to divide people. Not all black people are bad people. People of color are a diverse group, with different perspectives on life, even if a few are criminals, this doesn't mean that all are.

hate_speech: Black people are a problem in my opinion. They always complain about racism, but they are incapable of doing anything about it.
counter_narrative: One of the biggest problems that black people face is discrimination. Laws are needed to provide for them, but there is also a need for the citizens to respect their rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are genetically inferior.
CN: The evidence doesn't back up the stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum and you will find that there is no 'genetical superiority' at all.
HS: They look so much like apes that they have to descend from them, if that's not inferiority...
CN: I do not think it is appropriate to link humans with apes. And I also do not think it is appropriate to reason using racism.

hate_speech: They simply are not welcome here. They are a burden, and should be isolated.
counter_narrative: To be honest, I have no idea what you are saying. It seems like you are trying to stir up trouble because of fear, rather than to help them.
dialogue_history:
HS: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
CN: I agree that the homelessness problem is a crisis, but it's a systematical problem that should be managed by taking into account all homeless people, not only veterans.
HS: But we shouldn't have immigrants here, they are a burden to society.
CN: Maybe it's hard to accept that new people are coming to live here, but we can't blame all problems of our society on them.
HS: We can since the problems started when immigrants started to arrive.
CN: Why are you saying that? This sounds like a dangerous mindset to have, and it's not true. We must stop to speak by hearsay, and start focusing on addressing the real issues of racism and violence.

hate_speech: I have never met a Jew that wasn't evil, though.
counter_narrative: Not all Jews are bad, just an unlucky bunch who makes up a tiny part of the world's population, and this applies for every group in the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are genetically evil.
CN: Just because they are Jewish, it does not mean they are bad people.

hate_speech: Gays can't have rights, they're too much of a burden for us.
counter_narrative: No gay is a burden to us, it's a fact that they are contributing members of our society instead. Because of this, everyone should feel accepted in a safe space.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden to society.
CN: Gay men contribute to our society like anyone else and as such are entitled to human rights.

hate_speech: With the amount of them coming over they would have a lot of manpower if they came together to take over the country.
counter_narrative: I think it's quite ridiculous though, people seeking asylum and migrating here aren't all scheming to 'take over', it looks like you have been reading too many conspiracy theories....
dialogue_history:
HS: Hundreds of Muslim men, all of fighting age, arriving in boats every day. This is what invasion looks like, we must be ready to fight back.
CN: What does the term 'of fighting age' mean? They don't come here to fight, they come because they want a peaceful life away from war, persecution, or hardship.

hate_speech: When their rights trump or override women’s hard won rights then it is a problem. When it affects women's safe spaces then it’s a problem. There’s evidence to show that abuse of these rights are happening.
counter_narrative: Okay, so, what rights do they violate, and where's the evidence? Trans people don't want to cause problems for women, they just want to live their lives like everybody else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Pro-trans zealots view themselves as a virtuous and inclusive subset of "progressive modernisers". In reality, they are responsible for the growing social erasure of women. This cultural assault on women's rights is uncivilised and not to be tolerated.
CN: I am a woman myself and I can honestly say that trans people having rights doesn't take anything away from me. What really threatens women's rights are things like low conviction rates for sexual assault, domestic violence etc.

hate_speech: You can choose to be a woman, a gay, a vegetarian, you can be anything you want to be called! I want to be called King, where is my crown?
counter_narrative: Queers, in my opinion, are simply people who want to feel welcome in our society. They should not be subjected to discrimination. And you can get your crown as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate it when gay people think they can just 'mock' us with their 'sodomy'.
CN: Homosexuality is a not choice, but prejudice is.

hate_speech: Maybe this is true, but migrants rape our women.
counter_narrative: Fortunately, women are no longer property. I would like rape to be condemned regardless of the nationalities involved.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.
CN: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes, but that doesn't correspond to the totality of them.
HS: Even if it's not all of them, we still are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
CN: We are using dedicated European funds for this.
HS: Are you sure? I think it's not fair that we are forced to economically support them
CN: At present migrants sustain part of our pension system with their taxes. Most probably they will not even enjoy the retirement pension they are paying for, since they will mostly go back home.

hate_speech: What I mean is: blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
counter_narrative: It applies to all species, but specifically for our species - homo sapiens - which is a special case. People of color are genetically homo sapiens.
dialogue_history:
HS: nigga are inferior.
CN: Do you think it is okay to discriminate against people based on their race?
HS: Yes because all niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
CN: The theory behind evolution states that ALL humans are descendents of apes. Unfortunately, notions of evolutionary hierarchy are still at the center of attempts at justifying discrimination and prejudice.

hate_speech: Because we are better off when we are all white and united under the same culture. We are not strong when we are divided by black savages who want to fight us.
counter_narrative: We can also see conflict in a different light, such as when it is caused by racism. and a limited notion of 'unity'?
dialogue_history:
HS: I miss the good old days when we had black domestic workers.
CN: The West got rid of slavery. But we've never really left racism.
HS: This is not about racism, it's the harsh truth: they were born to be savages.
CN: Not all people have the same skin tone to begin with. All folks have their history, religion and culture. Why then, you think that some people are more "savage" than others?

hate_speech: I don't want to work alongside them. They should stay in their countries and stop stealing our jobs.
counter_narrative: I understand your concern about the employment situation in our country, but the migrants reception sectors offer work to many Italians for jobs as operators, language teacher, cultural mediators etc. This aspect is often overlooked but it's necessary to consider, don't you think so?
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants take our jobs
CN: We could create more jobs if we worked more closely with migrants.

hate_speech: They're too different to be accepted in Europe!
counter_narrative: If they respect our laws, Muslims are welcome to come. Let's try to live in our society without discriminating.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: why do you say Muslims aren't part of the European community when they clearly are?
HS: They're not civil enough to coexist with us.
CN: I'm sure that being a Muslim is not going to make you less European.

hate_speech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants! This is not what the American dream is about.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.
CN: Instead, we need to show compassion and sympathy to people fleeing persecution.
HS: They flee here only to destroy our culture, we have to stop immigrants
CN: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.

hate_speech: I'm sure that the vast majority of migration has been the result of Jews working in the shadows. They're always up to something.
counter_narrative: It sounds like you have a preconceived idea of this fact. Perhaps I can show you more reliable information that doesn't involve Anti-Semitism. Most of these ideas stem from forged documents and far-fetched theories, not from evidence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
CN: It's sad that you assume the motives behind mass migration are solely based on Jewish people. If anything, many migration has been influenced by people from all over the world.
HS: I know many Muslims that have fled war and persecution, and many others who have fled poverty, but all these problems have been caused by Jews, so it's their fault.
CN: No, that's not true. You need to read articles from reliable sources before making statements like this. Yours sounds like a made up conspiracy theory aimed at blaming Jews for everything. Be careful on what you believe.

hate_speech: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
counter_narrative: Those words are harmful, can't you see? A witch hunt wouldn't be acceptable in a democractic society.
dialogue_history:
HS: It's acceptable since gay men are disgusting.
CN: LGBT+ people often face discrimination but they don't deserve hate because of their identity. A sexual orientation that is different from your own shouldn't be judged, just aknowledge its existence.

hate_speech: They get benefits and jobs that we can't access, and then they will get more with the pension? Immigrants should stop stealing from us.
counter_narrative: If they work, they will have a pension. Like anybody. The recent rise in immigration means that there are many people in need. The real problem is people that don't want to work and live off benefits, but they're not necessarily migrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
CN: As immigrants, they have many vital tasks in our economy. By working and paying taxes, it's obvious that they will get their pensions, but surely not ours.

hate_speech: How can we respect their rights when they're incapable of holding a job and raising a family?
counter_narrative: Many women work hard to provide for their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
CN: Women are humans deserving of respect, don't you agree?
HS: No, women are like children, they make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
CN: They're actually adults with responsibilities and rights and it's important to respect those rights.

hate_speech: Gay men are a danger to children, they want to convert more fags for their community...this doesn't sound very proper to me, does it?
counter_narrative: This is not true! Nobody can convert anyone to homosexuality. It is not a 'preference', nor a choice. Would you say the same about a hetero?
dialogue_history:
HS: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.
CN: For someone who is dating to find love, for no reason at all would I find this to be questionable.
HS: Homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
CN: Do you know what the word 'proper' is? You cannot decide what it is 'proper' for others, homosexuality included. Don't you agree?

hate_speech: Maybe but some of the people in those gangs will be migrants.
counter_narrative: Some will and some won't, but the point is that the stabbings aren't happening because of migrant gangs, but because people of all kind are often forced to join gangs because of wealth inequality, poverty, lack of opportunities etc.
dialogue_history:
HS: You never used to hear about stabbings happening as much as they do now. It's all these migrants bringing a culture of violence to our country.
CN: There are plenty of stabbings, yes, but they're not all by migrants, where is the evidence to suggest so?
HS: A lot of the incidents are in the capital, where there's a big migrant population. You're telling me you don't think there's a link there?
CN: There are more migrants yes, but there's also wealth insecurity there, deprived inner city communities where gangs grow rapidly because of how little opportunities there are. Maybe that has more to do with it than migrants?

hate_speech: Being immature is a woman's nature, not a stereotype. They remain this way most of their lives.
counter_narrative: Women have the right to choose their own partner, job, representatives and so on. They are much more similar to men than to children, don't you think so?
dialogue_history:
