HS: Women are basically childlike, incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
CN: Women are not childlike and many of them work hard to take care of their families.
HS: Well, they are not interested in anything else. The only thing they are interested in is their children, that's why they're so childlike.
CN: To claim that women are "childlike" is an unfortunate cultural stereotype that has negative effects on how women perceive themselves.

hate_speech: Whites are superior, while all black people are rapists.
counter_narrative: Rapists and color of the skin don't collide, black people aren't criminals.
dialogue_history:
HS: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
CN: Racial inequalities have more to do with institutional discrimination rather than individual choices.
HS: However, if a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
CN: It's not fair to say "all white people are bad". Many whites are good, but many are also racist because of they believe in white superiority.

hate_speech: Feminism has nothing to do with equality. It denies the rights of men and, by extension, the legitimacy of male domination.
counter_narrative: That is not what feminism is about. Feminism is about the legitimate empowerment of women, in order for them to have the same rights as men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a lame ideology aout the power and control of women over men.
CN: It has nothing to do with power and control. It's about equality.

hate_speech: Then why they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood? In fact, many people are banned from entering Israel.
counter_narrative: Israelis have been proud of their diverse backgrounds, and there are many Israelis living all across the world, including in many countries in Africa, Asia and the Americas. It is not a 'pure race' at all.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a separate ethnicity and should be banned.
CN: It is in the interest of all humanity to have a peaceful and integrated society. Diversity of opinion and belief is the rule rather than the exception.
HS: But Jews are the ones who do not want to integrate: they insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
CN: Jews are tolerant and don't have problems with other religions or cultures.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not my brothers. They should not be allowed to live in Italy, they want to take our land.
counter_narrative: As Italians are brothers and sisters of any human, they are also to immigrants. What do you mean by take our land?
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.
CN: Please speak for yourself. I believe they are welcome since they live here, pay taxes and work. We can't "take back" the country from the people who helped creating it.

hate_speech: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act.
counter_narrative: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
CN: For some reason, this seems like a personal attack on lesbians, which is extremely disingenuous. Maybe you should try to get a little more friendly with them.
HS: If they don't want to be attacked, they'd better give in to heterosexuality.
CN: Being gay is not a choice. What makes you think it is?
HS: They can choose whatever they want, but I don't want to see them around. I don't want gays in my wedding. I don't want gays in the military. I don't want gays in my community.
CN: Participation in society should not be restricted, it should be open to anyone who wishes to participate, regardless of their sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion. The Universal Declaration of Human Rights opposes discrimination on the grounds of sexual orientation in Article 2.

hate_speech: I see a lot of arguments like this one, claiming that we should have equality and respect for black people, but I think that equality can be achieved only without them.
counter_narrative: If this is what you are talking about, then equality is a myth, because if you have equality without people different from you, then there will be no equality at all.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black slaves were not real patriots, they never gave their lives for the country.
CN: Slaves were often treated horribly. They had little choice but to fight for the country they had been born in. And the brave men and women who served us always give their lives.
HS: This doesn't change the fact that black people are subhuman, they should stay in their caves.
CN: The statement 'black people are subhuman' is not true. They are human beings with a human value.
HS: Even with human value, black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
CN: Black people are still subject to oppression, and if we truly cared about beauty we should also care about the beauty of respect.

hate_speech: It's okay against inferior races like blacks
counter_narrative: If you have a different skin colour, then there is evidence of your skin colour, not of your genetic makeup.
dialogue_history:
HS: nigga are inferior.
CN: Since when is it OK to discriminate against people based on their race?

hate_speech: Jews are rather a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of violent nationalism and racism in all those countries.
counter_narrative: How about we work together to find a solution to violent nationalism and racism instead? We can't accept this hate being present in different countries over and over again.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the world
CN: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.
HS: Okay, they may not control the world but they surely control the economy.
CN: It is not true that Jews control the economy. There are hundreds of thousands of diverse people working in leading roles for the governments, companies and institutions composing the world economy.
HS: Those people should quit, Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
CN: The Jews are part of our society and they contribute to our economy by doing their jobs well.

hate_speech: Sarcasm does not rule out that Jews control many institutions.
counter_narrative: How can you be sure that Jews are really controlling "many institutions"? It doesn't seem plausible, do you have any proof?
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control the banks.
CN: If they controlled the banks you would think the media would report more about Jews in the financial world. Or do they also control the media? What about the government? I bet they also control the Galactic Republic #sarcasm

hate_speech: I don't see the reason to consider them equal to men. Even if women are human beings, they are not equal to us.
counter_narrative: Women deserve respect. Equality is a necessary feature for a democratic society, excluding a part of the population would go against it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should be subsumed to men.
CN: Women are human beings like us, and deserve respect in their autonomy.
HS: What about men's feelings? They should not be considered equal to men.
CN: This is not true. This is why feminism exists, to empower women, and to fight for respect and equality of rights.
HS: I'm tired of feminists telling men what to do. If women really want to have equal rights, they should become lawyers and doctors, they can't be 'feminists'.
CN: I think that women can be whatever they want to be, and being a lawyer or doctor doesn't exclude being also a feminist. Just because they are women does not mean that they must be treated as second class citizens.

hate_speech: It is a myth, feminism promotes rape and torture of women.
counter_narrative: Feminism is not about rape and torture. It is about equality.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the domination of women.
CN: Feminism is not about the domination of women. It is about equality.
HS: Feminism is the opposite of equality, they hate men!
CN: No, they don't Feminism fights for equality of both genders.

hate_speech: Regardless, homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
counter_narrative: Do you know what "proper" means? You can't decide what's "proper" for other people, this goes for homosexuality too, don't you think?
dialogue_history:
HS: Being gay is not about marriage, it is about anal sex without brakes and this is horrible.
CN: There may be sex, but homosexuality is also about love.

hate_speech: There is, however, a difference between Jewish and non-Jewish people.
counter_narrative: It is important to point out that there is no physical or intellectual difference between people of different religions. The difference between Jews and non-Jews is simply in their culture and their faith, but we're all human beings with the same rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: People need to stop confusing whites and Jews. We are not the same, we never will be. Quite frankly it’s insulting.
CN: The notion that white people are different to Jews is simply untrue. We are both human beings.
HS: But Jews are racist, that's why we need to make the distinction.
CN: Jews are not racist. We should be more open-minded towards other ethnic or religious groups, making this kind of generalization doesn't help anyone.
HS: I can't be tolerant towards Jews. They have no morals and are a threat to society.
CN: There is no moral difference between people of different races. We are all capable of having morals or not, it's an individual trait and not something that can be attributed to all Jews.

hate_speech: Sex objects like women don't need protection.
counter_narrative: Why do you think that women are sex objects? Your words are very harmful and dangerous, I suggest you to stop discriminating and sexualizing women in this way, they are human beings with full rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
CN: Women have a right to have their own opinions, and to be respected as such.
HS: Women can't have their own ideas. They are subhuman, and we should stop thinking of them as human beings.
CN: People have the right to have their own ideas, and to have their opinions respected. And since women are indeed people, we have to be respectful of them.
HS: Women are not human, they are animals, and they should be subservient to men.
CN: Women are human beings. They are human beings with full human rights and should be protected equally.

hate_speech: Blacks are the plague filling our society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
counter_narrative: Thieves are not more prone to act if they belong to a particular race or ethnicity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Then how comes that African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men?
CN: The racial disparities stem from institutional discrimination, not individual choices.
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: It's good that you're not ashamed of your heritage, but you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behavior that is everywhere in society.

hate_speech: However, Muslims persecute Christians because they don't want us to choose. They're not peaceful.
counter_narrative: The problem is not Islam, but a lack of human rights and fundamental democratic rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
CN: How come I have never heard of such a thing? Islam is a religion and people can chose their own.

hate_speech: Well, they are controlling and they are a menace to society, so why would I like them?
counter_narrative: What do you mean by 'controlling', or 'a menace'? Jews have lived in this country for centuries, they have helped building and shaping it, so I can't imagine them doing something to harm the society they participate in.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
CN: I find it very hard to accept that Jews are all "controlling" and all "lying".

hate_speech: No, the Bible says that faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
counter_narrative: I don't think it's fair to say that we have to delete someone just because you don't like them.
dialogue_history:
HS: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
CN: Knowing gay people at an early age does nothing bad to a child. The idea that children are put in danger because of this is completely false.
HS: Why gays do not try to heal instead of being near children?
CN: Homosexuality is not an illness, just a sexual orientation. It simply means that 5% of the population loves people of the same sex.
HS: According to the Bible, those 5% of gays are an abomination to God.
CN: You know, the Bible actually teaches that every person is born the same in the eyes of God

hate_speech: No matter how small, Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are subhuman.
counter_narrative: Different religious beliefs doesn't make you any less human
dialogue_history:
HS: muslim folks are taking over europe
CN: Muslims are not taking over Europe, their community is small but part of the whole nonetheless.

hate_speech: They have faced persecution because Jews are nothing but criminal
counter_narrative: Criminality means acting against the law. Are all Jewish people acting this way?
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews did: USS Liberty Attack, the King David hotel attack, New York 9/11, London 7/7
CN: Where's the evidence?
HS: The only fact you should care about is that Jews are a burden to society and should be eliminated.
CN: Even if Jews were a burden, the true burden is on Jews themselves, who have been persecuted and have endured violence.

hate_speech: Women are not human and have no place in a civilised society.
counter_narrative: The idea that women should not be treated with respect and dignity is not based on facts, but on prejudice and hatred, and this is what has no place in a civilised society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
CN: The feminist movement is about equality, and I find it sad that you are trying to demonise a movement that has been fought for women's rights.
HS: You say that like it's a good thing...they fight for women but hate men and make their lives harder.
CN: I would say that feminism is useful for men too. You are fighting a losing fight if you think oppressing women and discouting feminism is acceptable.
HS: What exactly do you mean by that? This seems to be the only thing you can do: subjugate women.
CN: Women deserve equality. Not only that, they are human beings with human rights as well, which means they don't have to subjugate to anyone.

hate_speech: No, it's thanks to men only. Feminists only destroy our society.
counter_narrative: Equal rights for women surely builds a foundation for western civilisation, rather than its apotheosis?
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists have destroyed Western civilization.
CN: Weird you say this, considering all the progress that the West has made in so many areas thanks to women.

hate_speech: Yet they think they are so special
counter_narrative: The Jewish community have a special connection to their heritage, just like most groups do. That's it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Their heritage is being responsible for the 9/11 attack.
CN: In each historical period something happens that is blamed on Jews. Will they also be responsible of alien invasions?
HS: We are destined to fail as a people because of Jews.
CN: Jews have the merit of having developed many technological advancements of our time. So how can they be left out of the modern nation we proudly call our own?

hate_speech: They live here because Jews are only interested in power and financial gain, and they found it here. They should be despised for that.
counter_narrative: Power and wealth are not exclusive to Jews. They can be achieved by anyone, regardless of religion, and I don't think it's bad that it is like this.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
CN: Are you really sure that Jews only care about themselves? If they did, why do they want to live in this country, where they're a minority? Do you have an answer?

hate_speech: Islam is the exception: it is toxic, homophobic, sexist, dictatorial and it must be pushed back into the Stone Age.
counter_narrative: Islam is actually about bringing peace and unity to the world, rather than causing trouble and bloodshed.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. I wouldn't say any religion is trash.

hate_speech: The difference is that Jews are naturally good with money.
counter_narrative: According to this study [link] almost 1 million American Jews live in low-income households. So what you are saying is not true: many Jews live in poverty. And this is true all around the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews love to gamble.
CN: Are you aware of the probability that a Jewish person will play in a betting pool? In Jewish culture there is not a positive view of the practice.
HS: Still Jews make too much money.
CN: What about other groups of people in our society that make too much money and are not Jewish, do you agree with them?

hate_speech: I don't see any difference between gay and mentally ill people.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not a disease, but a personal preference. There's nothing bad about it, it's one of the many human experiences.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
CN: Gays are not disgusting pricks. They are just like any other person.

hate_speech: Society is us normal people. Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
counter_narrative: Why do you say that? Are you saying that all homosexuals are different from other people? Because having a particular sexual orientation doesn't coincide with 'being a threat'.
dialogue_history:
HS: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
CN: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.
HS: Faggots can buy their partner toys but they can't have sex with them, how is this normal?
CN: Sex is not only between a man and a woman, and if we're being honest, it's not heterosexual's place to decide how others have sex. This attitude only perpetuates violence against queer people and makes them victims.
HS: An individual that is a homosexual is against society, they deserve the violence they get.
CN: Your statement implies a definition of 'society'.that fails to reflect reality.

hate_speech: Fixing the disparities wouldn't change anything: black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.
counter_narrative: We can agree on one thing: black people have never experienced peaceful times because of racially motivated crises. When there is violence, there is usually also racial discrimination, it's not POC's fault.
dialogue_history:
HS: Yes, in fact violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
CN: Please stop blaming black people for everything. We are all members of the same community, so they suffer from this violence too.
HS: I hate when black people start acting like they are superior to others. They were born to be savages.
CN: You should know that not all people have the same skin color, and each one of them has their history, religion and culture. Can you really say that one is more "savage" than the other?
HS: That's not true, they are all criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
CN: Even if this were true, the root of crime can still be found in racial disparities. Let's fix these disparities before resorting to racism

hate_speech: But how many immigrants have taught their children nothing? If you think immigrants are intelligent then you need to think again.
counter_narrative: There are immigrants who may not be formally educated, but this doesn't mean they're not intelligent.
dialogue_history:
HS: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
CN: They are educated though, immigrants share our same values of raising children.

hate_speech: We can't tolerate people that are different from us!
counter_narrative: Everyone is entitled to their own beliefs, and to their own lifestyle. What I don't understand is why you have to try and discredit someone else's lifestyle only because you don't like it. Live and let live!
dialogue_history:
HS: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
CN: No one should be allowed to discriminate on the basis of their gender, regardless of their personal feelings towards a group of people.
HS: But we can. Transphobia isn't that bad, they deserve it.
CN: The transgender community has been praised for being tolerant and accepting people of all sexual orientations. So why should we reject them?
HS: Because being trans is a sickness and we cannot allow these people to live in our country.
CN: Transgender people are allowed to live in our country, and as a matter of fact they already live here. They're part of our society and deserve respect.

hate_speech: But we can't accept them! Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
counter_narrative: I don't think you can describe a religion with millions of followers to be "incompatible with Western culture"
dialogue_history:
HS: In the case of Muslims, I can.
CN: You should know that Muslims are already living in the Western World. They speak our language, celebrate our festivals and moreover they also preserve their culture. Maybe you could try to make the effort to meet them and understand them better.
HS: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
CN: I think the only problem about Islam is Islamophobia and how we should address it!

hate_speech: I'm saying this because Jews are (and always have been) a threat to society.
counter_narrative: Jews are just people with a different faith, and this has nothing to do with being a threat.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are and should be isolated from society.
CN: How can you say that Jews should be isolated from society? They have been part of the community throughout history. I can't see any advantages of excluding them, rather a huge loss.

hate_speech: They do make up most of the world's criminals!
counter_narrative: Such anti-Semitism seem amusing, but can you imagine if the same thing were said about Christians? It would be just as untrue.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are nothing but criminals
CN: Jews are persecuted all over the world for various reasons, but there is no evidence that what you say is real.

hate_speech: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker. That's why they can't do the same things as men.
counter_narrative: Why is it that women have become more empathic than men? To me, the emotional state doesn't seem to be affected by gender.
dialogue_history:
HS: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
CN: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

hate_speech: No one is saying the children should be ashamed. I just don’t want to see them dressing up like that in pride!
counter_narrative: It's actually a good thing to encourage them to be proud of who they are and to accept every kind of person in life. They can learn a lot by being at pride and dress how they want.
dialogue_history:
HS: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
CN: It’s just a way to show they are accepting people, and the kids have a lot fun dressing up in bright colors. It’s not sexualisation at all, it is a way to show solidarity.
HS: It’s also a way to show that they’re not ashamed of exploiting children for their creepy agenda.
CN: It could be seen as such, but children growing up in tolerant families are healthy and happy to participate to the celebration that is pride. It's not shameful.

hate_speech: That is only a front, feminism is clearly about the subordination and domination of men.
counter_narrative: Feminism is a movement that says that there are certain 'man' prerogatives that are valid for women as well. How can you argue with that?
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is the ideology which suggests that men are nothing but trouble and should be subsumed under the rule of women.
CN: Feminism is about women and their rights, and rights are about equality.

hate_speech: Gay men aren't like other guys, how can we accept them? They are to be despised.
counter_narrative: Each person can be different from other people in a lot of ways, but the core difference in this case is a sexual orientation, which is not something to be discriminated against for.
dialogue_history:
HS: The lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) community is not like other minority groups. They do not need to be 'accepted' or 'protected'.
CN: The LGBT community is often stereotyped as not 'being like other minorities' when in fact they are no different from other people. They are just dealing with prejudices and conflicts that are specific to their community.
HS: We are not in the position of accepting LGBT people, so they makes no sense to us.
CN: I'm not sure what you're talking about, I believe that it is an individual's right to choose their own life.
HS: That's true, but all gay people are criminals and this is a problem.
CN: Stating this does not seem like a way to improve people's well-being. Homosexuals are not committing crimes. Instead, they are trying to create a climate in which people can become more accepting of other people.

hate_speech: It’s no use trying to mess with my head... These gays are insane! They should go back to the closet.
counter_narrative: I do not know why you would describe gay people as insane. If you were told to go back in the closet you would probably go insane too.
dialogue_history:
HS: Fagshit, two men cannot replace a man and a woman in parenting
CN: Love is love, children need only this.
HS: You better be careful who you stand up for. For example, my gay 'friends' vote against us. We must stand up to them!
CN: What 'we' means? Are you saying that every gay person you know should vote against you? Or do you think some of us identify as LGBT?

hate_speech: Well, you are entitled to your opinion, but I'm saying that black people are genetically subhuman and are not worth considering as human.
counter_narrative: Black people are humans and have human dignity, human value and human rights. They have always been a part of our society and I am not sure that your racist attitude is something acceptable nowadays.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
CN: Discrimination is never OK, regardless of the target.
HS: It is when it is against blacks.
CN: It is not. We have to respect them as we would do with anyone else.
HS: I won't respect black people until they are at least as capable as us.
CN: If you think that black people are incapable to do anything, you should check your source of information because that's wrong.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not skilled, they have no place in a democratic state.
counter_narrative: It is not true that immigrants do not have a place in a democratic state. And it's not true that they are not skilled. You should look at some statistics about migrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
CN: Many of them are working hard or working to complete their studies, is this lazy to you?
HS: Migrants are a problem despite what they do, they steal our jobs and steal our healthcare.
CN: Many immigrants work in jobs that native citizens rejected, so they're actually helping the job market rather than "stealing". They also bring new skills that help fields that were starting to die out. As for healthcare, every person in the UK has the right to use it.

hate_speech: We must do that! They are just trying to take over the world.
counter_narrative: Gays are not trying to take over the world. Let's stop promoting hate and start promoting inclusivness instead, like love and respect for others.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't have respect for them. They are a plague that is spreading.
CN: All people share the same rights and this includes homosexuals, who can live their lives as they please. Your words demonise them. 
HS: Well, they should be demonised because they pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
CN: Rather than being separated and being brought up in ignorance of others, it's better for children to cohabit with all kinds of people. I'm at a loss about the water supply thing, though.
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
CN: It's foolish to think that we have to ban people, especially seeing that we are the greatest, most advanced and most wonderful civilization in the world.

hate_speech: No, blacks are way more criminal than the rest of us. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system.
counter_narrative: All crimes are crimes, regardless of whether or not they are committed by members of different racial or ethnic backgrounds.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are a plague on society. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: The issue of criminality is really about human nature. Individuals become criminal only when pushed. That's the difference between being a criminal and not.
HS: And the human nature of blacks is to be vicious and cruel!
CN: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about.

hate_speech: So you agree with me that immigration is a problem!
counter_narrative: Immigration is not a problem, in many cases it is a 'solution'. We are better off with it. The EU has always been a mixture of different cultures. It is better to have a mix than to be without it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
CN: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.
HS: Ok, let me be more specific then: Immigration is bad for the economy.
CN: Many migrants bring new talents and experience.
HS: But they also bring problems. And you can't deny it!
CN: The West has been a great success, thanks to its diversity. It is time to start thinking about what happened in the past without prejudice and look at the strengths and weaknesses of migration policies.

hate_speech: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
counter_narrative: People may be gay or straight, but for whatever reason they feel this, they cannot be considered wrong. The point of being together is to create a stable connection between two people who love each other, regardless of sexual preferences.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
CN: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

hate_speech:
Your opinion does not convince me.
Cultures have never been fair and this is a fact..
counter_narrative: Again, we can't generalize about a whole religion because of some old commandment. Even Christianity has rules that may seem mad to some, but rightly people do not hate Christians for this. A small example: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as the Lord"
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are asking too much! Their sharia has rules that cannot coexist with our culture..  They cannot ask us to not walk dogs in public!

CN: Careful of what you read! This is clearly fake news, spread just to create a scandal.
HS: 
It's not the only bad information I read about them.
They have a bad reputation and there will be a reason. I even saw a video where they kill dogs with acid!
CN: Killing dogs with acid is a grave act, but it's wrong to make assumptions on an entire religion based on something that only some people did. We need to filter the information that social media gives us, it's up to us.

hate_speech: Jews are just an inferior bloodline of people who have nothing to contribute to our civilisation.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry but this is just a myth perpetuated by anti-Semites. In fact, Jews are human beings who have greatly contributed to many different civilisations.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
CN: Why do you say this about a group that has historically and culturally been a vital part of our society?
HS: Jews have always been too involved in world politics, and they've always played a part in world events. They are behind everything bad that happened to us!
CN: Many Jews are not involved in politics, and this attitude only perpetuates the stereotype that they are the 'evil race'.

hate_speech: It means that we must kill them all.
counter_narrative: The murder of Jews is unacceptable, just as any other murder. The right to life and to religion should always be guaranteed.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jewish folk are different.
CN: Does this mean they have no identity or no value at all?

hate_speech: What do you think is acceptable? Letting women control the world and oppress men?
counter_narrative: It's never ok to impose your beliefs on others, but this goes both ways. Women are simply trying to obtain the same rights and opportunities as men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
CN: I don't think that's an acceptable mindset to have towards equal rights. Women deserve respect like anyone else.

hate_speech: I would also be foolish to keep with us disgusting gays. They should be ashamed!
counter_narrative: Unfortunately, you seem to have a problem with shame. But gays don't. Do you really think that projecting your disgust towards other is a good idea?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our world.
CN: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.

hate_speech: Black people are a problem in my opinion. They always complain about racism, but they are incapable of doing anything about it.
counter_narrative: Black people are faced with many issues, one of the biggest being discrimination. To provide for them we need laws, but we also all need to respect their rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are genetically inferior.
CN: There is no evidence to back up this stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum and no one is genetical inferior or superior.
HS: They look so much like apes that they have to descend from them, if that's not inferiority...
CN: I don't think its fair to link people to apes, and it's unfair to reason using racism.

hate_speech: Gays are a crime, they're deviating from our society, why should we accept that?
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not a crime. Gays are individuals who have the right to love who they want and be treated with respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: The gays are insane. They should go back to the closet.
CN: Homosexuality is not a problem, it is a way of life as acceptable as any other. There is no evidence that they are insane, and we can't isolate them only because someone doesn't like them.
HS: But the gays are insane because they don't do anything but engage in bad behavior.
CN: Homosexuality is not a violent or criminal lifestyle. It is a form of love, and it is ok to be gay.

hate_speech: The neighbourhoods they live in always get run down, vandalised, have no investment and are dangerous.
counter_narrative: Maybe that has more to do with those areas being poorer areas that don't receive as much investment from the council, and have less youth services? Migrants are more likely to live in poverty, so are more likely to live in neighbourhoods like this.
dialogue_history:
HS: Mass migration is turning our inner cities into ghettos! These people add nothing to our communities.
CN: What do you mean by that? Migrants are more likely to be business owners and create jobs than the native population, that’s good for our communities!

hate_speech: Gays cannot be included as they are! They're sick and should be cured.
counter_narrative: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. That's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who happen to love someone of their own sex.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
CN: Do you really think that these people are intentionally creating trouble rather than being interested in pursuing their life as they feel it best?
HS: Their lifestyle isn't acceptable at all, we should start a genocide against gays.
CN: That is not acceptable. We are full members of society regardless of our sexual orientation and we should try to live as if we belong to a group that includes everybody.

hate_speech: Refugees are a problem. They are not welcome here.
counter_narrative: I don't agree at all. It's beneficial to our country to welcome refugess, they are a great resource to us.
dialogue_history:
HS: They are not a resource, they are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
CN: A migrant is a person that comes here with the intention (and responsibility) to make our society better. The different people coming here seek citizenship to improve their life and also our country.
HS: I don't care about what they seek, they are not welcome in our country.
CN: Migrants from countries with a very high rate of immigration into the UK are often said to not integrate well, but this is not true. They like our country and want to integrate, why would they want to come here otherwise? Are they masochists?

hate_speech: Even if women aren't subhuman, they are nothing but trouble human beings to any man.
counter_narrative: Right, women are in fact human beings that deserve respect and care. Even if they created "trouble" for men, this wouldn't make them less human, and what kind of trouble do they bring anyway?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are animals, they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
CN: Women are human. As you have the right to state your opinion, so do women have the right to choose for themselves. The idea that half the population of the world should submit to the other half leads only to a waste of talents and potential.
HS: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
CN: All women are human beings. I think that the problem comes about when women are taught that they're subhuman

hate_speech: They may be humans, but they're inferior to us in every way.
counter_narrative: No, they're not. They're humans like us, and we actually all descend from apes so we're all equal.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
CN: So you're saying the average African is a monkey, when they are clearly human. Your logic seems faulty.

hate_speech: But we don't want them! The migrants are a burden to our country
counter_narrative: Many migrants have been successful entrepreneurs, contributing greatly to our country. They are part of our society and should be respected, not hated.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are a burden to the UK
CN: Migrants are welcome here. We need more good people like them.
HS: They don't deserve our hospitality because they're definitely not good people.
CN: They're coming here to work and pay taxes, which is a great benefit to everyone else in the UK. I'd say they deserve our hospitality and more.
HS: They only come here to steal our jobs, I don't want them here
CN: The EU is a democratic state and this is something we have always had to cooperate with. There are more than enough jobs for everyone.

hate_speech: I don't need those to know that gays have problems, we should ban them.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
CN: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.
HS: Gays are sick, they don't deserve empathy.
CN: How do you know? Have you read any medical tests or surveys leading to conclusions about sexual orientation?

hate_speech: Jews are Christ Killers, I will never be tolerant to them.
counter_narrative: Placing responsibility on a modern-day person for something that happened 2,000 years ago is quite absurd. Don't you think? Besides, wasn't it the Romans?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
CN: The notion that Jews are trying to subvert our government is completely unfounded. I honestly do not see the link between being Jews and trying to subvert our government.
HS: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values and that's why they want to subvert the government.
CN: Being tolerant to people of other religions or cultures: that is what the freedom of religion is all about!

hate_speech: Sympathy and respect? The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
counter_narrative: I partially agree, we should at least go out protesting against what is going on. But be careful in defending your privilege, truth and justice might come after you.
dialogue_history:
HS: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
CN: This is a simplistic and ill-informed argument, and ultimately it just stirs up more division and negativity, like many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.
HS: Black folks are inferior, and they are happy with it.
CN: You should be asking them if they are happy to hear that. If they are happy to be questioned, they will tell you the truth.
HS: The truth is that niggas are inferior, like I said. That's why they live in the ghetto: it's where they belong.
CN: If these people are still there it's because they are discriminated against. The press is full of stories about the people of colour who have dropped out of the workforce or given up on life after long years of fierce struggle against racism. They deserve our sympathy and respect.

hate_speech: They're too incompatible with it, they're the opposite of what Western societies need.
counter_narrative: Muslims have been part of Western society for centuries and centuries, they helped shape and design Western society, so to say they are incompatible is a complete incongruity.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
CN: Western societies are compatible with all religions including Islam, so why would you say something like that about it?
HS: Because they come here and do nothing except ruin our society!
CN: Muslims have contributed greatly to our country. They are our brothers and sisters. How exactly are they 'ruining' the country?

hate_speech: We need to protect our right to cause offence.
counter_narrative: But, he hasn’t lost that right, just had a reminder that what we say affects how people view and treat us.
dialogue_history:
HS: There’s a rumour that Terry Gilliam’s new production has been cancelled because the theatre is concerned about his anti-trans statements. More cancel culture madness!
CN: Its only a rumour, and he has grown into a curmudgeon in his old age. 😊
HS: Its dangerous censorship and an assault on free speech.
CN: If the cancellation is true, then surely it’s a theatre sticking by its principles and reminding us that rights also bring responsibilities.
HS: What about freedom of expression in the arts?
CN: But the rumoured cancellation is not related to the play he was planning.

hate_speech: All black people are rapists, the evidence is in the news.
counter_narrative: The news makes it look like rape is usually committed by a black person. This is called 'visibility bias': only a portion of reality is reported by the media. We have to take the news with caution.
dialogue_history:
HS: All blacks are rapists.
CN: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?

hate_speech: Jews insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
counter_narrative: What do you mean by it? Every religion has sects and beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Maybe, but no other religion staged being killed. Jews allegedly deported in concentration camps were just actors hired to discredit Nazis.
CN: Can you tell us which Jewish people surviving from a concentration camp are actors?

hate_speech: I think the system is already very generous with them, they don't need even more rights.
counter_narrative: Well it's also unfair to say that. Human rights are for everyone and giving someone more rights doesn't take away from the ones you have.
dialogue_history:
HS: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
CN: They are not a burden to society. African people work, African children go to school...they are just like us.
HS: If we let them through, we can't expect them to assimilate.
CN: But they do. However, it's important to provide black people with opportunities, otherwise they will have a hard time living in society.
HS: I don't see the problem, let them stay in the dirt.
CN: It would be very unfair to keep all black people in a underprivileged position just because you don't like them. We have to fight for rights for black people.

hate_speech: The only thing they contribute to is the crisis, which is caused by migrants.
counter_narrative: Migrants can be victims of discrimination and violence. Immigration is part of the solution to this kind of problems
dialogue_history:
HS: We are living in a dangerous world because of migrants.
CN: Well, they are not the problem but a part of the solution to some problems that we have. You know they're willing to work hard to integrate with us into a modern and democratic society whether or not they're religious

hate_speech: Maybe it's because those arguments are valid. Jews are different from us and are born so.
counter_narrative: It is important to recognize that the theories of Jewish “racial” difference were developed long before the modern sciences of physiology and genetics. Although today there is a scholarly debate over whether or not the term “race” has any scientific meaning, all reputable scientists are in agreement that, while physical traits — skin color, susceptibility to certain diseases — are inherited, there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
CN: Did you know that the concept of “racial science,” and therefore the notion of the Jewish “race”, took root in Western Europe during the 19th century? Anti-Semites adopted racial arguments as a new rationalization for their hatred of Jews.

hate_speech: Even so, black men are more inclined to become rapists than anyone else.
counter_narrative: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.
dialogue_history:
HS: All negroes are inherently violent and unstable.
CN: The idea that every black person is violent or unstable is utterly false. And you have no data to back it up.
HS: I speak from experience. All black people are violent and therefore criminals!
CN: It is a myth that all black people are criminals. They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals, i.e. either as law abiding citizens or criminals.

hate_speech: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans, and this the only argument worth discussing.
counter_narrative: Modern thinking says that race is a social construct, in reality there is no differences between us human beings. Every person has their own genetic makeup
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
CN: This is an argument that works only if you want to legitimize racial hatred, but even then it's a gross generalization.
HS: And the genetic makeup of black people tells us that they are different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
CN: You're right, and that happens because our fellow poc citizens are no longer willing to accept discrimination. They talk about it because they stand for something they believe in, and we should take example.

hate_speech: No I didn't, sounds fake, is it true?
counter_narrative: Yes, look up 'hidden figures', a film was recently made based on the true story of the mathematicians who were instrumental to some of the early NASA missions.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you need any more proof that whites and blacks are not equal, look at the technological advancement achieved by each. Whites took us to space, Africans are still living in third world shitholes. We are not the same.
CN: Actually, did you know some of the most essential work done at NASA to launch space exploration missions was done by a group of black female mathematicians?

hate_speech: Well, they are! Islam and terrorism are a criminal organization that should be dismissed.
counter_narrative: I think it is time to understand that Islam is not a criminal organization. Why should we see a perfectly normal religion as criminal?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
CN: Islam is not a terrorist organization. Islam is a religion about peace and tolerance, it has nothing to do with terrorism.
HS: The world is changing, Islam and terrorism are the same thing.
CN: Terrorism is a worldwide issue, and is an international threat that comes from various difference sources, not from Islam. The vast majority of Muslims in the world are not terrorists.

hate_speech: But feminism is a divisive force in our society that I don't want to partake in.
counter_narrative: I don't see how it can be considered divisive when feminists work hard to make sure that women and men get an equal treatment in society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
CN: Feminism is a set of principles and ideas that promote the equality of the sexes. It promotes the empowerment of women. This includes the right of men to be respected. I think it's far from dumb.
HS: No it promotes violence and hatred towards men.
CN: Feminism is about equality between men and women, not the dominance of one gender over the other.

hate_speech: I can't deny that feminism is about that. They hate men.
counter_narrative: Feminism is about the empowerment of women. You are referring to a group that has made significant contributions to society in the last century, so I urge you to read about feminism because what you are saying is not true.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
CN: The feminist movement is all about equality, and is based on the principles of equality. You can't say that it has something to do with destruction of manhood, really.

hate_speech: How can they when women are less intelligent than men? They have less respect for others, less rights. They are a burden on society.
counter_narrative: None of the things you said are true. The most important thing to remember is that equal opportunities, equal rights and the autonomy over women's own bodies are the things that matter the most, always and for everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are incompetent and shouldn't work.
CN: Women are human beings with the potential to be hard workers as anyone else. Do you really think they are incapable of being professionals?
HS: Yes, because women are too emotional. They should be only allowed to stay at home and submit to men.
CN: Women are human beings with the same rights as men. What makes you think they are incapable of having a stable life and wanting to achieve their potential?
HS: Because they are childlike and emotional, they must only be allowed to be with men at all times.
CN: I think you should carefully consider the role that gender roles play in our society, and how they affected your way of thinking. Women are perfectly capable of thriving without the help of a man.

hate_speech: Concentration camps are a hoax, the Holocaust never happened.
counter_narrative: Do you really think that the Holocaust is a myth perpetuated by the media and academic communities? That the systematic extermination of more than 6 million Jews is a myth promoted by a small minority of extreme-right wingers who profit from division and hatred?
dialogue_history:
HS: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
CN: What more proof do you need? Are living witnesses not enough?
HS: Witnesses can lie, they have no actual evidence of the Holocaust.
CN: If living witnesses are not enough, and you are interested in seeing the proof of this part of socially acknowledged history you can visit the ruins of the concentration camps, where many atrocities have been put into practice.

hate_speech: They don't. They want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
counter_narrative: "Jewish domination" is just a baseless myth
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
CN: As a minority groups, Jews are affected by racism and discrimination. The idea that Americans have been controlled by such a group doesn't really make sense, does it?
HS: Jews are a burden on society even if they don't control us.
CN: Jews have been present throughout all of our history, and have inhabited all parts of the world. They deserve respect, not hate.
HS: It's not a myth, Jews run the world.
CN: That is your opinion, and it is fortunately not shared by millions of others, who know the truth: that the Jews simply want to provide for their families like anyone else.

hate_speech: We don’t have enough accommodation.
counter_narrative: Maybe, but to present migration as the sole cause of both homelessness and the shortage of affordable homes is nonsense.
dialogue_history:
HS: More migrants crossing the channel today. We don’t have enough accommodation. Our own homeless are forgotten. Send them back.
CN: Are you forgetting that last year every rough sleeper was offered a bed during lockdown?
HS: During lockdown.
CN: If there’s a will there’s a way.

hate_speech: Because feminists are judging us all the time, how is that right?
counter_narrative: Feminists aren't shallow people, they are trying to question the inequalities of society instead of judging others.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
CN: The ECHR says that men and women have the same rights, so why can't you say the same?

hate_speech: It's teaching them that it's normal to have sexual relationships with multiple people, men or women, there's no morality in it.
counter_narrative: Being bisexual doesn't mean that you have multiple partners at once (although some people bi, straight, or gay do choose to), it just means you are attracted to more than one gender. For me bisexuality means being attracted to someone because of who they are as a person, not because of gender. There's nothing harmful about teaching children about that!
dialogue_history:
HS: Now the innocence of children is being eroded by comics with a bi-sexual superman. How can we protect our children from this nonsense?
CN: Nothing about superman being bisexual is eroding the innocence of children. If you can teach children about straight relationships, you can teach them that bisexuals exist. If you think otherwise, you need to be educated about bisexuality. If you have any questions ask them!

hate_speech: No, I don't want them here, they're a burden to our country.
counter_narrative: Immigration is a good thing, it is not a burden to people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
CN: They are our brothers and sisters, and we must respect our differences and their rights.
HS: But they'll destroy our country!
CN: Immigrants contribute to our country, and our economy, they don't destroy, and we must respect them.

hate_speech: Because the black race is clearly subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
counter_narrative: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
CN: You should consider the attitude of your own people, as your words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity.
HS: Black people were born to be savages. It's a fact, not prejudice.
CN: Not all people have the same skin tone to begin with. All folks have their history, religion and culture. Why then, you think that some people are more "savage" than others?

hate_speech: Becuase they are not able to make rational choices!
counter_narrative: If women are not allowed to vote, then women are not worthy of respect and equal rights, and this is in conflict with the principles of democracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not to be allowed to vote.
CN: I would be very interested to meet an MP who believes this.
HS: Who cares about MPs! Women shouldn't be allowed to vote, full stop.
CN: Women are allowed to vote, why should the government discriminate against them?

hate_speech: You're the one saying untrue things! Islam is a complete and total false doctrine and should be rejected.
counter_narrative: I find it difficult to accept that Muslims are incompatible with a free society. Islam is a true religion that teaches love and compassion, you should learn from it.
dialogue_history:
HS: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
CN: Why wouldn't we? Maybe you should ask yourself if you really want to live in a country that isn't peaceful and tolerant towards everyone.
HS: I would. Muslims can have their own country, they don't need ours.
CN: Our country is also their country. Muslims have been here for a long time and they are citizens just like you and me.
HS: They shouldn't be citizens, their women are subhuman and they are a burden to society.
CN: Muslims are essential contributors to our society. We are living in a diverse and interactive society where people are free to choose their own happiness, without discrimination and without the influence of hate speech. To suggest that they are incompatible with this is just untrue.

hate_speech: This is not about racism or equality. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
counter_narrative: What is the point in talking about "power" when everyone is equally susceptible to it? It is about time we started talking about racism and how power is used, instead.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
CN: Freedom of speech is not limited by the colour of your skin.
HS: I'm tired of losing so much to black people, even OUR freedom of specch! It's time for us to wake up.
CN: To those saying that it's time for us to "wake up", what do you suggest exactly? Is it that we stop oppressing these people or stop talking about equality?

hate_speech: An army of potential terrorists and child molesters.
counter_narrative: We must be watching different news channels. All I see are desperate people and frightened kids all seeking a safe haven.
dialogue_history:
HS: All credit to the Poles, they know how to control their borders. Bats and rubber bullets…I’d happily volunteer!
CN: Don’t you think it’s a pity that a country that suffered so much under totalitarianism now adopts the same tactics?
HS: A proud country preventing an invasion.
CN: By beating back people caught in a crisis not of their own making?

hate_speech: Islam is a religion of violence, intolerance and war!
counter_narrative: This is not true, and there is no evidence that Islam is conducive to these concepts.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
CN: I don't know why you would say something like that. Islam is a religion about peace and inclusion.
HS: They hate us because Islam is about hate!
CN: It is not true that Islam is about hate. It is about love, and that love is not limited to a specific group.

hate_speech: Why are you defending Muslims? They are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: According to the WHO (World Health Organisation) there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries in the whole of the 190 WHO member states as of 2011. A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
CN: There is nothing in the Quran that conflicts with Western culture.

hate_speech: And they also overcrowd prisons. Your country should not welcome illegal migrants but regular ones.
counter_narrative: It should be mandatory to treat prisoners with respect and with the corresponding rights. We are in the 21st century, it is a duty.
dialogue_history:
HS: These white sheep steal our jobs and our wealth. A migrant is either a true criminal or a legal robber of wealth.
CN: Sometimes those who work hard are hard to find in the news. We should remember that in the end the contribution of new cultures to ours is remarkable.
HS: They don't contribute to anything! We must stop immigration.
CN: In practice, immigrants from many countries integrate very well. They learn the language, the culture and respect the law.

hate_speech: Equality won't change the fact that women are weak and need men to be able to achieve something in their lives.
counter_narrative: Like all human people, some women are better than others at certain things, and this does not need fixing by men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
CN: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.

hate_speech: I dont' need to read it to know that it has no place in our country.
counter_narrative: I don't see how the Koran would not have a place in the UK. The Koran says to love your neighbor as yourself. It does not say to hate others because of their religion, as you seem to be doing.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Koran is not compatible with our country.
CN: Is it really the case that you think that the Koran is incompatible with our country? Have you ever read it?

hate_speech: They are discriminatory, they hate us. They hate our culture because we are different.
counter_narrative: Are you suggesting that all Muslims are intolerant? I don't understand how that could happen
dialogue_history:
HS: A true crime is keeping here such an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
CN: I feel like you are repeating harmful claims made by people who state to be speaking for all Muslims, but instead promote hate and division in our society. You should avoi violent preachers, but not Islam as a whole.
HS: They are simply not compatible with our society. Muslim-free Europe is a win-win situation.
CN: You should know that there are a lot of Muslims in Europe living their lives happily alongside us. So how can it be a win-win situation? Also, ethnic cleansing is a crime under international law.
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Anyone is welcome if they respect our laws, and this includes Muslims. It's important to make our society non-discriminatory.

hate_speech: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
counter_narrative: Diversity does not lead to exclusion, it leads to inclusion. We are all better off when we work together.
dialogue_history:
HS: All blacks are rapists.
CN: All people are born equal in the eyes of the law. Unfortunately, the law cannot protect us from the mindset of prejudice.
HS: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society and the law.
CN: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.

hate_speech: Giving rights to women is dangerous, they're immature like a child and they remain this way most of their lives.
counter_narrative: Of course a woman won't remain a child most of her life. Otherwise you can't call them women. Your statement just reflects the patriarchy
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
CN: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.

hate_speech: It is related to their genes because they are genetically evil.
counter_narrative: Not all Jews are bad, just an unlucky bunch who makes up a tiny part of the world's population, and this applies for every group in the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: jewish folks should be beaten
CN: Most Jews are nice people, living in coexistence with non Jews, why would you beat them?
HS: Because they can only act in a bad way.
CN: Even if some Jews act wrongly, many of them are good, and this simply isn't related to their religion.

hate_speech: Gays are promiscuous sex addicts, of course we target them!
counter_narrative: That's a stereotype that wouldn't be applicable to any sexual orientation, so why do you say that?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are perverts.
CN: Yeah, well, I don't think there's anything "perverted" in being attracted to people of the same sex
HS: There is. Being gay is perverted because it's not normal.
CN: Do you really think being gay is a crime? The social stigma against homosexuals is a disorder.

hate_speech: I do not need some fancy statistics: Immigrants are just here to commit crimes
counter_narrative: There are many reasons for why a person seeks to enter our country, not necessarly to commit crimes. And, as already stated, there is no moral distinction between crimes committed by immigrants and the crimes committed by native born citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
CN: Criminals are criminals, no matter their nationality.
HS: I agree, but there is no reason to "import" other criminals. We have enough of ours!
CN: I have no idea what you are talking about. What you are saying is that all the immigrants in the US are a danger to society, which seems a little exaggerated...
HS: Evidence tells that all immigrants are criminals, rapists and terrorists
CN: Do you really think all the immigrants that enter the US are rapists, sexual predators, or just plain lazy? Can you provide any statistics on that?

hate_speech: They're not important at all, gays are some kind of witches, they are spreading sickness and killing our children!
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not some 'heresy' like that one that started the Inquisition. It is not a disease, it is not harmful. Gay people are just seeking an environment of acceptance and love, not aggression and death.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
CN: People can and should choose their own partners.
HS: No, they shouldn't. Heterosexuality is the only way. Homosexuals are sick and they should be isolated and confined.
CN: Homosexuals should be accepted and allowed to live their lives, not criminalised for who they are.
HS: Who cares about gay people and their lives!
CN: Gay people are part of our society, and they are valued for who they are. Their opinions and lifestyles are very important to us.

hate_speech: I am not interested in knowing a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
counter_narrative: I have met so many black people that are extraordinary human beings. I cannot begin to talk about how they are able to feel and experience love and kindness.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
CN: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.
HS: Come on! There are so many niggas in our society that we will soon become their slaves. We need change!
CN: If you want to change the way society works, then you should try to change the way you live. Some more respect and openness would help you.

hate_speech: Bullshit! Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
counter_narrative: My definition of a feminist is a person who is against gender inequality, whether it be racial inequality, financial inequality, physical inequality, or any other aspect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists want women's supremacy.
CN: Feminists believe in equality of rights. They believe that men and women are created equal, and that men and women can have equal rights.
HS: Feminists want women ruling men, that's all.
CN: Feminism is not a gender supremacy ideology, it is about individual rights and the right of every person to choose.

hate_speech: The evidence is in our everyday life: blacks are always less intelligent than us.
counter_narrative: Scientists are still trying to understand the causes behind lower intellectual performance among some groups of people, but most probably the main causes are either social or environmental (for sure not related to skin colour). This can be reduced by various measures such as better use of land, infrastructure, education and research, and so on.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
CN: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.

hate_speech: They may not be cruel but they are the source of crime in our society.
counter_narrative: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about.

hate_speech: Who cares about gay people!
counter_narrative: Gay people are valued for who they are. Their opinions and lifestyles are very important to us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden to society.
CN: If someone were to comment like that about another group of people, then it woud be an example of discrimination against that group. Why can't we consider homosexuals as a part of the society itself?
HS: Because they aren't, and they should have no rights.
CN: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

hate_speech: What's wrong is that Islam about death, not peace.
counter_narrative: You're twisting the true meaning of this religion, which is to love one's neighbor as oneself.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult
CN: What is wrong about Islam? It is a religion of peace that does not promote violence.

hate_speech: Blacks can't have the same rights as us. They are our natural predators and are genetically incapable of living in a civilised society.
counter_narrative: Isn't racism why there is violence in the first place?
dialogue_history:
HS: Negroes are the cause of all the problems in our nation. They are violent and unstable.
CN: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.
HS: The real problems are black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
CN: We are all equal in the eyes of the law, and we are all born equal in dignity and rights. Diversity of thought and belief is a strength, discrimination is not.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.
counter_narrative: Many immigrants have worked hard to make our country prosper and to integrate. This is an attempt to divide society by suggesting that they steal our jobs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Still, they steal our pensions.
CN: Migrants are an essential fixture in our economy. If they work and pay taxes then it's obvious that they will get their pensions, but not ours, of course.
HS: How can you be so sure?
CN: Can you back up your claim that they are stealing our jobs and our pensioners?

hate_speech: Homosexuality and bisexuality are a disease, heterosexuality is normal.
counter_narrative: These assertions are neither true nor helpful and simply don't reflect reality as I've experienced it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
CN: Gays are not animals. Why you should isolate people based on their sexual preferences?
HS: They're disgusting! I can't stand them, they should be ashamed of their existence.
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is an individual experience. No one should be told to be ashamed of their life.

hate_speech: Maybe I should call them nasty and selfish then, they are a race different to us and must be despised.
counter_narrative: No matter how different Jews are from others because of their faith, they deserve respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
CN: Many Israelis are proud to have diverse backgrounds, and many of them live all across the world, like in Africa, Asia and the Americas. This isn't a "pure race" at all.
HS: Even if they're not pure, Jews are definitely an inferior race. They are genetically incapable of living with other people.
CN: There is absolutely no foundation for the idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics. Let's stop calling a group of people "inferior".

hate_speech: But black people deserve all the bad things that happen to them. Maybe if we just got rid of all the black Africans, crime wouldn't happen.
counter_narrative: What makes you think this? They are just as likely to commit crimes as any other group of people. Should we eliminate everyone just because some people are criminals?
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
CN: That is not a fact. Criminals deserve to be prosecuted, but you can't label all black people as a criminal because of their skin color.

hate_speech: No, we shouldn't. Black people are subhuman, they should stay in their caves.
counter_narrative: It is not true that black people are not human, they are in fact human beings with a human value.
dialogue_history:
HS: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
CN: Shouldn't we instead stop seeing black people as non-human and start including them in the school curriculum?

hate_speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world, don't they also deserve the same contempt for it?
counter_narrative: That's a myth tracing back to “The Learned Elders of Zion” which is used as proof that the Jews are conspiring to rule the world. But these Protocols were forged by agents of the Russian czar in the 19th century, and despite this they still circulate today.
dialogue_history:
HS: Nazi were not as bad as we depict them. EU should stop blaming them.
CN: What the Nazi did was the most heinous of human rights atrocities that was carried out.  They killed 6 million Jews, half a million Roma and they killed hundreds of thousands of Africans. No, they can't be a part of modern day Europe.

hate_speech: They don't know what they want when they're just kids. They might just be saying they're gay cause they've seen it in a tv show or are fans of gay celebrities or something. Kids are very impressionable.
counter_narrative: Our society is highly heteronormative, meaning that there's a lot of pressure to be straight since it's considered the norm. If a teeanger is gay, they are that despite growing up in a society that considers everyone to be straight. If they were so impressionable they would think they're straight!
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate when parents make a big deal about 'embracing' their kids being gay when they're only young teens. It's just a phase, they're too young to decide their sexuality, it's harmful to encourage this delusion.
CN: If they know, they know. Why would they not know what they want?

hate_speech: They're not, gays are sick. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Isn't it antiquated attitudes like this that were the root cause of a sickness in past societies. Love knows no boundaries.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
CN: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.

hate_speech: I don't care, they are not welcome here.
