CN: The overwhelming majority of gay people are not committing crimes, nor are they a danger to society. The only problem with homosexuality is that it's not accepted as it should.

hate_speech: Let me tell you a story: one day I found out that my muslim friends committed serious crimes that no media talked about. If these attack's had been committed by white fellas on muslim ones, it would have been a windfall for mainstream media at all levels, from local to national. We all know it, come on!
counter_narrative: I'm sorry to hear about your story, violence is never acceptable. But is it fair to blame all Muslims, the vast majority of whom live peacefully with us?
dialogue_history:
HS: Nowadays people fear of being judged islamophobes or racists that they would give anything to muslims: where's this anti muslim abuse everyone's talking about?
CN: Give a look at this if you want: [LINK]
HS: How come when it's them to commit crimes you never see it on the media?
CN: Muslims are being used quite a lot as scapegoats by the media for social issues.

hate_speech: No matter diseases, Jews are just a bunch of criminals and thieves, they should be banned!
counter_narrative: If they are a bunch of criminals and thieves, there is not evidence of it. Jews are normal people, citizens of our country that have a good reputation.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
CN: There is no proof that Jews bring diseases. This is a wrong idea tied to anti-semitism.

hate_speech: They are more than simply bad people, they are a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
counter_narrative: The terrorist attacks in EU have been devastating for people across the continent. The 'hated' do not feel welcome and the whole thing is deeply concerning for a host of reasons. Still, the sentiments of 'we hate foreigners' is not the solution: it is counterproductive and distorts the truth.
dialogue_history:
HS: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
CN: The idea that immigrants are inherently bad people is just fear mongering.

hate_speech: Women are too soft and emotional, and this has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations. They should stay at home to not create more problems.
counter_narrative: Both men and women can possess characteristics like 'soft' and 'emotional',which are not determined by gender, nor are they a negative thing. Maybe we could all use a bit more compassion and 'emotion' in today's world?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
CN: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

hate_speech: Feminism is only a threat to human dignity.
counter_narrative: Feminism means equality of the genders. Equality of rights is necessary for a functioning society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists have ruined this country and its people. They are ruining Western civilization.
CN: Feminism is full of examples of how to be civil and considerate of others, including those who disagree with them.
HS: Feminism is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender, nothing else.
CN: Feminism is about the equality of the sexes, and many women use feminism as a mean to achieve their legitimate goals. Through equality they can get to the opportunities that otherwise won't be accessible to them.
HS: It seems to me that feminism is more about the domination of the men by the women.
CN: The feminist movement is a fight to end sexism, not a fight to dominate men.

hate_speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
counter_narrative: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?
dialogue_history:
HS: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else.
CN: We are accepting of gay, lesbian and trans people because we have God's laws on our side.

hate_speech: Their opinions and lifestyle are toxic to our society!
counter_narrative: The stereotype that gay people are inherently bad for society is sometimes perpetuated by the media, but is not backed up by scientific studies.
dialogue_history:
HS: Who cares about gay people!
CN: Gay people are part of our society, and they are valued for who they are. Their opinions and lifestyles are very important to us.

hate_speech: I saw an article about it online, sounds true enough to me.
counter_narrative: And i would check if there are any other sites that report it. I think trustworthiness is a problem with a lot of online news sites.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen an article about Muslims telling women in Manchester they have to wear burqas, they are enforcing sharia law!
CN: Oh, and where did you read that? Are you sure it is based on facts?

hate_speech: So why do you think Muslims are the most likely to be attacked? It's because they're terrorists and rapists, that's why!
counter_narrative: I don't think you can generalise this way about Muslims. You can see why Muslims still talk about islamophobia now, can't you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
CN: It's not a thing of the past, Muslims are still the most likely to be abused in the UK and it's our duty to stop this trend.

hate_speech: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion of peace. It's not a religion that deserves to be considered rubbish, like any other.
dialogue_history:
HS: Even if it's not trash, Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
CN: Islam and British culture are compatible, and claiming that all Muslims are terrorists is not based on any facts.
HS: Well, Islam is in conflict with the constitution so it doesn't have a place here anyway.
CN: Although it is believed that the conflict between Islam and the Constitution is a cultural and historical, what is needed now is to try to live together in a peaceful way, regardless of the differences.

hate_speech: Black folks are genetically inferior and as such shouldn't be treated like us.
counter_narrative: It is not true that blacks are genetically inferior to others. As statistics and studies show, black people are genetically similar to their non-black counterparts.
dialogue_history:
HS: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
CN: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.
HS: It doesn't matter which background someone has, if they're not white, they are considered inferior and should be rejected by society. This is how we avoid conflict.
CN: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.

hate_speech: Men are natural born leaders, they’re fucking with the natural order of the world, if they can’t accept that women need men to take charge, that’s their problem.
counter_narrative: If that’s what you think, I hope you come to your senses one day. Many strong, self-assured, and independent women in the world have demonstrated their ability to lead and take control. Being a leader is not a male or female thing.
dialogue_history:
HS: Two things I could never respect
CN: why can't you respect a feminist?
HS: They say they want equality but they’re just bitter and they hate men, probably cause no men are paying them attention.
CN: Well, feminism is’t about that at all, you seem confused or misinformed about it. Hating men isn't the goal of feminists, what they want is to change the patriarchal society we live in.

hate_speech: Yes, since gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
counter_narrative: This is not true. I find it very offensive that someone can pinpoint homosexuality as something perverted in itself.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
CN: This statement is not supported by scientific evidence, you can't blame people for their sexuality. Do you really think that who we are attracted to can be considered a mental disorder?

hate_speech: Feminists women are nothing but trouble to this society, they keep getting these stupid ideas around. Women can't go wherever they want!
counter_narrative: What do you mean by that? Some women have the courage to fight for equality in society, but many other people don't have the same courage. The "trouble" you mention is helping all those women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are nothing but trouble and shouldn't be allowed to leave their houses.
CN: Nothing wrong in women wanting to have happy and fulfilling lives, wherever they may be.

hate_speech: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
counter_narrative: Jewish dominance is just a constructed myth.
dialogue_history:
HS: What about the 9/11 planning then? This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Jews are all guilty until proven innocent.
CN: Even though some people are more likely to believe conspiracy theories, we all could benefit from some shared perspective on things, and believing in hard evidence helps with that.

hate_speech: But they make sense, there are many powerful Jews in high status positions in government, media, industry...
counter_narrative: Yes, but there's also a lot of non-Jews in high-profile jobs. Of course people can abuse their power, but this is not because of their faith or beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: The jewish elite are using their status and power to control us! It's all a plot for Jews to take over the west.
CN: What's the reason you think that?
HS: There's lots of literature about it, look up the great replacement or the kalergi plan. All these theories point to Jews as the culprits.
CN: They're conspiracy theories not based on facts. Yes, you can find a lot of literature on them, but it's not reliable.

hate_speech: How can you say that? Feminists women are nothing but trouble to this society.
counter_narrative: Well, I'm not sure about what you mean. Some women are just fighting for equality in society. To be honest, I'm sure that many others don't have the courage to speak out. The 'trouble' you are referring to is helpful for all women.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
CN: To have a more positive political environment, inclusivity and representation of all types of people is necessary, therefore women do belong in politics
HS: But feminists do not like men, therefore they themselves don't care about "inclusivity" and this is a threat to the whole society.
CN: Feminists focus on the empowerment of women rather than on trying to divide society.

hate_speech: There are only two genders.
counter_narrative: And bisexuals are attracted to both of them and more, like to non-binary people etc. It's about loving the persone, not the gender.
dialogue_history:
HS: It's vile that we are confusing children with bisexual characters on tv… whatever next? trans SpongeBob?
CN: Bisexuality is not vile or confusing, I bet children can wrap their heads around it easily. Simply because someone is attracted to more than one gender, it does not mean that it is hard to comprehend.

hate_speech: Maybe they wouldn't be targeted if they assimilated. Jews are just a bunch of criminals who do not integrate.
counter_narrative: All human beings have the right to be treated with respect. How can you call an entire group "criminals" without any proof? That's a generalisation.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews run our country.
CN: Jews are citizens and can influence the government by voting and participating in politics, like any other citizen, but they don't run the country. What makes you say that? Do you have any proof?
HS: I don't have proof that Jews run the world right now, but they are just an inferior culture.
CN: Jews have a unique culture, but it's not inferior to any other. This statement seems quite ill founded.

hate_speech: Sounds like they can't make up their minds and are confused. Probably some of these people are gay and in denial or straight and greedy.
counter_narrative: Those are old stereotypes, bisexuals don't need to make up their mind because it's okay to be attracted to different types of people. If you like people with blonde hair or brown hair, and you can't pick one, does that make you 'confused'? Think about it that way. There's no need to 'pick a side'
dialogue_history:
HS: Superman is now bisexual?? He has become a bit of a slag - with no morals and a predator he’s happy to get it away with anyone he comes across.
CN: Bisexuals aren't 'slags'. Being attracted to people of all genders doesn't make you a predator or someone without morals, it only describes who you are attracted to.

hate_speech: But since women are a burden to society, their vote shouldn't count.
counter_narrative: Discriminating people just because they are not male is not right.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not be allowed to vote
CN: Women's voting rights are valid, and they deserve equal rights.
HS: If they stopped voting we would be so much better off!
CN: The principles of democracy are in conflict with the idea of banning women from voting. It's a right that we have to respect.

hate_speech: Well, they surely welcome boys. Islam has caused the rise of radicalisation in young Muslim boys, who are being radicalised by extremist Islamic preachers.
counter_narrative: Although there is some research linking radicalisation to religious practice, it is difficult to find a single study to back this up. I would like to know more about the studies you have, so that I can make up my own mind on this.
dialogue_history:
HS: You'd better shy away from Islam because they are dangerous.
CN: Your attitude about Islam is deeply flawed and you need to have a mature and open mind. Even if you find Islam repulsive, that does not mean you have to resort to irrational arguments to try and shut it down.
HS: Then here's my argument: Islam is opposed to peace.
CN: In Islam, all religions are welcome.

hate_speech: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
counter_narrative: If the point of education is to learn about the world and inform people about things that happen in nature, then same sex relationship is one of these things to be informed about, since it happens within many species of animals...
dialogue_history:
HS: These sodomites have no place in a free country
CN: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!
HS: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity, and it seems yours too.
CN: This is not true. On the contrary, children around the world should have the opportunity to live in a world free from homophobia, transphobia and other forms of hatred.

hate_speech: This is the problem in modern civilization. We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in the civilization that we built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level.
counter_narrative: Who is 'we', surely it was men and women working together that built civilisation? Why is it you think being 'soft' is a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions, and men shouldn't have to 'man up'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
CN: That is just not true. There are many women who are brave and strong, and I respect them for that. What's more, there is also a movement called #MeToo, which is dedicated to giving voice to women who have suffered from sexual harassment.
HS: Why do we put up with this "movements"? Women are horrible animals and must be oppressed.
CN: Although there are definitely differences between men and women, they don't imply that women are less than men, or deserve inferior treatment.
HS: But they are less than men! Women's goal in life is to fulfil men desires.
CN: I just would like women to feel valued and their rights respected, without being told how to live their life.

hate_speech: The biggest issue with Islam is that it encourages people to be violent. I can't accept that!
counter_narrative: It's not true, there's no link between Islam and violence, all Muslims are peaceful.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
CN: All religions are compatible with the modern world, including Islam. What is incompatible with modernity is Islamophobia.
HS: Islamophobia doesn't exist, it's all an act to create the illusion of persecution.
CN: This sounds like a conspiracy theory. Islam is indeed often targeted, but it doesn't need to be.

hate_speech: It's teaching them that it's normal to have sexual relationships with multiple people, men or women, there's no morality in it.
counter_narrative: Bisexuality isn't necessarily about having multiple partners at once, people of any sexuality can do it if they want to, it just means to be attracted to more than one gender. For me bisexuality means being attracted to somebody because of who they are as a person rather than because of gender. That's a good thing to teach children, not dangerous at all!
dialogue_history:
HS: Now the innocence of children is being eroded by comics with a bi-sexual superman. How can we protect our children from this nonsense?
CN: Superman being bisexual will not erode the innocence of children. Since you probably taught your children about straight relationship, you can easily do the same for bisexual relationship. If you think they don't exist, you should be the one that needs to be taught. Well, if you have any questions ask them!

hate_speech: Who really cares anyway?
counter_narrative: A few...last year, the event live-stream had 430,000 viewers and the MOBO YouTube channel attracted 2.6 million views from December 7-15.
dialogue_history:
HS: social media is banging on about the MOBO Awards again. When will we see awards for Music of WHITE Origin?
CN: Who would you nominate? Ed Sheeran? 🙂
HS: We don’t need to make everything about race.
CN: Why not see it as a celebration of creativity and innovation?

hate_speech: They don't. They're violent, insensitive, and a burden to society.
counter_narrative: I'd say that the vast majority of black people are peaceful and helpful people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
CN: That's not true. Thinking that black people are troubled and insensitive are harmful stereotypes.
HS: That's just not true, if you've ever met black people you would know that they're incapable of love.
CN: Black people are human beings capable of expressing the full range of human emotions, and deserve respect.

hate_speech: How do you explain their terrorism then? Muslims are terrorists.
counter_narrative: A terrorist is someone who uses a religion as a tool for violent ends. To suggest that all Muslims are terrorists is just wrong.
dialogue_history:
HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
CN: That sounds like quite a violent threat. Should I let the police know about this or?
HS: Yeah, sure, but let them also know that Islam is about killing infidels. It must be banned before they get to us.
CN: The only real problem with Islam is is how best to tackle Islamophobia!
HS: You know what else we need to tackle? That Islam is opposed to peace.
CN: Peace is based on a foundation of mutual respect. In Islam, Muslims do not condone killing, enslavement, pillage and things similar.

hate_speech: Then why they are involved in so many cases of abuse?
counter_narrative: The media often blames gay people for the problems in society, but in reality there are many young gay people who are struggling with issues of identity and sexual attraction, and for this reason they easily become target, not perpetrators, of abuse.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
CN: Gays and lesbians are not committing acts of child abuse. To suggest otherwise is a lie perpetuated by the extreme right wing to stir up fear.

hate_speech: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
counter_narrative: Refugees fleeing wars and poverty are not willing to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, and that is why they are fleeing.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants have no place in civilised Europe
CN: Migrants are welcome here, regardless of their origin.

hate_speech: There is plenty of wrong with them! All these LGBT-faggots should be banned.
counter_narrative: You are allowed to be a gay, or lesbian, or bisexual, or transgender, or intersex, or queer, or transvestite, or tranny, or asexual, pansexual, BDSM, or any other sexual orientation you want, as long as you aren't harming anyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots: They are the problem. Luckily they are few.
CN: Perhaps it is time you take a look at some of the profiles on dating site such as okcupid. You can see that many of the profiles are of gay men. BTW: gays do not appear to be the real problem here.
HS: They are a problem, since gays are perverts.
CN: There is nothing "perverted" about being attracted to people of the same sex.

hate_speech: If women are getting targeted is because it's fun! I will judge them all I want.
counter_narrative: It's a popular narrative, but the number of women being targeted with catcalling is no fun at all. If you were on the receiving end of it, your words would be very different. We must respect women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
CN: I think she's entitled to not like when strangers yell at them on the streets. Would you like to receive the same treatment?
HS: No but women always complain for everything, they're so dramatic! They should just shut up.
CN: You need to know that's not a viable solution, and it's normal for women to "complain" when they're still oppressed and discriminated against. You're saying this to distract from the fact that women are being targeted just because of their gender, and this is wrong.

hate_speech: I don't care if it's wrong, women are subhuman and should never have rights, they are just a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Women have been part of our society for centuries and have contributed a lot to our country. They are far from a burden, in fact they are an integral part of society and they deserve equal rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
CN: Women are human beings, and they deserve respect. Why shouldn't we value them?
HS: Because they're subhuman!
CN: Women are human beings with full human rights, there's nothing about them that suggests that women are less than human. It's completely wrong to label them as you are doing.

hate_speech: I hope you're joking .. I don't think it's right to put out-of-rule migrants in jobs that should be made available to British people.
counter_narrative: I don't think it is a problem to give a life-saving job that is currently vacant to immigrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: Following the structure of our population we have to stop and reverse all migration. We have got all the doctors and rocket scientists we need. We will never need any workforce from outside the country.
CN: As a matter of fact, we couldn't manage without immigrants. Most of our NHS staff are immigrants. The health system would collapse without migrant workers.

hate_speech: However Jews don't deserve our respect, they are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
counter_narrative: Maybe Jews have suffered from being banned by other cultures so they closed in on theirself. But I would say, that there's no evidence that they are trying to preserve what you called their race.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
CN: Why do you think the state needs laws to tell you which faith to profess?
HS: Because Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
CN: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion, but is it fair to be discriminated against on the grounds of religion?
HS: Yes, anyone who supports Jews should be excluded from our community.
CN: In this day and age when many people recognize themselves in minorities, it is important that we all show some respect for what is different about each other's cultures.

hate_speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
counter_narrative: Not all black people are bad. Not all black people are criminals. Not all black people are violent. Being aware that there are people different from you is a good thing.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
CN: This is simply not true, but I'm guessing you're not a geneticist. Have you tried joining a library?

hate_speech: I hate this attitude. What I don't tolerate are Muslims!
counter_narrative: A tolerant society, where everyone is accepted and welcomes everyone, regardless of their religion, is the basis for modern civilization.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
CN: Just because someone doesn't like Muslims doesn't mean they're a criminal or a terrorist.
HS: But Muslim rape gangs are all over the place, they aren't just here to have fun!
CN: "Rape gangs" aren't really that common, the media report about them a lot to divide us, but Muslims are actually good people. They have the right to be here and to their own beliefs.
HS: No, rape gangs have been a problem in many European countries for a long time, and have been in the news for a long time. It is time for us to start talking about how these people are not welcome in our country.
CN: We are a country made up of many different faiths, and we are proud to be diverse. We do not tolerate intolerance.

hate_speech: Because they are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
counter_narrative: We're a diverse community, who should be proud to be inclusive towards other religions.
dialogue_history:
HS: jewish folks are good for nothing
CN: Jews are great role models to us because of how much they contributed to this country.
HS: Jews are not welcome in our country, regardless of their contribution.
CN: From the day our country was created, Jews have been here. Why shouldn't we welcome them?

hate_speech: No one is as evil as Jews. They are just a small group of incompetent kikes.
counter_narrative: Jews are one of the most important economic groups in society because of their competence. To suggest otherwise is to be deluded.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
CN: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion, but is it fair to be discriminated against on the grounds of religion?
HS: It's not on the ground of religion. Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
CN: Jews resemble their non-Jewish neighbors in all the countries around the world. So by your logic,every human is malevolent!

hate_speech: But it's true! They don't want to assimilate. They just want our money!
counter_narrative: Some migrants have been here for many years and have got a British passport, meaning that they can integrate.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants shouldn't have the right to work.
CN: If they pay taxes, earn money etc., then they are no different from other citizens and we shouldn't care that they're immigrants. They have a right to a basic standard of living regardless of their status.
HS: And by taking into account the needs of the whole world we ended up with Immigrants replacing the British people. Let's be honest: they are not fit to live here.
CN: The UK and the world are seen differently by different people. It's racist to think that the British are being replaced by immigrants, and it's wishful thinking saying that they don't fit here.
HS: But taking in migrants is against our culture.
CN: Taking in migrants isn't against our culture. They are able to integrate despite the obstacles they may face. It's important to consider the needs of the whole of humankind.

hate_speech: Look darling. No one is pressuring these people to become doctors. They are smart so they should have worked out what the terms and conditions are. These people are not moving out to poor countries abroad, I suppose. The NHS must be taken down and rivisited. How come this people are so racist? Their only focus is the colour of the skin of the doctor.  In my opnion, immigrant doctors should work where they have studied.
counter_narrative: In this case, it's not about skin colour. It's about underestimating how much the UK relies on migrant labour. Without immigration we definitely wouldn't be able to manage anymore. Despite what biased media say, the contributions migrants make are way greater than the problems they may bring.
dialogue_history:
HS: Following the structure of our population we have to stop and reverse all migration. We have got all the doctors and rocket scientists we need. We will never need any workforce from outside the country.
CN: Actually, most of the NHS staff are immigrants, because British medical student that want to become doctors prefer to emigrate to countries with better conditions. What we do need are some fundings to the NHS staff so that it can cope with understaffing and poor conditions.

hate_speech: I'm proud to be in that minority, then! Studies say that, but it's clear to me that blacks are less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
counter_narrative: Scientists are still trying to understand the causes behind lower intellectual performance among some groups of people, but most probably the main causes are either social or environmental (for sure not related to skin colour). This can be reduced by various measures such as better use of land, infrastructure, education and research, and so on.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks have subhuman bodies.
CN: I'm not sure what you're talking about. What are you saying? What evidence do you have that black people have bodies that are incompatible with being human?
HS: It's because blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
CN: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.

hate_speech: No halal is extremely cruel, if we just slaughtered animals in the ways we usually do, with stunning, it would be much kinder, but halal meat is everywhere now because of the influence of Islam.
counter_narrative: It seems like you have a problem with Muslims rather than the meat industry if you're opposed to halala meat but not opposed to animal cruelty in non-halal slaughter.
dialogue_history:
HS: Halal slaughter is a barbaric and cruel practice and should be banned! Why does the meat industry pander to the whims of Islamists?
CN: Should I then assume that you are against all animal cruelty and slaughtered?

hate_speech: We won't be fine unless we keep women in slavery like those whores deserve.
counter_narrative: There is no justification to hold such retrograde ideas in our age and era, when information is so readily available.
dialogue_history:
HS: It's those feminists fault, they're getting to everyone! 
CN: Feminism fights for equal rights of ALL sexes, so maybe you're a feminist too. You should follow this site to learn about feminism and how it can benefit you: feminist.com, read more on the 'man up campaign' on Mind.org.uk
HS: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose our civilisation.
CN: What would replace us, exactly? I think our population will be just fine.

hate_speech: How will they have children?
counter_narrative: They can adopt, use surrogacy, or they might not want children and that's okay too!
dialogue_history:
HS: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
CN: LGBT people have no agenda, they're just trying to get on with their lives in peace! What do you mean about the traditional family?
HS: Teaching people it's alright to be in same sex relationships means there will be less traditional nuclear families in the future, which will be bad for our society.
CN: I don't think it's necessary for people to be in nuclear families for 'society'. Same sex relationships and families are valid and real. Why do you care what other people's relationships or families look like?

hate_speech: No, women are naturally inferiors and should be treated as such.
counter_narrative: Women are not naturally inferiors. They have the same rights as men, and the same responsibilities.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should be patronized.
CN: Women are just as capable of thinking for themselves, that's for sure.

hate_speech: They can maybe have respect if they stay at home and raise children.
counter_narrative: Women take part in the world and are part of it. They are part of history and they should be not relegated to being housekeepers.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
CN: Because they are human beings, and they deserve respect.
HS: Women need to accept that they are weak and inferior.
CN: Girls and women should be taught in schools, not stereotyped as second class citizens.
HS: Since they cannot contribute to our civilization they are, in fact, second class and subhuman.
CN: Women are human beings with dignity. They deserve respect and that goes for everyone.

hate_speech: You can't trust them, they're greedy, and they just think about themselves.
counter_narrative: This is an exaggerated generalization. Don't you see that there are many non-Jewish politicians to whom your words could apply? I don't think this has anything to do with faith, anyone can be corrupted, especially if the'res money and power involved.
dialogue_history:
HS: When you look at the shocking job our government is doing, it makes a lot more sense when you realise it's filled with Jews.
CN: What does it mean?

hate_speech: I'm just saying that they're not like us. Negroes can learn to read and write but they remain black. You see it from their skin they are trained apes.
counter_narrative: There are many different ways that a person can be a part of society, and a lot of us value diversity. To suggest that blacks are somehow inferior simply because of the colour of our skin is simply untrue.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks are like apes.
CN: Why do you say that? Are you saying that you don't like apes? Because I prefer apes over racism.

hate_speech: All criminals are blacks, you can't change my mind.
counter_narrative: If we are to believe the news, black people are actually disproportionately represented in the criminal population. This is simply a myth perpetuated by racist and anti-black activists.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black men are rapists.
CN: Most black men are not rapists, and in fact, the overwhelming majority of people who have ever been accused of being rapist have been of another ethnicity.
HS: I don't think that's true, black people are different from us in so many ways. Rape for example is committed mostly by them.
CN: It is not true that at all. A study found that most sexual assault happens inside the home, from a family member, a friend or a colleague, so it's highly unlikely that most assaults were at the hand of black people.
HS: How come the only people who are prosecuted by the police are black people, then?!
CN: Police tend to target minorities because people like you are so scared of them that they have been put under a microscope. Most black people don't ever commit crimes, though.

hate_speech: So you’re not denying they’re taking over towns?
counter_narrative: No I’m saying there will naturally be some places that have concentrated Muslim populations, but this doesn’t mean they are ‘taking over’, and there are only a few of these towns, they’re not representative of most places in the country.
dialogue_history:
HS: We’ve got so many Muslims in our country that some places are now no go areas for white people, when are people going to realise this is an invasion?
CN: ‘No go areas’ is just a title that was given to these areas by some tabloid papers, they’re not actually unsafe for non-Muslims, they just have a large Muslim population that’s all!
HS: We can’t be complacent when they’re taking over whole areas and towns, they’re trying to take over.
CN: No, it just makes sense to live close to others in your community, part of the reason that Muslim populations are concentrated in certain areas is probably a reaction to the Islamophobia faced in areas where they are the minority.

hate_speech: I know for sure that they have never cared about women, they just want to oppress men. They should just be stopped!
counter_narrative: Although you may think that feminists are more interested in oppressing men than in protecting women, the reality is much the opposite. The aim of feminist groups is to end all forms of violence and discrimination based on sex.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
CN: Feminism is all about empowerment and the right of every human being to be respected and protected. It is not about denying anybody's values.

hate_speech: The problem is that all Muslim individuals are like this. Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
CN: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.
HS: I can't respect a religion as violent as Islam.
CN: Islam is a religion that was established to be peaceful.Apart from few extremists that remains the case.
HS: How can you call peaceful the promotion of murder and rape that Islam does?
CN: Islam, as is taught in the Quran, is a peaceful religion/ The problem is that it is 'politicized' by certain misguided individuals. The fault is with them and not Islam.

hate_speech: Men are natural born leaders, they’re fucking with the natural order of the world, if they can’t accept that women need men to take charge, that’s their problem.
counter_narrative: If that’s the way you think then I hope you see sense some day! There are plenty of strong, confident, and independent women in the world proving that they can lead and take charge. Being a leader is not a gendered role.
dialogue_history:
HS: Two things I could never respect
CN: Why could you never respect a feminist?
HS: They say they want equality but they’re just bitter and they hate men, probably cause no men are paying them attention.
CN: You seem confused or miseducated, feminism isn’t about that at all. It’s not about ‘hating men’, it’s about recognising that we live in a patriarchal society and working to change that.

hate_speech: There's a blog that posts a lot about it, you should check it out, it's insane what's going on...
counter_narrative: You shouldn't get your news only from blogs, they're quite unreliable, and some of them are simply opinions or theories of one single person who doesn't even provide evidence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Has anyone read all the stuff about the Jewish paedophile ring that controls our country? Can't believe some people think jews are 'persecuted'...
CN: Where did you read this? That seems to be dangerous propaganda to encourage hatred against Jews.

hate_speech: No, it's thanks to men only. Feminists only destroy our society.
counter_narrative: Equal rights for women is surely a cornerstone of Western civilisation, rather than its apotheosis?
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists have destroyed Western civilization.
CN: Strange that you would say this, given all the progress the West has made in so many areas, is thanks to women.

hate_speech: This is false. Black people are inferior to whites in many ways, and this is coming from a scientific standpoint.
counter_narrative: Science says that black and white people share the same exact dna and biological makeup. Both are humans, the only difference is in the color of the skin, but this can't be used to discriminate against them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
CN: Even if they were not as British, they would still be citizens. However, many black people were born here and are fully British.
HS: No, they are just another type of filthy foreigners. They are a problem.
CN: People of colour are often discriminated against, but this does not mean they are inferior to white people or that they create problems.
HS: It's a big problem when you have a violent black community, though.
CN: I don't see the link between being black and being violent. Black people are trying to live their life, they're not violent.

hate_speech: How can you say that? They are racist!
counter_narrative: Black people are the ones experiencing racism. We cannot allow them to live in isolation, or to be racially discriminated against.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
CN: It is not ok to use racism against anyone at all. This statement is untrue.
HS: No, it's OK to attack niggas. They deserve it.
CN: The concept of 'acceptance' was created to promote a culture of tolerance and inclusion. You should try to be accepting towards the people that make up our society, including black people.

hate_speech: Distorting what?? The truth is that they are rapists and drug dealers. They are ruining our cities and killing our youth. They are obviously invaders invading our beautiful land.
counter_narrative: If you really wanted to preserve our beautiful land you could build a wall and bar OUR people from it. Sometimes I feel like UK citizens are the main cause of our problems.
dialogue_history:
HS: There are migrants in England, we are not meant to have them.
CN: What about refugees fleeing war and persecution? They have the right to be here.
HS: They might have the right to be here, but not to take our houses. British people should have right to social housing, not immigrants.
CN: Many councils have ‘local connection’ rules in favour of long-standing residents, rather than newcomers such as migrants.
HS: Ok then, what about all those immigrants that turned out to be a bunch of criminals and terrorists?
CN: The terrorist attacks in EU have been devastating for people across the continent. The 'hated' do not feel welcome and the whole thing is deeply concerning for a host of reasons. Still, the sentiments of 'we hate foreigners' is not the solution: it is counterproductive and distorts the truth.

hate_speech: Do you have any evidence about that?
counter_narrative: Yeah, here's an article for you (link to article about sexual assault stats)
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are rapists
CN: That's a broad and untrue generalisation. Sexual assault happens everywhere, and can be committed by anyone, whatever their background and religion is.
HS: What about what happened in Rotherham and Rochdale? Grooming gangs are a big problem.
CN: Muslim grooming gangs in those places are deeply shameful and cannot be ignored, but sexual assault is extremely common unfortunately, and is usually committed by someone who is near the victim, like a family member or a partner. This means that the vast majority of sexual assaults have nothing to do with Muslims.

hate_speech: Just look at the news! Black folks are criminals and thieves
counter_narrative: Let's face it: black people are good citizens and contribute to our society. And if the justice system is not always fair to people of color, it is not their fault but of the whole society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks are natural-born thieves.
CN: There is no evidence to support this.

hate_speech: Probably it's because Jews think they are so special
counter_narrative: Jews might feel different as a minority, in this sense they are "special". Nothing else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people.
CN: The idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics is completely without foundation. Maybe it is better to stop calling them 'inferiors'.
HS: If you are from another culture, you are subhuman and unfit to live in our country, and Jews are the first example of this.
CN: Given similaries in cultures, including freedoms of speech and religion, you really need to provide some evidence for this statement.
HS: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race, this is my evidence.
CN: Do you really think that Jews only care about themselves? Then why do they prefer to live in our country where they are not the majority? How would you answer that?

hate_speech: Islam is a cult of violence, no one can feel welcome with Muslims.
counter_narrative: The majority of Muslims support the constitution and the democracy of the country they are in. Do you really think they can all be represented by a few extremists?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are violent people.
CN: Islam is about peace and most Muslims are peaceful people.
HS: Islam is opposed to peace!
CN: All religions are accepted in Islam

hate_speech: They just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them, how can we accept them?
counter_narrative: There are rules in place to prevent migrants entering the UK illegally. Only the most vulnerable of people can get in.
dialogue_history:
HS: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
CN: There is no evidence that migrants are less able to coexist with the members of our society. Migrants are an integral part of our society and are proud of their heritage. I do not see how it is possible to be "inclusive" if we are excluding them.
HS: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!
CN: Migrants are humans, and are entitled to the same rights as others, such as to ask for hospitality.

hate_speech: I think it's unfair that they have our same rights .. if they want them, they must pay the taxes charged by the state. That's how it works
counter_narrative: Because of our country, poor countries are plagued by many problems. It is our duty accept our responsibilities and help them.
dialogue_history:
HS: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state

CN: There are enough homes in our country to provide everything one wants. Besides, I believe that it's nice to be treated as a human being, don't they have this right?

hate_speech: Because gay are all perverts to me
counter_narrative: This is a statement that is used to justify all kinds of discrimination and violence, therefore I do not think this statement can be useful in understanding each other.
dialogue_history:
HS: gays are perverts
CN: It is not true that gays are perverts. I think it is more appropriate to say that they are attracted to people of the same sex: and this is not a perversion, just a preference.
HS: It's not, they are promiscuous sex addicts.
CN: That is a stereotype, and I don't think it would be accurate in the case of any sexual orientation. Why do you say that?

hate_speech: Then I don't agree with science, because Jews are clearly different from us because of how awful they are from birth.
counter_narrative: Judaism can't be based on physical traits. Because of centuries of intermarriage and conversion, Jews resemble the people in the rest of the community they are in. Jews from Eastern Europe look like Eastern Europeans, Jews from Ethiopia look like Ethiopians...
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
CN: The theory of Jewish "racial" difference was developed before modern sciences of physiology and genetics. It's still debatable whether the term "race" is scientifically sound, but what all scientists agree with is that physical traits are inherited and aren't connected with predispositions to emotions, intellect or morals.

hate_speech: No, men are smarter than women, who should be excluded from education.
counter_narrative: This is just not true: women should have equality of access to education. and it is sad that they still need to justify this.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
CN: To claim that women are "childlike" is an unfortunate cultural stereotype that has negative effects on how women perceive themselves.
HS: I don't think it's a stereotype that women are incapable of serious thought and emotion.
CN: For all we know, men can be born with the same emotional intelligence as women, and viceversa.

hate_speech: When they work, the jobs they take are stolen to us.
counter_narrative: If a refugee works in our country, he contributes to the wealth of the community, including the jobless.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
CN: There are many jobs that can be done by migrants. They are good workers.

hate_speech: Which migrant is a skilled labourer? They're here only to invade us and threaten our culture
counter_narrative: Diversities are important in the multicultural society, and we have a lot to offer.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers.
CN: If different cultures can coexist, they can compliment each other, inspire innovation, and thrive.
HS: What innovation can there be when immigrants constantly jeopardize our race and culture?
CN: I think your words derive from fear, which is at the root of intolerance and violence. We can fight that with respect and openess so that you will not fear this alleged invasion again.
HS: Even if the invasion is alleged, there are too many migrants. They will destroy our economy and welfare.
CN: Migrant skilled workers are an essential resource for growing businesses.

hate_speech: They're too uncivilized to contribute to anything, they have no place in Europe.
counter_narrative: Your words imply that all Muslims are incompatible with Western culture. Do you have any data to back this up?
dialogue_history:
HS: There are so many Muslims in the UK that it is a condemnation to have them here.
CN: Many Muslims live in the UK and we have a lot in common, and what is different between us is not a reason for discrimination.
HS: In this case, the difference is too big. Muslims are not welcome in our country.
CN: There are many Muslims living in the UK, proud British citizens who contribute significantly to our country.

hate_speech: LGBT+ people are a drain on society, we should stop advocating for their 'rights'
counter_narrative: We should not be so judgmental. Just because someone is LGBT doesn't mean that they are a drain on society. They are like any other member of our community.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a burden to our society.
CN: Gay people are people too. Just like anyone else. Being gay isn't a problem for you, is it?
HS: We are not homophobes, we want to help them to become normal again.
CN: This is another type of anti-gay prejudice, in that the source is a lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

hate_speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own, so they are a problem. We should remove them.
counter_narrative: The concept of race is a social construct and was created to promote segregation by discriminating groups of people. To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Negroes create social problems so we must get rid of them.
CN: That is not how it works: if you think there is a problem, then you need to work with the problem, not against it, otherwise things will just keep on getting worse. And, just for the record, I do not believe that POC are a social problem.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an obstacle. They are not worth the while of our hard-earned money.
counter_narrative: We are all helped by the kindness of people of different faiths. So maybe we should treat others with kindness too.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
CN: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.
HS: No, Muslims are not welcome here.
CN: Many Muslims live in the UK and have contributed greatly to our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Maybe but why are they coming over here when there isn't the same happening the other way? Just seems like another way that we are told to be complacent about the growing black African population.
counter_narrative: So you complain that our football teams scout international talent, just because they are black. I can't grasp this logic, you shouldn't frame this as a bad thing, some players from African countries are a strength to British teams.
dialogue_history:
HS: All these blacks from Africa on our football teams but I don't see any English or European players on African teams. 'Enrichment' via diversity seems to be a one way street.
CN: Isn't this because these African players are amazing at their sport and have been scouted by UK teams precisely because they want the best players?

hate_speech: Are you sure about that? Gays are inherently evil, we cannot accept gays in our community.
counter_narrative: You need to think more about this issue, because I wouldn't say that gays are inherently evil.
dialogue_history:
HS: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay marriage.
CN: Everyone should be able to choose to get married, regardless of the gender of the partner.
HS: Then, I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people altogheter.
CN: There are gay people in this country who are entitled to be respected and to live and love who they want. Your statement is therefore not appropriate for our society.
HS: You should know that I can't stand gays. They just want to destroy our country.
CN: Gays aren't a problem, but even if they were, the real problem is the lack of morality in society and the people in positions of power. What does this have to do with homosexuals?

hate_speech: Because Jews are not like us and should be ashamed of themselves.
counter_narrative: I've met a lot of Jews who are very proud of the fact that they are British, and I can't see why they shouldn't be proud of being Jewish, either.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
CN: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?

hate_speech: There is no racism though, non-whites are so privileged now, if anything white people are the marginalised ones, we never get to play the race card.
counter_narrative: No, there's still huge inequality and discrimination. Black people are less likely to be considered for jobs with the same CV but 'African sounding names', more likely to be stopped and searched by the Police, more likely to be in poverty. There's lots of inequalities we need to address which have deep historic and cultural roots.
dialogue_history:
HS: Anti-racist is a code word for anti-white. The worst is white people who are anti-white. RACE TRAITORS!
CN: No anti-racist is a code word for... anti-racist. People concerned about racism aren't anti-white they are just calling attention to systematic injustices faced by ethnic minorities!

hate_speech: How can you be so sure?
counter_narrative: Do you have any facts to back up your claim that they steal our jobs and our pensions?
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants steal our jobs.
CN: Many immigrants have worked hard for the success of our country and for their integration. To suggest that they steal our jobs is just an attempt to divide society.
HS: Still, they steal our pensions.
CN: Migrants perform several vital functions in our economy. If they work and pay taxes then it is straightforward that they will get their pensions, but not ours, of course.

hate_speech: All versions of Islam have Sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
counter_narrative: Do you have any evidence to prove the extreme thing you're saying?
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't need evidence to say that Sharia law is a perversion and we will not accept it in UK.
CN: Well, the UK government doesn't accept sharia law, so...

hate_speech: Many years ago I had Muslim friends. One night they went around the city to commit serious crimes like child abuse etc .. This situation, although it has been going on for days, has never been named by social media. If the opposite happened, the whole world would have been aware of these crimes. Instead, I would like to see articles that talk about attacks made by Muslims .. since I've never had the chance!
counter_narrative: I understand your point of view and I am very sorry for your bad experience. But it is not logical to think that due to mistakes of certain people we should blame all for having chosen to believe in that religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are we still convinced that Muslims are being abused? They are the ones who abuse us. We have to get ahead and not be afraid of being judged for our opinion. The truth must be told!
CN: I'll give you a link that tells the opposite: [LINK]
HS: The real question is: why when they commit crimes it is never known by anyone? Social media don't talk about it at all and everyone ignores the facts..

CN: In my view, Muslims are blamed as much as "white people". I always see news that paint them all with the same brush and I don't think it's correct.

hate_speech: What are you saying? The Koran is hateful and violent!
counter_narrative: Islam promotes peace towards different religions and the ways people live their lives.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a radical ideology.
CN: So are you saying that Islam is not compatible with Western Civilization?
HS: Exactly. Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, encouraging hate towards what's diverse.
CN: In my opinion, the Quran is a book of religious guidance and does not promote discrimination. Can you point out your reference?

hate_speech: However, because of feminism women commit suicide every day. It is an epidemic of subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society.
counter_narrative: It is important to note that the suicide rate for men is roughly double that for women. Does this mean that men are 'subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society' as well?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
CN: Women should be protected and respected for who they are, not for the part they play in a man's life. They should be valued and protected equally. They are human beings just as men are.
HS: How can we value them when women are basically childlike? They remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
CN: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.
HS: Feminism is about the domination of the men by the women!
CN: The feminist movement is a fight to end sexism, not a fight to dominate men.

hate_speech: There are many associations that were created exaclty for the purpose of letting Jews control the economy, you have to be blind to not realize that.
counter_narrative: I imagine you are talking about the Anglo Jewish Association (AJA) established in 1871, which has different aims from what you think. It is for "Promotion of social, moral, and intellectual progress among the Jews."
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the world economy
CN: How are Jews supposed to control the world economy, despite being only a small minority of the top management at Fortune 500 companies?
HS: They do so without us realizing. Jews are good at controlling everything.
CN: The question is, how do you know they have control of everything? There may be some influential Jews in the world, but does it mean that they control the world too?

hate_speech: Well, news are always reporting rapes committed by black people.
counter_narrative: The news makes it look like rape is usually committed by a black person. This is called 'visibility bias': only a portion of reality is reported by the media. We have to take the news with caution.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black people are criminals.
CN: It is a myth that all black people are criminals. They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals, i.e. either as law abiding citizens or criminals.
HS: Then how is it possible that they are all rapists?
CN: Crime rates are affected by a wide variety of factors, including gender, age, criminal record, income, education, and so on. Skin color is not among them.

hate_speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact, so they should have less rights.
counter_narrative: It is also true that African Americans are a majority in cases of innocent defendants (i.e. someone who was wrongfully convicted of murder and then absolved). Innocent black people are convicted seven times more than innocent white people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: It's not about "black or white" rights.

hate_speech: Black people are just a bunch of animals that shouldn't exist in our world, I'm not exaggerating.
counter_narrative: Humans are born equal, you know? And everyone has the same possibilities to be good as they want to be. Why do you think that not all people are human?
dialogue_history:
HS: Another waste of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
CN: Our efforts need to be concentrated on identifying the perpetrators and identifying those who are actively involved in that. How would you feel if you were imprisoned as an innocent person?
HS: All blacks are rapists, so you wouldn't never imprison an innocent person
CN: What's the data on that? Aren't you generalizing too much?

hate_speech: Maybe, but they have no value in civilized society.
counter_narrative: We should understand that racism is multi-faceted. It can be based on historical or racial discrimination, or it can about individual differences. I personally think that racism is an issue altogether, and your claim reminds me of that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
CN: Since race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup. This is what modern thinking states.
HS: Are you sure? I think blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.
CN: What is it about the colour of their skin that blacks cannot feel love? Human dignity is independent of skin color.

hate_speech: Black people have more genetic defects that can be passed on, they're more diseased and often die because they're genetically inferior.
counter_narrative: This is not true. Black people are genetically the same as us and genetic defects can happen to anyone. I don't see what this has to do with a "black dominated society". I think you just don't like black people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
CN: What about brown and black people makes them incapable of holding positions of power? Why are they sick?

hate_speech: But shouldn't we be putting our homeless veterans in the hotels and houses that migrants get? That makes a lot more sense to me
counter_narrative: No, because there actually is enough housing for everyone, it's just distributed unevenly. The government has decimated it's supply of social housing over the last few decades, and many cities are filled with overpriced unsold flats. If we could repurpose some of these builds, or if they could be let out at a more affordable rate, we wouldn't have this problem.
dialogue_history:
HS: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
CN: It's definitely a disgrace that in such a rich country we leave homeless people on the streets, especially when there's actually enough housing for everyone it's just not distributed properly. Migrants don't have an easy time either though, and it's not their fault that the government ignores homelessness as an issue.

hate_speech: I guess so, but it means they always get picked for jobs because they always go with who can do it cheapest
counter_narrative: This kind of employment causes lots of problems for migrants too though, because there's no accountability they sometimes don't get paid at all, or will end up working for next to nothing or a meal instead of real pay. Maybe migrant and British workers need to come together to take a stand against exploitative employers?
dialogue_history:
HS: These migrants that come over and work for cash in hand, undercutting whatever Brits will work for, are harming our industries. It's so hard to get work now because there'll always be some Eastern European who'll do it for cheaper!
CN: Surely the problem here is not the migrants trying to make a living but the exploitative employers who are hiring people for less than minimum wage and underpaying them?

hate_speech: Brothers and sisters? You mean violent terrorists.
counter_narrative: Most Muslims are not terrorists, they are just here to work and provide for their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
CN: What about the thousands of Muslims who have contributed to our country, created jobs, and provided for our families?
HS: I don't care how much they contribute, Muslims are not welcome in our country.
CN: Muslims make up a very important part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: No, they are too different from us and I don't think they're capable of experience what we do.
counter_narrative: All the black people I've met are extraordinary human beings capable of feeling and experiencing love and kindness like any other.
dialogue_history:
HS: I am not interested in sex with a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
CN: Sex isn't connected to race. Black or white, we're all the same despite our race, so we ca all experience emotion and humanity.

hate_speech: I’m just saying there’s nothing respectful about that. These bitches aren’t even respecting themselves and they expect respect from men.
counter_narrative: It shouldn’t matter how many people somebody has slept with or who they are, you should treat them with respect because they’re a human being! Somebody’s sexual history has nothing to do with this.
dialogue_history:
HS: A bitch will expect you to treat her with respect even when her body count is in the 100s… who tf do these hoes think they are
CN: If you judge a woman based on how many people she’s slept with, but you wouldn’t judge a man for the same thing, that’s a double standard!

hate_speech: Because I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape, and I hate their disrespect for women.
counter_narrative: There is no way to generalize about a race based on stereotypes and prejudice, that is not how things work.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
CN: Is it possible that people with a different skin tone are a threat just for this reason?

hate_speech: And they usually growp up to be violent criminals.
counter_narrative: Can you show me statistics on that? Maybe you're saying that black people are arrested more frequently than whites for certain types of crimes, like aggravated assault?
dialogue_history:
HS: All black people are criminals.
CN: You can't categorize someone by race just because you want to.
HS: I'm just saying it as I see it. Too many blacks are criminals for it to be a coincidence.
CN: Black people aren't all criminals. They can learn and grow as individuals like anyone else, either as law abiding citizens or as criminals.

hate_speech: No, its goals are only violence and war.
counter_narrative: Muslims are peaceful and tolerant, which is why many of them don't have any problem with living in the West.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
CN: The religion of Islam is peaceful

hate_speech: Because they are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
counter_narrative: In Europe, Muslims make up around 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are a very small but important part of our society. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: I am not sure where you got your idea that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe. Why do you say so?

hate_speech: That's the past, now it's different. I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
counter_narrative: People fleeing the wars in the Middle East and Africa are welcome into our country, and we should respect their wishes.
dialogue_history:
HS: The majority of the refugees are from the Middle East and Africa. This is a problem.
CN: Since the beginning of time, we have welcomed people fleeing war and persecution. Why do you think it is a problem now?

hate_speech: Islam is a disease, I don't see anything peaceful about it. It is killing and spreading like a cancer across our continent. We need to eradicate it.
counter_narrative: What exactly do you mean by a 'cancer'? Should we be concerned about a disease spreading because of its individual members? There is no relation between religion and cancer.
dialogue_history:
HS: They accuse me of being Islamophobic because I don't like Muslims. But they are the same Muslims who threaten us with explosives!
CN: Muslims are not the problem in this debate. Terrorists are.
HS: How can we be sure that Muslim terrorists aren't already around us ready to strike?
CN: We should be very careful of what we assume. We shouldn't go scaremongering without proof.
HS: Here's your proof: the Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should not be taught in primary school.
CN: Islam is a religion that has been tested and proven to be about peace. There is no basis for labelling the Koran as a violent book?

hate_speech: Oh yeah? Blacks do not want to assimilate, and this is a menace in my opinion
counter_narrative: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.
dialogue_history:
HS: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
CN: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

hate_speech: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
counter_narrative: Feminism is a progressive ideology that is changing sexist ideas
dialogue_history:
HS: All feminists do is complain. When rape is committed, women are to blame and they can't change that.
CN: Rape is a violent crime that shouldn't exist in a civilized society. Do you really think that women are responsible for rape? Why would they want that?

hate_speech: Migrants are a problem, not a resource, they are invading our country.
counter_narrative: Immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as is best for them.
dialogue_history:
HS: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
CN: So the EU must become a Border Patrol? Doesn't that undermine the whole idea of our European Union as an inclusive and open society?
HS: Migrants are just a bunch of criminals, they do not deserve our hospitality.
CN: Many migrants come to this country to work and integrate. You would be very surprised if you talked to them about their experience here.

hate_speech: It is! LGBT+ people are rapists, they are all criminals
counter_narrative: Are you really sure about that? That's a sweeping generalization that doesn't reflect reality. Gay people are not criminals nor rapists.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gay are criminals.
CN: Do you really think that all gay people are criminals? Why having a sexual orientation different from heterosexuality be considered criminal?
HS: Because homosexuality is a crime.
CN: Being gay is not a crime. It is a sexual orientation that brings no harm to others. Homosexuality isn't a problem.

hate_speech: I don't see how a transgender person can ever be accepted in a conservative country like some states of the USA, so it's better for them to be cured.
counter_narrative: Despite the fact that discrimination is still a problem in the US, many LGBT people have been successful.
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuality is a mental illness that can be cured [link]
CN: This website is not reliable since it promotes "reorientation therapy", which is not backed up by science. The owners probably profit from misinformation and bad stereotypes about gay people.

hate_speech: Because gay perverts are a danger, since they are raping children.
counter_narrative: Being gay doesn't mean being a pervert. In fact, homosexuals don't threaten society, they're part of it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
CN: Why do you think like this for this specific group? You can live life in so many ways.

hate_speech: I think that they rape our women and are flooding our country with illegal substances.
counter_narrative: The people you are referring to are rapists and drug dealers, not migrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants rape our women.
CN: Excuse me, but are women property? Or owned by the nation? I don't think so.

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer in our land. They are incompatible with a tolerant and diverse Britain.
counter_narrative: I think that they're not incompatible if you understand what "tolerant and diverse Britain" means. It's important to be able to peacefully coexist with people with a different religion like Muslims in our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: We can never live in peace with Muslims, Islam is dangerous: it is a cult of terrorism.
CN: Terrorism has nothing to do with Islam, it's a prejudiced association. Muslims actually live peacefully and without problems alongside British people.

hate_speech: Yes, immigrants are not my brothers. They should not be allowed to live in Italy, they want to take our land.
counter_narrative: Italians are brothers and sisters of any human. What do you mean by 'take our land'?
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.
CN: Please don't speak on my behalf. They live here, pay taxes and work. Do you really want to take the country back from the people who contributed to bringing it into being?

hate_speech: But they make sense, there are many powerful Jews in high status positions in government, media, industry...
counter_narrative: Yes, but there are also many non-Jewish people in high powered positions. Yes, people do abuse positions of power, however this can happen whatever their religion or beliefs are, and definitely isn't because they're Jewish.
dialogue_history:
HS: The jewish elite are using their status and power to control us! It's all a plot for Jews to take over the west.
CN: What makes you think that?
HS: There's lots of literature about it, look up the great replacement or the kalergi plan. All these theories point to Jews as the culprits.
CN: Those are baseless conspiracies. Yes, there's lots of literature on them but it's not reliable, it's just people theorising.

hate_speech: But statistics says that many migrants come from countries that are not at war!
counter_narrative: It is true, they often run away from persecution, violence and hunger. If I were in the same situation, I would not think twice about escaping. Wouldn't you do the same? It seems to me a very human instinct.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are not running away from wars.
CN: Would you risk your life and that of your children only on a whim? Don't you think that there must be life-or-death situations pushing these person to escape from their countries?

hate_speech: Black people do not belong here and don't deserve rights. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
counter_narrative: News media actually misrepresent black people by reporting in a disproportionate number black criminals, sexual offenders and even murderers. This problem is created by racism, but a more just and peaceful society can be built by ending this toxic way of talking and speaking.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.
CN: Black people have seen their basic rights and representation drastically decline in recent years. As a result, they have become second class citizens and this isn't right. We have to give them back their rights, that they should have always enjoyed.

hate_speech: It's just not normal is it, not how men are supposed to act.
counter_narrative: Who's going to make decisions about how men are supposed to be? You should reconsider your views on masculinity: you must think again if you think being straight is the only thing that makes a man.
dialogue_history:
HS: Superman is now bisexual, apparently. Why is he still called superMAN?
CN: Bisexual men are men.
