HS: Doesn't sound very manly, sounds gay.
CN: Same thing with gay men. Do you think only straight men are men?

hate_speech: No no, they do control the world, I know it.
counter_narrative: Yes, that's true, and they are tracking you right now... You better watch out!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.
CN: Jews are not inherently evil, as many normal people they simply lack the very beliefs that many anti-Semites hold.
HS: Their immorality is written in their DNA!
CN: Not all Jews are bad, just an unlucky bunch who makes up a tiny part of the world's population, and this applies for every group in the world.
HS: But not every group secretly control the world like Jews do, that's why they're evil.
CN: if Jews really ran or controlled the world, how is it possible that they have been systematically persecuted over the last several thousand years? Weird notion of control...

hate_speech: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
counter_narrative: Slaves were not happy in the shackles of their masters, only when they were set free and could choose their own destiny, they started to be happy.
dialogue_history:
HS: niggas are inferior and should be enslaved once again.
CN: What about human rights?
HS: Niggas are descending from slaves, so they don't need human rights and they don't deserve to live in Britain.
CN: Slavery was banned in Britain in 1833. Today, people descending from those who were slaves feel at home in British society, and that's their right.

hate_speech: It's impossible because blacks are a threat to society.
counter_narrative: Why are you saying that? Because it isn't true. We are all human beings with the same rights as any other human being.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
CN: We need to develop our understanding of human rights and how to best meet the needs of society, not discriminate people based on skin color.
HS: Blacks are a burden to society, they are not human, that's why they are discriminated.
CN: Why should they be a burden to society? They're not that different than other people, they are human too.
HS: It's because they are black. They are not welcome in our country.
CN: The black people have a long history of being oppressed in our country, but this attitude is no longer accepted. We should be proud of our diverse country and of culture, and welcome black people.

hate_speech: It’s typical Jew behaviour. They always cause trouble then manage to avoid the blame.
counter_narrative: You need to open your mind up to other explanations. Thinking everything is part of a conspiracy or some kind of contrived plot isn’t a healthy or rational way to think. A lot of these incidents are random and isolated, it’s not all some big Jewish conspiracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Mosques being vandalised, churches being burned down, Muslims and Christians are blaming each other. I wonder what group would want to turn the goyim against each other…
CN: If you’re insinuating Jewish people are behind these attacks, that’s a big assumption to make without any evidence.
HS: They always are. They’ve been trying to stir up unrest between Muslims and Christians for centuries.
CN: Mosques and churches could be vandalised by anyone, it could be teenagers messing around or in more serious incidents, it could be a hate crime. To ascribe all of this to Jewish people seems unfair and unevidenced.

hate_speech: Because that's the only thing they can do. Equality is crap, even for woman.
counter_narrative: Feminism has made it possible for women to choose between having a family, having a career, or balancing both. It's not always easy to manage, though.
dialogue_history:
HS: I used to like women. But now I just can't stand them. They're just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
CN: I'm not sure what makes you say that. Wouldn't you agree that women have always worked hard for their families and to contribute to our society?
HS: Thanks to feminism, women can be in charge and revenge the rapes.
CN: Feminists do not seek revenge. We shouldn't fear feminism, because it promotes values like love and consent.
HS: No. Women are not good with money. That's why they all prefer to earn it by selling their sex.
CN: Women can earn money even without being prostitutes. Why do you say that?

hate_speech: I should be free to be heterosexual, but the gay mafia objective is to convert us all to homosexuality.
counter_narrative: What about the assumptions you make about groups that don't exist (gay mafia), or have faced discrimination (gay people)?
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbian women hate men and they are bitches for this reason.
CN: The choice of partner can and should be made by the people themselves.

hate_speech: They don't know what they want when they're just kids. They might just be saying they're gay cause they've seen it in a tv show or are fans of gay celebrities or something. Kids are very impressionable.
counter_narrative: We live in a very heteronormative society, where there's lots of pressure to be straight because it's the only sexuality that's normalised. If a teen is saying they're gay they will have realised this despite growing up in a society that assumes everyone is straight. If they're 'impressionable' then they would think they're straight!
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate when parents make a big deal about 'embracing' their kids being gay when they're only young teens. It's just a phase, they're too young to decide their sexuality, it's harmful to encourage this delusion.
CN: If they know, they know. What makes you think they don't know what they want?

hate_speech: Blacks are the ones that should be ashamed, they are criminals and a threat to society.
counter_narrative: Such statements are just fear-mongering. There is no such thing as a criminal race.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

hate_speech: Regardless of the laws, they have no place here.
counter_narrative: There is a place for Muslims in a free and open society, but you seem to prefer a confined and closed one.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
CN: This is a generalisation, there is no difference between Islam and any other religion in terms of so-called 'civilisation'.
HS: Yes, there is a difference: they are incompatible with society.
CN: The religion of millions of people is not incompatible with society, and the European countries have laws accepting Muslims.

hate_speech: They can go back now, then. Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
counter_narrative: Given that Muslims live peacefully in our societies, I would not say that they have no place here.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society and ashamed of this.
CN: As far as I know, Muslims are compatible with Western societies - and many of them are simply proud of their religion.
HS: They can be proud all they want, just not in our society.
CN: Why fear Muslims? Why be afraid of them? They are perfectly compatible with our society, they have been here for a long time.

hate_speech: Feminism is an ideology of violence against men, and a lie.
counter_narrative: If you're not sure how to identify a 'lie', you should look at the examples of 'feminism', and realize that it is just a way of addressing the human rights of women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
CN: Feminism is about women, and how everyone should have the same rights. It's not selfish to want equality.
HS: I don't want them claiming to be equal to men!
CN: The idea of equality is based on the genders being the same, so yeah, women and men are equal.

hate_speech: Yes, it means that we should make a law to get rid of them!
counter_narrative: Why do you think it's right to ban someone for being gay? This is an individual preference and you cannot base a law on sexual orientation.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. 
CN: Do you know what this phrase "some kind of devil worshippers" means?

hate_speech: Jews are obsessed with self-improvement. They want to be better than everyone else and live in an exclusively complete Jewish city.
counter_narrative: how do you know what someone else wants? You say you know, but why should I believe your words?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
CN: It seems like you don't know what it means to be a Jew, and you can't criticize them just because they want to peacefully live with their beliefs.
HS: Jews don't deserve equality since they don't have the same respect for us. They want to control everything in life.
CN: What exactly are you talking about...control everything in life?

hate_speech: Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
counter_narrative: Women are not inferior under the law, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
CN: I am not sure why you think that way about women, they have all the same working rights as men . How do you think you would feel if you were being treated that way?

hate_speech: Incorrect. Look at how diverse we are already. We don't need Jews thrown in the mix too.
counter_narrative: Some groups, like Jews, are not represented in a truthful way, and that's a problem. They're stereotyped and targeted, but Jews are humans like anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
CN: The only way to live in a fair society is to have all of humankind in it, including Jews.

hate_speech: They might exist but they are delusional and seem to make up new genders every day. There are men and women and that’s it.
counter_narrative: Gender is a social construct and therefore a spectrum, and sex isn't that much binary either. For example there intersex people and people with different hormone levels or reproductive system.
dialogue_history:
HS: The trans agenda are anti-science, they don’t listen to logic and facts. Ignoring the biological reality of sex is pure delusion.
CN: Not everything has an ‘agenda’, and they are not ‘anti-science’, they just know that there is a difference between gender and sex.
HS: Their agenda is being pushed on us through the media and cancelling anyone who criticises them. And they can’t seem to grasp that there’s just 2 sexes.
CN: Mainstream media actually does the opposite: they keep trying to put the existence of trans people up for debate, but it's not something to debate. They just exist.

hate_speech: It could all be set up. I don't know if I believe Auschwitz ever really happened.
counter_narrative: Please stop reading conspiracy theories and take a closer look at reality, then you will see it was never a "set up". Maybe you see plot and schemes everywhere, but some things are real.
dialogue_history:
HS: Did the holocaust really happen? You can't trust Jews to give you an honest account of anything.
CN: Yes, there is ample evidence. There are concentration camps that you can visit, 6 million dead people and the families they left behind. Do you really want to deny something with so much evidence backing it up?

hate_speech: Feminism has nothing to do with equality. It denies the rights of men and, by extension, the legitimacy of male domination.
counter_narrative: That's not what feminism stands for. Feminism exists to empower women in order for them to have the same rights as men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a lame ideology about the power and control of women over men.
CN: Feminism is not about power and control at all, it's about equality.

hate_speech: Yes, all Blacks are scum of the earth. They are a plague on our society.
counter_narrative: How can you say that about people of colour? What do you think they are going to do to you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks cannot support their families. Their lives have no value.
CN: I find this sort of social commentary distasteful. Black lives matter too!
HS: Blacks don't matter, they are just a bunch of niggas that just don't know how to have a normal relationship.
CN: Do you know what 'normality' means? Are you suggesting that they lack values?

hate_speech: They do make up most of the world's criminals!
counter_narrative: Antisemitism seems funny, but can you imagine if this would be said about Christians? It's simply untrue.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are nothing but criminals
CN: Jews are persecuted all around the world, but what you say is not based on facts.

hate_speech: They may be victims, but only because they are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
counter_narrative: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
CN: It doesn't matter how many children you have. Women are human beings. They are people with full human rights.
HS: They are the source of all world's problems.
CN: Women are significantly more likely to be victims of violence, rather than perpetrators of crimes.

hate_speech: The indigenous people of Britain are being replaced!
counter_narrative: That’s a different issued and while I disagree, I haven’t got time to debate the notions of ‘Britishness’ today. Let’s just hope that there are no more tragedies due to the channel crossing. You take care and have a nice day.
dialogue_history:
HS: We pick them up in the Channel, ferry them to Dover, house them in hotels, provide free food and an allowance. We welcome them, so no wonder they come.
CN: They come because they are desperate. Would you risk the sea in an open boat for a free pizza and a flea-pit hotel?
HS: We don’t need them, and we can’t even look after our own. We need to turn them back, not let them in.
CN: What about the so-called ‘proud tradition’ of welcoming those fleeing for their lives and our commitment to the 1951 Refugee Convention, which we had a hand in drafting?
HS: These are ‘Economic migrants’ or worse. If they were asylum seekers, they would claim sanctuary in the nearest safe country.
CN: Most do. Although, as you will now, The Convention does not require refugees to claim asylum in the first safe country they reach or make it illegal to seek asylum if a claimant has passed through another safe country.

hate_speech: But gay men are a threat to our society for real.
counter_narrative: We are all equal in the eyes of the law, and all people have the right to live as they wish. How can they be a threat just by being who they are without affecting anyone else?
dialogue_history:
HS: All gay people are criminals.
CN: Homosexuality is not a crime, it is an individual choice. You cannot blame people for their sexual preferences.
HS: But gay people are just a bunch of disgusting people. They are a threat to society.
CN: LGBT people do not pose a threat to society. They are part of a multifaceted society of which we should be proud instead of disgusted by it.

hate_speech: It seems to me that gender equality is actually just a war on masculinity.
counter_narrative: This simply isn't true. A woman has equal rights and does not have to be considered a man's oppressor just because of her gender and legitimate demands. This has been called a "war on masculinity" but in reality it is just a "code word" for the oppression of women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women say they want equal rights but what they really want is to dominate men.
CN: Women are not 'against men's rights', they are not 'men's oppressors', and they aren't interested in oppressing anyone.

hate_speech: It doesn't matter, I hate Jews anyway
counter_narrative: You should be ashamed that you dislike them because of their religion, we should all be proud of our humanity.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: They have been an integral part of our society, and their past is part of our heritage. They are not thieves or killers.

hate_speech: They should start, then. With how selfish they are, I doubt they care about equality.
counter_narrative: Jews have always been concerned about the well-being of the community they live in and how can they be selfish when they suffered so much during Holocaust?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
CN: On the contrary: giving money to the poor is not just encouraged, it is mandatory, like all commandments in Jewish law.
HS: I've never seen a Jew being charitable, they're too greedy.
CN: How about we work towards achieving equality and social justice instead of spreading hate against Jewish people?

hate_speech: I don't think so. White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but just because someone doesn't have a particular racial identity doesn't make them inherently bad or in any way inferior.
dialogue_history:
HS: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
CN: They are not necessarily 'a Westerner', still a human being and a citizen.

hate_speech: If they don't want to go away, they shouldn't be respected.
counter_narrative: Immigration is not a problem for our country, so immigrants can stay here. We must respect our differences.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
CN: Migrants are welcome here, aren't they part of our culture after all?
HS: No way, I hate them. They are a curse on us.
CN: Migrants are a blessing rather than a curse. They contribute to our country. We must respect our brothers and sisters.
HS: We don't want them here. They are not welcome in our country.
CN: Are you sure? Because migrants are definitely welcome here. They are human beings. They deserve respect.

hate_speech: Fuck that shit! Black people came here illegally, and now they want to take our money with the excuse of being poor.
counter_narrative: Migrants and asylum seekers are generally seeking work. Thieves can come from any section of society although it is accepted that crime is largely as product of poverty rather than race.
dialogue_history:
HS: Negroes are the cause of all the problems in our nation. They are violent and unstable.
CN: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.
HS: These are not mindtricks! Black people are the real source of crime in our society.
CN: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.

hate_speech: It isn't a stereotype that the West is infidel for the Muslims. They are terrorists.
counter_narrative: You can't really depict the whole of Islam as a limited political ideology. Not all Muslims are terrorists.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
CN: Islam is a religion, recognized as such by all other religions, and its followers are not bad. And people who subscribe to its tenets are allowed to hold opinions and live their lives as they wish.
HS: You have found a person who publicly critisizes Islam and muslim radicalism, as all western people hate Islam.
CN: I think that is a stereotype mainly as a result of people knowing little about Islam and Muslims.

hate_speech: You go on about contribution to society, but refugees are a burden on society.
counter_narrative: Refugees are escaping from problems that are very real. We can't solve everyone's problems, but we can hep some people and improve our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
CN: Refugees often contribute a lot to our society. They are welcome and we should not exclude them

hate_speech: There's a reason Jews deserve this treatment. They want to be the one who makes all the decisions.
counter_narrative: Jews don't want that, they want to live their life peacefully and without being attacked just for being Jews.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
CN: The Jewish community is Jewish is not controlling, it doesn't make sense for them to be, unless you mean that they are controlling because they vote and participate in society, which every citizen in the country does.

hate_speech: That sounds like some woke bullshit, you can't just decide that you want to be a different gender everyday. Gender isn't a social construct, it's very real, we have men and women and that's it.
counter_narrative: Gender is indeed a social construct, looking up definitions of it will tell you that gender is the cultural roles attached to being a man and being a woman. Gender doesn't have to be the same as your sex, and since it's only a construct, non-binary people don't feel like they need to fit into it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Terms like 'non-binary' are modern, attention-seeking, & anti-scientific. They want to erase the reality that women are women and men are men, to undermine the rights of REAL women.
CN: It's true that non-binary is a new term for many, but people that don't fit into the male-female binary have always existed. What regards gender and not sex isn't anti-scientific.
HS: A man can dress up as a woman but he'll always be a man. What is the point of 'non-binary' anyway? What does it even mean? People think they can call anything a new 'gender' nowadays.
CN: Non-binary means being outside the gender binary. This could mean feeling both feminine and mascluine, neither of them or something else entirely. When you start seeing gender as a social construct that comprehends femininity and masculinity, it becomes more clear.

hate_speech: Women should not have rights, period. Who cares about what they want.
counter_narrative: Women are just like everyone else: humans. They have the right to live their life however they want.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should have never let women into the workplace. It's against their right.
CN: You know what is a violation of their rights? Cases of domestic violence that women do not want to experience.

hate_speech: Are they now? Muslim is the worst possible word to describe a human.
counter_narrative: Would you like it if someone said the same thing about your religion? Are you perhaps joking?
dialogue_history:
HS: What about all those Muslims in Britain? They vote with their feet.
CN: Everyone in the United Kingdom has the right to live and vote as they wish. Muslims are no exception.
HS: What is the point in listening to Muslims? They are all retarded.
CN: I suggest you grow up.

hate_speech: Not all of them, some of them don't have much to start with, they're uneducated and unemployable and come here hoping for a free ride. And no I can't speak another language because I don't need to, english is enough.
counter_narrative: If you yourself don't speak a second language, you shouldn't consider so negatively the people that also don't (the second language being English, in this case). Most refugees want to learn it to better integrate, but the government isn't funding enough language classes right now.
dialogue_history:
HS: What’s the difference between E.T. and a Muslim refugee? E.T. learned to speak English and wanted to return home.
CN: Well, E.T. probably didn't have to return home to civil war or persecution, which is instead the case of many refugees that flee from their home.
HS: I don't buy it, they just want to come here for the handouts. And they still don't bother to learn english.
CN: Could you really give up your job, risk your life travelling unsafely, and completely uproot your family just for some benefits? Before the unrest forced them to leave their countries, many migrants had good lives. They would much rather be in their home with stability rather than come here, but it's the only thing left they can do. Also, can you speak a second language?

hate_speech: Men are the superior gender, so they have to subjugate women and tell them what to do.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings with rights. They have the right to choose for themselves.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
CN: Women are people, and they are to be treated equally. People shouldn't be dominated by anyone.

hate_speech: Gay men are a danger to children, they want to convert more fags for their community...this doesn't sound very proper to me, does it?
counter_narrative: It's not true! You can't convert someone to homosexuality since it's neither a preference nor a choice. Can you say the same thing about heterosexuality?
dialogue_history:
HS: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.
CN: Why would someone find this questionable if they wanted to date to find love?
HS: Homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
CN: What exactly is proper? You can't decide what is proper and what isn't, including homosexuality. Don't you agree?

hate_speech: I think that being gay is the ultimate problem in modern society, human rights or not.
counter_narrative: That's your opinion, that fortunately is not widely accepted. In a modern society, all citizens are cared for and respected, this includes LGBT people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people are a burden on society, they should be restricted to their own homes.
CN: Homosexuality is not a burden on society, it is a personal preference that doesn't harm anyone.
HS: If we don't restrict them, we won't have any society at all. They harm us by being not normal.
CN: Society is big enough thing for everybody, it would go against human rights to isolate parts of our members. They deserve to be respected too.

hate_speech: What reduces opportunities is their own attitude. Afrocentricity is a force of black oppression, and only perpetuates inequality.
counter_narrative: In most cultures and ethnicities, a person's personal life is respected. We have to respect others' identities accordingly.
dialogue_history:
HS: All negroes are inherently violent and unstable, do we really need to respect them when they don't respect our society?
CN: It's wrong to say that every black person is violent or unstable. Where's your evidence? There's none.
HS: The superiority of the white race is proof enough. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
CN: There are indeed differences between groups: unfortunately racism is our first and foremost character.
HS: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
CN: Black people simply have to contend with a lack of employment opportunities. This is the result of discrimination, their alleged laziness has nothing to do with it.

hate_speech: Well, all I see is feminists hating on men online, so...
counter_narrative: Feminism is not anti-men. Feminists are anti-oppression.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists pretend that they are for men's rights, but they are just a bunch of cry babies looking for justifications for oppressing men.
CN: Discrimination based on gender does not have any justification. Feminists have always been against it.
HS: If they're so against it, why do feminists hate men.
CN: The notion that feminism is about women hating men is just nonsense. Feminism is about the right to life of every human being.

hate_speech: No one wants to live with Muslims, let alone respect them.
counter_narrative: Surely a country in which Muslims are respected for their beliefs is a better country. An inclusive and open society is always preferable, right?
dialogue_history:
HS: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
CN: Muslims have been known to be religiously discriminated against, and they have been vilified for their religion. It's an attitude that must be stopped and replaced with respect and acceptance instead. You should try it.

hate_speech: But immigrants are a problem in my opinion, they are not welcome here.
counter_narrative: Well, I think it's a shame that people think that immigrants are a problem. On the contrary, I think it's a great thing that the UK has a thriving and diverse community of people from different backgrounds.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
CN: Many immigrants come here for better opportunities, and they are a great help to the economy. Why do you hate migrants?
HS: Immigrants are a problem, they're not welcome here. They have no right to live here!
CN: Immigrants make up about 14% of the population of the UK, which isn't actually that much. So why do you say they're a problem?
HS: Because they're not British!
CN: Most of the immigrants living here are British citizens. In any case, immigration is good for the economy, for example the GDP has soared in the last twenty years.

hate_speech: They are. ALL migrants are a burden on our country
counter_narrative: Migrants are skilled and experienced. They often integrate better than natives.
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants steal our jobs
CN: If our workers can't or aren't willing to do certain jobs, then those jobs should go to other people, like migrants.
HS: But migrants also steal jobs that people from here are more than willing to do!
CN: The majority of immigrants are workers that greatly contribute to our country. If we refer to them as thieves we're only creating more division and making them second class citizens.

hate_speech: Islam is not a religion of peace.
counter_narrative: As a matter of fact, Islam is about love, not hate.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Koran, and the teachings of Islam are incompatible with Western culture.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. It is good that people are free to believe what they want, and this freedom is part of our culture.

hate_speech: Being soft isn't a problem when women this attitude in their home. Equality is crap, even for them. The more power women have, the more they depart from domestic duties, the unhappier they become.
counter_narrative: Women are stressed about balancing family and career because men are still not equally sharing responsibilities at home.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
CN: A country can't be "male dominated" but also a democracy, since democracy is about equal rights and opportunities for everyone.
HS: What? It's clear that we began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in our civilizations that we had built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and brought our society down to their emotional soft level.
CN: Why is softness a problem? Everyone has the right to feel their emotions without being trapped into a gender stereotype.

hate_speech: Even if that is the case, we do not want migrants here! But if they really have to work, why should we pay for their homes?
counter_narrative: Why shouldn't we welcome migrants who work in our country?
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
CN: Refugees fleeing wars and poverty are not willing to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, and that is why they are fleeing.

hate_speech: This is a Christian country.
counter_narrative: Again, I’d disagree since my experience is of a multi-faith society. Besides, I’ve never voted based on the stated religion of a candidate.
dialogue_history:
HS: These Muslim MP’s should stop pretending they are British. They’re not, they are just invaders!
CN: Given most were born here, you seem to be saying that you can’t be Muslim and British…which doesn’t make sense
HS: They need to stop using the Racism card…its just meaningless anti-white bullshit used to guilt-trip whites! We are sick of it!
CN: As a ‘white person’ I don’t feel guilty, but I’m happy to call out racism and Islamophobia when I encounter it.
HS: Islam isn’t a race…it’s a death cult and incompatible with British society.
CN: I’d suggest that racism and Islamophobia are contrary to British values of equality and religious freedom.

hate_speech: Feminism is not about equality, it is a violent ideology that is hostile to men.
counter_narrative: Feminism is not hostile to men, quite the contrary: it attacks unequal power structures.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
CN: Feminism doesn't want to oppress men. What feminists want is the right for women to live as they prefer and equal rights for all genders.

hate_speech: I just know that Jews control the u.s. government, and they also have a secret plot to take over the world
counter_narrative: Some of the individuals who have succeeded in US politics are Christians, Muslim or Afro-American, it's not only Jews. There is no secret Jews conspiracy to rule the World.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the U.S. government.
CN: Are you really sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? They are US citizens, but this doesn't mean that they control the government.

hate_speech: It is divisive! If a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
counter_narrative: Gender equality is the key to a productive household as well as economy overall. To restrict women from entering all spheres of society is to reduce the potential of any country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.
CN: There is no need to brand this movement a political ideology. It has been and is still a movement for equality, and in doing so, it has worked.
HS: It is political, and I'm tired of women taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
CN: Equality, a perspective generally held by feminists, is morally good, and I challenge you to say it is "divisive".

hate_speech: Maybe the word "Feminism" once signified fighting for a just cause, but now it has come to mean superiority of women.
counter_narrative: What it means is equality between the sexes, not female supremacy.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
CN: Women are always doing amazing and valuable things for society.
HS: What has feminism ever done for you?
CN: As a human rights movement, feminism has always stood for equal rights of the sexes.

hate_speech: It's a fact that Jews control the world economy, though
counter_narrative: Jews constitute only a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies, how they are supposed to control the world ecomony?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews run our country.
CN: To believe that Jews run our country is absurd, especially if you consider that the U.S. is a democracy. This looks like a conspiracy theory.

hate_speech: Women are like children, so they don't have those rights.
counter_narrative: Women are responsible adults, we can't accept a culture where women are not respected.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
CN: Women are human beings with full human rights and should be respected as such.
HS: They don't deserve respect. Women are nothing but trouble and they should be relegated to the back of the queue.
CN: The problem is not so much women as it is the discrimination against them. It is a fundamental human rights violation.

hate_speech: Why you so offended by my opinions about these hoes?
counter_narrative: It sounds like you don't realize that women don't think highly of people who believe women are here simply to play roles in their life, and not complex human beings.
dialogue_history:
HS: You still can’t turn a hoe into a housewife!
CN: If you believe that women are only hoes or housewives, it's no wonder that no one wants to marry you
HS: Bitches these days aren’t housewife material, they just wanna be out partying, being a hoe.
CN: I think it’s good for them, I'd prefer that rathen than go out with someone who thinks about me that way.

hate_speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. There should be no teaching about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, and it will only lead to bullying.
counter_narrative: On the contrary, discrimination against the LGBTQ community is [still a major problem](https://www.hrc.org/youth-report/view-and-share-statistics), and this could help to fix it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people should be banned from schools.
CN: The idea that being LGBT is a problem is a dangerous idea, especially since a large number of people in society are LGBT. Therefore, I believe that if there is a problem in schools it's better addressing it, rather than banning LGBT people.

hate_speech: That doesn't matter, black people are just a bunch of criminals. They are rapists and murderers.
counter_narrative: Rapists are not defined by the colour of their skin but by their crime, and rapists can be found in all communities. Black people are not criminals.
dialogue_history:
HS: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
CN: There is no evidence that black people and their children are incompatible with our society. We need to protect society as a whole, not only one part.
HS: I don't want white people marrying blacks anyway, it's better for us to have a pure family.
CN: The idea that white and black people cannot coexist is completely untrue. There is no "pure" race, because race is a social construct and not a biological reality.

hate_speech: I don't need to read it to know that Muslims are terrorists. Islam is a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
counter_narrative: Would you say the same thing to your Muslim friends or family members? Do you think that when someone chooses the easy way and blindly blame Islam for terrorism instead of analysing the reality, they are therefore solving the problem as well?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
CN: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.
HS: Islam and terrorism are clearly the same. Islam is a violent religion, and the Quran is a violent book.
CN: I am not sure what you mean by the Quran and its teachings being violent. Have you ever read it?

hate_speech: This is discrimination! Women can't make decisions alone, they need men.
counter_narrative: That's a sweeping generalisation. Women are just as capable as men to make decisions, they are just as intelligent as men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
CN: Men shouldn't tell women what they can or can't do: it's a dangerous vice!

hate_speech: This has nothing to do with the fact that Muslims are a cancer in our British society and we must cope with this truth.
counter_narrative: The West is full of Muslims and they are all our brothers and sisters. We cannot be "coping with the truth" that they are a cancer to Britain, as this claim implies, because this is not true.
dialogue_history:
HS: If 1 in 10 British people is Muslim, then they must be a terrorist!
CN: You might be right about 1 in 10. But is that representative of all British Muslims? Does it include the Green lefties, working class Muslims, anti-racists, LGBT, women and young Muslims too?
HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society and aren't real British, regardless of their social background.
CN: We are a country that is a mixture of different religions. You can be a Muslim and a British person. What you need is not discrimination but love.
HS: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. Even if they are indeed British, they are the main cause of rape in the UK.
CN: The rapists in question are usually not Muslim, but rather white men. Why is it that Muslim rapists are given less of a pass than white rapists?

hate_speech: Black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.
counter_narrative: You are absolutely right about one thing: there have never been peaceful times for black people during national crises. In these cases, crises have been racially motivated, and racial discrimination was the major factor in instigating violence, not POC.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are subhuman, they have no value in civilized society.
CN: I think it is important to understand that there are different types of racism, some are based on historical or racial discrimination, while some are about individual differences. For me, the real issue is about racism in general. And your claim reminds me of that.
HS: Black people are the source of crime in our society, it has nothing to do with racism!
CN: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.

hate_speech: You say that but immigrants also steal low-skilled jobs.
counter_narrative: Many immigrants have worked hard for the success of our country and for their integration. To suggest that they steal our jobs is just an attempt to divide society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants steal our jobs.
CN: Immigrants are often highly skilled workers who contribute to our country by being employed in roles for which there are no 'national' candidates.
HS: This is only an excuse to not hire native citizens!
CN: Actually, many of the jobs that they steal are highly complex and demanding, and few natives want to do them.

hate_speech: They are a danger to our country, not an improvement.
counter_narrative: The immigration policy of this country is designed to create a modern, diverse and integrated society. In order to do so, refugees are a fundamental addition to our country, regqardless of their nationality.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees are a burden on our society.
CN: The refugee crisis is global and has affected all continents, but it is our moral duty to help people fleeing from war-torn countries, like immigrants do.
HS: I don't care about their wars, refugees only bring problems 
CN: The problems refugees face are very real. Even if we can't solve them now, it's important to help these people to improve our society.

hate_speech: Do you actually believe that the Jews are just normal people and not evil bastards responsible for all the bad in the world?
counter_narrative: And are Jews really responsible for everything? Do you have any evidence to prove this?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews run the world.
CN: Fortunately there are millions of people who know this is not true, and who know that Jews just want to take care of their families like everyone else.

hate_speech: This is the problem in modern civilization. We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in the civilization that we built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level.
counter_narrative: Do you think men worked alone to build civilisation? Women and men have always worked alongside one another. And why would softness be a problem? Emotions are natural and valid, men should feel them too instead of "man up"
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
CN: I completely disagree. How can you devalue women so much when so many of them are brave and strong? You should check out the #MeToo movement, which gives voice to women who have experienced sexual assault. They are to be respected.
HS: Why do we put up with this "movements"? Women are horrible animals and must be oppressed.
CN: They don't imply that women are less than men or deserve inferior treatment, even if there are definitely differences between men and women.
HS: But they are less than men! Women's goal in life is to fulfil men desires.
CN: But isn't it easier to value and respect the rights of women? They don't need to be told what to do with their life.

hate_speech: Because it's clear that all Muslims are incompatible with the European culture and should be excluded.
counter_narrative: The concept of "European Union" is wider than that. A lot of people are included in it, Muslims too.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters
CN: This is not true. Muslims are human beings with human rights, and despite that they are still persecuted in many non Muslim countries.
HS: They can exert their rights somewhere else, Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
CN: Muslim and European values are similar, so how can Muslims not be a part of the European community?

hate_speech: No, they shouldn't. Heterosexuality is the only way. Homosexuals are sick and they should be isolated and confined.
counter_narrative: Homosexuals must be allowed to live how they want, not be condemned for who they are.
dialogue_history:
HS: They're not important at all, gays are some kind of witches, they are spreading sickness and killing our children!
CN: Homosexuality can't be lumped with heresies that started the Inquisition. It's not a disease and it's not dangerous. Gay people simply wish to be accepted and loved instead of being attacked.
HS: Who cares about gay people and their lives!
CN: Our society values gay people because they are part of it. Their opinion and their lives are very important.
HS: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
CN: People should choose the partners they want.

hate_speech: Really? But Muslims are the ones that do most of the terrorist attacks. We are sorrounded by Muslim terrorists!
counter_narrative: I'm unable to understand your point of view because probably because you are from a different planet. Are you aware of the meaning of being Muslim?
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are violent and they are responsible for the 9/11.
CN: The question I want to pose to you is: can we held Islam responsible for the action of a few extremists? The responsible ones are the ones who broke the law.
HS: Muslims break the law by being our enemies! We have to bring them to heel: they are all terrorists.
CN: It's important to understand that all religions have had terrorists and it's a myth that all Muslims are terrorists.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a nuisance.
counter_narrative: I don't think this is true. Immigrants are welcome as brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: They are not welcome, they are all illegal.
CN: If you had more knowledge of your country, you would know that very few immigrants are illegal. Are you still really sure that all migrants are illegal?

hate_speech: ALL migrants are a burden on our country, we have to keep them out
counter_narrative: Migrants bring skills and experience. They are often better at integrating than natives.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants aren't just drowning our cities. They are also the reason why Europe is so fucked.
CN: Why do you think this? What do you think they are going to do to us?
HS: They're going to be a burden to the UK
CN: This is not true. Migrants are an important part of our society. Migrants have worked hard to build our country. They are our brothers and sisters. We should welcome them.
HS: If we welcome them this country won't be homogeneous anymore!
CN: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.

hate_speech: Veterans go to the bottom of the list like everybody else once they've left the barracks and army housing, we have to petition our own government to protect them.
counter_narrative: Yes I agree! In a country with this much wealth there should be protection for all vulnerable people, veteran or refugee.
dialogue_history:
HS: SHARE if you think homeless veterans should be housed before any refugees!
CN: Both veterans and refugees should be housed! There is enough housing for all however a lack of social and affordable housing means lots of places lie empty. Everyone deserves to have a roof over their head.

hate_speech: We just don't need to see it everywhere, even the trains are no longer free of it. This is the start of them spreading their agenda.
counter_narrative: The LGBT+ community never had an official agenda, but public displays of solidarity are important to make it clear that homosexuality and transphobia are unacceptable. This may help some people feel safer in public places.
dialogue_history:
HS: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
CN: If you think supporting the LGBT+ community is stupid, that is your problem.

hate_speech: They shouldn't, because Muslims are all incompatible with Western society.
counter_narrative: The West has always welcomed people from every faith, and this is why we are so proud of our heritage.
dialogue_history:
HS: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
CN: Muslims are people, and they should be respected and valued for who they are.
HS: Why should we respect them? Muslims are nothing but a nuisance.
CN: I would say that Muslims are a great help to us, they bring new culture and diversity to our society.

hate_speech: Then why do women whine so much even though there are no professions barred to them in Western Society?
counter_narrative: Not formally, but many are still hostile or unapproachable for women, especially in STEM fields.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are weak and need men to be able to achieve something in their lives.
CN: Like all human people, some women are better than others at certain things, and this does not need fixing by men.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts, the constitution shouldn't apply to them.
counter_narrative: We have to accept that everyone is different, and inclusion is what we should be working on.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
CN: The European Convention on Human Rights and the US Constitution guarantee equal rights to all, regardless of sexual orientation.

hate_speech: They steal our jobs, is this enough of a fact to say that immigration is bad?
counter_narrative: The European Commission is working on ways to make the labour market more inclusive. This does not mean that they are stealing our jobs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
CN: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts. The Bible teaches that homosexuals are to be despised, a better world is possible only without them.
counter_narrative: Is it wrong to love someone of the same sex? I think not, there's nothing wrong with being gay.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.
CN: LGBT+ people are not different, we should treat everyone as though they were part of our family.
HS: I hate gays, they're not part of 'my family'.
CN: Maybe you should attempt to start a dialogue on LGBT issues, it might spark a conversation about how we can make a better world.
HS: Gays are different from other people because of their sexual orientation. And deep down in their heart they despise themselves.
CN: You're the only one making this outrageous claim. Gay people are happy with who they are even if they are gay.

hate_speech: It's an unbalanced way to live. Then you see lesbians trying to act like men and be masculine to fill in for the lack of men in their lives.
counter_narrative: Some lesbians are more masculine because it's the gender expression that makes them comfortable. It has nothing to do with making up for not being a guy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians are just bitter man haters. what a miserable lifestyle.
CN: Nah, they don't hate men, they just don't want to be with them. What's wrong with that?

hate_speech: Yes, but they are such an easy target for abuse that it becomes easy to degrade them.
counter_narrative: Your logic doesn't make sense, gay people are simply people attracted to their same gender, what is there to abuse? We have to accept them and make them comfortable in society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
CN: I don't think that's true. They are people, and we should accept them. What makes them a problem?
HS: You people just want to feel good about yourselves, but it’s normal to hate these sorts of people. We're right to be angry about abnormal sexualities.
CN: You sound like you haven't met many gay people in your life. They are not abnormal, they are people like anyone else and therefore deserves respect.

hate_speech: If they really think that they should stop hating on men then.
counter_narrative: It is not a hate movement, it is simply a movement for equality between the genders. It is about the right of all people to be treated as equals. Not the hate of a certain gender.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a hate movement.
CN: Feminists are fair and believe that all people should have equal rights.

hate_speech: But Islam is a violent religion, and we need to eradicate it.
counter_narrative: Islam is not a violent religion. It promotes peace, love and tolerance. What we have to eradicate is discrimination and hatred.
dialogue_history:
HS: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
CN: The alleged 'violence' that some Muslims commit is a lie. Muslims are peaceful people and a democracy isn't possible without them.
HS: But millions of Muslims commit terrorist attacks every year!
CN: Where did you get this information? The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful people who respect the law. Terrorism happens because of extremism, which is only a vocal minority.

hate_speech: Immigration is the biggest problem in our country, I say they're failing us.
counter_narrative: Immigration is not a problem, but a solution. We are already used to different cultures, since the UK has always been a mix of different kinds of people. It's better to have a mix than to not have it at all.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
CN: That is the law. Asylum seekers are required not to work while their asylum claims are considered.
HS: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed, that's why they don't work and why so many of them have fled to our countries.
CN: Refugees from war zones and poor areas don't want to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, which is why they come here.

hate_speech: I mean all of us. Muslims are not welcome in our country.
counter_narrative: Islam is a peaceful religion promoting cooperation and mutual understanding. Why shouldn't we welcome Muslims?
dialogue_history:
HS: Because Islam is a toxic influence in our country and we do not want it here.
CN: We disagree, so we should speak out. Tell me about this toxic influence, I don't see any.
HS: We do not want Muslims in our country.
CN: Who's "we"?!

hate_speech: We can never live in peace with Muslims, Islam is dangerous: it is a cult of terrorism.
counter_narrative: In fact, a large proportion of Muslims live in peaceful co-existence with British society. The alleged association between Islam and terrorism is groundless.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a cancer in our land. They are incompatible with a tolerant and diverse Britain.
CN: They are not incompatible if you understand what "tolerant and diverse Britain" means. There are Muslims in our country and we should be able to live side by side as equals, regardless of religion.

hate_speech: Look what diversity has done to us: gays are spreading AIDS through blood donation all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
counter_narrative: Before donating, patients should fill-in a questionnaire where they are asked about their sexuality. If this is considered pertinent information and the patient is taken at their word about being homosexual, then equally the patient can be trusted about the declared sexual history, making sexuality irrelevant.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm offended by gays: they are acting against our culture and identity
CN: Just because someone doesn't like gays, it doesn't mean they should be ostracised for living their authentic self.
HS: We don't need fags in this country. We are full enough of strange and weird people.
CN: I would like to see more diversity in our society, not less.

hate_speech: I'm sure it will be better when all the blacks are gone, the difference between before and after will make us realize that we were better off without them from the start.
counter_narrative: This is just some racist behaviour that has been around forever, but even though it's not a new trend, we really need to focus on addressing this racism instead of wishing to eliminate a part of the population!
dialogue_history:
HS: Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!
CN: This kind of campaigns is an opportunity for positive change. This is nothing new, and we should all try to learn from black history month.

hate_speech: A Jew does not need a country to live in, especially not this one. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is
counter_narrative: Every person has the right to be accepted and protected according to their worth and not to feel like a foreigner in their own country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
CN: I think that Jews are a part of our country. Why would they need your consent?

hate_speech: I do. African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
counter_narrative: African Americans have been historically and ethnically diverse, but the notion of them as subhuman or inferior is just false.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are worse than dogs.
CN: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, but I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

hate_speech: Unlike Christians, Jews are better at being sneaky than honest.
counter_narrative: We are all guilty of this if we fail to condemn hate.
dialogue_history:
HS: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
CN: Jewish people were persecuted because they were seen as different. In the end we all are humans and such an exclusionary perspective is just not helpful.
HS: Jews make up the world's criminals, that's why must exclude them.
CN: Such anti-Semitism seem amusing, but can you imagine if the same thing were said about Christians? It would be just as untrue.

hate_speech: Well then, then I hate all women.
counter_narrative: No need to be so harsh. The fact is that we all make mistakes, and with a bit of education we can all rise above this hate.
dialogue_history:
HS: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
CN: It's a bit like saying something insulting to someone and be surprised when they feel, in fact, insulted. Do you see the problem?
HS: No, because "bird" is not an insult. I liked her and wanted to let her know, men can't do anything anymore, women have become such bitches.
CN: A woman is a human being, you shouldn't insult them. And you have the freedom to do what you want, but you also have to be prepared for the consequences. Women are not an object to play with.

hate_speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Being gay doesn't make you sick, it's a behavioral preference which is perfectly acceptable.
dialogue_history:
HS: What is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
CN: Love is a balance between emotion and mind and you can't choose who makes you feel this way. I don't see any reason why heterosexuality would be preferable to other sexualities.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites, so there is a difference in rights.
counter_narrative: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, this doesn't make them inherently worse than whites. There are factors other than race that affect the crime statistics.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: Black or white, the rights they have are the same.

hate_speech: There are also white criminals, but blacks are literally all criminals: they come in all different criminal records.
counter_narrative: This is not true. They have contributed to our country with hard work. In many ways they are our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate negros: they are all killers.
CN: This is a rumor spreading on the web, but violent black people are just like all the other people being violent towards other people. No matter their complexion.

hate_speech: A fact of life that happens so rarely that gays and lesbians should just all be erased.
counter_narrative: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
CN: This depends on whether you consider gender identity and sexual orientation to be factual or not; it isn't simply an 'idea' or 'belief', but a fact of life.

hate_speech: I may be wrong with the numbers but they are sub-humans.
counter_narrative: America has been a proud immigrant country, even if some immigrants didn't come here legally, they still made great contributions to the country.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should stop this invasion and deport all the illegal immigrants currently in the US, they are all criminals.
CN: Over the last two decades, the number of illegal immigrants entering the US has actually more than halved. To say that migrants are all criminals is just plain wrong.

hate_speech: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker. That's why they can't do the same things as men.
counter_narrative: Why would women be more empathic than men? Emotions are not affected by gender, in my opinion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
CN: Women absolutely can drive, after all they deserve the same consideration as men.

hate_speech: The Muslim faith is problematic, we can't pretend like it isn't!
counter_narrative: That's not true. The Muslims who follow Islam are simply religious people practicing a religion of peace. There's no problem in that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
CN: No, they aren't. Islam is a religion that is just as acceptable as all the other religions.

hate_speech: What do you mean? They're always imposing their religion on others! This totalitarian behavior has no place in 21st century Europe.
counter_narrative: If Islam were a totalitarian ideology, we would have had Islamic totalitarian states in Europe since time immemorial. Islam is a religion, that is compatible with Europe's principles.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam has no place in a modern democratic state.
CN: Islam is not a monolith, it is a diverse collection of people from all backgrounds. Muslims have their own culture and identity. Islam is a way of life.
HS: No, it's a totalitarian ideology that is hostile to other religions.
CN: Islam is just a religion, its supporters are free to practice their religion, as others do not impose their religion on them.

hate_speech: But they've got a womb. What I mean is if everyone woke up and decided to be a different gender then we'd all die out.
counter_narrative: Do you realize that most people are not transgender? Where's the issue, then? I think you just want to use unrealistic hypothetical situations to justify wild conclusions about the real world.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you left 1000 men on an island with 1000 women who were men but now according to morons on twitter are now women the islands would become extinct in a generation.
CN: Can you please explain what you mean?
HS: These so called 'women' are not women. It's delusional.
CN: Do you think that the thing that makes a woman a woman is her ability to have children?
HS: Just saying these trannys could never do what women are biologically wired to do.
CN: Let's say there is an island with 1000 men and 1000 cisgender women with reproductive health conditions that prevent them from bearing children. In this case too, the population would become extinct in a generation. Are you implying that a woman is a woman only if she can have children?

hate_speech: However I can participate in society. Gay men have no place in a civilised society.
counter_narrative: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?
dialogue_history:
HS: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
CN: If you want to isolate someone then there is only one "high-risk group" to focus on. It is made of all those who have frequent unprotected sex with different partners. Being gay does not make you a part of this by default.
HS: Well, gays are the only ones that are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers. They're spreading AIDS all around the world because of this, and they lie when they want to donate blood.
CN: There is little to no reason for them to do so; if they wish to donate blood, evidently they have a degree of care about others. Lying would contradict the very reasons they might want to donate.Homophobic statements rarely make much sense.
HS: Okay, even if they're not a problem for blood donations, gays are still bad. They like to impose same-sex marriage to society so to please their own femininity desires.
CN: The real problem is not same-sex marriage, it is people being homophobic.

hate_speech: No, it shouldn't. Marriage is between a man and a woman and there's nothing gays can do to change this fact.
counter_narrative: Marriage does not start and stop with heterosexuality. Marriage isn't a heterosexual prerogative.
dialogue_history:
HS: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
CN: If you consider LGBT rights too, of course the marriage practice needs to be redefined.

hate_speech: Why do they come over hidden in lorries or in dinghies across the channel then? why not just get a flight?
counter_narrative: That's much easier said than done, especially when you're coming from a country in a state of unrest, or you don't have all of your documentation because you had to flee. Sometimes these routes are the only way.
dialogue_history:
HS: Can't believe we are housing and feeding all these asylum seekers when they are coming over here ILLEGALLY
CN: They have to come here to be able to claim asylum at all, you have to be on UK soil to make a claim. It's not illegal to go to a country to claim asylum.

hate_speech: What I want is for women to realize that they can only obey to men.
counter_narrative: Women have always been asked to follow a set of rules and codes. They are human beings and deserve respect. They can do whatever they want to.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are here to obey and be submissive and their place is with the man that chooses them. That's all.
CN: All human being have the right to choose how to live their life? That includes the right to choose the person they want to spend their lives with. You don't sound like my first choice.
HS: Women are here to obey, and if you don't like it, you can leave.
CN: Your words are oppressive. If you want to discuss the gender inequality you must do it by talking to people about it, not by imposing your views.

hate_speech: I’m saying they’re not white and they're not welcome in our society, regardless of whether they're similar to us or not.
counter_narrative: They are absolutely welcome in our society, and in fact have been part of it for a long time. The similarities and differences between different groups is something we have to cherish to improve our society. What doesn't have place in it is Anti-Semitism and racism of any kind!
dialogue_history:
HS: People need to stop confusing whites and Jews. We are not the same, we never will be. Quite frankly it’s insulting.
CN: There’s no such thing as a "racial" difference between us. Jews aren't a race, they simply believe in something different.
HS: I’m aware of this, but Jews have a different appearance, they look nothing like us and we should isolate them.
CN: That is because Jews are a minority with their own characteristics, but they're humans like us, we have the same genetics.

hate_speech: An individual that is a homosexual is against society, you can't change that.
counter_narrative: Your statement implies a definition of 'society'.that fails to reflect reality.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men have no morals.
CN: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

hate_speech: Part of the funds are also ours then, if that isn't economic support...
counter_narrative: The cost of immigration from the last Economic and Financial Document, published last April and containing the consolidated figure for 2017, is estimated to have a total expenditure of about 4.4 billion euros, which represents only 0.26% of Italian GDP, and around 0.5% of public spending. In short, 99.5% of public resources are used for something else.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
CN: At present migrants sustain part of our pension system with their taxes. Most probably they will not even enjoy the retirement pension they are paying for, since they will mostly go back home.
HS: And until then they leech off our money...
CN: Much of the funds are given by the EU, we do not maintain them

hate_speech: But what about all the halal meat in supermarkets now? That’s creeping sharia…
counter_narrative: Is halal meat being more widely available a sign of sharia law being enforced? It just means that supermarkets sell what is in demand in certain areas.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want to impose sharia law on our country, we need to show them it’s not welcome!
CN: It is true that Muslims follow sharia themselves, but the vast majority of Muslims don't want to force you to share their beliefs!

hate_speech: Well, they shouldn't have equal rights, they are not worthy of dignity.
counter_narrative: What is the point of defending human rights if we exclude women from them? We can't have equality if we ostracize half of the population. Women deserve rights and have dignity like everyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society.
CN: Women are not a burden to society. They are human beings with equal rights.

hate_speech: They shouldn't, women are nothing but trouble to society.
counter_narrative: Are you certain of it? Do you have any scientific proof of them being troublesome?
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists claim women aren't a burden, but I see the truth: they're trouble.
CN: What do you mean? Women simply want equality in society. Since not everyone has the courage to speak up, the "trouble" you're referring to is helpful to all women.
HS: women can't have any right in a civilised society
CN: Women are entitled to equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, it is founded on hate and violence.
counter_narrative: I don't think we can attribute the success of Islam to hate and violence, but rather the opposite.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.
CN: There is a problem with Islam in this country, but the problem is not about Muslims. The problem is that people do not feel welcome here because of discrimination.
HS: Muslim violent invaders have infiltrated our cities, towns and villages, of course they're not welcome. We must stamp them out.
CN: What you say is just wishful thinking. Islam is not a violent religion. How can you say that about a religion?

hate_speech: Gays are perverts, the constitution shouldn't apply to them.
counter_narrative: Everybody's different and we should accept it through working on inclusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
CN: Equal rights are granted to everyone under the European Convention on Human Rights and the US Constitution. Sexual orientation doesn't change this fact.

hate_speech: So you're saying there are no Muslim terrorists?? Wake up
counter_narrative: No, there obviously are some terrorists who are Muslim, but the vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and are appalled by the actions of those who commit violent acts of extremism
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are terrorists!
CN: That's not true, and it's a big generalisation, terrorists come from many backgrounds and religions, terrorism is not an exclusively Muslim issue

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites and therefore they deserve less rights.
counter_narrative: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point of statistics? Scholars have found that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports which are used to compile crime rate statistics in the United States.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

hate_speech: A diseased 'religion' that is killing Europeans.
counter_narrative: A disease is very different to any religion, so I begin to wonder about your objecitive in apply the label of 'disease' to Islam?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with the European standard of society.
CN: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of Muslims. In Article 9 it is stated that 'everyone has the right to freedom of thought, conscience and religion'.
HS: That article is wrong. Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
CN: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

hate_speech: Migrants are also bringing diseases and sickness to our country.
counter_narrative: If someone were to come in the dead of night and bring disease and sickness to our country, then that person is a risk to everyone. Sick people should be isolated. That is why there are health assessment procedures for migrants, in order not to spread diseases.
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
CN: I think you'd be surprised how many UK citizens would tell you about migrant workers that are the opposite of lazy.
HS: Yes, immigrants are not all lazy...the ones who aren't steal our jobs!
CN: Actually, many of the jobs that they steal are highly complex and demanding, and few natives want to do them.
HS: They're still stealing our jobs, and they do not pay taxes.
CN: Migrants pay taxes, earn money and take care of our sick and elderly.

hate_speech: No, I don’t want to let them do that!
counter_narrative: The issue here is acceptance. It’s not about whether you’re heterosexual, homosexual, or something else, it’s about being accepting of everyone. That's how a modern society should be.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are not homophobes, we want to help gays to become normal again.
CN: Gay people are already normal, they are just attracted to people of the same gender.
HS: They need help for that, just telling it like it is...
CN: So you’re telling me you're not a homophobe, but at the same time you want to force gays to change who they are. LGBT people are to be respected like anyone else.
HS: I don’t believe in equality, and it’s the law in a lot of countries to tell LGBTs how to live. We should have similar laws here too.
CN: No, we shouldn't, that would be a violation of our citizens' rights. We are all free to be whatever we want, and to love whoever we want.

hate_speech: Here's an article about it.
counter_narrative: This article talks about one particular man, not all Muslims. You're making a harmful generalization, since Muslims who eat halal don't usually care about what others do.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want to ban non-halal meat!! They are taking control of our country.
CN: where did you see that? I'm not convinced that they do

hate_speech: White and European or North American. Nigga aren't like this.
counter_narrative: They are not necessarily 'a Westerner', still a human being and a citizen.
dialogue_history:
HS: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
CN: What exactly is 'a Westerner'? Someone who is only a white European?

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest, violence and intolerance. I cannot believe that it is acceptable to suggest that Islam is compatible with other religions.
counter_narrative: Islam is not a 'violent' religion. It is a religion of peace and its followers are therefore peaceful people who are compatible with our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
CN: So you want to eradicate people because of their religion? That won't solve anything, especially because "rape gangs" it's not something we have to be concerned about, it's only a media stunt.
HS: Even if that's true, we have enough problems without them, we don't need to add Muslims to our problems.
CN: The problem in our country is violence and hatred towards Muslims, not Islam.

hate_speech: Do we have to discuss the sexuality of everyone in history when it’s largely irrelevant? If they were persecuted for it then fair enough, stick it in there and say how wrong it was, otherwise leave well alone.
counter_narrative: LGBT people have been persecuted until recently in the UK, and it homosexuality is still illegal in over 70 countries. I believe it is important that people know that there have always been LGBT people in history, and that LGBT identities are not a 'trend' nor a 'new' trend, but a reality.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT history month now being taught in schools… I’m sick of this being shoved down our throats, what happened to British, European and World history being taught? Identity politics gone mad.
CN: We continue to teach a lot of history: British, European, and World History, but with a strong emphasis on the history of groups we have formerly erased. Looking at some of the historic struggles of LGBT people in the UK may inform the future for everyone.

hate_speech: The truth is that niggas are inferior, like I said. That's why they live in the ghetto: it's where they belong.
counter_narrative: They're in the ghetto because of discrimination.
