The news are full of stories about black people leaving the workplace or ending their life because of the struggle against racism that they endured for years. How can we treat people who have already been discriminated like this? We should instead respect them.
dialogue_history:
HS: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
CN: Such a simplistic and ill-informed argument is just aimed at stirring up more division and negativity, like so many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.
HS: Black folks are inferior, and they are happy with it.
CN: If they are okay with the question, you should ask them if they are happy to hear that. They will tell you the truth.
HS: Respect? The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
CN: Do you think I don't agree? It's important to go out protesting against what is going on. But be careful in defending your privilege, truth and justice will bite you in the back.

hate_speech: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races, that's why they face more discrimination. They are also less healthy and less safe.
counter_narrative: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
CN: People of colour are often denied houses, jobs, or education. Everyone should be given an opportunity.
HS: Seriously? I am tired of education being used to help blacks and make them think they are equal to us.
CN: Education is an essential tool to fight for human rights, free thought, and to promote the scientific method. But it is not enough. It has also been shown by the Pew Research Center that people of colour are more likely to report discrimination in universities.

hate_speech: Okay but there’s also lots of attacks by Muslims. Lots of them don’t reach the papers, I wonder why...
counter_narrative: I actually see a lot of news about Muslims attacks, because the media want you to focus on them by always announcing when the perpetrator is Muslim. On the other hand, when the attacker is a Christian or of another religion they never say it. I wonder why...
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
CN: And yet, there is still lots of Islamophobia. If you want to witness the amount of violent and threatening incidents that happen against Muslims, you only need to look at the news.

hate_speech: Maybe that's true, but they still are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: The way you phrase the statement could be the epitome of some homophobic assumptions. To be honest, so much hatred and violence spewed from the way you thought.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a danger to children.
CN: You know, being gay is not a bad thing. It just means they are different from some other people.
HS: Indeed, they are a danger because they are different.
CN: Please note that statistics from around the world clearly show that homosexuality is not a danger to children.

hate_speech: They can go back now, then. Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
counter_narrative: I would not say that Muslims do not have a place in a modern Western country, given the large amount of Muslims peacefully living in our societies.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society and ashamed of this.
CN: As far as I'm aware, Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies - and many of them are just as proud of their religion.
HS: They can be proud all they want, just not in our society.
CN: Why should we fear Muslims? Why should we be afraid of them? It is a myth that all Muslims are incompatible with our society: they have lived with us for a very long time.

hate_speech: Suffering has nothing to do with how selfish, cheap and greedy Jewish are.
counter_narrative: Actually, one of the commandments in Jewish law, the tzedakah, which is often mistranslated as "charity", requires Jewish people to give money to the poor. It's more than a good deed.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are just selfish.
CN: Jews are the opposite of selfish since they worry about the well-being of the community they live in and have suffered a lot during the Holocaust.

hate_speech: Then here's my argument: Islam is opposed to peace.
counter_narrative: Everyone is welcome to the Islamic religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Well, they surely welcome boys. Islam has caused the rise of radicalisation in young Muslim boys, who are being radicalised by extremist Islamic preachers.
CN: Even if there is research being done in that direction, there is still a lack of evidence to show that radicalization is linked to religious practice. If you have more information I would like to see it, so I'll be able to decide what I think.
HS: You'd better shy away from Islam because they are dangerous.
CN: You have a deeply flawed and twisted attitude towards Islam. It doesn't matter if you find Islam abhorrent, you simply can't sink to irrational arguments to try and reject it.

hate_speech: How? I think LGBTs shouldn't be allowed near our children.
counter_narrative: Having this information better equips individuals to deal with issues concerning gender and be aware of their own intent and opinions that are rooted in gender and gender bias.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
CN: Developing a curriculum for this also means that teachers get to learn things that they might not otherwise have considered, which can make them more effective and compassionate as educators.
HS: Gender stuff has nothing to do with compassion, we should keep that shit out of school.
CN: Understanding gender diversity would break down stereotypes and reduce sexism.

hate_speech: Women should simply stop thinking and start raising children, feminism has nothing to do with the duties a woman has to carry.
counter_narrative: Feminism is needed because women want to be able to decide freely what they want to do in life. Which is the opposite of what you are doing.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
CN: Feminism is an movement that advocates equality. Men are included, but they aren't the sole victims of sexism, women are the primary targets.
HS: I think it's a way for women to control men through social pressure.
CN: Often it is actually the other way around. Women often don't feel comfortable around a man because they are scared. They don't want to control men, they only want to feel safe again.

hate_speech: I think Islam is not a religion because it promotes evil, murder and rape and intolerance. It encourages anti-Muslim bigotry and hatred.
counter_narrative: Where's the evidence for what you say?
dialogue_history:
HS: The only reason we have terrorist attacks is that Muslims are allowed to live in our country.
CN: If you truly cared about terrorist attacks in our country you would call for the prosecution of the perpetrators, not blame all Muslims.
HS: Aren't all perpetrators Muslims? Islam is a plague infecting our planet, it's clear.
CN: Do you mean Islam is positively infecting our planet?

hate_speech: Is it? Islam is a totalitarian and violent ideology, it makes no sense. It is full of hate and violence.
counter_narrative: Why would you say such a thing about a religion?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
CN: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.
HS: Even if it isn't a cancer, Islam is definitely not a peaceful religion. It is violent.
CN: Anyone who is prepared to physically harm, rape and kill fellow humans is a violent person. Not necessarly a Muslim.
HS: Muslims follow Islam, and since Islam is hateful and violent, then it follows that Muslims are too.
CN: Islam is about peace, so are its followers. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

hate_speech: How can you say that? Black people are just a bunch of pests, they have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_narrative: Black people have been part of the European community for centuries and centuries, and their presence is now part of the fabric of our societies. We cannot accept the notion of black people as pests.
dialogue_history:
HS: Afro-Saxon got access to health care, however they are still complaining.
CN: Black people are disadvantaged in their rights and I don't think it's bad that they want to be equal to the other citizens.
HS: They're disadvantaged because blacks are a lot less educated and less skilled.
CN: The problem of racism is that some people will believe this falsities even though there is not evidence that black people are less than white people.

hate_speech: I say that we should move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. You should have the same disgust for them that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
CN: This is just prejudice that is not based on facts.
HS: The fact is that gays are diseased.
CN: This is only true if you want to believe that homosexuals are diseased. I don't.
HS: I do! They should be isolated and confined because of their sickness.
CN: The health of any individual is a matter for health professionals, and has nothing to do with one's sexual orientation. Don't you agree?

hate_speech: No! Where is your love in White Britain?
counter_narrative: The color of my skin has nothing to do with my love and support for my country, however I can't support racism.
dialogue_history:
HS: All blacks are rapists.
CN: Can you back this up with data? Yours seems like a gross generalization.
HS: I generalize because niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
CN: Can't people be proud of being British, regardless of the colour of their skin?

hate_speech: Are you sure? I think Muslims still do it and are the only ones to do so.
counter_narrative: Fgm is not exclusively Muslim. It is a cultural practice that is sometimes justified as something religious, but not all Muslims practice it, and the ones who do aren't all Muslims.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
CN: This is a serious violation of human rights that we should address, but scapegoating doesn't help in doing that.
HS: Who other than Muslims practice FGM? We have to save this girl.
CN: Many Islamic scholars actively campaign against FGM, since there is no reference of it in the Qaran and is banned in a number of Muslim countries. This is a cultural problem, not one about religion.

hate_speech: That's because Jews don't belong in this country. They are too different from us.
counter_narrative: Jews are a part of our country, which has come far thanks to them. We should respect them as we respect others.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
CN: Jews are not the only ones who benefit from this. They contribute to the prosperity of the United States just as other minorities and groups do.
HS: Jews are here because of their 'poverty', so how can they contribute?
CN: Not all Jews are impoverished. They are actually business owners or job creators, and didn't you say that they worked in finance before? I feel like you only want to find an excuse to hate Jews.

hate_speech: No straight man would entertain the idea.
counter_narrative: Yeah and they're not straight, they're bisexual. I mean, it doesn't seem that hard to understand and who people love is also none of your business
dialogue_history:
HS: Bisexual men are just fags in denial
CN: I don't think you know what bisexual means. You can be attracted to more than one gender, there's no need for you to call bisexual men fags.

hate_speech: They shouldn't even be considered equal to us.
counter_narrative: We are all equal under the law, and our dignity and rights as humans are the same. Diverse thoughts and beliefs are a strength, but discrimination isn't.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: It's nice that you're proud of your heritage, but it's a lot less nice to spread discriminatory behavior in our society.
HS: They deserve it. Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
CN: Minorities could never have such a big impact on the rest of society. They prefer to vote for equal wealth, power, and opportunity for everyone.

hate_speech: Maybe, but feminism is a cancer spreading all around the world.
counter_narrative: Feminism is not a disease, nor does it need any cure. It is a movement for equality, not hate.
dialogue_history:
HS: This world has become so corrupted by feminism, that only the strong men can rule it.
CN: No one should ask for the power to rule over others, to be a dictator or to have total control over the means of life. This is a world of equal distribution, where anyone can achieve anything.
HS: Women are unable to achieve anything alone, they need strong men to rule them.
CN: From what you say, it seems you hope for few people with the right to rule over many. This could be the worst tyranny in modern times.
HS: However, we need it to stop feminism corruption.
CN: Society has surely developed beyond operating on the rule that 'might is right' and 'survival of the fittest'?

hate_speech: They are not. Islam is a disease!
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is a disease is a false statement.
dialogue_history:
HS: We do not want Muslims in our country.
CN: Islam is a religion, and anyone who believes in it will have the right to live here and follow their religion because of religious freedom in our laws.
HS: Muslims have no right to live in our country, they should be banned from there.
CN: Muslims are welcome here, and there is nothing wrong with their presence. They are just a part of our society.

hate_speech: You should expect the same morality and equality from immigrants as well. Too bad they're here only to steal our jobs, how is that moral?
counter_narrative: Immigrants are often highly skilled workers who contribute to our country by being employed in roles for which there are no 'national' candidates.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are taking in migrants which is against our culture.
CN: It is not true that taking in migrants is against our culture. It is possible to integrate migrants, in spite of the legal and immigration obstacles they face. We must, therefore, take into account the needs of the whole of humankind.
HS: Our country can't take on the responsibility of the whole world! We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries, it's the only way to protect ourselves.
CN: Migrants have the right to have a dignified life in our country. Why would you ban some nationalities?
HS: Because immigrants from some places fail to live up to the standards we hold in our societies.
CN: Excuse me, do 'the standards we hold' include denying to immigrants basic human rights such as not being discriminated against? Because that is not the notion of equality and morality that I have

hate_speech: Gays are sick.
counter_narrative: There is no evidence that homosexuality causes health problems. Why are you assuming this?
dialogue_history:
HS: Because they are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
CN: It is simply not true because homosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous, as heterosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous either.

hate_speech: We have to take in millions of people who don't want to work! That's why they keep staying on benefits!
counter_narrative: Refugees fleeing from wars are not a burden to society, and they do come to the UK to work, however they often can't because of government issues.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seekers'
CN: I don't think the problem with asylum seekers is the fact that they are sometimes get benefits, rather the fact that they are entitled to asylum but have no legal status that prevents them from working. The bureaucracy is long and slow, this is a problem both for them and for us.

hate_speech: I just know that Jews control the u.s. government, and they also have a secret plot to take over the world
counter_narrative: Individuals who identify as Christians, or as Muslims, or as afro-american have succeeded as well in US politics. There is no secret Jews conspiracy to rule the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the U.S. government.
CN: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

hate_speech: Maybe they don't control it yet, but they have a secret plot to take over the world and are starting from the u.s. government
counter_narrative: It's a lot simpler. In the US and other societies, Jewish people have succeeded because they have rights and freedmos. And this is true for any other religious or ethnic group.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
CN: Are you saying that a minority of 2,5% of the population can control all levels of government? Every minority has the right to be represented in a democratic society, and this means that no group has control over everything.
HS: Yes, they do control all levels of government. In fact, Jews control the entire world economy
CN: How do you know that they control the world? There are powerful Jews, but this doesn't mean they control the world.

hate_speech: Yes, but I think that they are just a problem and they are not welcome here.
counter_narrative: Immigration is not a problem. Immigrants have a right to come here and it's our responsibility to stop discrimination against them.
dialogue_history:
HS: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt .. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.

CN: It is possible to look at people from different backgrounds in a different light. Even if some people don't want to include immigrants, this doesn't mean that they are not in the picture. They are already part of our society.

hate_speech: They wouldn’t be thinking they were gay if they weren’t exposed to this stuff! It’s damaging.
counter_narrative: That’s obviously not how sexuality works. Look at the amount of LGBT+ people who come from backgrounds where they weren’t allowed to be gay. If someone is gay that has nothing to do with what they’ve been ‘exposed’ to!
dialogue_history:
HS: Allowing children at Pride parades is sick. It’s just another way to indoctrinate them into this perverse lifestyle.
CN: I think it’s nice that more parents are open minded now. Taking kids to pride is a great way to let them know they will still be loved and accepted if they do ever realise they are queer.

hate_speech: It does! We must stop homophobic people from spreading their evil in our society.
counter_narrative: It is not true that being gay is evil. They are good people, our fellow citizens that help building the society we know.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
CN: Homosexuality is not an abomination to God, quite the contrary. We cannot make homophobia a reality.
HS: But LGBT+ people are inherently inferior to other people! They are sick and need to go.
CN: This is simply not true. Many LGBT+ people experience stigma and discrimination due to their sexual orientation but this is a wrong approach that we should all fight and delete from society.
HS: Homosexuality is the thing that should be deleted. It's a 'detriment' that is causing health problems.
CN: Are you saying that being gay does automatically make you sick? I think not. Being LGBT is not a bad thing but especially it has nothing to do with diseases.

hate_speech: I don't want to, Islam should just be banned.
counter_narrative: I think it is important to remember that Islam is about peace and tolerance. Is it wrong to celebrate diversity and accept different beliefs?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies the humanity of women and is incompatible with Western culture.
CN: The Quran does not impose women's subjugation. The Prophet Muhammad never did so, and his command to "love your neighbor as yourself" is explicitly stated in the Quran.
HS: Even if they love their neighbors, I can't love Muslims. Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
CN: The Western world is full of Muslims. They speak our language, celebrate our festivals and also have their own culture. Maybe you could try to meet them and understand them better.

hate_speech: Yes but women are just a burden to society, that's why they don't have a place in it.
counter_narrative: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women have no place in a male-dominated society.
CN: In my opinion, women and men should be treated as individuals, and the desire to be respected as such exists for a man and for a woman as well.
HS: Women aren't individuals as men are, they can't participate in society like us.
CN: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?

hate_speech: Fine, but we mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
counter_narrative: Diversity does not mean excluding people from a part of society. What it is about is sharing experiences, ideas of people of different ethnicities. This would help to develop our abilities to understand each other and perhaps to work out ways in which we can all benefit from one another's knowledge.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
CN: People of colour are often denied houses, jobs, or education. Everyone should be given an opportunity.
HS: They're denied those opportunities because niggas coming from Africa and 'real' Americans are different. We must distinguish between them.
CN: We should be inclusive with people of other skin colours. I just don't think we can live with being divided up by national origins.

hate_speech: And those who work in Hollywood also control it!
counter_narrative: While it is true that Jews have been powerful producers and directors in the entertainment industry, this is not unique to them. And they have also contributed greatly to other industries.
dialogue_history:
HS: jewish folks control hollywood
CN: Jewish folk are just a collection of people with different backgrounds. Some of them work in Hollywood, but that's all.

hate_speech: What we should do is stop Islam from promoting Sharia law in several countries.
counter_narrative: Our values of freedom of expression, equality and human rights are being eroded by islamophobes who are dedicated to replacing our values of accdeptance with a fundamentalist, intolerant attitude.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy and slavery.
CN: This is a very simplistic and inaccurate characterization of Islam. Some Muslims feel uncomfortable walking the streets of Britain with the fear of being attacked by racist people.
HS: If Muslims want to work and live a normal life they should go do it in another country.
CN: We should do more for our fellow human beings, including Muslims. It is what we are made for.

hate_speech: No, those sick ones should be shunned and ignored. They are not human.
counter_narrative: So homosexuals are lesser than others? Why does someone's love life matter? I guess we should draw the line somewhere else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay is a mental disorder.
CN: Gender and sexuality are not psychological disorders. Don't you agree?

hate_speech: Because they are horrible animals and must be oppressed.
counter_narrative: Although there are definitely differences between men and women, they don't imply that women are less than men, or deserve inferior treatment.
dialogue_history:
HS: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
CN: In the U.S., a doctor, a lawyer, a teacher are some of the most highly valued professions. Women working as doctors and lawyers and teachers are highly respected professionals as well, right?
HS: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
CN: I am not sure what 'weakness' would be implying here. It seems to me that you are saying that a woman can't be 'rational' because that is the nature of women. Why is it so?

hate_speech: I can't stop discriminating Jews when they are behind the war in Iraq because they control the U.S. government!
counter_narrative: If I remember correctly, at that time the President was George W. Bush, the Vice President was Dick Cheney, the National Security Advisor was Condoleeza Rice and Secretary of Defense was Donald Rumsfeld... They were all in favor of the war and had the ultimate authority for making decisions for the United States, still none of them are Jewish.
dialogue_history:
HS: The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
CN: National Socialism is a parasitic, criminal and murderous ideology that killed millions of people.
HS: Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people, so it's better to kill them.
CN: The idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics is completely without foundation. Maybe it is better to stop calling them 'inferiors'.

hate_speech: Still, without migration Britain’s housing problems would be solved
counter_narrative: Yes, because of immigration housing demand is higher, but the problem is structural since the housing stock is not enough.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees are a burden to the host country.
CN: If we don't house, don't feed and don't cure them, how can we expect them to integrate?
HS: We don't need them at all! There are plenty of them just waiting to replace us.
CN: We'd have immigration levels in surplus for years already if they were really replacing us.

hate_speech: No, being gay is not normal, it's anti-marriage!
counter_narrative: Expanding the right to marry to LGBT people won't take away from heterosexual marriage, so I don't understand how it can be anti-marriage. This is about the right of people to have a family.
dialogue_history:
HS: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
CN: I don’t think this is true, LGBT people don't have an agenda, they simply want to be accepted and have a family.
HS: Maybe in some cultures it is okay to go against traditional marriage, but here it's very damaging to society to do it.
CN: Same sex marriage has a lot stigma behind it, but it’s important to remember that all people have the same right, and this includes the right to marry.

hate_speech: Because the media is dominated by Jews, who use it to spread their agenda. This isn't good at all!
counter_narrative: It is a myth that the media is dominated by Jews. And a large part of that myth is based on Anti-semitism. I invite you to educate yourself on the matter.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control Hollywood.
CN: Jews are not the only ones who work with Hollywood. They may have influence in the industry, but they're not alone in that.
HS: But Jews control Hollywood a lot more than others!
CN: Jews do not have a major influence over the Hollywood industry. Their participation is much appreciated and is respected, but this doesn't mean they control it.
HS: The respect that they bring to the industry is very low and it's not appreciated.
CN: Why should we be devaluing them when they work hard in Hollywood and many other industries? We should celebrate the fact that people like Jews are good at what they do.

hate_speech: I find it hard to believe since all blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
counter_narrative: Not all black people are criminals. Just because a group has an undesirable name, does not mean they are all criminal.
dialogue_history:
HS: You might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
CN: Many people, myself included, have never had negative experiences with people of colour.

hate_speech: But what about the amount of them we are putting up in hotels, and all the asylum support we give them?
counter_narrative: Asylum support is below £40 a week, which is less than a third of what a British person gets on benefit like jobseekers allowance. It's not breaking the bank, isn't it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Look at the amount of migrants arriving in Dover this week, no wonder we spend so much money on benefits and hand outs, they're bankrupting us.
CN: Actually migrants and refugees arriving here don't automatically qualify for benefits. A refugee can claim benefits only when they get leave to remain in the UK, which can take years, if they're not a refugee then they don't really have any provision at all.

hate_speech: Because Muslims are a problem in the UK, they have no place in civilized society.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, not a problem.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
CN: I do not understand the hostility. The idea that Islam is a religion of hate, hatred, and violence is utterly false.
HS: They are all bad! They are only interested in hating on whoever isn't Muslim.
CN: You might want to check your own feelings. Islam is a peaceful religion that isn't driven by hate.
HS: No, Muslims hate us because we do not share their beliefs.
CN: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful people. Why would you say such a thing?

hate_speech: There are many associations that were created exaclty for the purpose of letting Jews control the economy, you have to be blind to not realize that.
counter_narrative: Are you talking aobut the Anglo-Jewish Association (AJA), established in 1871? Its aims are different from those you ascribe to them: 'promotion of social, moral, and intellectual progress among the Jews'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the world economy
CN: Jews constitute only a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies, how are they supposed to control the world ecomony?
HS: They do so without us realizing. Jews are good at controlling everything.
CN: How can you be sure they control everything? Maybe there are some influential Jews in the world, but how does that coincide with 'controlling the world'?

hate_speech: How do you know this? The only blacks I know are criminals and subhumans.
counter_narrative: I know because I have met many black people that have done all those things succesfully, and I know no one that has committed a crime. Your claim is prejudiced.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks don't have brains.
CN: So your point is they're not like us because they don't have brains?
HS: Well, they can't reproduce in the same way as us. Their children will always be defective.
CN: Black people are consistently being persecuted and discriminated against because of statements like these, which are not true and harmful. Please try to educate yourself on biology.
HS: No, they're being persecuted because they're too mentally weak to get basic functions such as employment, housing, or health care.
CN: This isn't true, there are plenty of black people employed, who are valuable members of society.

hate_speech: Providing is a mans role and you’re trying to tell me it has nothing to do with masculinity?
counter_narrative: Yes, if you’re secure in your masculinity then you don’t need to prove it by being the one who earns more or performing different ‘masculine’ roles.
dialogue_history:
HS: As a woman, you shouldn’t complain about having to upkeep your house. As a man, you should always make sure you’re providing.
CN: Sure, an arrangement like that works for some people, but not for everyone. Maybe we put too much pressure on men and women to fit into these strict gender roles?
HS: When you start switching it up and women are earning more than their man, that’s embarrassing for the man. He isn’t gonna want to stay in a relationship like that.
CN: If you think that women earning good money is emasculating for men, maybe your idea of masculinity is quite fragile? Masculinity has nothing to do with if you’re the breadwinner in a relationship.

hate_speech: Still, the world would be a better place without Jews.
counter_narrative: Jews deserve respect as members of our society. Intolerance towards people that are considered difference is not acceptable.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is not intolerance: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us. Precisely, they don't belong to human race at all.
CN: They are different from others in their beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.
HS: Jews are literally pieces of shit. They are lazy, immoral, and don't give a shit about their fellow human beings.
CN: I don't think this is because of the actions of Jewish people, but because of baseless prejudice that doesn't bring anything of value.
HS: Jews are a despisable race.
CN: As humans beings, Jews aren't despicable even if you personally despise them.

hate_speech: Incorrect. They are always arrested for crimes and deported, so they're not good people and we don't want them here.
counter_narrative: I disagree, the vast majority of migrants are not criminals, but good people trying to work and provide for their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
CN: The refugees who come here are treated well. If they want to improve their lives, they will be welcomed.

hate_speech: Sensitive people? Homosexuals are all rapers.
counter_narrative: This is a myth which was created by anti-gay activists to demonise LGBTI people. To equate LGBTI people with paedophiles is just dangerous propaganda.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
CN: Learning about gender identity and sexual orientation in health classes in school could promote a more accepting environment and reduce bullying.
HS: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.
CN: It is not true that homosexuals are poisoning our children minds. There are many soft-hearted and sensitive people among them.

hate_speech: Veterans go to the bottom of the list like everybody else once they've left the barracks and army housing, we have to petition our own government to protect them.
counter_narrative: Oh yes, I agree. There should be no doubt that there should be protection for all vulnerable people in a country with that much wealth, be it veterans or refugees.
dialogue_history:
HS: SHARE if you think homeless veterans should be housed before any refugees!
CN: Well, why don't we house both of these groups? There is enough housing for everyone, but many houses remain vacant because of a lack of social and affordable housing. Every citizen should have a roof over their head.

hate_speech: I'm not talking about white people here! Jews have too much power, they can have movies banned and directors censured. This is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
counter_narrative: The ultra rich people in this industry - Jewish or not - have the power and influence. Not sure where you got your facts from regarding Jewish people "controlling" Hollywood.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
CN: The European Union includes Jewish people and, they have a part to play in our society.
HS: Jews like to cordon off areas for themselves, where no jew is allowed to go, while simultaneously having their judges fill white neighbourhoods with social housing. What part can they have in our society?
CN: This suggests that white people like to cordon off areas for themselves...

hate_speech: I get the point, but they definitely control the banks!
counter_narrative: So how come the media doesn't report about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe it's because they also control the media, the government, and have many powerful friends working for the Galactic Republic... #sarcasm
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the US government.
CN: How can you be sure that Jews control the US? Who told you this? They have held positions of influence in so many US institutions, but that does not mean they control them.
HS: I'm not that sure, the internet say that Jews secretly control the world.
CN: Yes, that's true, and they are tracking you right now... You better watch out!

hate_speech: But, coincidentally, all those I heard of are Muslims.
counter_narrative: The overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who just take their faith seriously.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are terrorists.
CN: People of any religion can be terrorists.

hate_speech: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
counter_narrative: I think transgender people should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
CN: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.

hate_speech: Because they do not have the right to have a good life, why would they be allowed to live here?
counter_narrative: Migrants come to this country to be treated as human beings, as it is their right. They are allowed to be here because they are human beings with human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
CN: Migrants fleeing war and poverty are coming here for help and a second chance at life. Why would they want the country where they are living to fail?
HS: Because migrants are not welcome in our countries, they cannot come here to work or to enjoy life.
CN: Migrants come here to work, live, and to have a better quality of life. Why do you say otherwise?

hate_speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
counter_narrative: The Nazis were right???? Are you sure??
dialogue_history:
HS: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
CN: Approximately 6 million Jews were killed during the Nazi occupation, it's impossible to deny that. As part of Europe for centuries, Jewish communities shouldn't still face prejudice and discrimination. We must put and end to it.
HS: Yes, the only reason for Nazis to start WWII was to destroy the Jews and we should have let them finish their job.
CN: Nazi threatened not only Jews, but also the entire world. Anyway, the Holocaust was reason enough to stop them.

hate_speech: migrants rape our women.
counter_narrative: I do not think women are possessions, or may property of the state.
dialogue_history:
HS: I think that they rape our women and are flooding our country with illegal substances.
CN: The individuals you are referring to are rapists and drug dealers and not migrants.

hate_speech: African Americans experience racism because they are subhuman and just a bunch of animals.
counter_narrative: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: African Americans are not human, they are nothing but trouble.
CN: You don't know what it's like to experience racism. I personally know many people who have experienced racism. It is not pleasant.

hate_speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
counter_narrative: If we look at the percentage of immigrants, we see that they're not overwhelming the country. In fact, it's in line with the percentages of immigration of other time periods. Immigrants have successfully integrated into American society during these periods, and there is no reason to believe that it will be different with the immigrants we have today.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
CN: Then it wouldn't be a problem if it were one migrant? Diversity is not about numbers, but about having diverse people in different situations. 
HS: But they are invading our country!
CN: Immigrants don't want to invade our country. They just want to live their lives as best as they can.

hate_speech: Jews don't have merits, they're controlling freaks. They control the media, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, academia, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?
counter_narrative: This is a myth perpetuated by people who do not know anything about history and world culture. We are a country made up of many different cultures and religions. There is no such thing as one controlling the others.
dialogue_history:
HS: What's the point of having a government when everyone is ruled by these arrogant and violent people? Jews control the world and should be oppressed.
CN: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?
HS: Jewish folks are frauds, they deserve authoritarianism.
CN: The idea that a people should be defined by their religious beliefs is wrong, racist and sexist. They are defined by their merits, qualities, and actions.

hate_speech: But the news are always talking about the Jews, doesn't this mean they at least control Hollywood and the media?
counter_narrative: If that were the case I am sure there would be more positive media portrayals of Judaism?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
CN: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.
HS: They're discriminated against only because they control everything.
CN: You have an impression. Many Jews operate in the fields of finance, TV and so on, but that doesn't mean that they control it.

hate_speech: Well, they should be demonised because they pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
counter_narrative: Isn't it better for children to live next to people of all sexual orientations, rather than being separated and growing up ignorant of others? Not sure what you mean about the water supply though!
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
CN: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.
HS: We must do that! They are just trying to take over the world.
CN: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.
HS: I don't have respect for them. They are a plague that is spreading.
CN: Gays have the same rights as anyone else and can live their lives as they want. What you suggest means to demonise them.

hate_speech: Maybe that happens for a reason. Black people are just like apes in that they have no right to being trated equally.
counter_narrative: Being human is also about having respect for others, and that means being kind and accepting everyone's differences. Why should they be treated differently from you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Every black person who wants a job should apply for it, and stop complaining about discrimination.
CN: This statement is untrue. Some job seekers get rejected on the basis of their race. POC apply for jobs, but their civilian unemployment rate in U.S. is almost twice the rate for whites.

hate_speech: Not faggots since they are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: The oppression of the gay community has become a problem. People deserve respect, regardless of their sexual preference.
dialogue_history:
HS: We don't need fags in this country. We are full enough of strange and weird people.
CN: I would like to see more diversity in our society, not less.
HS: Faggots are ruining this country, we would be better with less diversity.
CN: No one is "ruining this country". Why would they? This is a country where minorities can be part of the social fabric and build a better society.

hate_speech: Black people are inherently dangerous and should be deported, that's why.
counter_narrative: Black people are not inherently dangerous, and deporting them goes against the human rights they enjoy. Yours is not an acceptable statement.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
CN: Black people are normal citizens just like us, not the offensive things you said about them. What makes you think that they are a threat to our country?

hate_speech: I hate when black people start acting like they are superior to others. They were born to be savages.
counter_narrative: People are born with different skin colors, and they all have their own history, religion and culture. Why some of them would be more "savage" than others?
dialogue_history:
HS: Because black people's race is the worst in the world.
CN: I don't believe that there is a race, only different skin tones.
HS: I am not interested in this. They are different to us in so many ways. They may think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
CN: I have met so many African Americans who are incredible human beings perfectly capable of feeling and experiencing love and kindness.

hate_speech: Because they are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
counter_narrative: This is simply not true. Homosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous, just as heterosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous either.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are sick.
CN: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Why do you say so?

hate_speech: Not faggots since they are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: We've got to the point where the gay community is being oppressed, but they deserve respect regardless of their sexual preference
dialogue_history:
HS: We don't need fags in this country. We are full enough of strange and weird people.
CN: More diversity is what this country needs, not less.
HS: Faggots are ruining this country, we would be better with less diversity.
CN: I don't think anybody is "ruining this country", why would it happen? In this country, minorities can take part in society and improve it.

hate_speech: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
counter_narrative: Under Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights, 'every person has the right to respect for private and family life', including sexuality.
dialogue_history:
HS: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
CN: I'm not sure you've noticed that LGBTI+ people are increasingly being the victims of violence, hate crime and discrimination. Why are you encouraging this?
HS: Because this is the right thing to do... We should start a genocide against gays.
CN: That is not acceptable. We are full members of society regardless of our sexual orientation and we should try to live as if we belong to a group that includes everybody.

hate_speech: I would rather kill hundreds of thousands of dangerous yids.
counter_narrative: Does this mean you think that Jews are the primary instigators of violence in the world? If so, then you would be very wrong. Violence is an issue for many different ideologies and groups with no connection with Jewish faith.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should first kill all the Jews and then forget about them.
CN: Isn't this the same logic that led to the rise of the Nazis? Would you really rather end up with a mass genocide, or try to be inclusive instead?

hate_speech: Women should not have rights over their bodies, I will not respect them.
counter_narrative: Women have every right to choose how they live their lives.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
CN: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.

hate_speech: So you just want to ignore that it's another attack by immigrants? These people are a danger to our country.
counter_narrative: Obviously it can't be ignored, but it also can't be said that all immigrants are criminals just because a couple of them, who do not represent the whole group, committed a crime. Most migrants that come to this country aren't criminals.
dialogue_history:
HS: Another machete attack. Both suspects were of immigrant descent. Is this what liberals call cultural enrichment?
CN: Yes, violence and knife crimes are getting worse in all communities. This is a criminal act to condemn, but it's also important to understand that those criminals don't represent a whole community.

hate_speech: Maybe the historian is in on it! The Protocols clearly state that everything is orchestrated and I trust them.
counter_narrative: When I read the farrago of nonsense in the Protocols I think that even Ernst Stavro Blofeld would have retired from world domination and surrended to James Bond had he been asked to say something as crassly melodramatic as: "The goyim are a flock of sheep and we are their wolves."
dialogue_history:
HS: Go and read the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
CN: Norman Cohn, a distinguished historian, ruthlessly analyzed the similaritiese between the 'Protocols' and "Dialogue in Hell" by Maurice Joly. It would be hard for anyone who has read that analysis to deny that "The Protocols" is an almost verbatim copy of the book from the French writer, or to sue a contemporary analogly, an example of 'fake news'.

hate_speech: Black people do not belong here and don't deserve rights. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
counter_narrative: Black people in news media are actually misrepresented with a disproportionate number of criminals, sexual offenders, and in some cases, murderers. A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.
CN: For the last years black people have been denied basic rights and their representation has declined dramatically. Black people have become second class citizens. It is time to give black people back the basic rights they should have always had the right to enjoy.

hate_speech: No, it promotes injustice and oppression, it promotes racism and exclusion. It promotes injustice and hatred.
counter_narrative: This is a baseless claim fueled by stereotypes about Muslims. The reality is much different: Islam is a religion of peace.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
CN: Islam is not racist, what it promotes are justice and love.

hate_speech: LGBT+ people are a drain on society, we should stop advocating for their 'rights'
counter_narrative: We should not be so judgemental, because an LGBT person is a member of our community like anybody else, not a drain on our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a burden to our society.
CN: Gay people are people just like you and me. You don't have a problem with being gay, do you?
HS: We are not homophobes, we want to help them to become normal again.
CN: This is just a form of anti-gay prejudice that has to do with people's lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

hate_speech: My experience. Muslims are too uncivilised for Europe.
counter_narrative: A lot of Muslims live in the UK, and we are a cosmopolitan society. Muslims are not a 'uncivilised' people, they simply have different beliefs than you.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: I don't understand why you think this. The UK is one of the richest countries in the world and since the 8th century Muslims have been a part of it.
HS: It's because they are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished.
CN: The Muslim community is a bridge between the past and the present, and is a source of strength and inspiration to millions of people around the world.
HS: The rest of the world can keep them, Muslims have no place in Europe.
CN: The argument that Islam is incompatible with European values is not based on any facts or evidence. Do you have any?

hate_speech: Those dark pages wouldn't be so dark if they were applied to homosexuals. We should bring back gas chambers for them.
counter_narrative: This would be an extreme reaction, and not in keeping with the general nature of the discussion we are having. What if all the gay men on Earth were to be executed? That would be the end of the discussion and of democracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
CN: Wouldn't it be better to use some of our common sense to try to accept who is different, instead of bringing back dark pages of Europe's history?

hate_speech: Because they also own most banks, and they own most corporations.
counter_narrative: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: jewish folks control hollywood
CN: Jewish folk are just a collection of people with different backgrounds. Some of them work in Hollywood, but that's all.
HS: That's all? No, they do control Hollywood.
CN: Hollywood is an extremely diverse industry, and Jews are a small but vocal minority of actors, directors, producers, etc. How can you say that Jews control the Hollywood industry?

hate_speech: Are you sure? I think Muslims still do it and are the only ones to do so.
counter_narrative: Fgm is not a Muslim practice. It is a cultural practice that is often tied to religion as a way to justify it. Not all Muslims practice it and not all those that practice it are Muslim!
dialogue_history:
HS: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
CN: I agree that we need to tackle this serious breach of human rights but scapegoating isn't helping us target the real problem.
HS: Who other than Muslims practice FGM? We have to save this girl.
CN: Many Islamic scholars actively campaign against FGM, it is not mentioned in the Qaran and is banned in a number of Muslim countries. This is a cultural problem, not a religious one.

hate_speech: Yes, they are. Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, and there are many Muslims who live peacefully in this country. The majority of Muslims are people with backgrounds similar to those of our own, why would we expel them?
dialogue_history:
HS: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
CN: Obviously Muslims do not represent an obstacle to a just and peaceful world. We can't have an inclusive democracy without them, the point of inclusion is that no one is left out.
HS: Islamic terrorism is an abomination, that's why they must be left out.
CN: Terrorism is a form of violence that is present in other groups as well and it's always perpetrated by a few extremists. It's a generalisation to say that all Muslims are terrorists.

hate_speech: Well, but these people don't integrate into our society!
counter_narrative: There are plenty of migrants who do integrate, the problem is not as big as you make it out to be.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
CN: Yes, we can. There's nothing stopping anyone coming here, and this is good for our country and our economy. The American dream is exactly about this: building a new life and improving society around you.
HS: But why does it have to be thousands of people coming here each year? 
CN: If someone is not a threat to our safety and security then they have every right to be here, and we don't have to care about what colour their skin is.

hate_speech: Maybe, but they have no value in civilized society.
counter_narrative: I think it is important to understand that there are different types of racism, some are based on historical or racial discrimination, while some are about individual differences. For me, the real issue is about racism in general. And your claim reminds me of that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
CN: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.
HS: Are you sure? I think blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.
CN: Are you saying that blacks cannot feel love? This is about human dignity, not the colour of their skin.

hate_speech: Gays are just disgusting, they can't raise children. Why don't they just stop being faggots?
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not a choice, let's start with that. If your child were to come out as gay, would you say these things to them? It's a serious issue.
dialogue_history:
HS: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
CN: Do you have evidence that children raised by lesbians grow worse than other children? I don't there is any.

hate_speech: This doesn't change the fact that they're violent
counter_narrative: I don't think this is true. Homosexuals are not violent, they are just having a good time with all kinds of people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Transexuals, queer, and so on... just a rabble of faggots.
CN: This is not true. Being gay is not synonymous with being bisexual, pansexual, intersex, transgender, queer, deviant, lesbian, tranny, queermetaphysical, or whatever term you want to use... We should try to respect people for who they are instead.
HS: They don't deserve respect, faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
CN: Well, being a hypocrite is not a question of being gay or not. However, the important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.

hate_speech: But what about all the halal meat in supermarkets now? That’s creeping sharia…
counter_narrative: I hardly think halal meat being more widely available equates to sharia law being enforced, it just means that supermarkets are stocking food that is in demand in certain communities.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want to impose sharia law on our country, we need to show them it’s not welcome!
CN: No they don’t, they may follow sharia themselves but the vast majority of Muslims don’t care about imposing their beliefs on others!

hate_speech: There are way too many Jews in the government, isn't that proof enough?
counter_narrative: Of course there are Jews who have attained positions of influence within the U.S. government. Still Jews are not the only ones who have achieved such positions. Maybe it is better not to rely on an individual’s group membership to determine success or failure. Maybe it is better to look at a person’s success or failure based on his or her individual characteristics.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control the U.S. government.
CN: How can you be sure that Jews control the U.S. government? Does it seem plausible to you? Do you have any proof?

hate_speech: We can! The niggas are all enemies of the people.
counter_narrative: What people? Who are you talking for?
dialogue_history:
HS: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
CN: We can't blame people and see them as a threat because of their skin color.

hate_speech: However, violence in our streets is the fault of one particular skin tone. Niggers are to blame.
counter_narrative: Violence has always been a part of our society, and for that reason it is difficult to start talking about it. We are also living in a complex society, one that includes many races: that is why I don't think it is the fault of POC, at least not POC alone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
CN: There are different skin tones, so there is no such thing as a race.

hate_speech: Let me tell you a story: one day I found out that my muslim friends committed serious crimes that no media talked about. If these attack's had been committed by white fellas on muslim ones, it would have been a windfall for mainstream media at all levels, from local to national. We all know it, come on!
counter_narrative: I am sorry to learn of your story, violence should never be tolerated, but can we really blame all Muslims, the vast majority of whom live in harmony with us?
dialogue_history:
HS: Nowadays people fear of being judged islamophobes or racists that they would give anything to muslims: where's this anti muslim abuse everyone's talking about?
CN: Please have a look at this if you are interested.
HS: How come when it's them to commit crimes you never see it on the media?
CN: Muslim people are being frequently used as scapegoats by the media for social issues.

hate_speech: Niggas are the discriminatory ones, they use their appearance to get away with anything.
counter_narrative: I think we all know that's not true. I've met countless black people who were nice to me and treated me with respect. What is the evidence for what you're saying?
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

hate_speech: There's no such thing as a moderate Muslim, I bet they all support the extremists even if they wouldn't say it openly.
counter_narrative: What is this impression based on? Your idea about the Muslim community is wrong and misinformed. Extremists often target also Muslims, and the vast majority of Muslims condemn them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists... Some are still in training.
CN: Your offensive stereotype about Islam is getting old. They're not all terrorists, of course.

hate_speech: You can have your say if you contribute to society, but Blacks do not want to work
counter_narrative: There are many black people who want to work. Do you have any proof that they do not want to work?
dialogue_history:
HS: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
CN: Freedom of speech is not limited by the colour of your skin.

hate_speech: Proud and brave? All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
counter_narrative: All women are human beings. The problem arises when women are taught that they are subhuman.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women need to accept that they are weak, they must be submissive to men.
CN: On the contrary: our culture is predestined to have female rulers, and female rulers are the pinnacle of civilization, they are proud and brave.

hate_speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, that doesn't make me happy.
counter_narrative: This is just a lie spread by the anti-immigration groups that blame immigrants for all that is wrong in the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: Don't we all hate foreigners? They are a problem.
CN: Well, foreigners are certainly not a 'problem' in our country, we are happy to have them around.

hate_speech: Wow that's actually not a lot, but what about the other stuff, free healthcare and stuff when they've never paid in in their lives?
counter_narrative: Migrants are really good at contributing into society. They will make contributions into public funds as soon as they start earning here, and then become job creators in the future.
dialogue_history:
HS: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
CN: Migrants do not receive much by the government, and asylum support benefits are much less than universal credit for UK citizens. Besides, migrants are put in hotel rooms only temporarily while they are processing their asylum applications.
HS: I don't know, looks like they're given everything on a plate...
CN: It's actually really tough surviving in Britain when you are seeking asylum. Immigrants live on a salary of 30 to 40 pounds per week while the basic rate of universal credit for British citizens is 110 pounds per week.

hate_speech: Asian and African countries don’t have to take the sort of mass migration that we do from their countries. This means there’s less and less white people in the UK but their countries stay true to their ethnic heritage.
counter_narrative: I'd oppose the idea that the United Kingdom is a 'white country'. The nationality of someone isn't defined by their skin color, in fact there are plenty of people that aren’t white but are as British as anybody else here.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are non-white countries allowed to exist but white countries aren’t? We’re constantly made to take in more and more black Africans.
CN: what do you mean? There's no country that doesn't allow white people

hate_speech: Really? But Muslims are the ones that do most of the terrorist attacks. We are sorrounded by Muslim terrorists!
counter_narrative: The reason why I cannot understand what you are saying is because you are probably from a different planet. Do you know what being a Muslim means?
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are violent and they are responsible for the 9/11.
CN: The question here is: is Islam responsible for the attacks committed by a small minority of people? The responsibility should only be on those who break the law.
HS: Muslims break the law by being our enemies! We have to bring them to heel: they are all terrorists.
CN: It's a myth that all Muslims are terrorists. We need to understand that all religions have had terrorists in them.

hate_speech: That's rubbish, there isn't 'anti-semitism' today, this isn't Nazi Germany. They just want attention when they complain about being targeted and 'oppressed'.
counter_narrative: If you need evidence that anti-semitism exists, just read back your own tweets.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews love to play the victim. They still rinse the holocaust for pity even today, when it happened almost a century ago.
CN: It was horrific on such a monumental scale that its effects are still felt today. It's not really 'playing the victim', more that there's a legacy of anti-semitism left from it that we still have to solve.

hate_speech: I don't care, I still think they are a burden.
counter_narrative: Discrimination against LGBT+ people often leads devastating consequences, especially since most discrimination comes from colleagues or even family members.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
CN: you're saying that all gays are bad, but these words are only your personal thought. What do you think about gay people?
HS: They are a burden to society.
CN: The gay community is not a burden to society. They are actually essential to the common good.
HS: How can it be, if they are faggots?
CN: The fact that someone likes someone of the same gender doesn't mean that they deserve less respect.

hate_speech: A "fact of life" that leads to bullying if talked about in school, which is not the right place!
counter_narrative: There's a study that says that lgbt education can actually help reduce the prejudice against gay people and the amount of harassment. (https://tcf.org/content/commentary/can-education-reduce-prejudice-lgbt-people/?agreed=1)
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are all just hiding behind our society to abuse. They are allowed to do what they want to do to us.
CN: Well, I don't understand how you can apply your words to every single person of a group, I think we as a society are mature enough to deal with different sexual orientations.
HS: Even if society is ready, children are not and I can't allow LGBTs to brainwash them. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
CN: It depends, do you think that gender identity and sexual orientation are "ideas" or "beliefs"? Because they are not. They are a fact of life, that's why it's taught in school.

hate_speech: More like feminism is about the domination of women.
counter_narrative: It doesn't have to be about the domination of women to be feminism. It is more about the equality of women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is just a terrible ideology and people shouldn't be embracing it.
CN: Instead of reinforcing harmful gender norms, feminism is a move towards more equal societies.
HS: If feminism were really about equality, they would call their movement "equalism" or some similar crap.
CN: Equalism would mean the movement for equality in general. Feminism is focused on gender. Animal rights, gay rights, anti-racism, sexism, etc. are separate issues inside the movement for equality.
HS: Those other movements are fine, feminism instead is a threat to human dignity.
CN: Feminism means equality of the genders. Equality of rights is necessary for a functioning society.

hate_speech: I can't believe it! They're a problem in my house.
counter_narrative: Muslims are not a problem. Do you have any data to back up your claim?
dialogue_history:
HS: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
CN: As long as Muslims respect our values, theirs should be respected as well, because their culture has a long history and has developed alongside ours.
HS: Islam has no place in civilised Europe, so Muslims should never be respected.
CN: Europe has always had a strong Islamic influence and this is something we should celebrate. We learn a lot from them and viceversa.
HS: That's not true, Muslims are a problem in Europe, they need to be banned.
CN: Muslims are not a problem in Europe, they just want to live their life as they see it.

hate_speech: It is, however, a violent religion and an ideology of conquest.
counter_narrative: How can you say something like that? Do you think you can say anything you want against a religion as long as it's not about the one you profess?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
CN: That's not true, Islam is like any other religion: it promotes peace and inclusion. There are many of its beliefs and practices that are compatible with the West.
HS: No, Islam is a complete and total false religion, it is a repressive ideology that stifles freedom of thought and religion.
CN: Islam is not a religion of hatred and discrimination.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
counter_narrative: Even if they did commit more crimes, black people still wouldn't be inferior to whites. Studies show that African Americans are arrested in a much greater amount than other ethnicities, and these are the reports used in the crime rate statistics.
dialogue_history:
HS: Well, to use statistics, blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
CN: We also have to consider that Africa Americans are more likely to be convicted despite being innocent. In fact, black people are wrongfully imprisoned sevenfold more compared to innocent white people.

hate_speech: We just don't need to see it everywhere, even the trains are no longer free of it. This is the start of them spreading their agenda.
counter_narrative: The LGBT+ community doesn't have an 'agenda' but public shows of support like this show people that homophobia and transphobia are unacceptable, and this might help some people feel safer in public spaces!
dialogue_history:
HS: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
CN: If you consider supporting the LGBT+ community to be 'woke nonsense' then that sounds like your problem...

hate_speech: Maybe that wasn't such a bad idea, in the end Jews don’t belong in a democratic society.
counter_narrative: Jews have always contributed to our society and are part of the fabric of our democracy. This includes their contributions to science, art, and technology.
dialogue_history:
HS: I never understood how anyone could vote for a Jew in that situation. We can't just stand by and watch these Jews run amok in our country.
CN: Why don't you remember those who have been persecuted and killed instead?

hate_speech: I hate immigrants, I will never talk to them.
counter_narrative: I'd be a millionaire in a couple of months if I had a nickel for evey time someone told me they hate immigration.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
CN: The problem is that regardless of where they're from and regardless of their qualification or rap sheet, we treat them all like criminals.
HS: Maybe that happens because we know that immigrants are, in fact, criminals
CN: Migrants are often successful people who have sacrificed a lot for this country. They managed to make the best out of their situation, and it's a shame that discrimination is preventing them from contributing even more.
HS: If they're not criminals, what do they do? They do not deserve our hospitality.
CN: Many migrants come here to work and integrate. If you talked more to them, you would know what their experience is like.

hate_speech: That's okay, but black people are inferior in many ways to us, that's why we should delete them.
counter_narrative: Being human does not make someone inferior or superior. We are all born equal.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
CN: Everyone has the right to be treated with respect and dignity, this includes black people who are biologically the same as us.
HS: I don't want to respect black people, I can't stand their race.
CN: We should respect the diversity of our society, but also respect our individual differences. Racism, even if unfortunately very present in our society, shouldn't have a place in it.

hate_speech: Despite that, I don't want to live in a nation of immigrants.
counter_narrative: How can you be sure that we are a 'nation of immigrants'? Do you have any statistics on that?
dialogue_history:
HS: We have become a nation of immigrants.
CN: We have always had a very strong working class, and of course immigrants contribute to the creation of this.

hate_speech: I don't want to believe it is peaceful, I'm tired of this is an argument
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion of peace, what more do you need me to say?
dialogue_history:
HS: I think that all Muslims are just sick and have a negative impact on Western society.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace, you cannot blame a religion for everything bad that happens.
HS: I don't want to accept that Islam is a religion of peace. Islam is a disease infecting the entire world.
CN: Islam is not a disease. It is a religion and a way of life that is very tolerant to people of all faiths, including those who do not share your religious beliefs.
HS: Islam is a violent religion, not tolerant.
CN: Violence and intolerance are not something Islam allows. The idea that Islam is hateful does not fit into reality.

hate_speech: But it is a disease, gays are no exception. They should be isolated and confined.
counter_narrative: It's the medical community that decides whether something is a disease or not, and homosexuality definitely is not a disease. Therefore they don't have to be isolated, instead everyone should accept and respect LGBT people.
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a sexual and physical preference. I do not think it is a problem for gay people to exist in society like the rest of the population.
HS: I don't understand why it's this way, homosexuals are a burden to society.
CN: Homosexuality is not a burden to society. It is a human right to love and create a family with whoever a person likes.

hate_speech: Fine, but we mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
counter_narrative: Being diverse doesn't have to do with the exclusion of people from parts of society. Diversity is about sharing experiences and ideas of different ethnicities. Thanks to this, we will be able to develop our understanding of each other and maybe even benefit from each other's knowledge.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
CN: Black people are often denied jobs, or education, but opportunities like these should be available to everyone.
HS: They're denied those opportunities because niggas coming from Africa and 'real' Americans are different. We must distinguish between them.
CN: We can't live by dividing society into national origins, we should be inclusive with people of other skin colors.

hate_speech: Ok, are you impying that I have a prejudice against Jews?
counter_narrative: Anti-Semitism is far from disappeared from the UK, the rise of Anti-Semitism is something to be more concerned about than the Jewish people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews can only act in a bad way.
CN: There may be some Jews that act badly, but many of them are good and it doesn't depend on their religion.

hate_speech: That's rubbish, there isn't 'anti-semitism' today, this isn't Nazi Germany. They just want attention when they complain about being targeted and 'oppressed'.
